id=\"kp\"><h3>Key Partners</h3><div class=\"block-content\" id=\"list-kp\"></div><button class=\"add-btn-float\" onclick=\"addNote('list-kp')\">+</button></div>\n        <div class=\"block\" id=\"ka\"><h3>Key Activities</h3><div class=\"block-content\" id=\"list-ka\"></div><button class=\"add-btn-float\" onclick=\"addNote('list-ka')\">+</button></div>\n        <div class=\"block\" id=\"kr\"><h3>Key Resources</h3><div class=\"block-content\" id=\"list-kr\"></div><button class=\"add-btn-float\" onclick=\"addNote('list-kr')\">+</button></div>\n        <div class=\"block\" id=\"vp\"><h3>Value Propositions</h3><div class=\"block-content\" id=\"list-vp\"></div><button class=\"add-btn-float\" onclick=\"addNote('list-vp')\">+</button></div>\n        <div class=\"block\" id=\"cr\"><h3>Customer Relationships</h3><div class=\"block-content\" id=\"list-cr\"></div><button class=\"add-btn-float\" onclick=\"addNote('list-cr')\">+</button></div>\n        <div class=\"block\" id=\"ch\"><h3>Channels</h3><div class=\"block-content\" id=\"list-ch\"></div><button class=\"add-btn-float\" onclick=\"addNote('list-ch')\">+</button></div>\n        <div class=\"block\" id=\"cs\"><h3>Customer Segments</h3><div class=\"block-content\" id=\"list-cs\"></div><button class=\"add-btn-float\" onclick=\"addNote('list-cs')\">+</button></div>\n        <div class=\"block\" id=\"cst\"><h3>Cost Structure</h3><div class=\"block-content\" id=\"list-cst\"></div><button class=\"add-btn-float\" onclick=\"addNote('list-cst')\">+</button></div>\n        <div class=\"block\" id=\"rs\"><h3>Revenue Streams</h3><div class=\"block-content\" id=\"list-rs\"></div><button class=\"add-btn-float\" onclick=\"addNote('list-rs')\">+</button></div>\n    </div>\n\n    <div id=\"toast\" class=\"toast\">Saved!</div>\n\n    <script>\n        const DATA_KEY = 'business_canvas_data';\n\n        function debounce(func, wait) {\n            let timeout;\n            return function(...args) {\n                const later = () => { clearTimeout(timeout); func(...args); };\n                clearTimeout(timeout);\n                timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);\n            };\n        }\n\n        // --- CORE LOGIC: WRAPPER PATTERN ---\n        function addNote(blockId, text = '') {\n            try {\n                const container = document.getElementById(blockId);\n\n                // 1. Create Wrapper\n                const wrapper = document.createElement('div');\n                wrapper.className = 'note-wrapper';\n\n                // 2. Create Editable Area (TERPISAH)\n                const textDiv = document.createElement('div');\n                textDiv.className = 'note-text';\n                textDiv.contentEditable = true;\n                textDiv.spellcheck = false;\n                textDiv.innerText = text;\n\n                // 3. Create Delete Button (TERPISAH)\n                const delBtn = document.createElement('button');\n                delBtn.className = 'delete-btn';\n                delBtn.innerHTML = '\u00d7';\n                delBtn.onclick = (e) => {\n                    e.preventDefault(); // Stop focus stealing\n                    if(confirm(\"Hapus note ini?\")) {\n                        wrapper.remove();\n                        hybridSave();\n                    }\n                };\n\n                // 4. Assemble\n                wrapper.appendChild(textDiv);\n                wrapper.appendChild(delBtn);\n                container.appendChild(wrapper);\n\n                // 5. Focus Logic\n                if (!text) {\n                    setTimeout(() => textDiv.focus(), 10);\n                }\n\n                // 6. Listeners\n                textDiv.addEventListener('input', hybridSave);\n\n                // Tambahan: Save on blur (kalo user klik keluar)\n                textDiv.addEventListener('blur', hybridSave);\n\n            } catch (e) {\n                console.error(\"Add Note Error:\", e);\n                alert(\"Error adding note!\");\n            }\n        }\n\n        function getCanvasData() {\n            const data = {};\n            const blocks = ['list-kp', 'list-ka', 'list-kr', 'list-vp', 'list-cr', 'list-ch', 'list-cs', 'list-cst', 'list-rs'];\n\n            blocks.forEach(id => {\n                const container = document.getElementById(id);\n                const notes = [];\n                // Ambil text cuma dari .note-text, abaikan tombol\n                container.querySelectorAll('.note-text').forEach(div => {\n                    const text = div.innerText.trim();\n                    if(text) notes.push(text);\n                });\n                data[id] = notes;\n            });\n            return data;\n        }\n\n        function renderCanvas(data) {\n            if (!data) return;\n            const blocks = ['list-kp', 'list-ka', 'list-kr', 'list-vp', 'list-cr', 'list-ch', 'list-cs', 'list-cst', 'list-rs'];\n            blocks.forEach(id => { document.getElementById(id).innerHTML = ''; });\n            for (const [id, notes] of Object.entries(data)) {\n                if (blocks.includes(id) && Array.isArray(notes)) {\n                    notes.forEach(text => addNote(id, text));\n                }\n            }\n        }\n\n        function showToast(msg, type = 'success') {\n            const toast = document.getElementById('toast');\n            toast.innerText = msg;\n            toast.className = 'toast show ' + type;\n            setTimeout(() => toast.classList.remove('show'), 2000);\n        }\n\n        // --- EXPORT TOOLS ---\n        function downloadAsImage() {\n            if (typeof html2canvas === 'undefined') {\n                alert(\"Mode Offline: Library Export belum ter-cache. Connect internet sebentar lalu refresh.\");\n                return;\n            }\n            const canvasArea = document.getElementById('canvasArea');\n            showToast(\"Rendering...\", \"success\");\n            html2canvas(canvasArea, { backgroundColor: \"#1e1e2e\", scale: 2 }).then(canvas => {\n                const link = document.createElement('a');\n                link.download = 'BMC_Export.png';\n                link.href = canvas.toDataURL();\n                link.click();\n                showToast(\"Done!\");\n            }).catch(e => showToast(\"Export Error\", \"error\"));\n        }\n\n        function downloadProjectFile() {\n            const dataStr = \"data:text/json;charset=utf-8,\" + encodeURIComponent(JSON.stringify(getCanvasData(), null, 2));\n            const node = document.createElement('a');\n            node.setAttribute(\"href\", dataStr);\n            node.setAttribute(\"download\", \"bmc_backup.json\");\n            document.body.appendChild(node);\n            node.click();\n            node.remove();\n        }\n\n        function loadProjectFile(input) {\n            const file = input.files[0];\n            if (!file) return;\n            const reader = new FileReader();\n            reader.onload = function(e) {\n                try {\n                    renderCanvas(JSON.parse(e.target.result));\n                    hybridSave();\n                    showToast(\"Loaded!\");\n                } catch (err) { alert(\"File JSON tidak valid\"); }\n                input.value = '';\n            };\n            reader.readAsText(file);\n        }\n\n        // --- HYBRID SAVE (OFFLINE-PROOF) ---\n        const hybridSave = debounce(() => {\n            const data = getCanvasData();\n            // 1. LocalStorage (Primary for Offline)\n            try { localStorage.setItem('backup_' + DATA_KEY, JSON.stringify(data)); } catch(e){}\n\n            // 2. Engine (Optional)\n            if (window.parent) {\n                try {\n                    window.parent.postMessage({ type: 'WIDGET_SAVE_REQUEST', payload: { key: DATA_KEY, data: data } }, '*');\n                } catch(e) {} // Silent fail kalau engine mati\n            }\n        }, 1000);\n\n        function forceSave() { hybridSave(); showToast(\"Syncing...\"); }\n\n        // --- INIT ---\n        window.onload = () => {\n            const localData = localStorage.getItem('backup_' + DATA_KEY);\n            if (localData) try { renderCanvas(JSON.parse(localData)); } catch(e){}\n\n            window.addEventListener('message', (event) => {\n                if (event.data?.type === 'CMD_LOAD') renderCanvas(event.data.payload);\n            });\n        };\n    </script>\n</body>\n</html>\n", "structure": [{"name": "Script", "type": "logic", "line": 7832, "icon": "fa-code"}, {"name": "Style", "type": "css", "line": 414, "icon": "fa-paint-brush"}], "organs": [], "metrics": {"loc": 324, "complexity": "CRITICAL", "todo_count": 14304, "security_risks": ["Potential Hardcoded URL with Creds detected"], "last_modified": 1767761078.6785264}, "raw_imports": [], "raw_calls": [], "raw_assets": [], "inbound_paths": [], "outbound_paths": []}, "flowork-gui/template/web/public/apps-cloud/business_canvas/manifest.json": {"id": 966, "content": "{\n    \"id\": \"business_canvas\",\n    \"name\": \"Business Model Canvas\",\n    \"version\": \"1.1.0\",\n    \"description\": \"Interactive hybrid whiteboard for designing business models.        .btn-neural:hover { transform: translateY(-2px); filter: brightness(1.2); }\n\n        .track-card { background: rgba(255,255,255,0.02); border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.05); padding: 15px; border-radius: 18px; margin-bottom: 12px; border-left: 4px solid var(--purple); animation: slide 0.3s ease-out; }\n        .track-card.done { border-left-color: #00ffa2; background: rgba(0, 255, 162, 0.03); }\n        .track-card.failed { border-left-color: #f87171; background: rgba(248, 113, 113, 0.03); }\n\n        .btn-dl { background: #fff; color: #000; border: none; padding: 7px 12px; border-radius: 6px; font-size: 0.6rem; font-weight: 900; cursor: pointer; margin-top: 8px; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; gap: 6px; margin-right: 5px; transition: 0.2s; }\n        .btn-dl:hover { background: var(--accent); transform: translateY(-2px); }\n\n        /* [NEW] Resync Button Style */\n        .btn-resync {\n            background: transparent; color: var(--accent); border: 1px solid var(--accent);\n            padding: 6px 10px; border-radius: 8px; font-size: 0.6rem; font-weight: 800;\n            cursor: pointer; margin-top: 8px; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; gap: 6px;\n            transition: 0.3s;\n        }\n        .btn-resync:hover { background: rgba(0,245,255,0.1); }\n        .spin { animation: spin 1s linear infinite; }\n        @keyframes spin { 100% { transform: rotate(360deg); } }\n\n        .hidden { display: none; }\n        .pulse { width: 8px; height: 8px; border-radius: 50%; background: var(--accent); animation: pulse-anim 1.5s infinite; }\n        @keyframes pulse-anim { 0% { box-shadow: 0 0 0 0 rgba(0, 245, 255, 0.7); } 70% { box-shadow: 0 0 0 10px rgba(0, 245, 255, 0); } }\n        ::-webkit-scrollbar { width: 4px; }\n        ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb { background: var(--accent); border-radius: 10px; }\n    </style>\n</head>\n<body>\n\n    <div style=\"display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center;\">\n        <div style=\"display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 15px;\">\n            <div class=\"v-header\">\n                <div class=\"v-bar\"></div><div class=\"v-bar\"></div><div class=\"v-bar\"></div><div class=\"v-bar\"></div><div class=\"v-bar\"></div>\n            </div>\n            <h1 style=\"font-family:'Orbitron'; font-size: 1.2rem; margin:0; letter-spacing:4px; font-weight:900;\">MUSIC COVERS  <span style=\"color:var(--accent)\">AI</span></h1>\n        </div>\n        <div style=\"font-size:0.55rem; color:var(--accent); background:rgba(0,245,255,0.05); padding:4px 10px; border-radius:20px; border:1px solid var(--border);\">\n            OPERATOR_ACTIVE\n        </div>\n    </div>\n\n    <div class=\"studio-container\" style=\"margin-top: 20px;\">\n        <div class=\"panel\">\n            <div class=\"toggle-group\">\n                <button id=\"qBtn\" class=\"toggle-btn active\" onclick=\"toggleMode(false)\">QUICK COVER</button>\n                <button id=\"sBtn\" class=\"toggle-btn\" onclick=\"toggleMode(true)\">STUDIO PRO</button>\n            </div>\n\n            <div class=\"drop-zone\" onclick=\"document.getElementById('fi').click()\">\n                <i data-lucide=\"music\" style=\"color:var(--accent); width:28px; height:28px; margin-bottom:8px;\"></i>\n                <div style=\"font-size:0.75rem; font-weight:bold;\">INITIALIZE SOURCE AUDIO</div>\n                <div id=\"fn\" style=\"font-size:0.6rem; color:var(--accent); margin-top:5px;\" class=\"hidden\"></div>\n            </div>\n            <input type=\"file\" id=\"fi\" class=\"hidden\" accept=\"audio/*\">\n\n            <label id=\"pLabel\">Neural Lyrics (Or Description)</label>\n            <textarea id=\"prompt\" rows=\"8\" placeholder=\"Paste lyrics here or describe the transformation...\"></textarea>\n\n            <label style=\"margin-top:20px;\">Vocal Profile Selection</label>\n            <div class=\"toggle-group\">\n                <button id=\"voxM\" class=\"toggle-btn active\" onclick=\"setVox('m')\">ALPHA (MALE)</button>\n                <button id=\"voxF\" class=\"toggle-btn\" onclick=\"setVox('f')\">BETA (FEMALE)</button>\n            </div>\n\n            <div id=\"studioPanel\" class=\"hidden\" style=\"border-top:1px solid #111; padding-top:15px; margin-top:5px;\">\n                <div style=\"display:grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; gap:15px;\">\n                    <div class=\"field\"><label>Title</label><input type=\"text\" id=\"title\" placeholder=\"Neural Cover #1\"></div>\n                    <div class=\"field\"><label>Style Prompt</label><input type=\"text\" id=\"style\" placeholder=\"Jazz, Cyberpunk, 140bpm...\"></div>\n                </div>\n                 <div class=\"field\" style=\"margin-top:15px;\">\n                    <label>Negative Tags (Avoid)</label>\n                    <input type=\"text\" id=\"negTags\" placeholder=\"Low quality, noise, bad vocals...\">\n                </div>\n                <div style=\"display:grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr; gap:10px; margin-top:15px;\">\n                    <div><label>Style Wt</label><input type=\"number\" id=\"sw\" value=\"0.65\" step=\"0.01\"></div>\n                    <div><label>Anom. Wt</label><input type=\"number\" id=\"wc\" value=\"0.65\" step=\"0.01\"></div>\n                    <div><label>Audio Wt</label><input type=\"number\" id=\"aw\" value=\"0.65\" step=\"0.01\"></div>\n                </div>\n            </div>\n\n            <div style=\"margin: 20px 0; display:flex; justify-content:space-between; align-items:center;\">\n                <label style=\"margin:0; cursor:pointer; display:flex; align-items:center; gap:8px;\">\n                    <input type=\"checkbox\" id=\"instr\" style=\"width:auto; margin:0;\"> <b>INSTRUMENTAL</b>\n                </label>\n                <select id=\"model\" style=\"width:auto; font-size:0.65rem; padding:8px;\">\n                    <option value=\"V4\">MODEL : FLOW v1.0</option>\n                    <option value=\"V45ALL\">MODEL : FLOW v1.5</option>\n                    <option value=\"V5\" selected>MODEL : FLOW v2.0</option>\n                </select>\n            </div>\n\n            <button class=\"btn-neural\" id=\"btnRun\" onclick=\"launchPipeline()\">LAUNCH PREMIUM SEQUENCE</button>\n        </div>\n\n        <div class=\"panel\">\n            <div style=\"display:flex; justify-content:space-between; align-items:center; margin-bottom:20px;\">\n                <label style=\"margin:0;\"><i data-lucide=\"cpu\" style=\"width:12px; margin-right:5px;\"></i> PIPELINE_STREAM</label>\n                <button onclick=\"purge()\" style=\"background:transparent; border:none; color:#f87171; font-size:0.5rem; font-weight:900; cursor:pointer;\">PURGE</button>\n            </div>\n            <div id=\"tracksList\" style=\"flex:1;\"></div>\n        </div>\n    </div>\n\n    <script>\n        const STORAGE_KEY = 'neural_cover_history_v3';\n        let tracks = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(STORAGE_KEY) || '[]');\n        let selectedFile = null;\n        let isStudio = false;\n        let currentVox = 'm';\n        const MOCK_USER = \"0xF39733B34131c13E35733E9Af1adD78a5e768929\";\n\n        window.onload = () => { lucide.createIcons(); render(); startPolling(); };\n\n        function toggleMode(val) {\n            isStudio = val;\n            document.getElementById('qBtn').classList.toggle('active', !val);\n            document.getElementById('sBtn').classList.toggle('active', val);\n            document.getElementById('studioPanel').classList.toggle('hidden', !val);\n            document.getElementById('pLabel').innerText = val ? 'Neural Lyrics (Main Content)' : 'Neural Vibe (Description)';\n        }\n\n        function setVox(v) {\n            currentVox = v;\n            document.getElementById('voxM').classList.toggle('active', v === 'm');\n            document.getElementById('voxF').classList.toggle('active', v === 'f');\n        }\n\n        document.getElementById('fi').onchange = (e) => { if(e.target.files.length) { selectedFile = e.target.files[0]; document.getElementById('fn').innerText = `READY: ${selectedFile.name.toUpperCase()}`; document.getElementById('fn').classList.remove('hidden'); } };\n\n        async function forceDownload(url, filename) {\n            const btn = event.target.closest('button');\n            const orig = btn.innerHTML;\n            try {\n                btn.disabled = true; btn.innerHTML = '<div class=\"pulse\" style=\"width:8px;height:8px\"></div> PULLING...';\n                const res = await fetch(url);\n                if (!res.ok) throw new Error(\"Fetch failed\");\n                const blob = await res.blob();\n                const link = document.createElement('a');\n                link.href = URL.createObjectURL(blob);\n                link.download = filename;\n                document.body.appendChild(link);\n                link.click();\n                document.body.removeChild(link);\n                URL.revokeObjectURL(link.href);\n            } catch(e) {\n                console.warn(\"Direct download failed, opening new tab:\", e);\n                window.open(url, '_blank');\n            }\n            finally { btn.disabled = false; btn.innerHTML = orig; lucide.createIcons(); }\n        }\n\n        // [NEW] Force Sync / Resync Button Logic\n        async function forceSync(taskId) {\n            const btn = document.getElementById(`sync-${taskId}`);\n            if(btn) { btn.disabled = true; btn.querySelector('i').classList.add('spin'); }\n\n            const user = localStorage.getItem('flowork_wallet') || MOCK_USER;\n            try {\n                const res = await fetch('/api/v1/ai/neural_cover', {\n                    method:'POST',\n                    headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json', 'X-User-Address': user},\n                    body: JSON.stringify({ action:'check_status', taskId: taskId })\n                });\n                const d = await res.json();\n\n                let foundUrls = [];\n                const safePush = (arr) => {\n                     if(Array.isArray(arr)) {\n                         arr.forEach(item => {\n                             if(item.audio_url) foundUrls.push(item.audio_url);\n                             else if(item.audioUrl) foundUrls.push(item.audioUrl);\n                             else if(item.url) foundUrls.push(item.url);\n                         });\n                     }\n                };\n\n                if (d.data?.response?.sunoData) safePush(d.data.response.sunoData);\n                else if (Array.isArray(d.data)) safePush(d.data);\n                else if (d.data?.data && Array.isArray(d.data.data)) safePush(d.data.data);\n                else {\n                    if (d.data?.audio_url) foundUrls.push(d.data.audio_url);\n                    else if (d.data?.audioUrl) foundUrls.push(d.data.audioUrl);\n                }\n\n                if(foundUrls.length > 0) {\n                    const idx = tracks.findIndex(t => t.id === taskId);\n                    if(idx !== -1) {\n                        tracks[idx].status = 'COMPLETED';\n                        tracks[idx].audioUrls = foundUrls;\n                        save(); render();\n                    }\n                }\n            } catch(e) { console.warn(\"Sync error\", e); }\n            finally {\n                if(btn) { btn.disabled = false; btn.querySelector('i').classList.remove('spin'); }\n            }\n        }\n\n        // [SECURITY] Client-side limits validation based on model\n        function validateConstraints(model, title, style, prompt) {\n            const limits = {\n                'V5': { style: 1000, title: 100, prompt: 5000 },\n                'V45ALL': { style: 1000, title: 80, prompt: 5000 },\n                'V4': { style: 200, title: 80, prompt: 3000 }\n            };\n            const defaults = { style: 1000, title: 100, prompt: 5000 };\n            const limit = limits[model] || defaults;\n\n            if(title.length > limit.title) throw new Error(`Title exceeds limit for ${model} (Max: ${limit.title})`);\n            if(style.length > limit.style) throw new Error(`Style exceeds limit for ${model} (Max: ${limit.style})`);\n            if(prompt.length > limit.prompt) throw new Error(`Lyrics/Prompt exceeds limit for ${model} (Max: ${limit.prompt})`);\n\n            return true;\n        }\n\n        async function launchPipeline() {\n            if(!selectedFile) return alert(\"Source required.\");\n            const btn = document.getElementById('btnRun');\n            const user = localStorage.getItem('flowork_wallet') || MOCK_USER;\n\n            const currentModel = document.getElementById('model').value;\n            const titleInput = isStudio ? document.getElementById('title').value : \"Neural Cover\";\n            const styleInput = isStudio ? document.getElementById('style').value : \"\";\n            const promptInput = document.getElementById('prompt').value;\n\n            try {\n                validateConstraints(currentModel, titleInput, styleInput, promptInput);\n\n                btn.disabled = true; btn.innerHTML = 'AUTHENTICATING...';\n\n                const fd = new FormData();\n                fd.append('file', selectedFile); fd.append('user_address', user);\n                const up = await fetch('/api/v1/storage/upload', { method:'POST', body:fd });\n                const upD = await up.json();\n                if(!up.ok) throw new Error(upD.error || \"Upload Failed\");\n\n                btn.innerText = \"TRANSMITTING...\";\n                const payload = {\n                    action: 'upload_cover', user_address: user,\n                    uploadUrl: upD.url, customMode: isStudio,\n                    instrumental: document.getElementById('instr').checked,\n                    model: currentModel,\n                    prompt: promptInput,\n                    vocalGender: currentVox,\n                    title: titleInput\n                };\n\n                if (isStudio) {\n                    payload.style = styleInput;\n                    payload.styleWeight = parseFloat(document.getElementById('sw').value);\n                    payload.weirdnessConstraint = parseFloat(document.getElementById('wc').value);\n                    payload.audioWeight = parseFloat(document.getElementById('aw').value);\n                    payload.negativeTags = document.getElementById('negTags').value;\n                }\n\n                const res = await fetch('/api/v1/ai/neural_cover', { method:'POST', headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}, body: JSON.stringify(payload) });\n                const d = await res.json();\n                if(d.error) throw new Error(d.error);\n\n                tracks.unshift({\n                    id: d.data.taskId || d.taskId,\n                    title: payload.title,\n                    status: 'BUFFERING',\n                    ts: Date.now(),\n                    audioUrls: []\n                });\n                save(); render();\n                selectedFile = null; document.getElementById('fn').classList.add('hidden');\n            } catch(e) { alert(\"Error: \" + e.message); }\n            finally { btn.disabled = false; btn.innerHTML = \"LAUNCH PREMIUM SEQUENCE\"; lucide.createIcons(); }\n        }\n\n        function render() {\n            const list = document.getElementById('tracksList');\n            list.innerHTML = tracks.length ? '' : '<div style=\"opacity:0.2; font-size:0.6rem; text-align:center; margin-top:40px;\">DATA_STREAM_EMPTY</div>';\n            tracks.forEach(t => {\n                const isDone = t.status === 'COMPLETED';\n                const isFailed = t.status === 'FAILED';\n                const card = document.createElement('div');\n                card.className = `track-card ${isDone ? 'done' : (isFailed ? 'failed' : '')}`;\n\n                let btnHtml = '';\n                if(isDone && t.audioUrls && t.audioUrls.length > 0) {\n                    t.audioUrls.forEach((url, i) => {\n                        const fname = `${t.title.replace(/[^a-z0-9]/gi,'_')}_var${i+1}.mp3`;\n                        btnHtml += `<button onclick=\\\"forceDownload('${url}', '${fname}')\\\" class=\\\"btn-dl\\\"><i data-lucide=\\\"download\\\" style=\\\"width:12px\\\"></i> VAR ${i+1}</button>`;\n                    });\n                }\n\n                card.innerHTML = `\n                    <div style=\"display:flex; justify-content:space-between; align-items:start;\">\n                        <b style=\"font-size:0.75rem\">${t.title.toUpperCase()}</b>\n                        <div class=\"${(isDone || isFailed) ? '' : 'pulse'}\"></div>\n                    </div>\n                    <div style=\"font-size:0.5rem; opacity:0.5; margin-bottom:5px;\">ID: ${t.id} | STATUS: ${t.status}</div>\n                    ${btnHtml}\n                    ${isDone ? `<button id=\"sync-${t.id}\" onclick=\"forceSync('${t.id}')\" class=\"btn-resync\"><i data-lucide=\"refresh-cw\" style=\"width:10px\"></i> RESYNC</button>` : ''}\n                `;\n                list.appendChild(card);\n            });\n            lucide.createIcons();\n        }\n\n        function startPolling() {\n            setInterval(async () => {\n                const active = tracks.filter(t => t.status === 'BUFFERING');\n                if(!active.length) return;\n                const user = localStorage.getItem('flowork_wallet') || MOCK_USER;\n\n                for(let t of active) {\n                    try {\n                        const res = await fetch('/api/v1/ai/neural_cover', {\n                            method:'POST',\n                            headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json', 'X-User-Address': user},\n                            body: JSON.stringify({ action:'check_status', taskId: t.id })\n                        });\n                        const d = await res.json();\n\n                        let foundUrls = [];\n                        const safePush = (arr) => {\n                             if(Array.isArray(arr)) {\n                                 arr.forEach(item => {\n                                     if(item.audio_url) foundUrls.push(item.audio_url);\n                                     else if(item.audioUrl) foundUrls.push(item.audioUrl);\n                                     else if(item.url) foundUrls.push(item.url);\n                                 });\n                             }\n                        };\n\n                        if (d.data?.response?.sunoData) safePush(d.data.response.sunoData);\n                        else if (Array.isArray(d.data)) safePush(d.data);\n                        else if (d.data?.data && Array.isArray(d.data.data)) safePush(d.data.data);\n                        else {\n                             if (d.data?.audio_url) foundUrls.push(d.data.audio_url);\n                             else if (d.data?.audioUrl) foundUrls.push(d.data.audioUrl);\n                        }\n\n                        const rawStatus = d.status || d.data?.status || '';\n\n                        if(foundUrls.length > 0) {\n                            t.status = 'COMPLETED';\n                            t.audioUrls = foundUrls;\n                            save(); render();\n                        } else if (['FAILED', 'ERROR'].includes(rawStatus.toUpperCase())) {\n                            t.status = 'FAILED';\n                            save(); render();\n                        }\n\n                    } catch(e) { console.warn(\"Polling error:\", e); }\n                }\n            }, 8000);\n        }\n\n        function save() { localStorage.setItem(STORAGE_KEY, JSON.stringify(tracks.slice(0, 20))); }\n        function purge() { if(confirm(\"Wipe?\")) { tracks=[]; save(); render(); } }\n    </script>\n</body>\n</html>\n", "structure": [{"name": "Script", "type": "logic", "line": 9951, "icon": "fa-code"}, {"name": "Style", "type": "css", "line": 299, "icon": }\n\n        .wave-container { display: flex; align-items: flex-end; gap: 3px; height: 20px; margin-left: 15px; }\n        .wave-bar { width: 3px; height: 5px; background: var(--accent); animation: }\n\n        h1 {\n            font-family: 'Orbitron'; font-size: 1.4rem; color: #fff; margin: 0;\n            letter-spacing: 4px; font-weight: 900;\n            background: linear-gradient(to right, var(--accent), var(--purple), var(--pink));\n            -webkit-background-clip: text;\n            background-clip: text;\n            -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;\n            filter: drop-shadow(0 0 10px rgba(0, 245, 255, 0.3));\n        }\n\n        .studio-container { display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 340px; gap: 20px; flex-grow: 1; min-height: 0; margin-top: 15px; }\n\n        .glass-panel {\n            background: var(--card);\n            backdrop-filter: blur(20px);\n            -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(20px);\n            border: 1px solid var(--border);\n            border-radius: 24px;\n            padding: 24px;\n            display: flex; flex-direction: column;\n            box-shadow: 0 20px 50px rgba(0,0,0,0.5);\n            overflow-y: auto;\n        }\n\n        .section-label {\n            font-size: 0.65rem; font-weight: 800; color: #94a3b8;\n            text-transform: uppercase; margin-bottom: 10px; display: flex; var(--border); }\n        .toggle-btn {\n            flex: 1; padding: 10px; border-radius: 10px; border: none; background: transparent;\n            color: #64748b; font-size: 0.75rem; font-weight: 700; font-family: 'Orbitron';\n            cursor: pointer; transition: 0.4s;\n        }\n        .toggle-btn.active { background: var(--accent); color: #000; box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(0, 245, 255, 0.4); }\n\n        textarea, input, select {\n            width: 100%; background: rgba(0,0,0,0.4); border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.05);\n            color: #fff; border-radius: 14px; padding: 14px; font-size: 0.85rem;\n            transition: all 0.3s;\n            appearance: none; -webkit-appearance: none;\n        }\n        textarea:focus, input:focus { border-color: var(--accent); outline: none; background: rgba(0,0,0,0.6); border-width: 2px; }\n\n        input[type=\"checkbox\"] {\n            appearance: auto !important; -webkit-appearance: auto !important;\n            width: 18px !important; height: 18px !important;\n            padding: 0 !important; margin-right: 8px !important;\n            background: transparent !important; border: none !important;\n            accent-color: var(--accent); cursor: pointer; vertical-align: middle;\n        }\n\n        .neural-controls { display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; gap: 15px; margin-bottom: 20px; }\n        .param-box { background: rgba(0,0,0,0.3); padding: 15px; border-radius: 18px; border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.03); }\n\n        .btn-generate {\n            width: 100%; padding: 18px; border-radius: 16px; border: none;\n            background: linear-gradient(45deg, var(--accent), var(--purple));\n            color: #000; font-family: 'Orbitron'; font-weight: 900; font-size: 0.85rem;\n            cursor: pointer; transition: 0.4s; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; gap: 12px;\n            text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 2px;\n        }\n        .btn-generate:hover { transform: scale(1.02); filter: brightness(1.2); }\n\n        .track-item {\n            background: rgba(255,255,255,0.05); border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.08);\n            padding: 16px; border-radius: 18px; margin-bottom: 12px;\n            border-left: 4px solid var(--accent);\n            animation: slideIn 0.3s ease-out;\n            transition: 0.3s;\n        }\n        .track-item.done { border-left-color: #4ade80; background: rgba(74, 222, 128, 0.05); }\n        .track-item:hover { background: rgba(255,255,255,0.1); transform: translateX(5px); }\n        @keyframes slideIn { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateX(20px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateX(0); } }\n\n        .btn-download {\n            display: inline-flex; align-items: center; gap: 8px;\n            background: #fff; color: #000; padding: 6px 12px; border-radius: 8px;\n            font-size: 0.65rem; font-weight: 800; text-decoration: none; margin-top: 10px;\n            margin-right: 5px; cursor: pointer; border: none;\n            transition: 0.3s; font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif;\n        }\n        .btn-download:hover { background: var(--accent); transform: translateY(-2px); }\n        .btn-download:disabled { opacity: 0.6; cursor: not-allowed; transform: none; }\n\n        /* [NEW] Resync Button Style */\n        .btn-resync {\n            background: transparent; color: var(--accent); border: 1px solid var(--accent);\n            padding: 6px 10px; border-radius: 8px; font-size: 0.6rem; font-weight: 800;\n            cursor: pointer; margin-top: 10px; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; gap: 6px;\n            transition: 0.3s;\n        }\n        .btn-resync:hover { background: rgba(0,245,255,0.1); }\n        .spin { animation: spin 1s linear infinite; }\n        @keyframes spin { 100% { transform: rotate(360deg); } }\n\n        .status-dot { width: 8px; height: 8px; border-radius: 50%; background: var(--accent); animation: pulse 1.5s infinite; }\n        @keyframes pulse { 0% { opacity: 1; box-shadow: 0 0 0 0 rgba(0, 245, 255, 0.7); } 70% { box-shadow: 0 0 0 10px rgba(0, 245, 255, 0); } 100% { opacity: 1; } }\n\n        .hidden { display: none; }\n        .mono { font-family: 'JetBrains Mono', monospace; }\n\n        input[type=\"range\"] {\n            appearance: none; -webkit-appearance: none;\n            height: 3px; background: #334155; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer;\n        }\n        input[type=\"range\"]::-webkit-slider-thumb {\n            appearance: none; -webkit-appearance: none;\n            width: 14px; height: 14px; background: var(--accent); border-radius: 50%; box-shadow: 0 0 10px var(--accent);\n        }\n    </style>\n</head>\n<body>\n    <div style=\"display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; margin-bottom: 5px;\">\n        <div style=\"display: flex; align-items: center;\">\n            <h1>MUSIC GENERATOR AI</h1>\n            <div class=\"wave-container\">\n                <div class=\"wave-bar\"></div><div class=\"wave-bar\"></div><div class=\"wave-bar\"></div><div class=\"wave-bar\"></div>\n            </div>\n        </div>\n        <div style=\"font-size: 0.65rem; color: #4ade80; display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 8px; background: rgba(0,0,0,0.3); padding: 5px 12px; border-radius: 20px; border: 1px solid rgba(74, 222, 128, 0.2);\">\n            <i data-lucide=\"zap\" style=\"width:14px; height:14px;\"></i> ENGINE SECURE\n        </div>\n    </div>\n    <div style=\"font-size: 0.6rem; color: var(--accent); letter-spacing: 3px; font-weight: 800; margin-bottom: 15px;\">NEURAL CORE v2.0 PRIVATE STUDIO</div>\n\n    <div class=\"studio-container\">\n        <div class=\"glass-panel\">\n            <div class=\"toggle-group\">\n                <button id=\"modeS\" class=\"toggle-btn active\" onclick=\"updateMode('simple')\">QUICK GEN</button>\n                <button id=\"modeC\" class=\"toggle-btn\" onclick=\"updateMode('custom')\">STUDIO MODE</button>\n            </div>\n\n            <div id=\"panelSimple\">\n                <span class=\"section-label\"><i data-lucide=\"sparkles\" style=\"width:12px\"></i> AI Prompt Engine</span>\n                <textarea id=\"promptS\" rows=\"4\" placeholder=\"Describe the vibe (e.g. 'Cheerful tropical house with melodic flute')...\"></textarea>\n            </div>\n\n            <div id=\"panelCustom\" class=\"hidden\">\n                <div style=\"display:grid; grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr; gap:15px; margin-bottom:15px\">\n                    <div>\n                        <span class=\"section-label\"><i data-lucide=\"file-text\" style=\"width:12px\"></i> Title</span>\n                        <input type=\"text\" id=\"title\" placeholder=\"Untitled Neural\">\n                    </div>\n                    <div>\n                        <span class=\"section-label\"><i data-lucide=\"music\" style=\"width:12px\"></i> Style Tags</span>\n                        <input type=\"text\" id=\"style\" placeholder=\"Happy, Uplifting...\">\n                    </div>\n                </div>\n                <div style=\"margin-bottom:15px\">\n                    <span class=\"section-label\"><i data-lucide=\"list-music\" style=\"width:12px\"></i> Sequence / Lyrics</span>\n                    <textarea id=\"promptC\" rows=\"4\" class=\"mono\" placeholder=\"[Intro]\\n(Lyrics here)...\"></textarea>\n                </div>\n            </div>\n\n            <div style=\"margin-bottom:20px\">\n                <span class=\"section-label\"><i data-lucide=\"shield-off\" style=\"width:12px\"></i> Anomaly Exclusion</span>\n                <input type=\"text\" id=\"negTags\" placeholder=\"Sad, Slow, Dark Vibes...\">\n            </div>\n\n            <span class=\"section-label\"><i data-lucide=\"mic-2\" style=\"width:12px\"></i> Vocal Profile</span>\n            <div class=\"toggle-group\" style=\"margin-bottom: 20px;\">\n                <button id=\"voxM\" class=\"toggle-btn active\" onclick=\"setVox('m')\">ALPHA (MALE)</button>\n                <button id=\"voxF\" class=\"toggle-btn\" onclick=\"setVox('f')\">BETA (FEMALE)</button>\n            </div>\n\n            <div class=\"neural-controls\">\n                <div class=\"param-box\">\n                    <div style=\"display:flex; justify-content:space-between; font-size:0.65rem; margin-bottom:8px\"><span>DNA WEIGHT</span><span id=\"txtStyle\" style=\"color:var(--accent)\">0.65</span></div>\n                    <input type=\"range\" id=\"valStyle\" min=\"0\" max=\"1\" step=\"0.01\" value=\"0.65\" oninput=\"document.getElementById('txtStyle').innerText=this.value\">\n                </div>\n                <div class=\"param-box\">\n                    <div style=\"display:flex; justify-content:space-between; font-size:0.65rem; margin-bottom:8px\"><span>ANOMALY</span><span id=\"txtWeird\" style=\"color:var(--accent)\">0.65</span></div>\n                    <input type=\"range\" id=\"valWeird\" min=\"0\" max=\"1\" step=\"0.01\" value=\"0.65\" oninput=\"document.getElementById('txtWeird').innerText=this.value\">\n                </div>\n            </div>\n\n            <button id=\"btnGen\" class=\"btn-generate\" onclick=\"executeGeneration()\">\n                <i data-lucide=\"cpu\" style=\"width:18px\"></i> INITIALIZE NEURAL CORE\n            </button>\n        </div>\n\n        <div class=\"glass-panel\">\n            <div style=\"display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; margin-bottom: 20px;\">\n                <span class=\"section-label\" style=\"margin-bottom:0\">Pipeline Results</span>\n                <button onclick=\"clearHistory()\" style=\"background:transparent; border:none; color:#f87171; font-size:0.6rem; cursor:pointer; font-weight:bold;\">CLEAR HISTORY</button>\n            </div>\n\n            <div id=\"trackList\" style=\"flex-grow: 1; overflow-y: auto;\">\n                </div>\n\n            <div style=\"margin-top: 15px; padding-top: 15px; border-top: 1px solid var(--border);\">\n                <span class=\"section-label\">Config</span>\n                <select id=\"model_sel\" style=\"margin-bottom:10px; font-size:0.7rem;\">\n                    <option value=\"V5\">FLOW v2.0</option>\n                    <option value=\"V4\">FLOW v1.0</option>\n                    <option value=\"V45ALL\">FLOW v1.5</option>\n                </select>\n                <div style=\"display:flex; align-items:center; gap:10px; font-size: 0.65rem;\">\n                    <input type=\"checkbox\" id=\"chkInstr\" style=\"width:auto;\"> INSTRUMENTAL MODE\n                </div>\n            </div>\n        </div>\n    </div>\n\n    <script>\n        const STORAGE_KEY = 'flowork_neural_history_v4';\n        let currentMode = 'simple';\n        let currentVox = 'm';\n\n        window.onload = () => {\n            lucide.createIcons();\n            restoreHistory();\n            startStatusPolling();\n        };\n\n        window.updateMode = (mode) => {\n            currentMode = mode;\n            document.getElementById('modeS').classList.toggle('active', mode === 'simple');\n            document.getElementById('modeC').classList.toggle('active', mode === 'custom');\n            document.getElementById('panelSimple').classList.toggle('hidden', mode === 'custom');\n            document.getElementById('panelCustom').classList.toggle('hidden', mode === 'simple');\n        };\n\n        window.setVox = (v) => {\n            currentVox = v;\n            document.getElementById('voxM').classList.toggle('active', v === 'm');\n            document.getElementById('voxF').classList.toggle('active', v === 'f');\n        };\n\n        // [SECURITY] Client-side Validation Constraints\n        function validateConstraints(model, title, style, prompt) {\n            const limits = {\n                'V5': { style: 1000, title: 100, prompt: 5000 },\n                'V4_5PLUS': { style: 1000, title: 100, prompt: 5000 },\n                'V4_5': { style: 1000, title: 100, prompt: 5000 },\n                'V45ALL': { style: 1000, title: 80, prompt: 5000 },\n                'V4': { style: 200, title: 80, prompt: 3000 }\n            };\n            const def = limits['V5'];\n            const limit = limits[model] || def;\n\n            if (title.length > limit.title) throw new Error(`Title exceeds limit for ${model} (Max: ${limit.title})`);\n            if (style.length > limit.style) throw new Error(`Style exceeds limit for ${model} (Max: ${limit.style})`);\n            if (prompt.length > limit.prompt) throw new Error(`Prompt exceeds limit for ${model} (Max: ${limit.prompt})`);\n        }\n\n        async function forceDownload(url, filename) {\n            const btn = event.target.closest('button');\n            const originalHtml = btn.innerHTML;\n\n            try {\n                btn.disabled = true;\n                btn.innerHTML = '<div class=\"status-dot\"></div> GETTING...';\n\n                const response = await fetch(url);\n                if (!response.ok) throw new Error(\"Network Fetch Error\");\n\n                const blob = await response.blob();\n                const link = document.createElement('a');\n                link.href = URL.createObjectURL(blob);\n                link.download = filename;\n                document.body.appendChild(link);\n                link.click();\n                document.body.removeChild(link);\n                URL.revokeObjectURL(link.href);\n            } catch (error) {\n                console.warn(\"Direct download blocked, fallback to new tab:\", error);\n                window.open(url, '_blank');\n            } finally {\n                btn.disabled = false;\n                btn.innerHTML = originalHtml;\n                lucide.createIcons();\n            }\n        }\n\n        // [NEW FEATURE] Manual Sync to fetch missing tracks\n        async function forceSync(taskId) {\n            const btn = document.getElementById(`sync-${taskId}`);\n            if(btn) { btn.disabled = true; btn.querySelector('i').classList.add('spin'); }\n\n            const user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('flowork_user_identity'))?.id || '';\n            try {\n                 const res = await fetch('/api/v1/ai/music', {\n                    method: 'POST',\n                    headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'X-User-Address': user },\n                    body: JSON.stringify({ action: 'check_status', taskId: taskId, user_address: user })\n                });\n                const data = await res.json();\n\n                let foundUrls = [];\n                const safePush = (arr) => {\n                     if(Array.isArray(arr)) {\n                         arr.forEach(item => {\n                             if(item.audio_url) foundUrls.push(item.audio_url);\n                             else if(item.audioUrl) foundUrls.push(item.audioUrl);\n                             else if(item.url) foundUrls.push(item.url);\n                         });\n                     }\n                };\n\n                if (data.data?.response?.sunoData) safePush(data.data.response.sunoData);\n                else if (Array.isArray(data.data)) safePush(data.data);\n                else if (data.data?.data && Array.isArray(data.data.data)) safePush(data.data.data);\n                else {\n                    if (data.data?.audio_url) foundUrls.push(data.data.audio_url);\n                    else if (data.data?.audioUrl) foundUrls.push(data.data.audioUrl);\n                }\n\n                if(foundUrls.length > 0) {\n                    let history = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(STORAGE_KEY) || '[]');\n                    const trackIdx = history.findIndex(t => t.taskId === taskId);\n                    if(trackIdx !== -1) {\n                        history[trackIdx].audioUrls = foundUrls;\n                        history[trackIdx].audioUrl = foundUrls[0];\n                        history[trackIdx].status = 'COMPLETED';\n                        saveToLocalStorage(history);\n                        restoreHistory();\n                    }\n                }\n            } catch(e) {\n                console.error(\"Sync failed\", e);\n            } finally {\n                 if(btn) { btn.disabled = false; btn.querySelector('i').classList.remove('spin'); }\n            }\n        }\n\n        function saveTrackToHistory(track) {\n            let history = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(STORAGE_KEY) || '[]');\n            history.unshift(track);\n            localStorage.setItem(STORAGE_KEY, JSON.stringify(history.slice(0, 50)));\n        }\n\n        function restoreHistory() {\n            const list = document.getElementById('trackList');\n            const history = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(STORAGE_KEY) || '[]');\n            list.innerHTML = '';\n            history.forEach(track => {\n                addTrackToUI(track);\n            });\n        }\n\n        function clearHistory() {\n            if(confirm(\"Purge Neural History?\")) {\n                localStorage.removeItem(STORAGE_KEY);\n                restoreHistory();\n            }\n        }\n\n        // [LOGIC UPDATE] Polling Logic with safePush for multiple audio detection\n        async function startStatusPolling() {\n            setInterval(async () => {\n                let history = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(STORAGE_KEY) || '[]');\n                const pending = history.filter(t => t.status !== 'COMPLETED' && t.status !== 'FAILED');\n                const user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('flowork_user_identity'))?.id || '';\n\n                if (pending.length === 0) return;\n\n                for(let track of pending) {\n                    try {\n                        const res = await fetch('/api/v1/ai/music', {\n                            method: 'POST',\n                            headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'X-User-Address': user },\n                            body: JSON.stringify({ action: 'check_status', taskId: track.taskId, user_address: user })\n                        });\n                        const data = await res.json();\n\n                        let foundUrls = [];\n\n                        // [GENIUS MOVE] The Array Parser Logic\n                        const safePush = (arr) => {\n                             if(Array.isArray(arr)) {\n                                 arr.forEach(item => {\n                                     // Check ALL possible keys\n                                     if(item.audio_url) foundUrls.push(item.audio_url);\n                                     else if(item.audioUrl) foundUrls.push(item.audioUrl);\n                                     else if(item.url) foundUrls.push(item.url);\n                                 });\n                             }\n                        };\n\n                        // 1. Priority: sunoData (Standard KIE)\n                        if (data.data?.response?.sunoData) safePush(data.data.response.sunoData);\n                        // 2. Direct Array\n                        else if (Array.isArray(data.data)) safePush(data.data);\n                        // 3. Deep Nested Array\n                        else if (data.data?.data && Array.isArray(data.data.data)) safePush(data.data.data);\n                        // 4. Single Object Fallback\n                        else {\n                             if (data.data?.audio_url) foundUrls.push(data.data.audio_url);\n                             else if (data.data?.audioUrl) foundUrls.push(data.data.audioUrl);\n                             else if (data.audio_url) foundUrls.push(data.audio_url);\n                         }\n\n                        const rawStatus = data.status || data.data?.status || '';\n\n                        // Jika URL ketemu (length > 0), anggap COMPLETED\n                        if(foundUrls.length > 0) {\n                            track.status = 'COMPLETED';\n                            track.audioUrls = foundUrls; // Save array!\n                            track.audioUrl = foundUrls[0]; // Fallback single\n                            saveToLocalStorage(history);\n                            restoreHistory();\n                        } else if (['FAILED', 'ERROR', 'failed'].includes(rawStatus)) {\n                            track.status = 'FAILED';\n                            saveToLocalStorage(history);\n                            restoreHistory();\n                        }\n\n                    } catch(e) { console.warn(\"Polling fail:\", e); }\n                }\n            }, 8000);\n        }\n\n        function saveToLocalStorage(history) {\n             localStorage.setItem(STORAGE_KEY, JSON.stringify(history));\n        }\n\n        window.executeGeneration = async () => {\n            const btn = document.getElementById('btnGen');\n            const user_address = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('flowork_user_identity'))?.id || '';\n\n            // Inputs\n            const selectedModel = document.getElementById('model_sel').value;\n            const titleInput = currentMode === 'custom' ? document.getElementById('title').value : \"Neural Stream\";\n            const styleInput = currentMode === 'custom' ? document.getElementById('style').value : \"\";\n            const promptInput = currentMode === 'custom' ? document.getElementById('promptC').value : document.getElementById('promptS').value;\n\n            // [SECURITY] Pre-flight Validation\n            try {\n                if(!promptInput) throw new Error(\"System requires prompt input.\");\n                validateConstraints(selectedModel, titleInput, styleInput, promptInput);\n\n                const payload = {\n                    type: 'audio', user_address,\n                    customMode: currentMode === 'custom',\n                    instrumental: document.getElementById('chkInstr').checked,\n                    model: selectedModel,\n                    prompt: promptInput,\n                    title: titleInput,\n                    style: styleInput,\n                    negativeTags: document.getElementById('negTags').value,\n                    vocalGender: currentVox,\n                    styleWeight: parseFloat(document.getElementById('valStyle').value),\n                    weirdnessConstraint: parseFloat(document.getElementById('valWeird').value),\n                    audioWeight: 0.65\n                };\n\n                btn.disabled = true;\n                btn.innerHTML = '<div class=\"status-dot\"></div> TRANSMITTING...';\n\n                const res = await fetch('/api/v1/ai/music', {\n                    method: 'POST',\n                    headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'X-User-Address': user_address },\n                    body: JSON.stringify(payload)\n                });\n                const data = await res.json();\n                if(!res.ok || data.error) throw new Error(data.error || \"Bridge Error\");\n\n                const newTrack = {\n                    title: payload.title,\n                    taskId: data.data.taskId,\n                    status: 'QUEUED',\n                    audioUrl: null,\n                    audioUrls: [],\n                    timestamp: Date.now()\n                };\n                saveTrackToHistory(newTrack);\n                restoreHistory();\n\n            } catch(e) { alert(`\u26a0\ufe0f ${e.message}`); }\n            finally {\n                btn.disabled = false;\n                btn.innerHTML = '<i data-lucide=\"cpu\" style=\"width:18px\"></i> INITIALIZE NEURAL CORE';\n                lucide.createIcons();\n            }\n        };\n\n        function addTrackToUI(track) {\n            const list = document.getElementById('trackList');\n            const isDone = track.status === 'COMPLETED';\n            const isFailed = track.status === 'FAILED';\n            const div = document.createElement('div');\n            div.className = `track-item ${isDone ? 'done' : ''}`;\n\n            if (isFailed) div.style.borderLeftColor = '#ef4444';\n\n            let downloadButtonsHtml = '';\n            if (isDone) {\n                // [LOGIC UPDATE] Render Multiple Buttons if Array exists\n                if (track.audioUrls && track.audioUrls.length > 0) {\n                    track.audioUrls.forEach((url, index) => {\n                        const fname = `${track.title.replace(/[^a-z0-9]/gi, '_').toLowerCase()}_var${index+1}.mp3`;\n                        downloadButtonsHtml += `\n                            <button onclick=\"forceDownload('${url}', '${fname}')\" class=\"btn-download\">\n                                <i data-lucide=\"download\" style=\"width:12px\"></i> VAR ${index + 1}\n                            </button>`;\n                    });\n                }\n                // Fallback for single legacy tracks\n                else if (track.audioUrl) {\n                    const fname = `${track.title.replace(/[^a-z0-9]/gi, '_').toLowerCase()}.mp3`;\n                    downloadButtonsHtml += `\n                        <button onclick=\"forceDownload('${track.audioUrl}', '${fname}')\" class=\"btn-download\">\n                            <i data-lucide=\"download\" style=\"width:12px\"></i> DOWNLOAD WAV\n                        </button>`;\n                }\n            }\n\n            div.innerHTML = `\n                <div style=\"display:flex; justify-content:space-between; align-items:start;\">\n                    <div style=\"font-size:0.75rem; font-weight:700; color:#fff;\">${track.title}</div>\n                    <div class=\"${(isDone || isFailed) ? '' : 'status-dot'}\" style=\"${isFailed ? 'background:#ef4444;' : ''}\"></div>\n                </div>\n                <div style=\"font-size:0.55rem; color:var(--accent); font-family:'JetBrains Mono'; margin-top:5px;\">\n                    ID: ${track.taskId ? track.taskId.substring(0,12) : '???'}...\n                </div>\n                <div style=\"font-size:0.55rem; color:#64748b; margin-top:2px;\">STATUS: <span style=\"color:${isDone ? '#4ade80' : (isFailed ? <div class=\"top-section\">\n            <div class=\"now-playing\" id=\"trackTitle\">NO MEDIA SELECTED</div>\n            <div class=\"status-text\" id=\"statusText\">Select a folder to begin</div>\n            <canvas id=\"visualizer\"></canvas>\n        </div>\n\n        <div class=\"controls\">\n            <button class=\"btn\" onclick=\"prevTrack()\">\u23ee</button>\n            <button class=\"btn btn-main\" onclick=\"togglePlay()\" id=\"btnPlay\">\u25b6</button>\n            <button class=\"btn\" onclick=\"nextTrack()\">\u23ed</button>\n            <button class=\"btn\" onclick=\"toggleShuffle()\" id=\"btnShuffle\" title=\"Shuffle\">\ud83d\udd00</button>\n            <button class=\"btn\" onclick=\"toggleRepeat()\" id=\"btnRepeat\" title=\"Repeat\">\ud83d\udd01</button>\n        </div>\n\n        <div class=\"import-section\">\n            <label class=\"file-btn\">\n                \ud83d\udcc2 LOAD MUSIC FOLDER\n                <input type=\"file\" id=\"folderInput\" webkitdirectory directory multiple style=\"display: none;\" onchange=\"handleFolderSelect(this)\">\n            </label>\n        </div>\n\n        <div class=\"playlist\" id=\"playlist\">\n            </div>\n    </div>\n\n    <audio id=\"audioPlayer\" crossorigin=\"anonymous\"></audio>\n\n    <script>\n        // --- CORE VARIABLES ---\n        const audio = document.getElementById('audioPlayer');\n        const trackTitle = document.getElementById('trackTitle');\n        const statusText = document.getElementById('statusText');\n        const btnPlay = document.getElementById('btnPlay');\n        const playlistContainer = document.getElementById('playlist');\n\n        let playlist = []; // Array of { name, fileObj }\n        let currentIndex = 0;\n        let isPlaying = false;\n        let isShuffle = false;\n        let isRepeat = false;\n\n        // --- AUDIO CONTEXT (Visualizer) ---\n        let audioCtx, analyser, source;\n        const canvas = document.getElementById('visualizer');\n        const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');\n\n        function initAudioContext() {\n            if (!audioCtx) {\n                audioCtx = new (window.AudioContext || window.webkitAudioContext)();\n                analyser = audioCtx.createAnalyser();\n                source = audioCtx.createMediaElementSource(audio);\n                source.connect(analyser);\n                analyser.connect(audioCtx.destination);\n                analyser.fftSize = 64; // Low res for retro look\n                drawVisualizer();\n            }\n        }\n\n        // --- FOLDER HANDLING (OFFLINE MAGIC) ---\n        function handleFolderSelect(input) {\n            const files = Array.from(input.files);\n\n            // Filter audio files only\n            const audioFiles = files.filter(f =>\n                f.name.toLowerCase().endsWith('.mp3') ||\n                f.name.toLowerCase().endsWith('.wav') ||\n                f.name.toLowerCase().endsWith('.ogg') ||\n                f.name.toLowerCase().endsWith('.flac')\n            );\n\n            if (audioFiles.length === 0) {\n                statusText.innerText = \"No music files found.\";\n                return;\n            }\n\n            // Sort alphabetically\n            audioFiles.sort((a, b) => a.name.localeCompare(b.name));\n\n            // Build Playlist\n            playlist = audioFiles.map(f => ({\n                name: f.name.replace(/\\.[^/.]+$/, \"\"), // Remove extension\n                fileObj: f\n            }));\n\n            renderPlaylist();\n            statusText.innerText = `${playlist.length} tracks loaded. Ready.`;\n\n            // Auto play first\n            loadTrack(0);\n        }\n\n        // --- PLAYLIST UI ---\n        function renderPlaylist() {\n            playlistContainer.innerHTML = '';\n            playlist.forEach((track, index) => {\n                const div = document.createElement('div');\n                div.className = `track ${index === currentIndex ? 'active' : ''}`;\n                div.innerHTML = `\n                    <span class=\"track-name\">${index + 1}. ${track.name}</span>\n                    <span class=\"track-time\">LOCAL</span>\n                `;\n                div.onclick = () => {\n                    currentIndex = index;\n                    loadTrack(index);\n                    playAudio();\n                };\n                playlistContainer.appendChild(div);\n            });\n        }\n\n        // --- PLAYER LOGIC ---\n        function loadTrack(index) {\n            if (playlist.length === 0) return;\n\n            // Initialize AudioContext on first interaction\n            initAudioContext();\n\n            const track = playlist[index];\n\n            // Create Blob URL from local file object\n            const fileUrl = URL.createObjectURL(track.fileObj);\n\n            audio.src = fileUrl;\n            audio.load();\n\n            trackTitle.innerText = track.name;\n            statusText.innerText = \"Playing Local File...\";\n\n            // Update UI Highlight\n            document.querySelectorAll('.track').forEach((el, i) => {\n                el.classList.toggle('active', i === index);\n            });\n        }\n\n        function playAudio() {\n            if (playlist.length === 0) return;\n            audio.play().then(() => {\n                isPlaying = true;\n                btnPlay.innerText = \"\u23f8\";\n                statusText.innerText = \"Playing...\";\n            }).catch(e => console.error(\"Play error:\", e));\n        }\n\n        function pauseAudio() {\n            audio.pause();\n            isPlaying = false;\n            btnPlay.innerText = \"\u25b6\";\n            statusText.innerText = \"Paused\";\n        }\n\n        function togglePlay() {\n            if (isPlaying) pauseAudio();\n            else playAudio();\n        }\n\n        function nextTrack() {\n            if (playlist.length === 0) return;\n\n            if (isShuffle) {\n                currentIndex = Math.floor(Math.random() * playlist.length);\n            } else {\n                currentIndex = (currentIndex + 1) % playlist.length;\n            }\n            loadTrack(currentIndex);\n            playAudio();\n        }\n\n        function prevTrack() {\n            if (playlist.length === 0) return;\n            currentIndex = (currentIndex - 1 + playlist.length) % playlist.length;\n            loadTrack(currentIndex);\n            playAudio();\n        }\n\n        // --- BUTTONS LOGIC ---\n        function toggleShuffle() {\n            isShuffle = !isShuffle;\n            document.getElementById('btnShuffle').classList.toggle('active', isShuffle);\n        }\n        function toggleRepeat() {\n            isRepeat = !isRepeat;\n            document.getElementById('btnRepeat').classList.toggle('active', isRepeat);\n        }\n\n        // --- EVENTS ---\n        audio.addEventListener('ended', () => {\n            if (isRepeat) {\n                audio.currentTime = 0;\n                playAudio();\n            } else {\n                nextTrack();\n            }\n        });\n\n        // --- VISUALIZER LOOP ---\n        function drawVisualizer() {\n            requestAnimationFrame(drawVisualizer);\n            if (!analyser) return;\n\n            const bufferLength = analyser.frequencyBinCount;\n            const dataArray = new Uint8Array(bufferLength);\n            analyser.getByteFrequencyData(dataArray);\n\n            ctx.clearRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);\n\n            const barWidth = (canvas.width / bufferLength) * 2.5;\n            let barHeight;\n            let x = 0;\n\n            for (let i = 0; i < bufferLength; i++) {\n                barHeight = dataArray[i] / 255 * canvas.height;\n\n                // Gradient: Cyan to Purple\n                const gradient = ctx.createLinearGradient(0, canvas.height, 0, 0);\n                gradient.addColorStop(0, '#00ffcc');\n                gradient.addColorStop(1, '#ff00ff');\n\n                ctx.fillStyle = gradient;\n\n                // Cyberpunk Rounded Bars\n                ctx.beginPath();\n                ctx.roundRect(x, canvas.height - barHeight, barWidth, barHeight, [2, 2, 0, 0]);\n                ctx.fill();\n\n                x += barWidth + 2;\n            }\n        }\n    </script>\n</body>\n</html>\n", "structure": [{"name": "Script", "type": "logic", "line": 7063, "icon": "fa-code"}, {"name": "Style", "type": "css", "line": 324, "icon": "fa-paint-brush"}], "organs": <div>\n                    <label><i data-lucide=\"monitor\" style=\"width:12px\"></i> RATIO</label>\n                    <select id=\"aspect_ratio\">\n                        <option         <option value=\"standard\">Standard</option>\n                    </select>\n                </div>\n            </div>\n\n            <button class=\"btn-gen\" id=\"btnRun\" </div>\n    </div>\n\n    <script>\n        const STORAGE_KEY = 'cine_motion_history_v1';\n        let tasks = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(STORAGE_KEY) || '[]');\n\n        // Mock User (VIP)\n        const MOCK_USER = \"0xF39733B34131c13E35733E9Af1adD78a5e768929\";\n\n        window.onload = () => { lucide.createIcons(); render(); startPolling(); };\n\n        async function generateVideo() {\n            const prompt = document.getElementById('prompt').value.trim();\n            if (!prompt) return alert(\"Please enter a scene description.\");\n\n            const btn = document.getElementById('btnRun');\n            const user = localStorage.getItem('flowork_wallet') || MOCK_USER;\n\n            btn.disabled = true;\n            btn.innerHTML = 'INITIALIZING RENDER...';\n\n            try {\n                const payload = {\n                    action: 'create',\n                    user_address: user,\n                    prompt: prompt,\n                    aspect_ratio: document.getElementById('aspect_ratio').value,\n                    n_frames: document.getElementById('n_frames').value,\n                    size: document.getElementById('size').value\n                };\n\n                const res = await fetch('/api/v1/ai/sora_video', {\n                    method: 'POST',\n                    headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },\n                    body: JSON.stringify(payload)\n                });\n\n                const data = await res.json();\n\n                if (data.code !== 200) throw new Error(data.msg || data.error || \"Generation Failed\");\n\n                // Add to Queue\n                tasks.unshift({\n                    id: data.data.taskId,\n                    prompt: prompt,\n                    status: 'waiting',\n                    timestamp: Date.now(),\n                    videoUrl: null\n                });\n\n                save(); render();\n                document.getElementById('prompt').value = \"\";\n\n            } catch (e) {\n                alert(\"Error: \" + e.message);\n            } finally {\n                btn.disabled = false;\n                btn.innerHTML = '<i data-lucide=\"clapperboard\"></i> RENDER SCENE';\n                lucide.createIcons();\n            }\n        }\n\n        function startPolling() {\n            setInterval(async () => {\n                const active = tasks.filter(t => t.status === 'waiting');\n                if (!active.length) return;\n\n                const user = localStorage.getItem('flowork_wallet') || MOCK_USER;\n\n                for (let t of active) {\n                    try {\n                        const res = await fetch('/api/v1/ai/sora_video', {\n                            method: 'POST',\n                            headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },\n                            body: JSON.stringify({\n                                action: 'check_status',\n                                taskId: t.id,\n                                user_address: user\n                            })\n                        });\n\n                        const d = await res.json();\n\n                        if(d.code !== 200) continue;\n\n                        const state = d.data?.state;\n\n                        if (state === 'success') {\n                            try {\n                                const resultObj = JSON.parse(d.data.resultJson);\n                                if (resultObj.resultUrls && resultObj.resultUrls.length > 0) {\n                                    t.status = 'success';\n                                    t.videoUrl = resultObj.resultUrls[0];\n                                    save(); render();\n                                }\n                            } catch (parseErr) { console.warn(\"Parsing Error\"); }\n                        } else if (state === 'fail') {\n                            t.status = 'fail';\n                            t.errorMsg = d.data?.failMsg || \"Unknown Error\";\n                            save(); render();\n                        }\n\n                    } catch (e) { console.warn(\"Poll Error\"); }\n                }\n            }, 5000);\n        }\n\n        function render() {\n            const container = document.getElementById('videoList');\n            container.innerHTML = tasks.length ? '' : '<div style=\"text-align:center; padding:40px; color:#444; font-size:0.8rem;\">NO RENDER HISTORY</div>';\n\n            tasks.forEach(t => {\n                const card = document.createElement('div');\n                card.className = 'video-card';\n\n                let content = '';\n                let badgeClass = '';\n\n                if (t.status === 'waiting') {\n                    badgeClass = 'status-waiting';\n                    content = `<div class=\"video-content\"><div class=\"loading-pulse\"></div></div>`;\n                } else if (t.status === 'success') {\n                    badgeClass = 'status-success';\n                    content = `\n                        <div class=\"video-content\">\n                            <video src=\"${t.videoUrl}\" controls preload=\"metadata\"></video>\n                        </div>\n                        <a href=\"${t.videoUrl}\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"download-btn\" download>DOWNLOAD MP4</a>\n                    `;\n                } else {\n                    badgeClass = 'status-fail';\n                    content = `<div class=\"video-content\" style=\"color:#ff4444; font-size:0.7rem; flex-direction:column; gap:5px;\"><i data-lucide=\"alert-triangle\"></i> FAILED</div>`;\n                }\n\n                card.innerHTML = `\n                    <div class=\"video-header\">\n                        <div style=\"font-size:0.7rem; font-weight:bold; white-space:nowrap; overflow:hidden; text-overflow:ellipsis; max-width:200px; color:#fff;\" title=\"${t.prompt}\">\n                            ${t.prompt.toUpperCase()}\n                        </div>\n                        <div class=\"status-badge ${badgeClass}\">${t.status}</div>\n                    </div>\n                    ${content}\n                `;\n                container.appendChild(card);\n            });\n            lucide.createIcons();\n        }\n\n        function save() { localStorage.setItem(STORAGE_KEY, JSON.stringify(tasks.slice(0, 10))); }\n        function purge() { if(confirm(\"Clear history?\")) { tasks=[]; save(); render(); } }\n\n    </script>\n</body>\n</html>\n", "structure": [{"name": "Script", "type": "logic", "line": 7815, "icon": "fa-code"}, {"name": "Style", "type": "css", "line": 299, "icon": "fa-paint-brush"}], "organs": [], "metrics": {"loc": 303, "complexity": "CRITICAL", "todo_count": 14125, "security_risks": ["Potential Hardcoded URL with Creds detected"], "last_modified": 1767761078.684541}, "raw_imports": [], "raw_calls": [], "raw_assets": ["${t.videoUrl}"], "inbound_paths": [], "outbound_paths": []}, "flowork-gui/template/web/public/apps-cloud/Video-Generator/manifest.json": {"id": 978, "content": "{\n    \"id\": \"Video-Generator\",\n    \"name\": \"Video Generator\",\n    \"version\": \"1.0.0\",\n    \"description\": \"High-fidelity text-to-video generation engine.
