viewBox=\"0 0 24 24\"><path d=\"M6 6h2v12H6zm3.5 6l8.5 6V6z\"/></svg>\n                    </button>\n\n                    <button class=\"btn-tech\" onclick=\"togglePlay()\" id=\"btnPlayPause\">\n                        <svg id=\"iconPlay\" viewBox=\"0 0 24 24\"><path d=\"M8 5v14l11-7z\"/></svg>\n                        <svg id=\"iconPause\" viewBox=\"0 0 24 24\" style=\"display:none\"><path d=\"M6 19h4V5H6v14zm8-14v14h4V5h-4z\"/></svg>\n                    </button>\n\n                    <button class=\"btn-tech\" onclick=\"stopVideo()\" title=\"Terminate\">\n                        <svg viewBox=\"0 0 24 24\"><path d=\"M6 6h12v12H6z\"/></svg>\n                    </button>\n\n                    <button class=\"btn-tech\" onclick=\"playNext()\" title=\"Next Node\">\n                        <svg viewBox=\"0 0 24 24\"><path d=\"M6 18l8.5-6L6 6v12zM16 6v12h2V6h-2z\"/></svg>\n                    </button>\n                </div>\n\n                <div class=\"time-counter\" id=\"timeDisplay\">00:00 / 00:00</div>\n\n                <div class=\"btn-group\" style=\"margin-left: auto;\">\n                    <div class=\"speed-readout\" id=\"speedDisplay\" onclick=\"cycleSpeed()\">1.0x</div>\n\n                    <div class=\"vol-wrapper\">\n                        <button class=\"btn-tech\" style=\"width:24px; border:none;\" onclick=\"toggleMute()\">\n                            <svg viewBox=\"0 0 24 24\" id=\"volIcon\"><path d=\"M3 9v6h4l5 5V4L7 9H3zm13.5 3c0-1.77-1.02-3.29-2.5-4.03v8.05c1.48-.73 2.5-2.25 2.5-4.02zM14 3.23v2.06c2.89.86 5 3.54 5 6.71s-2.11 5.85-5 6.71v2.06c4.01-.91 7-4.49 7-8.77s-2.99-7.86-7-8.77z\"/></svg>\n                        </button>\n                        <input type=\"range\" id=\"volSlider\" min=\"0\" max=\"1\" step=\"0.05\" value=\"1\">\n                    </div>\n\n                    <button class=\"btn-tech\" onclick=\"toggleFullscreen()\">\n                        <svg viewBox=\"0 0 24 24\"><path d=\"M7 14H5v5h5v-2H7v-3zm-2-4h2V7h3V5H5v5zm12 7h-3v2h5v-5h-2v3zM14 5v2h3v3h2V5h-5z\"/></svg>\n                    </button>\n                </div>\n            </div>\n        </div>\n\n        <div class=\"sidebar-section\">\n            <div class=\"side-header\">\n                DATA STREAM\n                <button class=\"btn-add\" onclick=\"document.getElementById('fileInput').click()\">+ IMPORT</button>\n            </div>\n\n            <div class=\"playlist-area\" id=\"playlistBox\">\n                </div>\n\n            <div class=\"log-console\" id=\"logger\">\n                <div class=\"log-line\"><span class=\"log-tm\">SYS</span> <span class=\"log-msg\">FLUX ENGINE v3.0 ONLINE</span></div>\n            </div>\n        </div>\n    </div>\n\n    <input type=\"file\" id=\"fileInput\" multiple accept=\"video/*\">\n\n    <script>\n        // --- SYSTEM VARIABLES ---\n        const video = document.getElementById('videoPlayer');\n        const scrubber = document.getElementById('scrubber');\n        const scrubFill = document.getElementById('scrubFill');\n        const playlistBox = document.getElementById('playlistBox');\n        const logger = document.getElementById('logger');\n        const timeDisplay = document.getElementById('timeDisplay');\n        const statusText = document.getElementById('statusText');\n        const statusDot = document.getElementById('statusDot');\n        const emptyState = document.getElementById('emptyState');\n        const speedDisplay = document.getElementById('speedDisplay');\n\n        let playlist = [];\n        let currentIndex = -1;\n        let isDragging = false;\n        let playbackRate = 1.0;\n\n        // --- LOGGER ---\n        function log(msg) {\n            const now = new Date();\n            const time = `${now.getHours()}:${now.getMinutes()}:${now.getSeconds()}`;\n            const div = document.createElement('div');\n            div.className = 'log-line';\n            div.innerHTML = `<span class=\"log-tm\">[${time}]</span> <span class=\"log-msg\">${msg}</span>`;\n            logger.prepend(div);\n        }\n\n        // --- FILE HANDLING ---\n        function handleFiles(files) {\n            let count = 0;\n            for(let f of files) {\n                if(f.type.startsWith('video/')) {\n                    playlist.push(f);\n                    count++;\n                }\n            }\n            if(count > 0) {\n                log(`Imported ${count} new artifacts.`);\n                renderPlaylist();\n                if(currentIndex === -1) loadTrack(0);\n            }\n        }\n\n        function renderPlaylist() {\n            playlistBox.innerHTML = '';\n            playlist.forEach((file, i) => {\n                const div = document.createElement('div');\n                div.className = `track-card ${i === currentIndex ? 'active' : ''}`;\n                div.innerHTML = `\n                    <div class=\"track-info\">\n                        <div class=\"track-name\">${i+1}. ${file.name}</div>\n                        <div class=\"track-dur\">${(file.size / 1024 / 1024).toFixed(1)} MB</div>\n                    </div>\n                `;\n                div.onclick = () => loadTrack(i);\n                playlistBox.appendChild(div);\n            });\n        }\n\n        function loadTrack(index) {\n            if(index < 0 || index >= playlist.length) return;\n            currentIndex = index;\n\n            const file = playlist[index];\n            video.src = URL.createObjectURL(file);\n            video.playbackRate = playbackRate;\n            video.play();\n\n            updateStatus(\"PLAYING\", true);\n            emptyState.style.display = 'none';\n            renderPlaylist();\n            updatePlayBtn(true);\n            log(`Streaming: ${file.name}`);\n        }\n\n        // --- PLAYBACK CONTROLS ---\n        function togglePlay() {\n            if(!video.src) return;\n            if(video.paused) {\n                video.play();\n                updateStatus(\"PLAYING\", true);\n                updatePlayBtn(true);\n            } else {\n                video.pause();\n                updateStatus(\"PAUSED\", false);\n                updatePlayBtn(false);\n            }\n        }\n\n        function stopVideo() {\n            video.pause();\n            video.currentTime = 0;\n            updateStatus(\"TERMINATED\", false);\n            updatePlayBtn(false);\n        }\n\n        function updatePlayBtn(isPlay) {\n            document.getElementById('iconPlay').style.display = isPlay ? 'none' : 'block';\n            document.getElementById('iconPause').style.display = isPlay ? 'block' : 'none';\n        }\n\n        function playNext() {\n            if(playlist.length === 0) return;\n            let next = (currentIndex + 1) % playlist.length;\n            loadTrack(next);\n        }\n\n        function playPrev() {\n            if(playlist.length === 0) return;\n            let prev = (currentIndex - 1 + playlist.length) % playlist.length;\n            loadTrack(prev);\n        }\n\n        function updateStatus(text, active) {\n            statusText.innerText = text;\n            if(active) statusDot.classList.add('active');\n            else statusDot.classList.remove('active');\n        }\n\n        function cycleSpeed() {\n            const speeds = [0.5, 1.0, 1.5, 2.0, 4.0];\n            let idx = speeds.indexOf(playbackRate);\n            playbackRate = speeds[(idx + 1) % speeds.length];\n            video.playbackRate = playbackRate;\n            speedDisplay.innerText = playbackRate + \"x\";\n            log(`Speed adjusted: ${playbackRate}x`);\n        }\n\n        // --- SCRUBBING LOGIC (THE FIX) ---\n        function updateScrubber(e) {\n            const rect = scrubber.getBoundingClientRect();\n            // Kalkulasi posisi X relatif terhadap width element\n            let percent = (e.clientX - rect.left) / rect.width;\n\n            // Clamp (batasi) antara 0 sampai 1\n            if(percent < 0) percent = 0;\n            if(percent > 1) percent = 1;\n\n            scrubFill.style.width = (percent * 100) + \"%\";\n\n            // Jika video sudah ready, update waktunya\n            if(video.duration) {\n                video.currentTime = percent * video.duration;\n            }\n        }\n\n        // 1. Mouse Down di Track\n        scrubber.addEventListener('mousedown', (e) => {\n            isDragging = true;\n            updateScrubber(e); // Pindah langsung ke posisi klik\n            if(!video.paused) {\n                video.pause(); // Pause sebentar pas geser biar smooth\n                video.dataset.wasPlaying = \"true\";\n            }\n        });\n\n        // 2. Mouse Move di Window (biar kalo kursor keluar track tetep ke-drag)\n        window.addEventListener('mousemove', (e) => {\n            if(isDragging) {\n                e.preventDefault(); // Mencegah highlight text\n                updateScrubber(e);\n            }\n        });\n\n        // 3. Mouse Up di Window\n        window.addEventListener('mouseup', (e) => {\n            if(isDragging) {\n                isDragging = false;\n                if(video.dataset.wasPlaying === \"true\") {\n                    video.play();\n                    delete video.dataset.wasPlaying;\n                }\n            }\n        });\n\n        // --- TIME UPDATE & VOLUME ---\n        video.ontimeupdate = () => {\n            if(!isDragging && video.duration) {\n                const pct = (video.currentTime / video.duration) * 100;\n                scrubFill.style.width = pct + \"%\";\n            }\n            const cur = fmtTime(video.currentTime);\n            const dur = fmtTime(video.duration || 0);\n            timeDisplay.innerText = `${cur} / ${dur}`;\n        };\n\n        function fmtTime(s) {\n            const m = Math.floor(s/60);\n            const sc = Math.floor(s%60);\n            return `${m<10?'0'+m:m}:${sc<10?'0'+sc:sc}`;\n        }\n\n        document.getElementById('volSlider').oninput = (e) => {\n            video.volume = e.target.value;\n            video.muted = false;\n        };\n\n        function toggleMute() {\n            video.muted = !video.muted;\n            log(video.muted ? \"Audio Muted\" : \"Audio Active\");\n        }\n\n        function toggleFullscreen() {\n            const el = document.querySelector('.stage-section'); // Fullscreen area video + control\n            if(!document.fullscreenElement) el.requestFullscreen();\n            else document.exitFullscreen();\n        }\n\n        // --- EVENTS LAIN ---\n        document.getElementById('fileInput').onchange = (e) => handleFiles(e.target.files);\n\n        const dropTarget = document.getElementById('dropTarget');\n        dropTarget.ondragover = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); dropTarget.style.background = '#0a1015'; };\n        dropTarget.ondragleave = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); dropTarget.style.background = '#000'; };\n        dropTarget.ondrop = (e) => {\n            e.preventDefault();\n            dropTarget.style.background = '#000';\n            handleFiles(e.dataTransfer.files);\n        };\n\n        video.onended = () => playNext();\n\n    </script>\n</body>\n</html>\n", "structure": [{"name": "Script", "type": "logic", "line": 13652, "icon": "fa-code"}, {"name": "Style", "type": "css", "line": 334, "icon": "fa-paint-brush"}], "organs": [], "metrics": {"loc": 603, "complexity": "CRITICAL", "todo_count": 21795, "security_risks": ["Potential Hardcoded URL with Creds detected"], "last_modified": 1767761078.6865475}, "raw_imports": [], "raw_calls": [], "raw_assets": [], "inbound_paths": [], "outbound_paths": []}, "flowork-gui/template/web/public/apps-cloud/video-player/manifest.json": {"id": 981, "content": "{\n    \"id\": \"video-player\",\n    \"name\": \"Video Player\",\n    \"version\": \"2.2.0\",\n    \"description\": \"Tactical video operations terminal.       letter-spacing: 2px;\n        }\n        .time-digital {\n            font-size: 0.9rem;\n            color: var(--neon-dim);\n            margin-top: 5px;\n        }\n    </style>\n</head>\n<body>\n\n    <div class=\"header-area\">\n        <div class=\"title-bar\">/// GLOBAL_OPS_SYNC ///</div>\n        <div>\n            <span class=\"status-text\" id=\"syncStatus\">OFFLINE</span>\n            <span class=\"badge-cloud\">CLOUD</span>\n        </div>\n    </div>\n\n    <div class=\"clock-grid\" id=\"clockGrid\">\n        </div>\n\n    <script>\n        // --- CONFIGURATION ---\n        // Default zones if no save data found\n        const DEFAULT_ZONES = [\n            { city: 'New York', tz: 'America/New_York' },\n            { city: 'London', tz: 'Europe/London' },\n            { city: 'Berlin', tz: 'Europe/Berlin' },\n            { city: 'Jakarta', tz: 'Asia/Jakarta' },\n            { city: 'Tokyo', tz: 'Asia/Tokyo' }\n        ];\n\n        let activeZones = [...DEFAULT_ZONES];\n        let clocks = [];\n        let animationFrameId;\n\n        // --- CLOCK LOGIC ---\n\n        function createClock(zone, index) {\n            const container = document.createElement('div');\n            container.className = 'clock-container';\n\n            const canvas = document.createElement('canvas');\n            canvas.width = 160;\n            canvas.height = 160;\n            canvas.id = `canvas-${index}`;\n\n            const label = document.createElement('div');\n            label.className = 'city-label';\n            label.innerText = zone.city;\n\n            const digital = document.createElement('div');\n            digital.className = 'time-digital';\n            digital.id = `digital-${index}`;\n            digital.innerText = \"--:--\";\n\n            container.appendChild(canvas);\n            container.appendChild(label);\n            container.appendChild(digital);\n            document.getElementById('clockGrid').appendChild(container);\n\n            return { canvas, ctx: canvas.getContext('2d'), zone: zone.tz, digitalEl: digital };\n        }\n\n        function initClocks() {\n            // Clear existing\n            const grid = document.getElementById('clockGrid');\n            grid.innerHTML = '';\n\n            // Create new based on activeZones state\n            clocks = activeZones.map((zone, i) => createClock(zone, i));\n        }\n\n        function drawClock(clock) {\n            const ctx = clock.ctx;\n            const now = new Date();\n\n            // Timezone Conversion\n            let timeString;\n            try {\n                timeString = now.toLocaleString('en-US', { timeZone: clock.zone });\n            } catch (e) {\n                // Fallback for invalid TZ\n                timeString = now.toLocaleString('en-US');\n            }\n            const targetTime = new Date(timeString);\n\n            const hours = targetTime.getHours();\n            const minutes = targetTime.getMinutes();\n            const seconds = targetTime.getSeconds();\n            const milliseconds = targetTime.getMilliseconds();\n\n            // Smooth seconds animation\n            const smoothSec = seconds + (milliseconds / 1000);\n            const smoothMin = minutes + (smoothSec / 60);\n            const smoothHour = hours + (smoothMin / 60);\n\n            // Update Digital Display\n            clock.digitalEl.innerText = targetTime.toLocaleTimeString('en-GB', { hour: '2-digit', minute: '2-digit' });\n\n            // Drawing Logic (Hacker Style)\n            ctx.clearRect(0, 0, 160, 160);\n            const cx = 80;\n            const cy = 80;\n\n            // 1. Outer Rotating Ring\n            ctx.save();\n            ctx.translate(cx, cy);\n            ctx.rotate(Date.now() / 1000 * 0.5);\n            ctx.strokeStyle = '#008f11';\n            ctx.lineWidth = 2;\n            ctx.setLineDash([10, 10]);\n            ctx.beginPath();\n            ctx.arc(0, 0, 75, 0, Math.PI * 2);\n            ctx.stroke();\n            ctx.restore();\n\n            // 2. Inner Static Ring\n            ctx.beginPath();\n            ctx.arc(cx, cy, 65, 0, Math.PI * 2);\n            ctx.strokeStyle = '#00ff41';\n            ctx.lineWidth = 1;\n            ctx.stroke();\n\n            // 3. Tick Marks\n            for (let i = 0; i < 12; i++) {\n                const angle = (i * 30) * Math.PI / 180;\n                const x1 = cx + Math.cos(angle) * 55;\n                const y1 = cy + Math.sin(angle) * 55;\n                const x2 = cx + Math.cos(angle) * 62;\n                const y2 = cy + Math.sin(angle) * 62;\n                ctx.beginPath();\n                ctx.moveTo(x1, y1);\n                ctx.lineTo(x2, y2);\n                ctx.strokeStyle = '#00ff41';\n                ctx.lineWidth = 2;\n                ctx.stroke();\n            }\n\n            // 4. Hands\n            const hAngle = (smoothHour * 30 - 90) * Math.PI / 180;\n            drawHand(ctx, cx, cy, hAngle, 35, 4, '#00ff41');\n\n            const mAngle = (smoothMin * 6 - 90) * Math.PI / 180;\n            drawHand(ctx, cx, cy, mAngle, 50, 3, '#00ff41');\n\n            const sAngle = (smoothSec * 6 - 90) * Math.PI / 180;\n            drawHand(ctx, cx, cy, sAngle, 55, 1, '#fff'); // White second hand\n\n            // Center Dot\n            ctx.beginPath();\n            ctx.arc(cx, cy, 3, 0, Math.PI * 2);\n            ctx.fillStyle = '#fff';\n            ctx.fill();\n        }\n\n        function drawHand(ctx, x, y, angle, length, width, color) {\n            const x2 = x + Math.cos(angle) * length;\n            const y2 = y + Math.sin(angle) * length;\n            ctx.beginPath();\n            ctx.moveTo(x, y);\n            ctx.lineTo(x2, y2);\n            ctx.strokeStyle = color;\n            ctx.lineWidth = width;\n            ctx.lineCap = 'round';\n            ctx.stroke();\n        }\n\n        function animate() {\n            clocks.forEach(drawClock);\n            animationFrameId = requestAnimationFrame(animate);\n        }\n\n        // --- HYBRID BRIDGE PROTOCOL (The Magic Glue) ---\n        const syncStatusEl = document.getElementById('syncStatus');\n\n        window.addEventListener('message', (event) => {\n            const { type, payload } = event.data;\n\n            // 1. Handle LOAD Command (Received on Startup from Dashboard)\n            if (type === 'CMD_LOAD') {\n                console.log(\"[WorldClock] Loading configuration from engine...\");\n                if (payload && payload.zones && Array.isArray(payload.zones)) {\n                    activeZones = payload.zones; // Restore saved zones\n                    syncStatusEl.innerText = \"SYNCED\";\n                    syncStatusEl.style.color = \"#00ff41\";\n                } else {\n                    syncStatusEl.innerText = \"DEFAULT\";\n                }\n                initClocks(); // Re-render with loaded data\n            }\n\n            // 2. Handle SAVE Command (Received when user clicks 'Save State')\n            if (type === 'CMD_SAVE') {\n                console.log(\"[WorldClock] Sending configuration to engine...\");\n\n                // Pack the current state and send back\n                event.source.postMessage({\n                    type: 'WIDGET_SAVE_REQUEST',\n                    payload: {\n                        data: {\n                            zones: activeZones, // Save the array of zones\n                            last_sync: Date.now()\n                        }\n                    }\n                }, '*');\n            }\n        });\n\n        // Start initialization\n        initClocks();\n        animate();\n\n    </script>\n</body>\n</html>\n", "structure": [{"name": "Script", "type": "logic", "line": 2958, "icon": "fa-code"}, {"name": "Style", "type": "css", "line": 290, "icon": "fa-paint-brush"}], "organs": [], "metrics": {"loc": 298, "complexity": "MEDIUM", "todo_count": 9904, <script>\n        // CONFIG\n        let API_URL = localStorage.getItem('flowork_engine_url') || \"\";\n        let TOKEN = localStorage.getItem('flowork_auth_token') || \"\";\n        const MODULE_ID = \"youtube_keyword_researcher_v1\";\n\n        if(!TOKEN || !API_URL) toggleSettings();\n\n        function log(msg, type='info') {\n            const term = document.getElementById('terminal');\n            const d = new Date();\n            const ts = `${d.getHours()}:${d.getMinutes()}:${d.getSeconds()}`;\n            const div = document.createElement('div');\n            div.className = 'log-line';\n            let cls = 'log-info';\n            if(type==='warn') cls = 'log-warn';\n            if(type==='error') cls = 'log-error';\n            if(type==='sys') cls = 'log-sys';\n            div.innerHTML = `<span class=\"log-ts\">[${ts}]</span> <span class=\"${cls}\">${msg}</span>`;\n            term.prepend(div);\n        }\n\n        function nav(tab) {\n            document.querySelectorAll('.tab-btn').forEach(b => b.classList.remove('active'));\n            document.querySelectorAll('.tab-content').forEach(c => c.classList.remove('active'));\n            document.getElementById('state-idle').style.display = 'none';\n            const btns = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('.tab-btn'));\n            const targetBtn = btns.find(b => b.getAttribute('onclick').includes(tab));\n            if(targetBtn) targetBtn.classList.add('active');\n            const content = document.getElementById('tab-' + tab);\n            if(content) content.classList.add('active');\n        }\n\n        function toggleSettings() {\n            const m = document.getElementById('settingsModal');\n            const isOpen = m.style.display === 'flex';\n            m.style.display = isOpen ? 'none' : 'flex';\n            if(!isOpen) {\n                document.getElementById('cfg-url').value = API_URL || \"http://localhost:8000/api/v1\";\n                document.getElementById('cfg-token').value = TOKEN;\n            }\n        }\n\n        function saveConfig() {\n            let u = document.getElementById('cfg-url').value.trim();\n            if(u.endsWith('/')) u = u.slice(0, -1);\n            if (!u.includes('/api/v1') && !u.includes('localhost')) u += '/api/v1';\n            API_URL = u;\n            TOKEN = document.getElementById('cfg-token').value.trim();\n            localStorage.setItem('flowork_engine_url', API_URL);\n            localStorage.setItem('flowork_auth_token', TOKEN);\n            toggleSettings();\n            log(\"Config saved.\", \"sys\");\n        }\n\n        let logInterval;\n        function simulateLogs() {\n            const msgs = [\"Resetting Neural Link...\", \"Flushing Local Cache...\", \"Initializing Deep Scan...\", \"Resolving Target...\", \"Analyzing Audio Vector...\"];\n            let i=0;\n            logInterval = setInterval(() => {\n                if(i<msgs.length) { log(msgs[i], \"info\"); i++; }\n                else clearInterval(logInterval);\n            }, 2500);\n        }\n\n        function resetUI() {\n            // [FIX] KOSONGKAN LAYAR DULU\n            document.getElementById('state-idle').style.display = 'flex';\n            document.querySelectorAll('.tab-content').forEach(c => c.classList.remove('active'));\n\n            document.getElementById('txt-title').innerText = \"-\";\n            document.getElementById('txt-desc').innerText = \"-\";\n            document.getElementById('txt-ch-name').innerText = \"-\";\n            document.getElementById('txt-ch-subs').innerText = \"-\";\n            document.getElementById('img-thumb').style.display = 'none';\n            document.getElementById('img-avatar').src = \"\";\n            document.getElementById('val-views').innerText = \"0\";\n            document.getElementById('val-likes').innerText = \"0\";\n            document.getElementById('val-com').innerText = \"0\";\n            document.getElementById('val-dur').innerText = \"00:00\";\n            document.getElementById('val-seo').innerText = \"0\";\n            document.getElementById('val-eng').innerText = \"0%\";\n            document.getElementById('val-earnings').innerText = \"-\";\n            document.getElementById('val-monet').innerText = \"-\";\n            document.getElementById('val-velocity').innerText = \"-\";\n            document.getElementById('txt-hook').innerText = \"[Waiting for Deep Scan...]\";\n            document.getElementById('txt-trans').innerText = \"-\";\n            document.getElementById('tags-orig').innerHTML = \"\";\n            document.getElementById('tags-ai').innerHTML = \"\";\n            document.getElementById('tags-ch').innerHTML = \"\";\n            document.getElementById('lbl-hook-score').innerText = \"\";\n        }\n\n        async function startHack() {\n            const url = document.getElementById('urlInput').value;\n            const depth = document.getElementById('depthSelect').value;\n            const model = document.getElementById('modelSelect').value;\n\n            if(!API_URL || !TOKEN) return toggleSettings();\n            if(!url) return log(\"URL Required.\", \"error\");\n\n            resetUI();\n\n            document.getElementById('btnScan').disabled = true;\n            document.getElementById('btnScan').innerText = \"RUNNING\";\n            document.getElementById('btnScan').classList.add('active');\n            document.getElementById('sys-status').innerText = \"PROCESSING\";\n            document.getElementById('sys-status').style.color = \"var(--neon-cyan)\";\n\n            log(`TARGET: ${url}`, \"sys\");\n            log(`MODE: ${depth} | MODEL: ${model}`, \"sys\");\n\n            if(logInterval) clearInterval(logInterval);\n            simulateLogs();\n\n            try {\n                let endpointBase = API_URL;\n                if (!endpointBase.endsWith('/proxy')) endpointBase += '/proxy';\n                const ep = `${endpointBase}/execution/run_module`;\n\n                const inputsData = {\n                    video_url: url,\n                    research_depth: depth,\n                    whisper_model: model,\n                    output_folder: \"C:/FLOWORK/outputs\"\n                };\n\n                const payload = {\n                    module_id: MODULE_ID,\n                    action: \"execute\",\n                    inputs: inputsData,\n                    params: inputsData,\n                    config: inputsData\n                };\n\n                const res = await fetch(ep, {\n                    method: 'POST',\n                    headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'X-Gateway-Secret': TOKEN },\n                    body: JSON.stringify(payload)\n                });\n\n                if(!res.ok) throw new Error(`Server Error: ${res.status}`);\n\n                const responseData = await res.json();\n                const cleanData = findResultJson(responseData);\n\n                if(cleanData) {\n                    render(cleanData);\n                } else {\n                    console.error(\"FULL RESPONSE:\", responseData);\n                    throw new Error(\"Data structure invalid.\");\n                }\n\n            } catch(e) {\n                log(e.message, \"error\");\n\n                // [FIX] ANTI PANIC MODE\n                // Kalau errornya fetch/network (timeout), kita anggap sukses background\n                if (e.message.includes(\"Failed to fetch\") || e.message.includes(\"NetworkError\") || e.name === 'TypeError') {\n                    alert(\"\u26a0\ufe0f TIMEOUT (BACKEND LAGI KERJA) \u26a0\ufe0f\\n\\nBrowser mutusin koneksi karena nunggu kelamaan (Download Model AI 145MB + Transkrip).\\n\\nCek Terminal Docker: Pasti ada log 'Report Secured' nanti.\\n\\nTips: Pake mode TINY biar lebih cepet.\");\n\n                    document.getElementById('sys-status').innerText = \"BG TASK\";\n                    document.getElementById('sys-status').style.color = \"var(--neon-purple)\";\n                } else {\n                    alert(\"Error: \" + e.message);\n                }\n            } finally {\n                if(logInterval) clearInterval(logInterval);\n                document.getElementById('btnScan').disabled = false;\n                document.getElementById('btnScan').innerText = \"INJECT\";\n                document.getElementById('btnScan').classList.remove('active');\n\n                if (document.getElementById('sys-status').innerText !== \"BG TASK\") {\n                    document.getElementById('sys-status').innerText = \"IDLE\";\n                    document.getElementById('sys-status').style.color = \"var(--neon-green)\";\n                }\n            }\n        }\n\n        function findResultJson(obj) {\n            if (!obj || typeof obj !== 'object') return null;\n            if (obj.result_json) return obj.result_json;\n            if (obj.payload && obj.payload.result_json) return obj.payload.result_json;\n            if (obj.data) return findResultJson(obj.data);\n            return null;\n        }\n\n        function render(data) {\n            log(\"Decrypting Intelligence...\", \"sys\");\n            console.log(\"RENDER DATA:\", data);\n\n            const meta = data.meta || {};\n            const ch = data.channel_intel || {};\n            const stats = data.video_ballistics || {};\n            const seo = data.seo_analysis || {};\n            const trans = data.transcript_data || {};\n            const fin = data.financials || {};\n\n            const thumbImg = document.getElementById('img-thumb');\n            const thumbUrl = meta.thumbnail;\n            if(thumbUrl) {\n                thumbImg.src = thumbUrl;\n                thumbImg.style.display = 'block';\n                document.getElementById('thumb-err').style.display='none';\n            }\n\n            document.getElementById('img-avatar').src = ch.name ? `https://ui-avatars.com/api/?name=${ch.name}&background=00f3ff&color=000` : \"\";\n\n            document.getElementById('txt-title').innerText = meta.title || \"Unknown Title\";\n            document.getElementById('txt-desc').innerText = meta.description_full || \"No Description\";\n\n            document.getElementById('txt-ch-name').innerText = ch.name || \"-\";\n            document.getElementById('txt-ch-subs').innerText = fmt(ch.subscribers) + \" Subs\";\n            document.getElementById('lnk-ch').href = ch.url || \"#\";\n\n            document.getElementById('val-views').innerText = fmt(meta.views);\n            document.getElementById('val-likes').innerText = fmt(meta.likes);\n            document.getElementById('val-com').innerText = fmt(meta.comments);\n            document.getElementById('val-dur').innerText = fmtTime(meta.duration);\n            document.getElementById('val-seo').innerText = stats.seo_score || 0;\n            document.getElementById('val-eng').innerText = (stats.engagement_rate || 0) + \"%\";\n\n            const earnings = fin.est_earnings ? `${fin.est_earnings.low} - ${fin.est_earnings.high}` : \"$0\";\n            document.getElementById('val-earnings').innerText = earnings;\n            document.getElementById('val-velocity').innerText = stats.velocity || \"0 v/h\";\n\n            const monetEl = document.getElementById('val-monet');\n            monetEl.innerText = fin.monetization_status || \"?\";\n            monetEl.className = \"stat-val \" + (fin.monetization_status && fin.monetization_status.includes(\"MONETIZED\") ? \"money\" : \"alert\");\n\n            let transText = \"No Transcript Data.\";\n            let hookText = \"Requires Deep Scan.\";\n\n            if (typeof trans === 'string') {\n                if (trans === \"Not requested\") {\n                    transText = \"\u26a0\ufe0f TRANSCRIPT NOT REQUESTED. Select 'DEEP SCAN' to fetch.\";\n                    hookText = \"Data unavailable in Flash Mode.\";\n                } else {\n                    transText = trans;\n                }\n            } else if (trans && typeof trans === 'object') {\n                transText = trans.full_text || \"\u26a0\ufe0f Audio recognized but no text found.\";\n                hookText = trans.hook_text || \"No Hook Data found.\";\n\n                const hookScoreEl = document.getElementById('lbl-hook-score');\n                hookScoreEl.innerText = \"\";\n                if (trans.hook_analysis && trans.hook_analysis.includes(\"STRONG\")) {\n                    hookScoreEl.innerText = \"[ STRONG ]\";\n                    hookScoreEl.style.color = \"var(--neon-green)\";\n                } else if (trans.hook_analysis) {\n                    hookScoreEl.innerText = \"[ WEAK ]\";\n                    hookScoreEl.style.color = \"var(--neon-alert)\";\n                }\n            }\n\n            document.getElementById('txt-trans').innerText = transText;\n            document.getElementById('txt-hook').innerText = hookText;\n\n            renderTags('tags-orig', meta.original_tags);\n            renderTags('tags-ai', seo.top_keywords, true);\n            renderTags('tags-ch', ch.channel_tags);\n\n            nav('visual');\n        }\n\n        function fmt(n) { return n ? parseInt(n).toLocaleString('en-US') : \"0\"; }\n        function fmtTime(s) {\n            if(!s) return \"00:00\";\n            const m = Math.floor(s/60);\n            const sc = Math.floor(s%60);\n            return `${m}:${sc<10?'0'+sc:sc}`;\n        }\n\n        function renderTags(id, tags, isAi=false) {\n            const box = document.getElementById(id);\n            box.innerHTML = \"\";\n            if(!tags || tags.length===0) { box.innerHTML=\"<span style='color:#555'>NO DATA</span>\"; return; }\n            tags.forEach(t => {\n                const s = document.createElement('span');\n                s.className = \"cyber-tag\" + (isAi?\" ai\":\"\");\n                s.innerText = t;\n                s.onclick = () => { navigator.clipboard.writeText(t); log(\"Copied tag.\", \"info\"); };\n                box.appendChild(s);\n            });\n        }\n\n        function copy(id) {\n            navigator.clipboard.writeText(document.getElementById(id).innerText);\n            log(\"Content copied to clipboard.\", \"sys\");\n        }\n    </script>\n</body>\n</html>\n", "structure": <div class=\"top-section\">\n            <div class=\"now-playing\" id=\"trackTitle\">NO MEDIA SELECTED</div>\n            <div class=\"status-text\" id=\"statusText\">Select a folder to begin</div>\n            <canvas id=\"visualizer\"></canvas>\n        </div>\n\n        <div class=\"controls\">\n            <button class=\"btn\" onclick=\"prevTrack()\">\u23ee</button>\n            <button class=\"btn btn-main\" onclick=\"togglePlay()\" id=\"btnPlay\">\u25b6</button>\n            <button class=\"btn\" onclick=\"nextTrack()\">\u23ed</button>\n            <button class=\"btn\" onclick=\"toggleShuffle()\" id=\"btnShuffle\" title=\"Shuffle\">\ud83d\udd00</button>\n            <button class=\"btn\" onclick=\"toggleRepeat()\" id=\"btnRepeat\" title=\"Repeat\">\ud83d\udd01</button>\n        </div>\n\n        <div class=\"import-section\">\n            <label class=\"file-btn\">\n                \ud83d\udcc2 LOAD MUSIC FOLDER\n                <input type=\"file\" id=\"folderInput\" webkitdirectory directory multiple style=\"display: none;\" onchange=\"handleFolderSelect(this)\">\n            </label>\n        </div>\n\n        <div class=\"playlist\" id=\"playlist\">\n            </div>\n    </div>\n\n    <audio id=\"audioPlayer\" crossorigin=\"anonymous\"></audio>\n\n    <script>\n        // --- CORE VARIABLES ---\n        const audio = document.getElementById('audioPlayer');\n        const trackTitle = document.getElementById('trackTitle');\n        const statusText = document.getElementById('statusText');\n        const btnPlay = document.getElementById('btnPlay');\n        const playlistContainer = document.getElementById('playlist');\n\n        let playlist = []; // Array of { name, fileObj }\n        let currentIndex = 0;\n        let isPlaying = false;\n        let isShuffle = false;\n        let isRepeat = false;\n\n        // --- AUDIO CONTEXT (Visualizer) ---\n        let audioCtx, analyser, source;\n        const canvas = document.getElementById('visualizer');\n        const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');\n\n        function initAudioContext() {\n            if (!audioCtx) {\n                audioCtx = new (window.AudioContext || window.webkitAudioContext)();\n                analyser = audioCtx.createAnalyser();\n                source = audioCtx.createMediaElementSource(audio);\n                source.connect(analyser);\n                analyser.connect(audioCtx.destination);\n                analyser.fftSize = 64; // Low res for retro look\n                drawVisualizer();\n            }\n        }\n\n        // --- FOLDER HANDLING (OFFLINE MAGIC) ---\n        function handleFolderSelect(input) {\n            const files = Array.from(input.files);\n\n            // Filter audio files only\n            const audioFiles = files.filter(f =>\n                f.name.toLowerCase().endsWith('.mp3') ||\n                f.name.toLowerCase().endsWith('.wav') ||\n                f.name.toLowerCase().endsWith('.ogg') ||\n                f.name.toLowerCase().endsWith('.flac')\n            );\n\n            if (audioFiles.length === 0) {\n                statusText.innerText = \"No music files found.\";\n                return;\n            }\n\n            // Sort alphabetically\n            audioFiles.sort((a, b) => a.name.localeCompare(b.name));\n\n            // Build Playlist\n            playlist = audioFiles.map(f => ({\n                name: f.name.replace(/\\.[^/.]+$/, \"\"), // Remove extension\n                fileObj: f\n            }));\n\n            renderPlaylist();\n            statusText.innerText = `${playlist.length} tracks loaded. Ready.`;\n\n            // Auto play first\n            loadTrack(0);\n        }\n\n        // --- PLAYLIST UI ---\n        function renderPlaylist() {\n            playlistContainer.innerHTML = '';\n            playlist.forEach((track, index) => {\n                const div = document.createElement('div');\n                div.className = `track ${index === currentIndex ? 'active' : ''}`;\n                div.innerHTML = `\n                    <span class=\"track-name\">${index + 1}. ${track.name}</span>\n                    <span class=\"track-time\">LOCAL</span>\n                `;\n                div.onclick = () => {\n                    currentIndex = index;\n                    loadTrack(index);\n                    playAudio();\n                };\n                playlistContainer.appendChild(div);\n            });\n        }\n\n        // --- PLAYER LOGIC ---\n        function loadTrack(index) {\n            if (playlist.length === 0) return;\n\n            // Initialize AudioContext on first interaction\n            initAudioContext();\n\n            const track = playlist[index];\n\n            // Create Blob URL from local file object\n            const fileUrl = URL.createObjectURL(track.fileObj);\n\n            audio.src = fileUrl;\n            audio.load();\n\n            trackTitle.innerText = track.name;\n            statusText.innerText = \"Playing Local File...\";\n\n            // Update UI Highlight\n            document.querySelectorAll('.track').forEach((el, i) => {\n                el.classList.toggle('active', i === index);\n            });\n        }\n\n        function playAudio() {\n            if (playlist.length === 0) return;\n            audio.play().then(() => {\n                isPlaying = true;\n                btnPlay.innerText = \"\u23f8\";\n                statusText.innerText = \"Playing...\";\n            }).catch(e => console.error(\"Play error:\", e));\n        }\n\n        function pauseAudio() {\n            audio.pause();\n            isPlaying = false;\n            btnPlay.innerText = \"\u25b6\";\n            statusText.innerText = \"Paused\";\n        }\n\n        function togglePlay() {\n            if (isPlaying) pauseAudio();\n            else playAudio();\n        }\n\n        function nextTrack() {\n            if (playlist.length === 0) return;\n\n            if (isShuffle) {\n                currentIndex = Math.floor(Math.random() * playlist.length);\n            } else {\n                currentIndex = (currentIndex + 1) % playlist.length;\n            }\n            loadTrack(currentIndex);\n            playAudio();\n        }\n\n        function prevTrack() {\n            if (playlist.length === 0) return;\n            currentIndex = (currentIndex - 1 + playlist.length) % playlist.length;\n            loadTrack(currentIndex);\n            playAudio();\n        }\n\n        // --- BUTTONS LOGIC ---\n        function toggleShuffle() {\n            isShuffle = !isShuffle;\n            document.getElementById('btnShuffle').classList.toggle('active', isShuffle);\n        }\n        function toggleRepeat() {\n            isRepeat = !isRepeat;\n            document.getElementById('btnRepeat').classList.toggle('active', isRepeat);\n        }\n\n        // --- EVENTS ---\n        audio.addEventListener('ended', () => {\n            if (isRepeat) {\n                audio.currentTime = 0;\n                playAudio();\n            } else {\n                nextTrack();\n            }\n        });\n\n        // --- VISUALIZER LOOP ---\n        function drawVisualizer() {\n            requestAnimationFrame(drawVisualizer);\n            if (!analyser) return;\n\n            const bufferLength = analyser.frequencyBinCount;\n            const dataArray = new Uint8Array(bufferLength);\n            analyser.getByteFrequencyData(dataArray);\n\n            ctx.clearRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);\n\n            const barWidth = (canvas.width / bufferLength) * 2.5;\n            let barHeight;\n            let x = 0;\n\n            for (let i = 0; i < bufferLength; i++) {\n                barHeight = dataArray[i] / 255 * canvas.height;\n\n                // Gradient: Cyan to Purple\n                const gradient = ctx.createLinearGradient(0, canvas.height, 0, 0);\n                gradient.addColorStop(0, '#00ffcc');\n                gradient.addColorStop(1, '#ff00ff');\n\n                ctx.fillStyle = gradient;\n\n                // Cyberpunk Rounded Bars\n                ctx.beginPath();\n                ctx.roundRect(x, canvas.height - barHeight, barWidth, barHeight, [2, 2, 0, 0]);\n                ctx.fill();\n\n                x += barWidth + 2;\n            }\n        }\n    </script>\n</body>\n</html>\n", "structure": [{"name": "Script", "type": "logic", "line": 7063, "icon": "fa-code"}, {"name": "Style", "type": "css", "line": 324, "icon": "fa-paint-brush"}], "organs": <div class=\"title-bar\">\n        <h2>Business Model Canvas</h2>\n        <div class=\"toolbar\">\n            <button onclick=\"downloadAsImage()\" class=\"btn-export\">\ud83d\udcf8 Export class=\"toast\">Saved!</div>\n\n    <script>\n        const DATA_KEY = 'business_canvas_data';\n\n        function debounce(func, wait) {\n            let timeout;\n            return function(...args) {\n                const later = () => { clearTimeout(timeout); func(...args); };\n                clearTimeout(timeout);\n                timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);\n            };\n        }\n\n        // --- CORE LOGIC: WRAPPER PATTERN ---\n        function addNote(blockId, text = '') {\n            try {\n                const container = document.getElementById(blockId);\n\n                // 1. Create Wrapper\n                const wrapper = document.createElement('div');\n                wrapper.className = 'note-wrapper';\n\n                // 2. Create Editable Area (TERPISAH)\n                const textDiv = document.createElement('div');\n                textDiv.className = 'note-text';\n                textDiv.contentEditable = true;\n                textDiv.spellcheck = false;\n                textDiv.innerText = text;\n\n                // 3. Create Delete Button (TERPISAH)\n                const delBtn = document.createElement('button');\n                delBtn.className = 'delete-btn';\n                delBtn.innerHTML = '\u00d7';\n                delBtn.onclick = (e) => {\n                    e.preventDefault(); // Stop focus stealing\n                    if(confirm(\"Hapus note ini?\")) {\n                        wrapper.remove();\n                        hybridSave();\n                    }\n                };\n\n                // 4. Assemble\n                wrapper.appendChild(textDiv);\n                wrapper.appendChild(delBtn);\n                container.appendChild(wrapper);\n\n                // 5. Focus Logic\n                if (!text) {\n                    setTimeout(() => textDiv.focus(), 10);\n                }\n\n                // 6. Listeners\n                textDiv.addEventListener('input', hybridSave);\n\n                // Tambahan: Save on blur (kalo user klik keluar)\n                textDiv.addEventListener('blur', hybridSave);\n\n            } catch (e) {\n                console.error(\"Add Note Error:\", e);\n                alert(\"Error adding note!\");\n            }\n        }\n\n        function getCanvasData() {\n            const data = {};\n            const blocks = ['list-kp', 'list-ka', 'list-kr', 'list-vp', 'list-cr', 'list-ch', 'list-cs', 'list-cst', 'list-rs'];\n\n            blocks.forEach(id => {\n                const container = document.getElementById(id);\n                const notes = [];\n                // Ambil text cuma dari .note-text, abaikan tombol\n                container.querySelectorAll('.note-text').forEach(div => {\n                    const text = div.innerText.trim();\n                    if(text) notes.push(text);\n                });\n                data[id] = notes;\n            });\n            return data;\n        }\n\n        function renderCanvas(data) {\n            if (!data) return;\n            const blocks = ['list-kp', 'list-ka', 'list-kr', 'list-vp', 'list-cr', 'list-ch', 'list-cs', 'list-cst', 'list-rs'];\n            blocks.forEach(id => { document.getElementById(id).innerHTML = ''; });\n            for (const [id, notes] of Object.entries(data)) {\n                if (blocks.includes(id) && Array.isArray(notes)) {\n                    notes.forEach(text => addNote(id, text));\n                }\n            }\n        }\n\n        function showToast(msg, type = 'success') {\n            const toast = document.getElementById('toast');\n            toast.innerText = msg;\n            toast.className = 'toast show ' + type;\n            setTimeout(() => toast.classList.remove('show'), 2000);\n        }\n\n        // --- EXPORT TOOLS ---\n        function downloadAsImage() {\n            if (typeof html2canvas === 'undefined') {\n                alert(\"Mode Offline: Library Export belum ter-cache. Connect internet sebentar lalu refresh.\");\n                return;\n            }\n            const canvasArea = document.getElementById('canvasArea');\n            showToast(\"Rendering...\", \"success\");\n            html2canvas(canvasArea, { backgroundColor: \"#1e1e2e\", scale: 2 }).then(canvas => {\n                const link = document.createElement('a');\n                link.download = 'BMC_Export.png';\n                link.href = canvas.toDataURL();\n                link.click();\n                showToast(\"Done!\");\n            }).catch(e => showToast(\"Export Error\", \"error\"));\n        }\n\n        function downloadProjectFile() {\n            const dataStr = \"data:text/json;charset=utf-8,\" + encodeURIComponent(JSON.stringify(getCanvasData(), null, 2));\n            const node = document.createElement('a');\n            node.setAttribute(\"href\", dataStr);\n            node.setAttribute(\"download\", \"bmc_backup.json\");\n            document.body.appendChild(node);\n            node.click();\n            node.remove();\n        }\n\n        function loadProjectFile(input) {\n            const file = input.files[0];\n            if (!file) return;\n            const reader = new FileReader();\n            reader.onload = function(e) {\n                try {\n                    renderCanvas(JSON.parse(e.target.result));\n                    hybridSave();\n                    showToast(\"Loaded!\");\n                } catch (err) { alert(\"File JSON tidak valid\"); }\n                input.value = '';\n            };\n            reader.readAsText(file);\n        }\n\n        // --- HYBRID SAVE (OFFLINE-PROOF) ---\n        const hybridSave = debounce(() => {\n            const data = getCanvasData();\n            // 1. LocalStorage (Primary for Offline)\n            try { localStorage.setItem('backup_' + DATA_KEY, JSON.stringify(data)); } catch(e){}\n\n            // 2. Engine (Optional)\n            if (window.parent) {\n                try {\n                    window.parent.postMessage({ type: 'WIDGET_SAVE_REQUEST', payload: { key: DATA_KEY, data: data } }, '*');\n                } catch(e) {} // Silent fail kalau engine mati\n            }\n        }, 1000);\n\n        function forceSave() { hybridSave(); showToast(\"Syncing...\"); }\n\n        // --- INIT ---\n        window.onload = () => {\n            const localData = localStorage.getItem('backup_' + DATA_KEY);\n            if (localData) try { renderCanvas(JSON.parse(localData)); } catch(e){}\n\n            window.addEventListener('message', (event) => {\n                if (event.data?.type === 'CMD_LOAD') renderCanvas(event.data.payload);\n            });\n        };\n    </script>\n</body>\n</html>\n", "structure": [{"name": "Script", "type": "logic", "line": 7832, "icon": "fa-code"}, {"name": "Style", "type": "css", "line": 414, "icon": "fa-paint-brush"}], "organs": [], "metrics": {"loc": 324, "complexity": "CRITICAL", "todo_count": 14304, "security_risks": ["Potential Hardcoded URL with Creds detected"], "last_modified": 1767761078.6953914}, "raw_imports": [], "raw_calls": [], "raw_assets": [], "inbound_paths": [], "outbound_paths": []}, "flowork-gui/template/web/public/widgets-cloud/business_canvas/manifest.json": {"id": 1009, "content": "{\n    \"id\": \"business_canvas\",\n    \"name\": \"Business Model Canvas\",\n    \"version\": \"1.1.0\",\n    \"description\": \"Interactive hybrid whiteboard for designing business models. </div>\n    </div>\n\n    <script>\n        const STORAGE_KEY = 'cine_motion_history_v1';\n        let tasks = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(STORAGE_KEY) || '[]');\n\n        // Mock User (VIP)\n        const MOCK_USER = \"0xF39733B34131c13E35733E9Af1adD78a5e768929\";\n\n        window.onload = () => { lucide.createIcons(); render(); startPolling(); };\n\n        async function generateVideo() {\n            const prompt = document.getElementById('prompt').value.trim();\n            if (!prompt) return alert(\"Please enter a scene description.\");\n\n            const btn = document.getElementById('btnRun');\n            const user = localStorage.getItem('flowork_wallet') || MOCK_USER;\n\n            btn.disabled = true;\n            btn.innerHTML = 'INITIALIZING RENDER...';\n\n            try {\n                const payload = {\n                    action: 'create',\n                    user_address: user,\n                    prompt: prompt,\n                    aspect_ratio: document.getElementById('aspect_ratio').value,\n                    n_frames: document.getElementById('n_frames').value,\n                    size: document.getElementById('size').value\n                };\n\n                const res = await fetch('/api/v1/ai/sora_video', {\n                    method: 'POST',\n                    headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },\n                    body: JSON.stringify(payload)\n                });\n\n                const data = await res.json();\n\n                if (data.code !== 200) throw new Error(data.msg || data.error || \"Generation Failed\");\n\n                // Add to Queue\n                tasks.unshift({\n                    id: data.data.taskId,\n                    prompt: prompt,\n                    status: 'waiting',\n                    timestamp: Date.now(),\n                    videoUrl: null\n                });\n\n                save(); render();\n                document.getElementById('prompt').value = \"\";\n\n            } catch (e) {\n                alert(\"Error: \" + e.message);\n            } finally {\n                btn.disabled = false;\n                btn.innerHTML = '<i data-lucide=\"clapperboard\"></i> RENDER SCENE';\n                lucide.createIcons();\n            }\n        }\n\n        function startPolling() {\n            setInterval(async () => {\n                const active = tasks.filter(t => t.status === 'waiting');\n                if (!active.length) return;\n\n                const user = localStorage.getItem('flowork_wallet') || MOCK_USER;\n\n                for (let t of active) {\n                    try {\n                        const res = await fetch('/api/v1/ai/sora_video', {\n                            method: 'POST',\n                            headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },\n                            body: JSON.stringify({\n                                action: 'check_status',\n                                taskId: t.id,\n                                user_address: user\n                            })\n                        });\n\n                        const d = await res.json();\n\n                        if(d.code !== 200) continue;\n\n                        const state = d.data?.state;\n\n                        if (state === 'success') {\n                            try {\n                                const resultObj = JSON.parse(d.data.resultJson);\n                                if (resultObj.resultUrls && resultObj.resultUrls.length > 0) {\n                                    t.status = 'success';\n                                    t.videoUrl = resultObj.resultUrls[0];\n                                    save(); render();\n                                }\n                            } catch (parseErr) { console.warn(\"Parsing Error\"); }\n                        } else if (state === 'fail') {\n                            t.status = 'fail';\n                            t.errorMsg = d.data?.failMsg || \"Unknown Error\";\n                            save(); render();\n                        }\n\n                    } catch (e) { console.warn(\"Poll Error\"); }\n                }\n            }, 5000);\n        }\n\n        function render() {\n            const container = document.getElementById('videoList');\n            container.innerHTML = tasks.length ? '' : '<div style=\"text-align:center; padding:40px; color:#444; font-size:0.8rem;\">NO RENDER HISTORY</div>';\n\n            tasks.forEach(t => {\n                const card = document.createElement('div');\n                card.className = 'video-card';\n\n                let content = '';\n                let badgeClass = '';\n\n                if (t.status === 'waiting') {\n                    badgeClass = 'status-waiting';\n                    content = `<div class=\"video-content\"><div class=\"loading-pulse\"></div></div>`;\n                } else if (t.status === 'success') {\n                    badgeClass = 'status-success';\n                    content = `\n                        <div class=\"video-content\">\n                            <video src=\"${t.videoUrl}\" controls preload=\"metadata\"></video>\n                        </div>\n                        <a href=\"${t.videoUrl}\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"download-btn\" download>DOWNLOAD MP4</a>\n                    `;\n                } else {\n                    badgeClass = 'status-fail';\n                    content = `<div class=\"video-content\" style=\"color:#ff4444; font-size:0.7rem; flex-direction:column; gap:5px;\"><i data-lucide=\"alert-triangle\"></i> FAILED</div>`;\n                }\n\n                card.innerHTML = `\n                    <div class=\"video-header\">\n                        <div style=\"font-size:0.7rem; font-weight:bold; white-space:nowrap; overflow:hidden; text-overflow:ellipsis; max-width:200px; color:#fff;\" title=\"${t.prompt}\">\n                            ${t.prompt.toUpperCase()}\n                        </div>\n                        <div class=\"status-badge ${badgeClass}\">${t.status}</div>\n                    </div>\n                    ${content}\n                `;\n                container.appendChild(card);\n            });\n            lucide.createIcons();\n        }\n\n        function save() { localStorage.setItem(STORAGE_KEY, JSON.stringify(tasks.slice(0, 10))); }\n        function purge() { if(confirm(\"Clear history?\")) { tasks=[]; save(); render(); } }\n\n    </script>\n</body>\n</html>\n", "structure": [{"name": "Script", "type": "logic", "line": 7815, "icon": "fa-code"}, {"name": "Style", "type": "css", "line": 299, "icon": "fa-paint-brush"}], "organs": [], "metrics": {"loc": 303, "complexity": "CRITICAL", "todo_count": 14125, "security_risks": ["Potential Hardcoded URL with Creds detected"], "last_modified": 1767761078.696391}, "raw_imports": [], "raw_calls": [], "raw_assets": ["${t.videoUrl}"], "inbound_paths": [], "outbound_paths": []}, "flowork-gui/template/web/public/widgets-cloud/cine_motion_pro/manifest.json": {"id": 1012, "content": "{\n    \"id\": \"cine_motion_pro\",\n    \"name\": \"Video Generator\",\n    \"version\": \"1.0.0\",\n    \"description\": \"High-fidelity text-to-video generation engine. monospace; font-size: 0.75rem;\n            overflow-y: auto; display: flex; flex-direction: column-reverse;\n        }\n        .log-line { margin-bottom: 4px; border-bottom: 1px solid #ffae00; }\n        .log-error { color: var(--neon-alert); }\n        .log-sys { color: var(--neon-green); font-weight: bold; }\n\n        /* --- FLEX GRID LAYOUT --- */\n        .layout-grid {\n            display: flex;\n            flex-wrap: wrap;\n            gap: 20px;\n            width: 100%;\n        }\n        .layout-col-left {\n            flex: 1 1 350px;\n            min-width: background: rgba(255,255,255,0.02); border: 1px solid rgba(0, 243, 255, 0.15);\n            margin-bottom: 15px; position: relative;\n        }\n        .cyber-card::before {\n            content:''; .stat-val { font-family: 'Orbitron'; font-size: 1.1rem; color: #fff; word-break: break-word; }\n        .stat-val.money { color: var(--neon-green); text-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0,255,102,0.4); }\n        .stat-val.alert { color: var(--neon-alert); }\n        .stat-lbl { font-family: 'JetBrains Mono'; font-size: 0.6rem; color: #888; margin-top: 5px; text-transform: uppercase; }\n\n        .tag-pool { background: var(--neon-purple); color: #fff; }\n\n        .cyber-text {\n            font-family: 'JetBrains Mono'; font-size: 0.85rem; color: #ccc;\n            line-height: 1.6; white-space: pre-wrap; word-break: break-word;\n        }\n\n        .tab-content { display: none; height: 100%; animation: glitch-anim 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1); }\n        .tab-content.active { display:                 <div id=\"txt-ch-subs\" style=\"font-family:'JetBrains Mono'; color:var(--neon-green); font-size:1.2rem;\">-</div>\n                    <br>\n                    <a id=\"lnk-ch\" CHANNEL</a>\n                </div>\n                <div class=\"cyber-card\" style=\"margin-top:20px;\">\n                    <div class=\"card-header\">CHANNEL KEYWORDS</div>\n                <div id=\"txt-trans\" class=\"cyber-text\" style=\"min-height:200px;\">-</div>\n                    </div>\n                </div>\n            </div>\n\n        </div>\n    </div>\n\n    <div class=\"terminal-panel\" id=\"terminal\">\n        <div class=\"log-line\"><span class=\"log-ts\">SYS</span> <span class=\"log-sys\">NEURAL SCOUT v11.0 // NO FAIL PROTOCOL</span></div>\n    </div>\n\n    <div class=\"modal\" id=\"settingsModal\">\n        <div class=\"modal-win\">\n            <h2 style=\"font-family:'Orbitron'; color:var(--neon-cyan); margin-top:0;\">SYSTEM CONFIG</h2>\n            <label style=\"display:block; color:#888; font-size:0.8rem; margin-bottom:5px;\">GATEWAY URL</label>\n            <input type=\"text\" id=\"cfg-url\" class=\"cyber-input\" style=\"width:100%; margin-bottom:15px;\">\n            <label style=\"display:block; color:#888; font-size:0.8rem; margin-bottom:5px;\">AUTH TOKEN</label>\n            <input type=\"password\" id=\"cfg-token\" class=\"cyber-input\" style=\"width:100%; margin-bottom:20px;\">\n            <button class=\"btn-scan\" onclick=\"saveConfig()\" style=\"width:100%;\">SAVE CONFIG</button>\n            <button onclick=\"toggleSettings()\" style=\"width:100%; background:none; border:1px solid #333; color:#888; margin-top:10px; padding:10px; cursor:pointer;\">CANCEL</button>\n        </div>\n    </div>\n\n    <script>\n        // CONFIG\n        let API_URL = localStorage.getItem('flowork_engine_url') || \"\";\n        let TOKEN = localStorage.getItem('flowork_auth_token') || \"\";\n        const MODULE_ID = \"youtube_keyword_researcher_v1\";\n\n        if(!TOKEN || !API_URL) toggleSettings();\n\n        function log(msg, type='info') {\n            const term = document.getElementById('terminal');\n            const d = new Date();\n            const ts = `${d.getHours()}:${d.getMinutes()}:${d.getSeconds()}`;\n            const div = document.createElement('div');\n            div.className = 'log-line';\n            let cls = 'log-info';\n            if(type==='warn') cls = 'log-warn';\n            if(type==='error') cls = 'log-error';\n            if(type==='sys') cls = 'log-sys';\n            div.innerHTML = `<span class=\"log-ts\">[${ts}]</span> <span class=\"${cls}\">${msg}</span>`;\n            term.prepend(div);\n        }\n\n        function nav(tab) {\n            document.querySelectorAll('.tab-btn').forEach(b => b.classList.remove('active'));\n            document.querySelectorAll('.tab-content').forEach(c => c.classList.remove('active'));\n            document.getElementById('state-idle').style.display = 'none';\n            const btns = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('.tab-btn'));\n            const targetBtn = btns.find(b => b.getAttribute('onclick').includes(tab));\n            if(targetBtn) targetBtn.classList.add('active');\n            const content = document.getElementById('tab-' + tab);\n            if(content) content.classList.add('active');\n        }\n\n        function toggleSettings() {\n            const m = document.getElementById('settingsModal');\n            const isOpen = m.style.display === 'flex';\n            m.style.display = isOpen ? 'none' : 'flex';\n            if(!isOpen) {\n                document.getElementById('cfg-url').value = API_URL || \"http://localhost:8000/api/v1\";\n                document.getElementById('cfg-token').value = TOKEN;\n            }\n        }\n\n        function saveConfig() {\n            let u = document.getElementById('cfg-url').value.trim();\n            if(u.endsWith('/')) u = u.slice(0, -1);\n            if (!u.includes('/api/v1') && !u.includes('localhost')) u += '/api/v1';\n            API_URL = u;\n            TOKEN = document.getElementById('cfg-token').value.trim();\n            localStorage.setItem('flowork_engine_url', API_URL);\n            localStorage.setItem('flowork_auth_token', TOKEN);\n            toggleSettings();\n            log(\"Config saved.\", \"sys\");\n        }\n\n        let logInterval;\n        function simulateLogs() {\n            const msgs = [\"Resetting Neural Link...\", \"Flushing Local Cache...\", \"Initializing Deep Scan...\", \"Resolving Target...\", \"Analyzing Audio Vector...\"];\n            let i=0;\n            logInterval = setInterval(() => {\n                if(i<msgs.length) { log(msgs[i], \"info\"); i++; }\n                else clearInterval(logInterval);\n            }, 2500);\n        }\n\n        function resetUI() {\n            // [FIX] KOSONGKAN LAYAR DULU\n            document.getElementById('state-idle').style.display = 'flex';\n            document.querySelectorAll('.tab-content').forEach(c => c.classList.remove('active'));\n\n            document.getElementById('txt-title').innerText = \"-\";\n            document.getElementById('txt-desc').innerText = \"-\";\n            document.getElementById('txt-ch-name').innerText = \"-\";\n            document.getElementById('txt-ch-subs').innerText = \"-\";\n            document.getElementById('img-thumb').style.display = 'none';\n            document.getElementById('img-avatar').src = \"\";\n            document.getElementById('val-views').innerText = \"0\";\n            document.getElementById('val-likes').innerText = \"0\";\n            document.getElementById('val-com').innerText = \"0\";\n            document.getElementById('val-dur').innerText = \"00:00\";\n            document.getElementById('val-seo').innerText = \"0\";\n            document.getElementById('val-eng').innerText = \"0%\";\n            document.getElementById('val-earnings').innerText = \"-\";\n            document.getElementById('val-monet').innerText = \"-\";\n            document.getElementById('val-velocity').innerText = \"-\";\n            document.getElementById('txt-hook').innerText = \"[Waiting for Deep Scan...]\";\n            document.getElementById('txt-trans').innerText = \"-\";\n            document.getElementById('tags-orig').innerHTML = \"\";\n            document.getElementById('tags-ai').innerHTML = \"\";\n            document.getElementById('tags-ch').innerHTML = \"\";\n            document.getElementById('lbl-hook-score').innerText = \"\";\n        }\n\n        async function startHack() {\n            const url = document.getElementById('urlInput').value;\n            const depth = document.getElementById('depthSelect').value;\n            const model = document.getElementById('modelSelect').value;\n\n            if(!API_URL || !TOKEN) return toggleSettings();\n            if(!url) return log(\"URL Required.\", \"error\");\n\n            resetUI();\n\n            document.getElementById('btnScan').disabled = true;\n            document.getElementById('btnScan').innerText = \"RUNNING\";\n            document.getElementById('btnScan').classList.add('active');\n            document.getElementById('sys-status').innerText = \"PROCESSING\";\n            document.getElementById('sys-status').style.color = \"var(--neon-cyan)\";\n\n            log(`TARGET: ${url}`, \"sys\");\n            log(`MODE: ${depth} | MODEL: ${model}`, \"sys\");\n\n            if(logInterval) clearInterval(logInterval);\n            simulateLogs();\n\n            try {\n                let endpointBase = API_URL;\n                if (!endpointBase.endsWith('/proxy')) endpointBase += '/proxy';\n                const ep = `${endpointBase}/execution/run_module`;\n\n                const inputsData = {\n                    video_url: url,\n                    research_depth: depth,\n                    whisper_model: model,\n                    output_folder: \"C:/FLOWORK/outputs\"\n                };\n\n                const payload = {\n                    module_id: MODULE_ID,\n                    action: \"execute\",\n                    inputs: inputsData,\n                    params: inputsData,\n                    config: inputsData\n                };\n\n                const res = await fetch(ep, {\n                    method: 'POST',\n                    headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'X-Gateway-Secret': TOKEN },\n                    body: JSON.stringify(payload)\n                });\n\n                if(!res.ok) throw new Error(`Server Error: ${res.status}`);\n\n                const responseData = await res.json();\n                const cleanData = findResultJson(responseData);\n\n                if(cleanData) {\n                    render(cleanData);\n                } else {\n                    console.error(\"FULL RESPONSE:\", responseData);\n                    throw new Error(\"Data structure invalid.\");\n                }\n\n            } catch(e) {\n                log(e.message, \"error\");\n\n                // [FIX] ANTI PANIC MODE\n                // Kalau errornya fetch/network (timeout), kita anggap sukses background\n                if (e.message.includes(\"Failed to fetch\") || e.message.includes(\"NetworkError\") || e.name === 'TypeError') {\n                    alert(\"\u26a0\ufe0f TIMEOUT (BACKEND LAGI KERJA) \u26a0\ufe0f\\n\\nBrowser mutusin koneksi karena nunggu kelamaan (Download Model AI 145MB + Transkrip).\\n\\nCek Terminal Docker: Pasti ada log 'Report Secured' nanti.\\n\\nTips: Pake mode TINY biar lebih cepet.\");\n\n                    document.getElementById('sys-status').innerText = \"BG TASK\";\n                    document.getElementById('sys-status').style.color = \"var(--neon-purple)\";\n                } else {\n                    alert(\"Error: \" + e.message);\n                }\n            } finally {\n                if(logInterval) clearInterval(logInterval);\n                document.getElementById('btnScan').disabled = false;\n                document.getElementById('btnScan').innerText = \"INJECT\";\n                document.getElementById('btnScan').classList.remove('active');\n\n                if (document.getElementById('sys-status').innerText !== \"BG TASK\") {\n                    document.getElementById('sys-status').innerText = \"IDLE\";\n                    document.getElementById('sys-status').style.color = \"var(--neon-green)\";\n                }\n            }\n        }\n\n        function findResultJson(obj) {\n            if (!obj || typeof obj !== 'object') return null;\n            if (obj.result_json) return obj.result_json;\n            if (obj.payload && obj.payload.result_json) return obj.payload.result_json;\n            if (obj.data) return findResultJson(obj.data);\n            return null;\n        }\n\n        function render(data) {\n            log(\"Decrypting Intelligence...\", \"sys\");\n            console.log(\"RENDER DATA:\", data);\n\n            const meta = data.meta || {};\n            const ch = data.channel_intel || {};\n            const stats = data.video_ballistics || {};\n            const seo = data.seo_analysis || {};\n            const trans = data.transcript_data || {};\n            const fin = data.financials || {};\n\n            const thumbImg = document.getElementById('img-thumb');\n            const thumbUrl = meta.thumbnail;\n            if(thumbUrl) {\n                thumbImg.src = thumbUrl;\n                thumbImg.style.display = 'block';\n                document.getElementById('thumb-err').style.display='none';\n            }\n\n            document.getElementById('img-avatar').src = ch.name ? `https://ui-avatars.com/api/?name=${ch.name}&background=00f3ff&color=000` : \"\";\n\n            document.getElementById('txt-title').innerText = meta.title || \"Unknown Title\";\n            document.getElementById('txt-desc').innerText = meta.description_full || \"No Description\";\n\n            document.getElementById('txt-ch-name').innerText = ch.name || \"-\";\n            document.getElementById('txt-ch-subs').innerText = fmt(ch.subscribers) + \" Subs\";\n            document.getElementById('lnk-ch').href = ch.url || \"#\";\n\n            document.getElementById('val-views').innerText = fmt(meta.views);\n            document.getElementById('val-likes').innerText = fmt(meta.likes);\n            document.getElementById('val-com').innerText = fmt(meta.comments);\n            document.getElementById('val-dur').innerText = fmtTime(meta.duration);\n            document.getElementById('val-seo').innerText = stats.seo_score || 0;\n            document.getElementById('val-eng').innerText = (stats.engagement_rate || 0) + \"%\";\n\n            const earnings = fin.est_earnings ? `${fin.est_earnings.low} - ${fin.est_earnings.high}` : \"$0\";\n            document.getElementById('val-earnings').innerText = earnings;\n            document.getElementById('val-velocity').innerText = stats.velocity || \"0 v/h\";\n\n            const monetEl = document.getElementById('val-monet');\n            monetEl.innerText = fin.monetization_status || \"?\";\n            monetEl.className = \"stat-val \" + (fin.monetization_status && fin.monetization_status.includes(\"MONETIZED\") ? \"money\" : \"alert\");\n\n            let transText = \"No Transcript Data.\";\n            let hookText = \"Requires Deep Scan.\";\n\n            if (typeof trans === 'string') {\n                if (trans === \"Not requested\") {\n                    transText = \"\u26a0\ufe0f TRANSCRIPT NOT REQUESTED. Select 'DEEP SCAN' to fetch.\";\n                    hookText = \"Data unavailable in Flash Mode.\";\n                } else {\n                    transText = trans;\n                }\n            } else if (trans && typeof trans === 'object') {\n                transText = trans.full_text || \"\u26a0\ufe0f Audio recognized but no text found.\";\n                hookText = trans.hook_text || \"No Hook Data found.\";\n\n                const hookScoreEl = document.getElementById('lbl-hook-score');\n                hookScoreEl.innerText = \"\";\n                if (trans.hook_analysis && trans.hook_analysis.includes(\"STRONG\")) {\n                    hookScoreEl.innerText = \"[ STRONG ]\";\n                    hookScoreEl.style.color = \"var(--neon-green)\";\n                } else if (trans.hook_analysis) {\n                    hookScoreEl.innerText = \"[ WEAK ]\";\n                    hookScoreEl.style.color = \"var(--neon-alert)\";\n                }\n            }\n\n            document.getElementById('txt-trans').innerText = transText;\n            document.getElementById('txt-hook').innerText = hookText;\n\n            renderTags('tags-orig', meta.original_tags);\n            renderTags('tags-ai', seo.top_keywords, true);\n            renderTags('tags-ch', ch.channel_tags);\n\n            nav('visual');\n        }\n\n        function fmt(n) { return n ? parseInt(n).toLocaleString('en-US') : \"0\"; }\n        function fmtTime(s) {\n            if(!s) return \"00:00\";\n            const m = Math.floor(s/60);\n            const sc = Math.floor(s%60);\n            return `${m}:${sc<10?'0'+sc:sc}`;\n        }\n\n        function renderTags(id, tags, isAi=false) {\n            const box = document.getElementById(id);\n            box.innerHTML = \"\";\n            if(!tags || tags.length===0) { box.innerHTML=\"<span style='color:#555'>NO DATA</span>\"; return; }\n            tags.forEach(t => {\n                const s = document.createElement('span');\n                s.className = \"cyber-tag\" + (isAi?\" ai\":\"\");\n                s.innerText = t;\n                s.onclick = () => { navigator.clipboard.writeText(t); log(\"Copied tag.\", \"info\"); };\n                box.appendChild(s);\n            });\n        }\n\n        function copy(id) {\n            navigator.clipboard.writeText(document.getElementById(id).innerText);\n            log(\"Content copied to clipboard.\", \"sys\");\n        }\n    </script>\n</body>\n</html>\n", "structure":
