      </div>\n    </div>\n\n    <input type=\"file\" id=\"fileInput\" multiple accept=\"video/*\">\n\n    <script>\n        // --- SYSTEM VARIABLES ---\n        const video = document.getElementById('videoPlayer');\n        const scrubber = document.getElementById('scrubber');\n        const scrubFill = document.getElementById('scrubFill');\n        const playlistBox = document.getElementById('playlistBox');\n        const logger = document.getElementById('logger');\n        const timeDisplay = document.getElementById('timeDisplay');\n        const statusText = document.getElementById('statusText');\n        const statusDot = document.getElementById('statusDot');\n        const emptyState = document.getElementById('emptyState');\n        const speedDisplay = document.getElementById('speedDisplay');\n\n        let playlist = [];\n        let currentIndex = -1;\n        let isDragging = false;\n        let playbackRate = 1.0;\n\n        // --- LOGGER ---\n        function log(msg) {\n            const now = new Date();\n            const time = `${now.getHours()}:${now.getMinutes()}:${now.getSeconds()}`;\n            const div = document.createElement('div');\n            div.className = 'log-line';\n            div.innerHTML = `<span class=\"log-tm\">[${time}]</span> <span class=\"log-msg\">${msg}</span>`;\n            logger.prepend(div);\n        }\n\n        // --- FILE HANDLING ---\n        function handleFiles(files) {\n            let count = 0;\n            for(let f of files) {\n                if(f.type.startsWith('video/')) {\n                    playlist.push(f);\n                    count++;\n                }\n            }\n            if(count > 0) {\n                log(`Imported ${count} new artifacts.`);\n                renderPlaylist();\n                if(currentIndex === -1) loadTrack(0);\n            }\n        }\n\n        function renderPlaylist() {\n            playlistBox.innerHTML = '';\n            playlist.forEach((file, i) => {\n                const div = document.createElement('div');\n                div.className = `track-card ${i === currentIndex ? 'active' : ''}`;\n                div.innerHTML = `\n                    <div class=\"track-info\">\n                        <div class=\"track-name\">${i+1}. ${file.name}</div>\n                        <div class=\"track-dur\">${(file.size / 1024 / 1024).toFixed(1)} MB</div>\n                    </div>\n                `;\n                div.onclick = () => loadTrack(i);\n                playlistBox.appendChild(div);\n            });\n        }\n\n        function loadTrack(index) {\n            if(index < 0 || index >= playlist.length) return;\n            currentIndex = index;\n\n            const file = playlist[index];\n            video.src = URL.createObjectURL(file);\n            video.playbackRate = playbackRate;\n            video.play();\n\n            updateStatus(\"PLAYING\", true);\n            emptyState.style.display = 'none';\n            renderPlaylist();\n            updatePlayBtn(true);\n            log(`Streaming: ${file.name}`);\n        }\n\n        // --- PLAYBACK CONTROLS ---\n        function togglePlay() {\n            if(!video.src) return;\n            if(video.paused) {\n                video.play();\n                updateStatus(\"PLAYING\", true);\n                updatePlayBtn(true);\n            } else {\n                video.pause();\n                updateStatus(\"PAUSED\", false);\n                updatePlayBtn(false);\n            }\n        }\n\n        function stopVideo() {\n            video.pause();\n            video.currentTime = 0;\n            updateStatus(\"TERMINATED\", false);\n            updatePlayBtn(false);\n        }\n\n        function updatePlayBtn(isPlay) {\n            document.getElementById('iconPlay').style.display = isPlay ? 'none' : 'block';\n            document.getElementById('iconPause').style.display = isPlay ? 'block' : 'none';\n        }\n\n        function playNext() {\n            if(playlist.length === 0) return;\n            let next = (currentIndex + 1) % playlist.length;\n            loadTrack(next);\n        }\n\n        function playPrev() {\n            if(playlist.length === 0) return;\n            let prev = (currentIndex - 1 + playlist.length) % playlist.length;\n            loadTrack(prev);\n        }\n\n        function updateStatus(text, active) {\n            statusText.innerText = text;\n            if(active) statusDot.classList.add('active');\n            else statusDot.classList.remove('active');\n        }\n\n        function cycleSpeed() {\n            const speeds = [0.5, 1.0, 1.5, 2.0, 4.0];\n            let idx = speeds.indexOf(playbackRate);\n            playbackRate = speeds[(idx + 1) % speeds.length];\n            video.playbackRate = playbackRate;\n            speedDisplay.innerText = playbackRate + \"x\";\n            log(`Speed adjusted: ${playbackRate}x`);\n        }\n\n        // --- SCRUBBING LOGIC (THE FIX) ---\n        function updateScrubber(e) {\n            const rect = scrubber.getBoundingClientRect();\n            // Kalkulasi posisi X relatif terhadap width element\n            let percent = (e.clientX - rect.left) / rect.width;\n\n            // Clamp (batasi) antara 0 sampai 1\n            if(percent < 0) percent = 0;\n            if(percent > 1) percent = 1;\n\n            scrubFill.style.width = (percent * 100) + \"%\";\n\n            // Jika video sudah ready, update waktunya\n            if(video.duration) {\n                video.currentTime = percent * video.duration;\n            }\n        }\n\n        // 1. Mouse Down di Track\n        scrubber.addEventListener('mousedown', (e) => {\n            isDragging = true;\n            updateScrubber(e); // Pindah langsung ke posisi klik\n            if(!video.paused) {\n                video.pause(); // Pause sebentar pas geser biar smooth\n                video.dataset.wasPlaying = \"true\";\n            }\n        });\n\n        // 2. Mouse Move di Window (biar kalo kursor keluar track tetep ke-drag)\n        window.addEventListener('mousemove', (e) => {\n            if(isDragging) {\n                e.preventDefault(); // Mencegah highlight text\n                updateScrubber(e);\n            }\n        });\n\n        // 3. Mouse Up di Window\n        window.addEventListener('mouseup', (e) => {\n            if(isDragging) {\n                isDragging = false;\n                if(video.dataset.wasPlaying === \"true\") {\n                    video.play();\n                    delete video.dataset.wasPlaying;\n                }\n            }\n        });\n\n        // --- TIME UPDATE & VOLUME ---\n        video.ontimeupdate = () => {\n            if(!isDragging && video.duration) {\n                const pct = (video.currentTime / video.duration) * 100;\n                scrubFill.style.width = pct + \"%\";\n            }\n            const cur = fmtTime(video.currentTime);\n            const dur = fmtTime(video.duration || 0);\n            timeDisplay.innerText = `${cur} / ${dur}`;\n        };\n\n        function fmtTime(s) {\n            const m = Math.floor(s/60);\n            const sc = Math.floor(s%60);\n            return `${m<10?'0'+m:m}:${sc<10?'0'+sc:sc}`;\n        }\n\n        document.getElementById('volSlider').oninput = (e) => {\n            video.volume = e.target.value;\n            video.muted = false;\n        };\n\n        function toggleMute() {\n            video.muted = !video.muted;\n            log(video.muted ? \"Audio Muted\" : \"Audio Active\");\n        }\n\n        function toggleFullscreen() {\n            const el = document.querySelector('.stage-section'); // Fullscreen area video + control\n            if(!document.fullscreenElement) el.requestFullscreen();\n            else document.exitFullscreen();\n        }\n\n        // --- EVENTS LAIN ---\n        document.getElementById('fileInput').onchange = (e) => handleFiles(e.target.files);\n\n        const dropTarget = document.getElementById('dropTarget');\n        dropTarget.ondragover = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); dropTarget.style.background = '#0a1015'; };\n        dropTarget.ondragleave = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); dropTarget.style.background = '#000'; };\n        dropTarget.ondrop = (e) => {\n            e.preventDefault();\n            dropTarget.style.background = '#000';\n            handleFiles(e.dataTransfer.files);\n        };\n\n        video.onended = () => playNext();\n\n    </script>\n</body>\n</html>\n", "structure": [{"name": "Script", "type": "logic", "line": 13652, "icon": "fa-code"}, {"name": "Style", "type": "css", "line": 334, "icon": "fa-paint-brush"}], "organs": [], "metrics": {"loc": 603, "complexity": "CRITICAL", "todo_count": 21795, "security_risks": ["Potential Hardcoded URL with Creds detected"], "last_modified": 1767761078.6995933}, "raw_imports": [], "raw_calls": [], "raw_assets": [], "inbound_paths": [], "outbound_paths": []}, "flowork-gui/template/web/public/widgets-cloud/flux_video_deck/manifest.json": {"id": 1018, "content": "{\n    \"id\": \"flux_video_deck\",\n    \"name\": \"Video Player\",\n    \"version\": \"2.2.0\",\n    \"description\": \"Tactical video operations terminal. <span class=\"section-label\" style=\"margin-bottom:0\">Pipeline Results</span>\n                <button onclick=\"clearHistory()\" style=\"background:transparent; border:none; color:#f87171; </div>\n\n            <div style=\"margin-top: 15px; padding-top: 15px; border-top: 1px solid var(--border);\">\n                <span class=\"section-label\">Config</span>\n                <select id=\"model_sel\" style=\"margin-bottom:10px; font-size:0.7rem;\">\n                    <option value=\"V5\">FLOW v2.0</option>\n                    <option value=\"V4\">FLOW v1.0</option>\n                    <option value=\"V45ALL\">FLOW v1.5</option>\n                </select>\n                <div style=\"display:flex; align-items:center; gap:10px; font-size: 0.65rem;\">\n                    <input type=\"checkbox\" id=\"chkInstr\" style=\"width:auto;\"> INSTRUMENTAL MODE\n                </div>\n            </div>\n        </div>\n    </div>\n\n    <script>\n        const STORAGE_KEY = 'flowork_neural_history_v4';\n        let currentMode = 'simple';\n        let currentVox = 'm';\n\n        window.onload = () => {\n            lucide.createIcons();\n            restoreHistory();\n            startStatusPolling();\n        };\n\n        window.updateMode = (mode) => {\n            currentMode = mode;\n            document.getElementById('modeS').classList.toggle('active', mode === 'simple');\n            document.getElementById('modeC').classList.toggle('active', mode === 'custom');\n            document.getElementById('panelSimple').classList.toggle('hidden', mode === 'custom');\n            document.getElementById('panelCustom').classList.toggle('hidden', mode === 'simple');\n        };\n\n        window.setVox = (v) => {\n            currentVox = v;\n            document.getElementById('voxM').classList.toggle('active', v === 'm');\n            document.getElementById('voxF').classList.toggle('active', v === 'f');\n        };\n\n        // [SECURITY] Client-side Validation Constraints\n        function validateConstraints(model, title, style, prompt) {\n            const limits = {\n                'V5': { style: 1000, title: 100, prompt: 5000 },\n                'V4_5PLUS': { style: 1000, title: 100, prompt: 5000 },\n                'V4_5': { style: 1000, title: 100, prompt: 5000 },\n                'V45ALL': { style: 1000, title: 80, prompt: 5000 },\n                'V4': { style: 200, title: 80, prompt: 3000 }\n            };\n            const def = limits['V5'];\n            const limit = limits[model] || def;\n\n            if (title.length > limit.title) throw new Error(`Title exceeds limit for ${model} (Max: ${limit.title})`);\n            if (style.length > limit.style) throw new Error(`Style exceeds limit for ${model} (Max: ${limit.style})`);\n            if (prompt.length > limit.prompt) throw new Error(`Prompt exceeds limit for ${model} (Max: ${limit.prompt})`);\n        }\n\n        async function forceDownload(url, filename) {\n            const btn = event.target.closest('button');\n            const originalHtml = btn.innerHTML;\n\n            try {\n                btn.disabled = true;\n                btn.innerHTML = '<div class=\"status-dot\"></div> GETTING...';\n\n                const response = await fetch(url);\n                if (!response.ok) throw new Error(\"Network Fetch Error\");\n\n                const blob = await response.blob();\n                const link = document.createElement('a');\n                link.href = URL.createObjectURL(blob);\n                link.download = filename;\n                document.body.appendChild(link);\n                link.click();\n                document.body.removeChild(link);\n                URL.revokeObjectURL(link.href);\n            } catch (error) {\n                console.warn(\"Direct download blocked, fallback to new tab:\", error);\n                window.open(url, '_blank');\n            } finally {\n                btn.disabled = false;\n                btn.innerHTML = originalHtml;\n                lucide.createIcons();\n            }\n        }\n\n        // [NEW FEATURE] Manual Sync to fetch missing tracks\n        async function forceSync(taskId) {\n            const btn = document.getElementById(`sync-${taskId}`);\n            if(btn) { btn.disabled = true; btn.querySelector('i').classList.add('spin'); }\n\n            const user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('flowork_user_identity'))?.id || '';\n            try {\n                 const res = await fetch('/api/v1/ai/music', {\n                    method: 'POST',\n                    headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'X-User-Address': user },\n                    body: JSON.stringify({ action: 'check_status', taskId: taskId, user_address: user })\n                });\n                const data = await res.json();\n\n                let foundUrls = [];\n                const safePush = (arr) => {\n                     if(Array.isArray(arr)) {\n                         arr.forEach(item => {\n                             if(item.audio_url) foundUrls.push(item.audio_url);\n                             else if(item.audioUrl) foundUrls.push(item.audioUrl);\n                             else if(item.url) foundUrls.push(item.url);\n                         });\n                     }\n                };\n\n                if (data.data?.response?.sunoData) safePush(data.data.response.sunoData);\n                else if (Array.isArray(data.data)) safePush(data.data);\n                else if (data.data?.data && Array.isArray(data.data.data)) safePush(data.data.data);\n                else {\n                    if (data.data?.audio_url) foundUrls.push(data.data.audio_url);\n                    else if (data.data?.audioUrl) foundUrls.push(data.data.audioUrl);\n                }\n\n                if(foundUrls.length > 0) {\n                    let history = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(STORAGE_KEY) || '[]');\n                    const trackIdx = history.findIndex(t => t.taskId === taskId);\n                    if(trackIdx !== -1) {\n                        history[trackIdx].audioUrls = foundUrls;\n                        history[trackIdx].audioUrl = foundUrls[0];\n                        history[trackIdx].status = 'COMPLETED';\n                        saveToLocalStorage(history);\n                        restoreHistory();\n                    }\n                }\n            } catch(e) {\n                console.error(\"Sync failed\", e);\n            } finally {\n                 if(btn) { btn.disabled = false; btn.querySelector('i').classList.remove('spin'); }\n            }\n        }\n\n        function saveTrackToHistory(track) {\n            let history = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(STORAGE_KEY) || '[]');\n            history.unshift(track);\n            localStorage.setItem(STORAGE_KEY, JSON.stringify(history.slice(0, 50)));\n        }\n\n        function restoreHistory() {\n            const list = document.getElementById('trackList');\n            const history = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(STORAGE_KEY) || '[]');\n            list.innerHTML = '';\n            history.forEach(track => {\n                addTrackToUI(track);\n            });\n        }\n\n        function clearHistory() {\n            if(confirm(\"Purge Neural History?\")) {\n                localStorage.removeItem(STORAGE_KEY);\n                restoreHistory();\n            }\n        }\n\n        // [LOGIC UPDATE] Polling Logic with safePush for multiple audio detection\n        async function startStatusPolling() {\n            setInterval(async () => {\n                let history = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(STORAGE_KEY) || '[]');\n                const pending = history.filter(t => t.status !== 'COMPLETED' && t.status !== 'FAILED');\n                const user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('flowork_user_identity'))?.id || '';\n\n                if (pending.length === 0) return;\n\n                for(let track of pending) {\n                    try {\n                        const res = await fetch('/api/v1/ai/music', {\n                            method: 'POST',\n                            headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'X-User-Address': user },\n                            body: JSON.stringify({ action: 'check_status', taskId: track.taskId, user_address: user })\n                        });\n                        const data = await res.json();\n\n                        let foundUrls = [];\n\n                        // [GENIUS MOVE] The Array Parser Logic\n                        const safePush = (arr) => {\n                             if(Array.isArray(arr)) {\n                                 arr.forEach(item => {\n                                     // Check ALL possible keys\n                                     if(item.audio_url) foundUrls.push(item.audio_url);\n                                     else if(item.audioUrl) foundUrls.push(item.audioUrl);\n                                     else if(item.url) foundUrls.push(item.url);\n                                 });\n                             }\n                        };\n\n                        // 1. Priority: sunoData (Standard KIE)\n                        if (data.data?.response?.sunoData) safePush(data.data.response.sunoData);\n                        // 2. Direct Array\n                        else if (Array.isArray(data.data)) safePush(data.data);\n                        // 3. Deep Nested Array\n                        else if (data.data?.data && Array.isArray(data.data.data)) safePush(data.data.data);\n                        // 4. Single Object Fallback\n                        else {\n                             if (data.data?.audio_url) foundUrls.push(data.data.audio_url);\n                             else if (data.data?.audioUrl) foundUrls.push(data.data.audioUrl);\n                             else if (data.audio_url) foundUrls.push(data.audio_url);\n                         }\n\n                        const rawStatus = data.status || data.data?.status || '';\n\n                        // Jika URL ketemu (length > 0), anggap COMPLETED\n                        if(foundUrls.length > 0) {\n                            track.status = 'COMPLETED';\n                            track.audioUrls = foundUrls; // Save array!\n                            track.audioUrl = foundUrls[0]; // Fallback single\n                            saveToLocalStorage(history);\n                            restoreHistory();\n                        } else if (['FAILED', 'ERROR', 'failed'].includes(rawStatus)) {\n                            track.status = 'FAILED';\n                            saveToLocalStorage(history);\n                            restoreHistory();\n                        }\n\n                    } catch(e) { console.warn(\"Polling fail:\", e); }\n                }\n            }, 8000);\n        }\n\n        function saveToLocalStorage(history) {\n             localStorage.setItem(STORAGE_KEY, JSON.stringify(history));\n        }\n\n        window.executeGeneration = async () => {\n            const btn = document.getElementById('btnGen');\n            const user_address = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('flowork_user_identity'))?.id || '';\n\n            // Inputs\n            const selectedModel = document.getElementById('model_sel').value;\n            const titleInput = currentMode === 'custom' ? document.getElementById('title').value : \"Neural Stream\";\n            const styleInput = currentMode === 'custom' ? document.getElementById('style').value : \"\";\n            const promptInput = currentMode === 'custom' ? document.getElementById('promptC').value : document.getElementById('promptS').value;\n\n            // [SECURITY] Pre-flight Validation\n            try {\n                if(!promptInput) throw new Error(\"System requires prompt input.\");\n                validateConstraints(selectedModel, titleInput, styleInput, promptInput);\n\n                const payload = {\n                    type: 'audio', user_address,\n                    customMode: currentMode === 'custom',\n                    instrumental: document.getElementById('chkInstr').checked,\n                    model: selectedModel,\n                    prompt: promptInput,\n                    title: titleInput,\n                    style: styleInput,\n                    negativeTags: document.getElementById('negTags').value,\n                    vocalGender: currentVox,\n                    styleWeight: parseFloat(document.getElementById('valStyle').value),\n                    weirdnessConstraint: parseFloat(document.getElementById('valWeird').value),\n                    audioWeight: 0.65\n                };\n\n                btn.disabled = true;\n                btn.innerHTML = '<div class=\"status-dot\"></div> TRANSMITTING...';\n\n                const res = await fetch('/api/v1/ai/music', {\n                    method: 'POST',\n                    headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'X-User-Address': user_address },\n                    body: JSON.stringify(payload)\n                });\n                const data = await res.json();\n                if(!res.ok || data.error) throw new Error(data.error || \"Bridge Error\");\n\n                const newTrack = {\n                    title: payload.title,\n                    taskId: data.data.taskId,\n                    status: 'QUEUED',\n                    audioUrl: null,\n                    audioUrls: [],\n                    timestamp: Date.now()\n                };\n                saveTrackToHistory(newTrack);\n                restoreHistory();\n\n            } catch(e) { alert(`\u26a0\ufe0f ${e.message}`); }\n            finally {\n                btn.disabled = false;\n                btn.innerHTML = '<i data-lucide=\"cpu\" style=\"width:18px\"></i> INITIALIZE NEURAL CORE';\n                lucide.createIcons();\n            }\n        };\n\n        function addTrackToUI(track) {\n            const list = document.getElementById('trackList');\n            const isDone = track.status === 'COMPLETED';\n            const isFailed = track.status === 'FAILED';\n            const div = document.createElement('div');\n            div.className = `track-item ${isDone ? 'done' : ''}`;\n\n            if (isFailed) div.style.borderLeftColor = '#ef4444';\n\n            let downloadButtonsHtml = '';\n            if (isDone) {\n                // [LOGIC UPDATE] Render Multiple Buttons if Array exists\n                if (track.audioUrls && track.audioUrls.length > 0) {\n                    track.audioUrls.forEach((url, index) => {\n                        const fname = `${track.title.replace(/[^a-z0-9]/gi, '_').toLowerCase()}_var${index+1}.mp3`;\n                        downloadButtonsHtml += `\n                            <button onclick=\"forceDownload('${url}', '${fname}')\" class=\"btn-download\">\n                                <i data-lucide=\"download\" style=\"width:12px\"></i> VAR ${index + 1}\n                            </button>`;\n                    });\n                }\n                // Fallback for single legacy tracks\n                else if (track.audioUrl) {\n                    const fname = `${track.title.replace(/[^a-z0-9]/gi, '_').toLowerCase()}.mp3`;\n                    downloadButtonsHtml += `\n                        <button onclick=\"forceDownload('${track.audioUrl}', '${fname}')\" class=\"btn-download\">\n                            <i data-lucide=\"download\" style=\"width:12px\"></i> DOWNLOAD WAV\n                        </button>`;\n                }\n            }\n\n            div.innerHTML = `\n                <div style=\"display:flex; justify-content:space-between; align-items:start;\">\n                    <div style=\"font-size:0.75rem; font-weight:700; color:#fff;\">${track.title}</div>\n                    <div class=\"${(isDone || isFailed) ? '' : 'status-dot'}\" style=\"${isFailed ? 'background:#ef4444;' : ''}\"></div>\n                </div>\n                <div style=\"font-size:0.55rem; color:var(--accent); font-family:'JetBrains Mono'; margin-top:5px;\">\n                    ID: ${track.taskId ? track.taskId.substring(0,12) : '???'}...\n                </div>\n                <div style=\"font-size:0.55rem; color:#64748b; margin-top:2px;\">STATUS: <span style=\"color:${isDone ? '#4ade80' : (isFailed ? '#ef4444' : '#fff')}\">${track.status}</span></div>\n                ${isDone ? `\n                    <div style=\"margin-top:5px; display:flex; flex-wrap:wrap; align-items:center; gap:5px;\">\n                        ${downloadButtonsHtml}\n                        <button id=\"sync-${track.taskId}\" onclick=\"forceSync('${track.taskId}')\" class=\"btn-resync\" title=\"Force check for more variations\">\n                            <i data-lucide=\"refresh-cw\" style=\"width:10px\"></i> RESYNC\n                        </button>\n                    </div>\n                ` : ''}\n            `;\n            list.appendChild(div);\n            lucide.createIcons();\n        }\n    </script>\n</body>\n</html>\n", "structure": [{"name": "Script", "type": "logic", "line": 13381, "icon": "fa-code"}, {"name": "Style", "type": "css", "line": 299, "icon": "fa-paint-brush"}], "organs": [], "metrics": {"loc": 573, "complexity": "CRITICAL", "todo_count": 29188, "security_risks": ["Potential Hardcoded URL with Creds detected"], "last_modified": 1767761078.7016041}, "raw_imports": [], "raw_calls": [], "raw_assets": [], "inbound_paths": [], "outbound_paths": []}, "flowork-gui/template/web/public/widgets-cloud/music_gen/manifest.json": {"id": 1021, "content": "{\n    \"id\": \"music_gen\",\n    \"name\": \"Music Generator Ai\",\n    \"version\": \"2.3.0\",\n    \"description\": \"Music Generator Proprietary AI Music Core v5.0.     <div><label>Anom. Wt</label><input type=\"number\" id=\"wc\" value=\"0.65\" step=\"0.01\"></div>\n                    <div><label>Audio Wt</label><input type=\"number\" id=\"aw\" value=\"0.65\" step=\"0.01\"></div>\n                </div>\n            </div>\n\n            <div style=\"margin: 20px 0; display:flex; justify-content:space-between; align-items:center;\">\n                <label style=\"margin:0; cursor:pointer; display:flex; align-items:center; gap:8px;\">\n                    <input type=\"checkbox\" id=\"instr\" style=\"width:auto; margin:0;\"> <b>INSTRUMENTAL</b>\n                </label>\n                <select id=\"model\" style=\"width:auto; font-size:0.65rem; padding:8px;\">\n                    <option value=\"V4\">MODEL : FLOW v1.0</option>\n                    <option value=\"V45ALL\">MODEL : FLOW v1.5</option>\n                    <option value=\"V5\" selected>MODEL : FLOW v2.0</option>\n                </select>\n            </div>\n\n            <button class=\"btn-neural\" id=\"btnRun\" onclick=\"launchPipeline()\">LAUNCH PREMIUM SEQUENCE</button>\n        </div>\n\n        <div class=\"panel\">\n            <div style=\"display:flex; justify-content:space-between; align-items:center; margin-bottom:20px;\">\n                <label style=\"margin:0;\"><i data-lucide=\"cpu\" style=\"width:12px; margin-right:5px;\"></i> PIPELINE_STREAM</label>\n                <button onclick=\"purge()\" style=\"background:transparent; border:none; color:#f87171; font-size:0.5rem; font-weight:900; cursor:pointer;\">PURGE</button>\n            </div>\n            <div id=\"tracksList\" style=\"flex:1;\"></div>\n        </div>\n    </div>\n\n    <script>\n        const STORAGE_KEY = 'neural_cover_history_v3';\n        let tracks = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(STORAGE_KEY) || '[]');\n        let selectedFile = null;\n        let isStudio = false;\n        let currentVox = 'm';\n        const MOCK_USER = \"0xF39733B34131c13E35733E9Af1adD78a5e768929\";\n\n        window.onload = () => { lucide.createIcons(); render(); startPolling(); };\n\n        function toggleMode(val) {\n            isStudio = val;\n            document.getElementById('qBtn').classList.toggle('active', !val);\n            document.getElementById('sBtn').classList.toggle('active', val);\n            document.getElementById('studioPanel').classList.toggle('hidden', !val);\n            document.getElementById('pLabel').innerText = val ? 'Neural Lyrics (Main Content)' : 'Neural Vibe (Description)';\n        }\n\n        function setVox(v) {\n            currentVox = v;\n            document.getElementById('voxM').classList.toggle('active', v === 'm');\n            document.getElementById('voxF').classList.toggle('active', v === 'f');\n        }\n\n        document.getElementById('fi').onchange = (e) => { if(e.target.files.length) { selectedFile = e.target.files[0]; document.getElementById('fn').innerText = `READY: ${selectedFile.name.toUpperCase()}`; document.getElementById('fn').classList.remove('hidden'); } };\n\n        async function forceDownload(url, filename) {\n            const btn = event.target.closest('button');\n            const orig = btn.innerHTML;\n            try {\n                btn.disabled = true; btn.innerHTML = '<div class=\"pulse\" style=\"width:8px;height:8px\"></div> PULLING...';\n                const res = await fetch(url);\n                if (!res.ok) throw new Error(\"Fetch failed\");\n                const blob = await res.blob();\n                const link = document.createElement('a');\n                link.href = URL.createObjectURL(blob);\n                link.download = filename;\n                document.body.appendChild(link);\n                link.click();\n                document.body.removeChild(link);\n                URL.revokeObjectURL(link.href);\n            } catch(e) {\n                console.warn(\"Direct download failed, opening new tab:\", e);\n                window.open(url, '_blank');\n            }\n            finally { btn.disabled = false; btn.innerHTML = orig; lucide.createIcons(); }\n        }\n\n        // [NEW] Force Sync / Resync Button Logic\n        async function forceSync(taskId) {\n            const btn = document.getElementById(`sync-${taskId}`);\n            if(btn) { btn.disabled = true; btn.querySelector('i').classList.add('spin'); }\n\n            const user = localStorage.getItem('flowork_wallet') || MOCK_USER;\n            try {\n                const res = await fetch('/api/v1/ai/neural_cover', {\n                    method:'POST',\n                    headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json', 'X-User-Address': user},\n                    body: JSON.stringify({ action:'check_status', taskId: taskId })\n                });\n                const d = await res.json();\n\n                let foundUrls = [];\n                const safePush = (arr) => {\n                     if(Array.isArray(arr)) {\n                         arr.forEach(item => {\n                             if(item.audio_url) foundUrls.push(item.audio_url);\n                             else if(item.audioUrl) foundUrls.push(item.audioUrl);\n                             else if(item.url) foundUrls.push(item.url);\n                         });\n                     }\n                };\n\n                if (d.data?.response?.sunoData) safePush(d.data.response.sunoData);\n                else if (Array.isArray(d.data)) safePush(d.data);\n                else if (d.data?.data && Array.isArray(d.data.data)) safePush(d.data.data);\n                else {\n                    if (d.data?.audio_url) foundUrls.push(d.data.audio_url);\n                    else if (d.data?.audioUrl) foundUrls.push(d.data.audioUrl);\n                }\n\n                if(foundUrls.length > 0) {\n                    const idx = tracks.findIndex(t => t.id === taskId);\n                    if(idx !== -1) {\n                        tracks[idx].status = 'COMPLETED';\n                        tracks[idx].audioUrls = foundUrls;\n                        save(); render();\n                    }\n                }\n            } catch(e) { console.warn(\"Sync error\", e); }\n            finally {\n                if(btn) { btn.disabled = false; btn.querySelector('i').classList.remove('spin'); }\n            }\n        }\n\n        // [SECURITY] Client-side limits validation based on model\n        function validateConstraints(model, title, style, prompt) {\n            const limits = {\n                'V5': { style: 1000, title: 100, prompt: 5000 },\n                'V45ALL': { style: 1000, title: 80, prompt: 5000 },\n                'V4': { style: 200, title: 80, prompt: 3000 }\n            };\n            const defaults = { style: 1000, title: 100, prompt: 5000 };\n            const limit = limits[model] || defaults;\n\n            if(title.length > limit.title) throw new Error(`Title exceeds limit for ${model} (Max: ${limit.title})`);\n            if(style.length > limit.style) throw new Error(`Style exceeds limit for ${model} (Max: ${limit.style})`);\n            if(prompt.length > limit.prompt) throw new Error(`Lyrics/Prompt exceeds limit for ${model} (Max: ${limit.prompt})`);\n\n            return true;\n        }\n\n        async function launchPipeline() {\n            if(!selectedFile) return alert(\"Source required.\");\n            const btn = document.getElementById('btnRun');\n            const user = localStorage.getItem('flowork_wallet') || MOCK_USER;\n\n            const currentModel = document.getElementById('model').value;\n            const titleInput = isStudio ? document.getElementById('title').value : \"Neural Cover\";\n            const styleInput = isStudio ? document.getElementById('style').value : \"\";\n            const promptInput = document.getElementById('prompt').value;\n\n            try {\n                validateConstraints(currentModel, titleInput, styleInput, promptInput);\n\n                btn.disabled = true; btn.innerHTML = 'AUTHENTICATING...';\n\n                const fd = new FormData();\n                fd.append('file', selectedFile); fd.append('user_address', user);\n                const up = await fetch('/api/v1/storage/upload', { method:'POST', body:fd });\n                const upD = await up.json();\n                if(!up.ok) throw new Error(upD.error || \"Upload Failed\");\n\n                btn.innerText = \"TRANSMITTING...\";\n                const payload = {\n                    action: 'upload_cover', user_address: user,\n                    uploadUrl: upD.url, customMode: isStudio,\n                    instrumental: document.getElementById('instr').checked,\n                    model: currentModel,\n                    prompt: promptInput,\n                    vocalGender: currentVox,\n                    title: titleInput\n                };\n\n                if (isStudio) {\n                    payload.style = styleInput;\n                    payload.styleWeight = parseFloat(document.getElementById('sw').value);\n                    payload.weirdnessConstraint = parseFloat(document.getElementById('wc').value);\n                    payload.audioWeight = parseFloat(document.getElementById('aw').value);\n                    payload.negativeTags = document.getElementById('negTags').value;\n                }\n\n                const res = await fetch('/api/v1/ai/neural_cover', { method:'POST', headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}, body: JSON.stringify(payload) });\n                const d = await res.json();\n                if(d.error) throw new Error(d.error);\n\n                tracks.unshift({\n                    id: d.data.taskId || d.taskId,\n                    title: payload.title,\n                    status: 'BUFFERING',\n                    ts: Date.now(),\n                    audioUrls: []\n                });\n                save(); render();\n                selectedFile = null; document.getElementById('fn').classList.add('hidden');\n            } catch(e) { alert(\"Error: \" + e.message); }\n            finally { btn.disabled = false; btn.innerHTML = \"LAUNCH PREMIUM SEQUENCE\"; lucide.createIcons(); }\n        }\n\n        function render() {\n            const list = document.getElementById('tracksList');\n            list.innerHTML = tracks.length ? '' : '<div style=\"opacity:0.2; font-size:0.6rem; text-align:center; margin-top:40px;\">DATA_STREAM_EMPTY</div>';\n            tracks.forEach(t => {\n                const isDone = t.status === 'COMPLETED';\n                const isFailed = t.status === 'FAILED';\n                const card = document.createElement('div');\n                card.className = `track-card ${isDone ? 'done' : (isFailed ? 'failed' : '')}`;\n\n                let btnHtml = '';\n                if(isDone && t.audioUrls && t.audioUrls.length > 0) {\n                    t.audioUrls.forEach((url, i) => {\n                        const fname = `${t.title.replace(/[^a-z0-9]/gi,'_')}_var${i+1}.mp3`;\n                        btnHtml += `<button onclick=\\\"forceDownload('${url}', '${fname}')\\\" class=\\\"btn-dl\\\"><i data-lucide=\\\"download\\\" style=\\\"width:12px\\\"></i> VAR ${i+1}</button>`;\n                    });\n                }\n\n                card.innerHTML = `\n                    <div style=\"display:flex; justify-content:space-between; align-items:start;\">\n                        <b style=\"font-size:0.75rem\">${t.title.toUpperCase()}</b>\n                        <div class=\"${(isDone || isFailed) ? '' : 'pulse'}\"></div>\n                    </div>\n                    <div style=\"font-size:0.5rem; opacity:0.5; margin-bottom:5px;\">ID: ${t.id} | STATUS: ${t.status}</div>\n                    ${btnHtml}\n                    ${isDone ? `<button id=\"sync-${t.id}\" onclick=\"forceSync('${t.id}')\" class=\"btn-resync\"><i data-lucide=\"refresh-cw\" style=\"width:10px\"></i> RESYNC</button>` : ''}\n                `;\n                list.appendChild(card);\n            });\n            lucide.createIcons();\n        }\n\n        function startPolling() {\n            setInterval(async () => {\n                const active = tracks.filter(t => t.status === 'BUFFERING');\n                if(!active.length) return;\n                const user = localStorage.getItem('flowork_wallet') || MOCK_USER;\n\n                for(let t of active) {\n                    try {\n                        const res = await fetch('/api/v1/ai/neural_cover', {\n                            method:'POST',\n                            headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json', 'X-User-Address': user},\n                            body: JSON.stringify({ action:'check_status', taskId: t.id })\n                        });\n                        const d = await res.json();\n\n                        let foundUrls = [];\n                        const safePush = (arr) => {\n                             if(Array.isArray(arr)) {\n                                 arr.forEach(item => {\n                                     if(item.audio_url) foundUrls.push(item.audio_url);\n                                     else if(item.audioUrl) foundUrls.push(item.audioUrl);\n                                     else if(item.url) foundUrls.push(item.url);\n                                 });\n                             }\n                        };\n\n                        if (d.data?.response?.sunoData) safePush(d.data.response.sunoData);\n                        else if (Array.isArray(d.data)) safePush(d.data);\n                        else if (d.data?.data && Array.isArray(d.data.data)) safePush(d.data.data);\n                        else {\n                             if (d.data?.audio_url) foundUrls.push(d.data.audio_url);\n                             else if (d.data?.audioUrl) foundUrls.push(d.data.audioUrl);\n                        }\n\n                        const rawStatus = d.status || d.data?.status || '';\n\n                        if(foundUrls.length > 0) {\n                            t.status = 'COMPLETED';\n                            t.audioUrls = foundUrls;\n                            save(); render();\n                        } else if (['FAILED', 'ERROR'].includes(rawStatus.toUpperCase())) {\n                            t.status = 'FAILED';\n                            save(); render();\n                        }\n\n                    } catch(e) { console.warn(\"Polling error:\", e); }\n                }\n            }, 8000);\n        }\n\n        function save() { localStorage.setItem(STORAGE_KEY, JSON.stringify(tracks.slice(0, 20))); }\n        function purge() { if(confirm(\"Wipe?\")) { tracks=[]; save(); render(); } }\n    </script>\n</body>\n</html>\n", "structure": [{"name": "Script", "type": "logic", "line": 9951, "icon": "fa-code"}, {"name": "Style", "type": "css", "line": 299, "icon": }\n        body {\n            margin: 0;\n            padding: 20px;\n            background-color: var(--bg-color);\n            color: var(--neon-green);\n            font-family: 'Share Tech Mono', monospace;\n            height: 100vh;\n            display: flex;\n            flex-direction: column;\n            overflow: hidden;\n        }\n        .header-area {\n            display: padding-bottom: 10px;\n        }\n        .title-bar {\n            font-size: 1.2rem;\n            letter-spacing: 4px;\n            text-transform: uppercase;\n            text-shadow: 0 0 10px var(--neon-green);\n        }\n        .badge-cloud {\n            background: var(--neon-dim);\n            color: #000;\n            padding: 2px 8px;\n            border-radius: 4px;\n            font-size: 0.8rem;\n            font-weight: bold;\n            letter-spacing: 1px;\n        }\n        .status-text {\n            font-size: 0.7rem;\n            color: #555;\n            margin-left: 10px;\n        }\n        .clock-grid {\n            display: grid;\n            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(180px, 1fr));\n            gap: 20px;\n            width: 100%;\n            flex: 1;\n            align-content: center;\n            justify-items: center;\n            overflow-y: auto;\n        }\n        .clock-container {\n            display: flex;\n            flex-direction: column;\n            align-items: center;\n            width: 180px;\n            transition: transform 0.2s;\n        }\n        .clock-container:hover {\n            transform: scale(1.05);\n        }\n        canvas {\n            filter: drop-shadow(0 0 5px var(--neon-green));\n        }\n        .city-label {\n            margin-top: 10px;\n            font-size: 1rem;\n            color: var(--neon-green);\n            text-transform: uppercase;\n            letter-spacing: 2px;\n        }\n        .time-digital {\n            font-size: 0.9rem;\n            color: var(--neon-dim);\n            margin-top: 5px;\n        }\n    </style>\n</head>\n<body>\n\n    <div class=\"header-area\">\n        <div class=\"title-bar\">/// GLOBAL_OPS_SYNC ///</div>\n        <div>\n            <span class=\"status-text\" id=\"syncStatus\">OFFLINE</span>\n            <span class=\"badge-cloud\">CLOUD</span>\n        </div>\n    </div>\n\n    <div class=\"clock-grid\" id=\"clockGrid\">\n        </div>\n\n    <script>\n        // --- CONFIGURATION ---\n        // Default zones if no save data found\n        const DEFAULT_ZONES = [\n            { city: 'New York', tz: 'America/New_York' },\n            { city: 'London', tz: 'Europe/London' },\n            { city: 'Berlin', tz: 'Europe/Berlin' },\n            { city: 'Jakarta', tz: 'Asia/Jakarta' },\n            { city: 'Tokyo', tz: 'Asia/Tokyo' }\n        ];\n\n        let activeZones = [...DEFAULT_ZONES];\n        let clocks = [];\n        let animationFrameId;\n\n        // --- CLOCK LOGIC ---\n\n        function createClock(zone, index) {\n            const container = document.createElement('div');\n            container.className = 'clock-container';\n\n            const canvas = document.createElement('canvas');\n            canvas.width = 160;\n            canvas.height = 160;\n            canvas.id = `canvas-${index}`;\n\n            const label = document.createElement('div');\n            label.className = 'city-label';\n            label.innerText = zone.city;\n\n            const digital = document.createElement('div');\n            digital.className = 'time-digital';\n            digital.id = `digital-${index}`;\n            digital.innerText = \"--:--\";\n\n            container.appendChild(canvas);\n            container.appendChild(label);\n            container.appendChild(digital);\n            document.getElementById('clockGrid').appendChild(container);\n\n            return { canvas, ctx: canvas.getContext('2d'), zone: zone.tz, digitalEl: digital };\n        }\n\n        function initClocks() {\n            // Clear existing\n            const grid = document.getElementById('clockGrid');\n            grid.innerHTML = '';\n\n            // Create new based on activeZones state\n            clocks = activeZones.map((zone, i) => createClock(zone, i));\n        }\n\n        function drawClock(clock) {\n            const ctx = clock.ctx;\n            const now = new Date();\n\n            // Timezone Conversion\n            let timeString;\n            try {\n                timeString = now.toLocaleString('en-US', { timeZone: clock.zone });\n            } catch (e) {\n                // Fallback for invalid TZ\n                timeString = now.toLocaleString('en-US');\n            }\n            const targetTime = new Date(timeString);\n\n            const hours = targetTime.getHours();\n            const minutes = targetTime.getMinutes();\n            const seconds = targetTime.getSeconds();\n            const milliseconds = targetTime.getMilliseconds();\n\n            // Smooth seconds animation\n            const smoothSec = seconds + (milliseconds / 1000);\n            const smoothMin = minutes + (smoothSec / 60);\n            const smoothHour = hours + (smoothMin / 60);\n\n            // Update Digital Display\n            clock.digitalEl.innerText = targetTime.toLocaleTimeString('en-GB', { hour: '2-digit', minute: '2-digit' });\n\n            // Drawing Logic (Hacker Style)\n            ctx.clearRect(0, 0, 160, 160);\n            const cx = 80;\n            const cy = 80;\n\n            // 1. Outer Rotating Ring\n            ctx.save();\n            ctx.translate(cx, cy);\n            ctx.rotate(Date.now() / 1000 * 0.5);\n            ctx.strokeStyle = '#008f11';\n            ctx.lineWidth = 2;\n            ctx.setLineDash([10, 10]);\n            ctx.beginPath();\n            ctx.arc(0, 0, 75, 0, Math.PI * 2);\n            ctx.stroke();\n            ctx.restore();\n\n            // 2. Inner Static Ring\n            ctx.beginPath();\n            ctx.arc(cx, cy, 65, 0, Math.PI * 2);\n            ctx.strokeStyle = '#00ff41';\n            ctx.lineWidth = 1;\n            ctx.stroke();\n\n            // 3. Tick Marks\n            for (let i = 0; i < 12; i++) {\n                const angle = (i * 30) * Math.PI / 180;\n                const x1 = cx + Math.cos(angle) * 55;\n                const y1 = cy + Math.sin(angle) * 55;\n                const x2 = cx + Math.cos(angle) * 62;\n                const y2 = cy + Math.sin(angle) * 62;\n                ctx.beginPath();\n                ctx.moveTo(x1, y1);\n                ctx.lineTo(x2, y2);\n                ctx.strokeStyle = '#00ff41';\n                ctx.lineWidth = 2;\n                ctx.stroke();\n            }\n\n            // 4. Hands\n            const hAngle = (smoothHour * 30 - 90) * Math.PI / 180;\n            drawHand(ctx, cx, cy, hAngle, 35, 4, '#00ff41');\n\n            const mAngle = (smoothMin * 6 - 90) * Math.PI / 180;\n            drawHand(ctx, cx, cy, mAngle, 50, 3, '#00ff41');\n\n            const sAngle = (smoothSec * 6 - 90) * Math.PI / 180;\n            drawHand(ctx, cx, cy, sAngle, 55, 1, '#fff'); // White second hand\n\n            // Center Dot\n            ctx.beginPath();\n            ctx.arc(cx, cy, 3, 0, Math.PI * 2);\n            ctx.fillStyle = '#fff';\n            ctx.fill();\n        }\n\n        function drawHand(ctx, x, y, angle, length, width, color) {\n            const x2 = x + Math.cos(angle) * length;\n            const y2 = y + Math.sin(angle) * length;\n            ctx.beginPath();\n            ctx.moveTo(x, y);\n            ctx.lineTo(x2, y2);\n            ctx.strokeStyle = color;\n            ctx.lineWidth = width;\n            ctx.lineCap = 'round';\n            ctx.stroke();\n        }\n\n        function animate() {\n            clocks.forEach(drawClock);\n            animationFrameId = requestAnimationFrame(animate);\n        }\n\n        // --- HYBRID BRIDGE PROTOCOL (The Magic Glue) ---\n        const syncStatusEl = document.getElementById('syncStatus');\n\n        window.addEventListener('message', (event) => {\n            const { type, payload } = event.data;\n\n            // 1. Handle LOAD Command (Received on Startup from Dashboard)\n            if (type === 'CMD_LOAD') {\n                console.log(\"[WorldClock] Loading configuration from engine...\");\n                if (payload && payload.zones && Array.isArray(payload.zones)) {\n                    activeZones = payload.zones; // Restore saved zones\n                    syncStatusEl.innerText = \"SYNCED\";\n                    syncStatusEl.style.color = \"#00ff41\";\n                } else {\n                    syncStatusEl.innerText = \"DEFAULT\";\n                }\n                initClocks(); // Re-render with loaded data\n            }\n\n            // 2. Handle SAVE Command (Received when user clicks 'Save State')\n            if (type === 'CMD_SAVE') {\n                console.log(\"[WorldClock] Sending configuration to engine...\");\n\n                // Pack the current state and send back\n                event.source.postMessage({\n                    type: 'WIDGET_SAVE_REQUEST',\n                    payload: {\n                        data: {\n                            zones: activeZones, // Save the array of zones\n                            last_sync: Date.now()\n                        }\n                    }\n                }, '*');\n            }\n        });\n\n        // Start initialization\n        initClocks();\n        animate();\n\n    </script>\n</body>\n</html>\n", "structure": [{"name": "Script", "type": "logic", "//#######################################################################\n// WEBSITE https://flowork.cloud\n// File NAME : C:\\FLOWORK\\flowork-gui\\template\\web\\src\\api\\core.js total lines 166 \n//#1. Dynamic Component Discovery (DCD): Hub wajib melakukan scanning file secara otomatis.\n//#2. Lazy Loading: Modul hanya di-import ke RAM saat dipanggil (On-Demand).\n//#3. Atomic Isolation: 1 File = 1 Fungsi dengan nama file yang identik dengan nama fungsi aslinya.\n//#4. Zero Logic Mutation: Dilarang merubah alur logika, nama variabel, atau struktur if/try/loop.\n//#######################################################################\n\nimport axios from 'axios';\nimport { useAuthStore } from '@/store/auth';\nimport { ethers } from 'ethers';\n\nexport const CURRENT_PAYLOAD_VERSION = 2;\nexport const DEFAULT_API_TIMEOUT = 60000;\n\nexport const getContentBaseUrl = () => '/api/v1';\n\nconst toHttps = (url) => {\n    if (typeof url === 'string' && url.startsWith('http:')) {\n        if (window.location.protocol === 'https:' || window.location.hostname.includes('flowork.cloud')) {\n            return url.replace(/^http:\\/\\//i, 'https://');\n        }\n    }\n    return url;\n}\n\nconst axiosConfig = {\n    timeout: DEFAULT_API_TIMEOUT,\n    headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },\n    transformRequest: [function (data, headers) {\n        return JSON.stringify(data);\n    }],\n};\n\nexport const apiClient = axios.create({ ...axiosConfig, baseURL: '/' });\nexport const cloudApiClient = axios.create({ ...axiosConfig, baseURL: '/api/v1' });\nexport const contentApiClient = axios.create({ ...axiosConfig, baseURL: getContentBaseUrl() });\n\nexport const getGatewayUrl = () => {\n    const activeEngineUrl = localStorage.getItem('flowork_active_engine_url');\n    if (activeEngineUrl) {\n        return toHttps(activeEngineUrl.replace(/\\/$/, \"\"));\n    }\n\n    try {\n        const storedState = localStorage.getItem('flowork_gateway');\n        if (storedState) {\n            const parsed = JSON.parse(storedState);\n            if (parsed.gatewayUrl) return toHttps(parsed.gatewayUrl.replace(/\\/$/, \"\"));\n        }\n    } catch (e) { }\n\n    if (import.meta.env.VITE_GATEWAY_URL) {\n        return toHttps(import.meta.env.VITE_GATEWAY_URL.replace(/\\/$/, \"\"));\n    }\n\n    const hostname = window.location.hostname;\n    if (hostname === 'localhost' || hostname === '127.0.0.1' || hostname.startsWith('192.168.')) {\n         return `${window.location.protocol}//${hostname}:8000`;\n    }\n\n    return 'https://api.flowork.cloud';\n};\n\nexport const getAuthHeaders = async (fullUrl, method = 'GET') => {\n    const headers = {};\n    const authStore = useAuthStore();\n\n    let token = localStorage.getItem('flowork_gateway_token') || localStorage.getItem('token');\n    if (token) {\n        headers['Authorization'] = `Bearer ${token}`;\n        headers['x-gateway-token'] = token;\n    }\n\n    const tunnelToken = localStorage.getItem('flowork_tunnel_token');\n    if (tunnelToken) {\n        headers['cf-access-client-id'] = localStorage.getItem('cf_client_id');\n        headers['cf-access-client-secret'] = localStorage.getItem('cf_client_secret');\n    }\n\n    let privateKey = authStore.privateKey || localStorage.getItem('flowork_private_key');\n    if (!privateKey) {\n        try {\n            const localAuth = localStorage.getItem('wallet_auth');\n            if (localAuth) {\n                const parsed = JSON.parse(localAuth);\n                if (parsed.privateKey) privateKey = parsed.privateKey;\n            }\n        } catch (e) {}\n    }\n\n    if (privateKey) {\n        try {\n            const wallet = new ethers.Wallet(privateKey);\n            const timestamp = Math.floor(Date.now() / 1000);\n            const messageToSign = `flowork_api_auth|${wallet.address}|${timestamp}`;\n            const signature = await wallet.signMessage(messageToSign);\n\n            headers['X-User-Address'] = wallet.address;\n            headers['X-Signature'] = signature;\n            headers['X-Signed-Message'] = messageToSign;\n            headers['X-Payload-Version'] = CURRENT_PAYLOAD_VERSION;\n        } catch (e) {\n            console.error(\"[API] Sign Error:\", e);\n        }\n    }\n\n    const activeEngineId = localStorage.getItem('flowork_active_engine_id');\n    if (activeEngineId) headers['X-Flowork-Engine-ID'] = activeEngineId;\n\n    return headers;\n};\n\nconst dynamicUrlInterceptor = (config) => {\n    const currentGatewayUrl = getGatewayUrl();\n    const newBaseUrl = `${currentGatewayUrl}/api/v1`;\n\n    if (config.url.startsWith('/api/v1')) {\n        config.baseURL = currentGatewayUrl;\n    } else {\n        config.baseURL = newBaseUrl;\n    }\n\n    if (config.baseURL) config.baseURL = toHttps(config.baseURL);\n\n    return config;\n};\n\nconst cryptoInterceptor = async config => {\n    let fullUrl = config.baseURL || '';\n    if (!fullUrl.endsWith('/') && !config.url.startsWith('/')) fullUrl += '/';\n    fullUrl += config.url;\n\n    fullUrl = toHttps(fullUrl);\n    config.url = config.url.replace(/^http:\\/\\//i, 'https://');\n    if (config.baseURL) config.baseURL = toHttps(config.baseURL);\n\n    const authHeaders = await getAuthHeaders(fullUrl, config.method);\n    config.headers = { ...config.headers, ...authHeaders };\n    return config;\n};\n\napiClient.interceptors.request.use(dynamicUrlInterceptor, error => Promise.reject(error));\napiClient.interceptors.request.use(cryptoInterceptor, error => Promise.reject(error));\ncloudApiClient.interceptors.request.use(cryptoInterceptor, error => Promise.reject(error));\ncontentApiClient.interceptors.request.use(cryptoInterceptor, error => Promise.reject(error));\n\nexport function handleApiError(error, context, options = {}) {\n    console.error(`[API Error] ${context}:`, error);\n\n    if (error.code === 'ECONNABORTED' || error.message.includes('timeout')) {\n        return { error: 'Connection timed out.' };\n    }\n\n    if (error.response) {\n        if (error.response.status === 401 && !options.suppressLogout) {\n            const authStore = useAuthStore();\n            authStore.handleLogoutError();\n        }\n        return error.response.data || { error: `HTTP Error ${error.response.status}` };\n    } else if (error.request) {\n        return { error: 'Network Error.' };\n    } else {\n        return { error: `Request Error: ${error.message}` };\n    }\n}\n\nexport const wsOnlyError = (context = '') => Promise.resolve({ error: `WS Only (${context})` });\n", "structure": [{"name": "handleApiError", "type": ref(false);\nconst isCleaning = ref(false);\nconst snackbar = ref({ show: false, text: '', color: 'success' });\n\n\nconst mainNavGroups = ref([\n  {\n    title: 'CORE',\n    items: [\n      { title: displayName = computed(() => profile.value?.name || authStore.user?.username || 'Commander');\n\nconst formattedPublicAddress = computed(() => {\n    const id = authStore.user?.id;\n    return id ? `${id.substring(0, 6)}...${id.substring(id.length - 4)}` : 'UNKNOWN';\n});\n\nconst logout = () => {\n  authStore.logout();\n  router.push('/login');\n};\n\nconst onModeChange = (newMode) => {\n    uiStore.setDesignerMode(newMode);\n    uiStore.closeRightPanel();\n};\n\nconst goToDesigner = () => { router.push('/'); };\n\nasync function cleanSystemCache() {\n    isCleaning.value = true;\n    try {\n        const res = await api.post('/api/v1/system/clear-cache');\n        showCleanDialog.value = false;\n        snackbar.value = { show: true, text: `CLEANUP SUCCESSFUL!`, color: 'success' };\n        if (route.name === 'Dashboard') window.location.reload();\n    } catch (error) {\n        showCleanDialog.value = false;\n        snackbar.value = { show: true, text: 'Cleanup failed.', color: 'error' };\n    } finally {\n        isCleaning.value = false;\n    }\n}\n</script>\n\n<style scoped>\n.app-bar {\n  background-color: rgba(10, 15, 30, 0.9) !important;\n  backdrop-filter: useEngineStore } from '@/store/engines';\nimport { getComponentIconUrl } from '@/api';\n\nconst emit = defineEmits(['open-marketplace', 'request-publish', 'launch-app']);\nconst appStore = useAppStore();\nconst socketStore = useSocketStore();\nconst engineStore = useEngineStore();\n\nconst apps = computed(() => appStore.installedApps);\nconst isLoading = computed(() => appStore.isLoading);\nconst folderInput = ref(null);\nconst searchQuery = ref('');\n\nconst activeEngineId = computed(() => {\n    return engineStore.selectedEngineId || socketStore.engineId || 'local';\n});\n\nconst isCloudStatic = (app) => {\n    if (app.id === 'business_canvas') return true;\n    if (app.path && app.path.includes('apps-cloud')) return true;\n    return false;\n};\n\nconst resolveIcon = (app) => {\n    if (isCloudStatic(app)) {\n        return `/apps-cloud/${app.id}/icon.svg`;\n    }\n    let url = app.iconUrl || app.icon_url;\n    if (!url && app.icon_file) {\n        url = `/api/v1/apps/${app.id}/assets/${app.icon_file}`;\n    }\n    if (!url) {\n        return getComponentIconUrl('app', app.id);\n    }\n    if (url.startsWith('http') || url.startsWith('data:')) return url;\n\n    const separator = url.includes('?') ? '&' : '?';\n    if (url.includes('engine_id=')) return url;\n    return `${url}${separator}engine_id=${activeEngineId.value}`;\n};\n\nconst handleImageError = (event) => {\n    event.target.style.display = 'none';\n};\n\nconst filteredApps = computed(() => {\n  if (!searchQuery.value) return apps.value;\n  return apps.value.filter(a =>\n    a.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.value.toLowerCase())\n  );\n});\n\nonMounted(() => {\n    if (appStore.installedApps.length === 0) {\n        appStore.fetchInstalledApps();\n    }\n});\n\nconst handleAppClick = (id) => {\n    appStore.openApp(id);\n};\n\nconst triggerUpload = () => { if (folderInput.value) folderInput.value.click(); };\n\nconst handleFolderSelect = async (event) => {\n    const files = event.target.files;\n    if (!files || files.length === 0) return;\n    const packageData = { manifest: {}, files: {}, type: 'app' };\n    const IGNORED = ['node_modules', '.git', 'dist', '.DS_Store'];\n\n    for (const file of files) {\n        const path = file.webkitRelativePath;\n        if (IGNORED.some(x => path.includes(x))) continue;\n        try {\n            const isBinary = /\\.(png|jpg|jpeg|gif|webp|ico|zip)$/i.test(file.name);\n            let content;\n            if (isBinary) content = await readFileAsBase64(file);\n            else content = await file.text();\n            if (file.name === 'manifest.json') {\n                try { packageData.manifest = JSON.parse(content); } catch(e){}\n            }\n            packageData.files[path] = content;\n        } catch (e) {}\n    }\n    emit('request-publish', packageData);\n    event.target.value = '';\n};\n\nconst readFileAsBase64 = (file) => {\n    return new Promise((resolve) => {\n        const reader = new FileReader();\n        reader.onload = () => resolve(reader.result);\n        reader.readAsDataURL(file);\n    });\n};\n</script>\n\n<style scoped>\n.widget-toolbox-container { height: 100%; Dynamic Component Discovery (DCD): Hub wajib melakukan scanning file secara otomatis.\n//#2. Lazy Loading: Modul hanya di-import ke RAM saat dipanggil (On-Demand).\n//#3. Atomic Isolation: 1 File = 1 Fungsi dengan nama file yang identik dengan nama fungsi aslinya.\n//#4. Zero Logic Mutation: Dilarang merubah alur logika, nama variabel, atau struktur if/try/loop.\n//#######################################################################\n\n<template>\n  <div comment-form-card\">\n      <v-card-text>\n        <v-textarea\n          v-model=\"newCommentContent\"\n          label=\"Leave your comment...\"\n          rows=\"3\"\n          variant=\"filled\"\n          auto-grow\n          hide-details=\"auto\"\n          :counter=\"2000\"\n          maxlength=\"2000\"\n          :error-messages=\"postError || rateLimitError\"\n        ></v-textarea>\n        <div class=\"d-flex justify-end mt-2\">\n          <v-btn\n            color=\"cyan\"\n            @click=\"postComment\"\n            :loading=\"isPosting\"\n            :disabled=\"!newCommentContent.trim()\"\n            class=\"action-btn\"\n          >\n            Post Comment\n          </v-btn>\n        </div>\n      </v-card-text>\n    </v-card>\n    <v-alert
