comment.\n    </v-alert>\n\n\n    <div v-if=\"isLoading\" class=\"text-center\">\n      <v-progress-circular indeterminate color=\"cyan\"></v-progress-circular>\n    </div>\n    <v-alert v-else-if=\"fetchError\" type=\"error\" variant=\"tonal\">\n      Failed to load comments: {{ fetchError }}\n    </v-alert>\n    <div v-else-if=\"comments.length === 0\" class=\"text-grey text-center\">\n      Be the first to comment!\n    </div>\n\n    <v-slide-y-transition group tag=\"div\" class=\"comment-list\">\n      <v-card\n        v-for=\"comment in comments\"\n        :key=\"comment.id\"\n        class=\"mb-4 comment-card\"\n        variant=\"outlined\"\n      >\n        <v-card-text class=\"pb-0\">\n          <div class=\"d-flex align-center mb-2\">\n            <v-avatar size=\"32\" class=\"mr-3\" color=\"blue-grey-darken-3\">\n               <v-icon icon=\"mdi-account-circle\"></v-icon>\n            </v-avatar>\n            <div>\n              <div class=\"comment-author\">{{ formatAuthor(comment.author_username) }}</div>\n              <div class=\"comment-date\">{{ timeAgo(comment.created_at) }}</div>\n            </div>\n            <v-spacer></v-spacer>\n\n             <v-tooltip v-if=\"isAuthor(comment)\" text=\"Edit Comment\" location=\"top\">\n                <template v-slot:activator=\"{ props: tooltipProps }\">\n                    <v-btn\n                        v-bind=\"tooltipProps\"\n                        icon=\"mdi-pencil-outline\"\n                        variant=\"text\"\n                        size=\"small\"\n                        color=\"grey-lighten-1\"\n                        @click=\"startEdit(comment)\"\n                        :loading=\"editingCommentId === comment.id && isUpdating\"\n                        class=\"ml-2\"\n                    ></v-btn>\n                </template>\n            </v-tooltip>\n\n             <v-tooltip v-if=\"isAuthor(comment) || isModerator\" text=\"Delete Comment\" location=\"top\">\n                <template v-slot:activator=\"{ props: tooltipProps }\">\n                    <v-btn\n                        v-bind=\"tooltipProps\"\n                        icon=\"mdi-delete-outline\"\n                        variant=\"text\"\n                        size=\"small\"\n                        color=\"red-lighten-2\"\n                        @click=\"deleteComment(comment.id)\"\n                        :loading=\"deletingCommentId === comment.id\"\n                        class=\"ml-1\"\n                    ></v-btn>\n                </template>\n            </v-tooltip>\n          </div>\n\n          <div class=\"comment-content\">\n             <div v-if=\"editingCommentId === comment.id\">\n                <v-textarea\n                  v-model=\"editingCommentContent\"\n                  variant=\"outlined\"\n                  rows=\"3\"\n                  auto-grow\n                  hide-details=\"auto\"\n                  :counter=\"2000\"\n                  maxlength=\"2000\"\n                  class=\"mb-2\"\n                ></v-textarea>\n                <v-btn size=\"small\" variant=\"text\" @click=\"cancelEdit\">Cancel</v-btn>\n                <v-btn\n                    size=\"small\"\n                    color=\"cyan\"\n                    @click=\"saveEdit(comment)\"\n                    :loading=\"isUpdating\"\n                    class=\"action-btn\"\n                >Save</v-btn>\n              </div>\n              <div v-else>\n                <span v-if=\"!comment.expanded && comment.content.length > 300\" v-html=\"linkify(comment.content.substring(0, 300) + '...')\"></span>\n                <span v-else v-html=\"linkify(comment.content)\"></span>\n                <v-btn\n                    v-if=\"comment.content.length > 300\"\n                    variant=\"text\"\n                    size=\"small\"\n                    @click=\"toggleExpand(comment)\"\n                    class=\"read-more-btn\"\n                >\n                    {{ comment.expanded ? 'Show Less' : 'Read More' }}\n                </v-btn>\n             </div>\n          </div>\n        </v-card-text>\n\n        <v-card-actions class=\"comment-actions\">\n           <v-tooltip text=\"Upvote\" location=\"top\">\n                <template v-slot:activator=\"{ props: tooltipProps }\">\n                    <v-btn\n                        v-bind=\"tooltipProps\"\n                        icon=\"mdi-arrow-up-bold-outline\"\n                        variant=\"text\"\n                        size=\"small\"\n                        :color=\"comment.userVote === 'up' ? 'success' : 'grey'\"\n                        @click=\"voteComment(comment.id, 'up')\"\n                        :loading=\"votingCommentId === comment.id && votingType === 'up'\"\n                        :disabled=\"!authStore.isAuthenticated\"\n                    ></v-btn>\n                 </template>\n            </v-tooltip>\n          <span class=\"comment-score mx-1\" :class=\"getScoreColor(comment.score)\">{{ comment.score }}</span>\n          <v-tooltip text=\"Downvote\" location=\"top\">\n                <template v-slot:activator=\"{ props: tooltipProps }\">\n                    <v-btn\n                        v-bind=\"tooltipProps\"\n                        icon=\"mdi-arrow-down-bold-outline\"\n                        variant=\"text\"\n                        size=\"small\"\n                        :color=\"comment.userVote === 'down' ? 'error' : 'grey'\"\n                        @click=\"voteComment(comment.id, 'down')\"\n                        :loading=\"votingCommentId === comment.id && votingType === 'down'\"\n                        :disabled=\"!authStore.isAuthenticated\"\n                    ></v-btn>\n                 </template>\n            </v-tooltip>\n\n          <v-spacer></v-spacer>\n\n          <v-tooltip text=\"Flag Comment\" location=\"top\">\n             <template v-slot:activator=\"{ props: tooltipProps }\">\n                <v-btn\n                    v-bind=\"tooltipProps\"\n                    icon=\"mdi-flag-outline\"\n                    variant=\"text\"\n                    size=\"small\"\n                    color=\"grey\"\n                    @click=\"flagComment(comment.id)\"\n                    :loading=\"flaggingCommentId === comment.id\"\n                    :disabled=\"!authStore.isAuthenticated\"\n                ></v-btn>\n             </template>\n          </v-tooltip>\n        </v-card-actions>\n      </v-card>\n    </v-slide-y-transition>\n\n    <v-dialog v-model=\"showLinkWarning\" max-width=\"500\">\n      <v-card>\n        <v-card-title class=\"headline orbitron-font\">External Link Warning</v-card-title>\n        <v-card-text>\n          You are about to leave Flowork and navigate to the following external URL. Flowork is not responsible for the content of external sites.\n          <div class=\"mt-2 text-caption text-grey-lighten-1\" style=\"word-break: break-all;\">{{ externalLinkTarget }}</div>\n        </v-card-text>\n        <v-card-actions>\n          <v-spacer></v-spacer>\n          <v-btn text @click=\"showLinkWarning = false\">Cancel</v-btn>\n          <v-btn color=\"primary\" @click=\"proceedToExternalLink\">Proceed</v-btn>\n        </v-card-actions>\n      </v-card>\n    </v-dialog>\n\n  </div>\n</template>\n\n<script setup>\nimport { ref, onMounted, onUnmounted, computed, reactive, nextTick } from 'vue';\nimport { useAuthStore } from '@/store/auth';\nimport { useLocaleStore } from '@/store/locale';\nimport { apiGetComments, apiPostComment, apiVoteComment, apiFlagComment, apiDeleteComment, apiUpdateComment } from '@/api';\nimport linkifyIt from 'linkify-it';\nimport tlds from 'tlds';\nimport { useUiStore } from '@/store/ui';\n\nconst props = defineProps({\n  articleId: { type: String, required: true },\n  articleSlug: { type: String, required: true },\n  articleAuthorId: { type: String, default: '' }\n});\n\nconst authStore = useAuthStore();\nconst localeStore = useLocaleStore();\nconst uiStore = useUiStore();\nconst t = localeStore.loc;\n\nconst comments = ref([]);\nconst isLoading = ref(true);\nconst fetchError = ref(null);\nconst newCommentContent = ref('');\nconst isPosting = ref(false);\nconst postError = ref('');\nconst rateLimitError = ref('');\n\nconst votingCommentId = ref(null);\nconst votingType = ref(null);\nconst flaggingCommentId = ref(null);\nconst deletingCommentId = ref(null);\n\nconst editingCommentId = ref(null);\nconst editingCommentContent = ref('');\nconst isUpdating = ref(false);\n\nconst showLinkWarning = ref(false);\nconst externalLinkTarget = ref('');\n\nconst linkifyInstance = linkifyIt();\nlinkifyInstance.tlds(tlds);\n\nasync function postComment() {\n  if (!newCommentContent.value.trim() || !authStore.isAuthenticated) return;\n  isPosting.value = true;\n  postError.value = '';\n  rateLimitError.value = '';\n  try {\n    const result = await apiPostComment(props.articleSlug, newCommentContent.value, null);\n    if (result.error) {\n        if (result.status === 429) {\n            rateLimitError.value = result.error || 'Rate limit exceeded.';\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: rateLimitError.value, color: 'error' });\n        } else {\n            postError.value = result.error || `HTTP error ${result.status}`;\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: postError.value, color: 'error' });\n        }\n        throw new Error(result.error || `HTTP error ${result.status}`);\n     }\n    comments.value.unshift(reactive({ ...result, expanded: false, userVote: null }));\n    newCommentContent.value = '';\n  } catch (err) {\n    console.error(\"Failed to post comment:\", err);\n    if (!postError.value && !rateLimitError.value) {\n        const errorMsg = err.message || \"Could not post comment.\";\n        postError.value = errorMsg;\n        uiStore.showNotification({ text: errorMsg, color: 'error' });\n    }\n  } finally {\n    isPosting.value = false;\n  }\n}\n\nasync function voteComment(commentId, type) {\n    if (!authStore.isAuthenticated) return;\n    votingCommentId.value = commentId;\n    votingType.value = type;\n     try {\n         const result = await apiVoteComment(commentId, type);\n         if (result.error) throw new Error(result.error || `HTTP error ${result.status}`);\n         const comment = comments.value.find(c => c.id === commentId);\n         if (comment) {\n            if (comment.userVote === type) { comment.score += (type === 'up' ? -1 : 1); comment.userVote = null; }\n            else if (comment.userVote) { comment.score += (type === 'up' ? 2 : -2); comment.userVote = type; }\n            else { comment.score += (type === 'up' ? 1 : -1); comment.userVote = type; }\n         }\n     } catch (err) {\n         console.error(\"Failed to vote:\", err);\n         uiStore.showNotification({ text: `Error voting: ${err.message}`, color: 'error' });\n     } finally {\n         votingCommentId.value = null;\n         votingType.value = null;\n     }\n}\n\nasync function flagComment(commentId) {\n    if (!authStore.isAuthenticated) return;\n    if (!confirm(\"Are you sure you want to flag this comment as inappropriate?\")) return;\n    flaggingCommentId.value = commentId;\n    try {\n        const result = await apiFlagComment(commentId);\n        if (result.error && result.status !== 409) {\n             throw new Error(result.error || `HTTP error ${result.status}`);\n        }\n        if (result.status === 409) {\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: result.message, color: 'info' });\n        } else {\n             uiStore.showNotification({ text: \"Comment flagged successfully.\", color: 'success' });\n        }\n    } catch (err) {\n        console.error(\"Failed to flag comment:\", err);\n        uiStore.showNotification({ text: `An error occurred: ${err.message}`, color: 'error' });\n    } finally {\n        flaggingCommentId.value = null;\n    }\n}\n\nasync function deleteComment(commentId) {\n    if (!authStore.isAuthenticated) return;\n    if (!confirm(\"Are you sure you want to permanently delete this comment?\")) return;\n    deletingCommentId.value = commentId;\n     try {\n        const result = await apiDeleteComment(commentId);\n        if (result.error) throw new Error(result.error || `HTTP error ${result.status}`);\n        comments.value = comments.value.filter(c => c.id !== commentId);\n        uiStore.showNotification({ text: \"Comment deleted.\", color: 'info' });\n     } catch (err) {\n        console.error(\"Failed to delete comment:\", err);\n        uiStore.showNotification({ text: `Error deleting: ${err.message}`, color: 'error' });\n     } finally {\n         deletingCommentId.value = null;\n     }\n}\n\nfunction startEdit(comment) {\n  editingCommentId.value = comment.id;\n  editingCommentContent.value = comment.content;\n}\n\nfunction cancelEdit() {\n  editingCommentId.value = null;\n  editingCommentContent.value = '';\n}\n\nasync function saveEdit(comment) {\n  if (!editingCommentContent.value.trim()) {\n      uiStore.showNotification({ text: \"Comment cannot be empty.\", color: 'error' });\n      return;\n  }\n  isUpdating.value = true;\n  try {\n    const result = await apiUpdateComment(comment.id, editingCommentContent.value);\n    if (result.error) throw new Error(result.error);\n    comment.content = editingCommentContent.value;\n    uiStore.showNotification({ text: 'Comment updated!', color: 'success' });\n    cancelEdit();\n  } catch (err) {\n    console.error(\"Failed to update comment:\", err);\n    uiStore.showNotification({ text: `Update failed: ${err.message}`, color: 'error' });\n  } finally {\n      isUpdating.value = false;\n  }\n}\n\nfunction toggleExpand(comment) {\n  comment.expanded = !comment.expanded;\n}\n\nfunction formatAuthor(address) {\n  if (!address) return 'Anonymous';\n  if (address.startsWith('0x') && address.length === 42) {\n    return `${address.substring(0, 6)}...${address.substring(address.length - 4)}`;\n  }\n  return address;\n}\n\nfunction timeAgo(dateString) {\n  const date = new Date(dateString);\n  const seconds = Math.floor((new Date() - date) / 1000);\n  let interval = seconds / 31536000;\n  if (interval > 1) return Math.floor(interval) + \" years ago\";\n  interval = seconds / 2592000;\n  if (interval > 1) return Math.floor(interval) + \" months ago\";\n  interval = seconds / 86400;\n  if (interval > 1) return Math.floor(interval) + \" days ago\";\n  interval = seconds / 3600;\n  if (interval > 1) return Math.floor(interval) + \" hours ago\";\n  interval = seconds / 60;\n  if (interval > 1) return Math.floor(interval) + \" minutes ago\";\n  return seconds < 5 ? \"just now\" : Math.floor(seconds) + \" seconds ago\";\n}\n\n\nfunction getScoreColor(score) {\n  if (score > 0) return 'text-success';\n  if (score < 0) return 'text-error';\n  return 'text-grey';\n}\n\nconst isAuthor = (comment) => {\n    return authStore.isAuthenticated && comment.author_id?.toLowerCase() === authStore.user.id?.toLowerCase();\n};\n\nconst isModerator = computed(() => {\n    return authStore.isAuthenticated && props.articleAuthorId?.toLowerCase() === authStore.user.id?.toLowerCase();\n});\n\nfunction linkify(text) {\n  const matches = linkifyInstance.match(text);\n  if (!matches) {\n    return escapeHtml(text);\n  }\n  let result = '';\n  let lastIndex = 0;\n  matches.forEach(match => {\n    result += escapeHtml(text.slice(lastIndex, match.index));\n    result += `<a href=\"${escapeHtml(match.url)}\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener noreferrer\" data-external-link=\"true\" data-url=\"${escapeHtml(match.url)}\">${escapeHtml(match.text)}</a>`;\n    lastIndex = match.lastIndex;\n  });\n  result += escapeHtml(text.slice(lastIndex));\n  return result;\n}\n\nfunction escapeHtml(unsafe) {\n    if (!unsafe) return '';\n    return unsafe\n         .replace(/&/g, \"&amp;\")\n         .replace(/</g, \"&lt;\")\n         .replace(/>/g, \"&gt;\")\n         .replace(/\"/g, \"&quot;\")\n         .replace(/'/g, \"&#039;\");\n}\n\nfunction handleLinkClick(event) {\n    const target = event.target.closest('a[data-external-link=\"true\"]');\n    if (target) {\n        event.preventDefault();\n        externalLinkTarget.value = target.dataset.url;\n        showLinkWarning.value = true;\n    }\n}\n\nfunction proceedToExternalLink() {\n    if (externalLinkTarget.value) {\n        window.open(externalLinkTarget.value, '_blank', 'noopener,noreferrer');\n    }\n    showLinkWarning.value = false;\n    externalLinkTarget.value = '';\n}\n\nconst commentsSectionRef = ref(null);\n\nonMounted(() => {\n    fetchComments();\n    nextTick(() => {\n        if (commentsSectionRef.value) {\n            commentsSectionRef.value.addEventListener('click', handleLinkClick);\n        }\n    });\n});\n\nonUnmounted(() => {\n    if (commentsSectionRef.value) {\n         commentsSectionRef.value.removeEventListener('click', handleLinkClick);\n    }\n});\n\nasync function fetchComments() {\n  isLoading.value = true;\n  fetchError.value = null;\n  try {\n    const result = await apiGetComments(props.articleSlug);\n    if (result.error) throw new Error(result.error);\n    comments.value = result.map(c => reactive({ ...c, expanded: false, userVote: null }));\n    console.log(\"[Comments] Successfully loaded comments:\", comments.value); // English Log\n  } catch (err) {\n    console.error(\"[Comments] Failed to load comments:\", err); // English Log\n    fetchError.value = err.message;\n  } finally {\n    isLoading.value = false;\n  }\n}\n</script>\n\n<style scoped>\n.comments-section {\n  margin-top: 40px;\n  position: relative;\n}\n.section-title {\n  color: #00f5ff;\n  border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(0, 245, 255, 0.2);\n  padding-bottom: 8px;\n  margin-bottom: 24px;\n}\n.comment-form-card {\n overflow: hidden;\n  position: relative;\n}\n.comment-card::before {\n  content: '';\n  position: absolute;\n  top: -50%; left: -50%;\n  width: 200%; height: 200%;\n  background: conic-gradient(\n fetchRecentPosts(category, slug, lang, currentId) {\n  const recentPostsDiv = document.getElementById('recent-posts');\n  if (!recentPostsDiv) {\n      console.error('[Sidebar] Cannot find #recent-posts element.');\n      return;\n  }\n  if (!category || !lang || !currentId) {\n    console.warn('[Sidebar] Missing required props for related posts fetch.');\n    recentPostsDiv.innerHTML = await response.json();\n      console.log(`[Sidebar] Received posts data:`, posts);\n\n      if (posts && posts.length > 0) {\n          let html = '';\n          posts.forEach(post => {\n              const url = `/p-${post.slug}-${post.language || 'en'}.html`;\n              html += `<a href=\"${url}\" class=\"recent-post-link\">${post.title}</a>`;\n          });\n          if (html === '') {\n             recentPostsDiv.innerHTML = '<p>No other related posts found.</p>';\n          } else {\n             recentPostsDiv.innerHTML = html;\n          }\n      } else {\n          recentPostsDiv.innerHTML = '<p>No related posts found.</p>';\n      }\n  } catch (error) {\n      console.error('[Sidebar] Error fetching or processing related posts:', error);\n      recentPostsDiv.innerHTML = '<p style=\"color: #ff5252;\">Could not load related posts.</p>';\n  }\n}\n\nonMounted(() => {\n    fetchCategories();\n    if (props.category && props.currentLang && height / 2) / (height / 2);\n  const rotateY = 15 * x;\n  const rotateX = -15 * y;\n  cardStyle.value = {\n    transform: `perspective(1000px) rotateX(${rotateX}deg) rotateY(${rotateY}deg) item.title.toLowerCase().includes(s) ||\n        (item.description && item.description.toLowerCase().includes(s))\n    );\n});\n\nfunction runCommand(item) {\n  if (item && item.action) {\n         :disabled=\"!globalLoopConfig.isEnabled || isReadOnly\"\n                    placeholder=\"#\"\n                    title=\"Iterations\"\n                 />\n             </div>\n\n type=\"checkbox\"\n                        id=\"delay-check\"\n                        v-model=\"globalLoopConfig.isDelayEnabled\"\n                        :disabled=\"!globalLoopConfig.isEnabled || isReadOnly\"\n                     />\n                     <label for=\"delay-check\">DELAY</label>\n                 </div>\n\n                <div class=\"radio-pill-group\" :class=\"{ disabled: !globalLoopConfig.isEnabled || !globalLoopConfig.isDelayEnabled }\">\n                    <div\n                        class=\"radio-pill\"\n                        :class=\"{ active: globalLoopConfig.delayType === 'static' }\"\n                        @click=\"!isReadOnly && (globalLoopConfig.delayType = 'static')\"\n                    >FIX</div>\n                    <div\n                        class=\"radio-pill\"\n                        :class=\"{ active: globalLoopConfig.delayType === 'random_range' }\"\n                        @click=\"!isReadOnly && (globalLoopConfig.delayType = 'random_range')\"\n                    >RND</div>\n                </div>\n\n                <template v-if=\"globalLoopConfig.delayType === 'static'\">\n                    <input\n                        v-model.number=\"globalLoopConfig.delayStatic\"\n                        type=\"number\"\n                        class=\"compact-input\"\n                        style=\"width: 45px\"\n                        :disabled=\"!globalLoopConfig.isEnabled || !globalLoopConfig.isDelayEnabled || isReadOnly\"\n                    />\n                    <span class=\"unit-text\">s</span>\n                </template>\n\n                <template v-else>\n                    <input\n                        v-model.number=\"globalLoopConfig.delayRandomMin\"\n                        type=\"number\"\n                        class=\"compact-input\"\n                        style=\"width: 35px\"\n                        placeholder=\"min\"\n                        :disabled=\"!globalLoopConfig.isEnabled || !globalLoopConfig.isDelayEnabled || isReadOnly\"\n                    />\n                    <span class=\"unit-text\">-</span>\n                    <input\n                        v-model.number=\"globalLoopConfig.delayRandomMax\"\n                        type=\"number\"\n                        class=\"compact-input\"\n                        style=\"width: 35px\"\n                        placeholder=\"max\"\n                        :disabled=\"!globalLoopConfig.isEnabled || !globalLoopConfig.isDelayEnabled || isReadOnly\"\n                    />\n                    <span class=\"unit-text\">s</span>\n                </template>\n             </div>\n\n             <v-spacer></v-spacer>\n\n             <div class=\"engine-name-display\">\n                 <span class=\"eng-label\">TARGET:</span>\n                 <span class=\"eng-name\">{{ selectedEngine ? selectedEngine.name : 'N/A' }}</span>\n             </div>\n\n             <div class=\"config-divider\"></div>\n\n             <div class=\"extra-actions\">\n                <button class=\"icon-btn\" @click=\"handleSaveAs\" title=\"Save As New Preset\">\n                    <v-icon size=\"small\">mdi-content-save-edit-outline</v-icon>\n                </button>\n                <button class=\"icon-btn\" @click=\"openPublishDialog\" :disabled=\"!currentPresetName\" title=\"Publish to Marketplace\">\n                    <v-icon size=\"small\">mdi-publish</v-icon>\n                </button>\n                <button class=\"icon-btn\" @click=\"handleShare\" :disabled=\"!currentPresetName\" title=\"Share Workflow\">\n                    <v-icon size=\"small\">mdi-share-variant-outline</v-icon>\n                </button>\n             </div>\n        </div>\n\n      </div>\n\n      <v-dialog v-model=\"isSaveAsDialogOpen\" max-width=\"500px\" persistent>\n          <v-card class=\"dialog-card\">\n              <v-card-title class=\"orbitron-font\">Save Workflow As</v-card-title> <v-card-text>\n                  <v-text-field\n                      v-model=\"newPresetName\"\n                      label=\"Preset Name\" placeholder=\"my-awesome-workflow\" variant=\"outlined\"\n                      autofocus\n                      @keyup.enter=\"confirmSaveAs\"\n                  ></v-text-field>\n              </v-card-text>\n              <v-card-actions>\n                  <v-spacer></v-spacer>\n                  <v-btn variant=\"text\" @click=\"isSaveAsDialogOpen = false\">Cancel</v-btn> <v-btn color=\"cyan\" variant=\"flat\" @click=\"confirmSaveAs\" class=\"action-button\">Save</v-btn> </v-card-actions>\n          </v-card>\n      </v-dialog>\n\n      <MarketplacePublishDialog v-model=\"isPublishDialogOpen\" />\n    </div>\n  </div>\n</template>\n\n<script setup>\nimport MarketplacePublishDialog from '@/components/MarketplacePublishDialog.vue';\nimport { useMarketplaceStore } from '@/store/marketplace';\nimport { onMounted, onUnmounted, computed, ref } from 'vue';\nimport { useWorkflowStore } from '@/store/workflow';\nimport { useUiStore } from '@/store/ui';\nimport { useShareStore } from '@/store/share';\nimport { storeToRefs } from 'pinia';\nimport { useAuthStore } from '@/store/auth';\nimport { useRouter } from 'vue-router';\nimport { useLayoutWorkerStore } from '@/store/layoutWorker';\nimport { useSocketStore } from '@/store/socket';\nimport { useEngineStore } from '@/store/engines';\nimport { useLocaleStore } from '@/store/locale';\nimport { useSettingsStore } from '@/store/settings';\nimport api from '@/api'; // [ADDED]\n\nconst workflowStore = useWorkflowStore();\nconst uiStore = useUiStore();\nconst shareStore = useShareStore();\nconst authStore = useAuthStore();\nconst router = useRouter();\nconst layoutWorkerStore = useLayoutWorkerStore();\nconst socketStore = useSocketStore();\nconst engineStore = useEngineStore();\nconst marketplaceStore = useMarketplaceStore();\nconst localeStore = useLocaleStore();\nconst settingsStore = useSettingsStore();\nconst { loc } = storeToRefs(localeStore);\n\nconst { presets, currentPresetName, globalLoopConfig, isReadOnly, canExecute, favoritePresets } = storeToRefs(workflowStore);\nconst { isConnected, isConnecting, connectionError, currentEngineStatus } = storeToRefs(socketStore);\nconst { selectedEngine } = storeToRefs(engineStore);\nconst { isFooterPinned: isPinned } = storeToRefs(uiStore);\nconst { isModified } = storeToRefs(workflowStore);\n\nconst selectedPreset = computed(() => currentPresetName.value);\n\nconst isFooterVisible = ref(false);\nconst isMouseOverFooter = ref(false);\nconst isMenuOpen = ref(false);\nconst isPublishDialogOpen = ref(false);\nconst isSaveAsDialogOpen = ref(false);\nconst newPresetName = ref('');\nconst showAdvancedConfig = ref(false);\nconst isPresetDropdownOpen = ref(false);\nconst presetDropdownRef = ref(null);\n\nconst quickPrompt = ref('');\nconst isSendingPrompt = ref(false);\nconst isPromptFocused = ref(false);\nconst promptMode = ref('chat'); // 'chat' | 'architect'\n\nfunction handlePromptFocus() {\n    isPromptFocused.value = true;\n    isFooterVisible.value = false;\n}\n\nfunction handlePromptBlur() {\n    setTimeout(() => { isPromptFocused.value = false; }, 200);\n}\n\nasync function handleFooterSubmit() {\n    if (!quickPrompt.value.trim()) return;\n\n    if (promptMode.value === 'chat') {\n        await sendQuickPrompt();\n    } else {\n        await generateBlueprint();\n    }\n}\n\nasync function sendQuickPrompt() {\n    isSendingPrompt.value = true;\n    try {\n        await socketStore.sendAgentInput(quickPrompt.value);\n        uiStore.showNotification({ text: \"Message sent to Agent!\", color: \"cyan\" });\n        quickPrompt.value = \"\";\n    } catch (e) {\n        uiStore.showNotification({ text: \"Failed to send prompt.\", color: \"error\" });\n    } finally {\n        isSendingPrompt.value = false;\n    }\n}\n\nasync function generateBlueprint() {\n    isSendingPrompt.value = true;\n    try {\n        uiStore.showNotification({ text: \"Architecting solution...\", color: \"purple-accent-2\" });\n\n        const response = await api.post('/ai-architect/generate', {\n            prompt: quickPrompt.value\n        });\n\n        if (response.data && response.data.error) throw new Error(response.data.error);\n\n        const result = response.data.data || response.data;\n        if (!result.nodes || !result.connections) throw new Error(\"Invalid Blueprint Format\");\n\n        workflowStore.loadGraph(result);\n        uiStore.showNotification({ text: \"Blueprint Generated Successfully!\", color: \"success\" });\n\n        setTimeout(() => layoutWorkerStore.runAutoLayout(), 500);\n\n        quickPrompt.value = \"\";\n\n    } catch (e) {\n        console.error(\"Architect Error:\", e);\n        uiStore.showNotification({ text: `Architect Failed: ${e.message}`, color: \"error\" });\n    } finally {\n        isSendingPrompt.value = false;\n    }\n}\n\nconst handleAutoLayout = () => {\n    layoutWorkerStore.runAutoLayout();\n};\n\nfunction handleExecution(mode) {\n    if (!socketStore.isConnected) {\n        uiStore.showConnectEngineDialog();\n        return;\n    }\n\n    if (canExecute.value && !authStore.isAuthenticated) {\n        uiStore.showNotification({ text: 'Please login to run or simulate workflows.', color: 'warning' });\n        router.push({ name: 'Login', query: { redirect: router.currentRoute.value.fullPath } });\n        return;\n    }\n\n    if (mode === 'SIMULATE') {\n        workflowStore.simulateCurrentWorkflow();\n    } else {\n        workflowStore.executeCurrentWorkflow();\n    }\n}\n\nconst handleMouseMove = (event) => {\n  if (isPinned.value) {\n    return;\n  }\n  if (isPromptFocused.value) {\n      isFooterVisible.value = false;\n      return;\n  }\n  const triggerZoneHeight = 15;\n  const mouseY = event.clientY;\n  const windowHeight = window.innerHeight;\n\n  if (windowHeight - mouseY < triggerZoneHeight) {\n      isFooterVisible.value = true;\n  } else if (!isMouseOverFooter.value && !isPresetDropdownOpen.value) {\n      isFooterVisible.value = false;\n  }\n};\n\nconst handleClickOutside = (event) => {\n    if (presetDropdownRef.value && !presetDropdownRef.value.contains(event.target)) {\n        isPresetDropdownOpen.value = false;\n    }\n};\n\nonMounted(async () => {\n  window.addEventListener('mousemove', handleMouseMove);\n  document.addEventListener('click', handleClickOutside);\n  window.addEventListener('beforeunload', (event) => {\n      if (isModified.value) {\n          event.preventDefault();\n          event.returnValue = 'You have unsaved changes! Are you sure you want to leave?';\n      }\n  });\n  layoutWorkerStore.initWorker();\n\n  try {\n      await settingsStore.fetchSettings();\n      const savedPinState = settingsStore.settings['ui_footer_pinned'];\n      if (savedPinState !== undefined) {\n          uiStore.setFooterPin(savedPinState);\n      }\n  } catch (e) {\n      console.error(\"Settings load error\", e);\n  }\n});\n\nonUnmounted(() => {\n  window.removeEventListener('mousemove', handleMouseMove);\n  document.removeEventListener('click', handleClickOutside);\n  window.removeEventListener('beforeunload', (event) => {\n      if (isModified.value) {\n          event.preventDefault();\n          event.returnValue = 'You have unsaved changes! Are you sure you want to leave?';\n      }\n  });\n});\n\nconst presetItems = computed(() => presets.value.map(p => ({ title: p.name, value: p.id })));\n\nconst togglePresetDropdown = () => {\n    isPresetDropdownOpen.value = !isPresetDropdownOpen.value;\n};\n\nconst selectPreset = (id) => {\n    workflowStore.loadWorkflow(id);\n    isPresetDropdownOpen.value = false;\n};\n\nconst handleSave = () => {\n    if (!socketStore.isConnected) {\n        uiStore.showConnectEngineDialog();\n        return;\n    }\n    if (currentPresetName.value) {\n        workflowStore.saveCurrentWorkflow(currentPresetName.value);\n    } else {\n        handleSaveAs();\n    }\n};\nconst handleSaveAs = () => {\n  if (!socketStore.isConnected) {\n    uiStore.showConnectEngineDialog();\n    return;\n  }\n  newPresetName.value = currentPresetName.value || 'new-preset';\n  isSaveAsDialogOpen.value = true;\n};\n\nfunction openPublishDialog() {\n    if (!currentPresetName.value) {\n        uiStore.showNotification({ text: 'Please save your workflow with a name before publishing.', color: 'warning' });\n        handleSaveAs();\n        return;\n    }\n    if (isModified.value) {\n        uiStore.showNotification({ text: 'You have unsaved changes. Please save before publishing.', color: 'warning' });\n        handleSave();\n        return;\n    }\n    isPublishDialogOpen.value = true;\n}\n\nconst handleShare = () => {\n    if (!currentPresetName.value) {\n        uiStore.showNotification({ text: 'Please save the workflow before sharing.', color: 'warning' });\n        return;\n    }\n    shareStore.openShareModal({ name: currentPresetName.value });\n};\n\nconst confirmSaveAs = () => {\n    if (newPresetName.value && newPresetName.value.trim()) {\n        workflowStore.saveCurrentWorkflow(newPresetName.value.trim());\n    }\n    isSaveAsDialogOpen.value = false;\n};\n\nasync function handleDeletePreset(presetId) {\n    const preset = presets.value.find(p => p.id === presetId);\n    if (preset) {\n        const confirmed = await uiStore.showConfirmation({\n            title: 'Delete Preset',\n            text: `Are you sure you want to delete the preset \"${preset.name}\"? This cannot be undone.`,\n            color: 'error',\n            confirmText: 'Delete'\n        });\n        if (confirmed) {\n            workflowStore.deletePresetAction(presetId);\n        }\n    }\n}\n\nfunction handlePresetSelection(presetId) {\n    if (presetId) {\n        workflowStore.loadWorkflow(presetId);\n    }\n}\n\nconst connectionStatusClass = computed(() => {\n  if (isConnecting.value) return 'connecting';\n  if (isConnected.value) return 'online';\n  if (connectionError.value) return 'error';\n  return 'offline';\n});\n\nconst connectionChipTooltip = computed(() => {\n    if (isConnected.value) return `Connected to engine: ${selectedEngine.value?.name || 'N/A'}`;\n    if (connectionError.value) return connectionError.value;\n    return 'Not connected to any engine';\n});\n\nfunction attemptReconnect() {\n    if (connectionError.value && !isConnecting.value) {\n        console.log(\"[ControlsFooter] Attempting manual reconnect...\");\n        socketStore.connect();\n    }\n}\n</script>\n\n<style scoped>\n/* Global Wrapper */\n.footer-area-wrapper {\n  position: absolute;\n  bottom: 0;\n  left: 50%;\n  transform: translateX(-50%);\n  width: 100%;\n  max-width: 850px;\n  z-index: 10;\n  pointer-events: none;\n}\n\n/* Mini Prompt */\n.mini-prompt-container {\n  position: absolute;\n  bottom: 24px;\n  left: 0;\n  width: 100%;\n  display: flex;\n  justify-content: center;\n  pointer-events: auto;\n  transform: translateY(100px);\n  opacity: 0;\n  transition: transform 0.4s cubic-bezier(0.22, 1, 0.36, 1), opacity 0.3s ease-in;\n}\n.mini-prompt-container.is-visible {\n  transform: translateY(0);\n  opacity: 1;\n}\n.mini-prompt-sheet {\n  width: 100%;\n  max-width: 500px;\n  backdrop-filter: blur(12px);\n  background-color: rgba(24, 24, 24, 0.95) !important;\n  border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.08);\n  box-shadow: 0 8px 32px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);\n  transition: border-color 0.3s ease;\n}\n.mini-prompt-input :deep(.v-field__input) {\n  color: #fff !important;\n  font-size: 0.95rem;\n}\n\n/* [NEW] Mode Switcher Pills */\n.pill-switch {\n    background-color: #1a1a1a;\n    border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.1);\n}\n.pill-option {\n    padding: 2px 12px;\n    font-size: 9px;\n    font-family: 'Orbitron', monospace;\n    font-weight: bold;\n    border-radius: 12px;\n    cursor: pointer;\n    color: #666;\n    transition: all 0.2s;\n    display: flex;\n    align-items: center;\n}\n.pill-option.active {\n    color: #000;\n    background-color: #fff;\n}\n.pill-option:first-child.active { background-color: #00E5FF; } /* Cyan for Chat */\n.pill-option:last-child.active { background-color: #D500F9; color: #fff; } /* Purple for Architect */\n\n/* Main Cockpit Footer */\n.controls-footer-container {\n  position: absolute;\n  bottom: 20px;\n  left: 50%;\n  transform: translateX(-50%) translateY(150%);\n  width: 98%;\n  max-width: 850px;\n  opacity: 0;\n  transition: all 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.19, 1, 0.22, 1);\n  z-index: 20;\n  pointer-events: none;\n}\n.controls-footer-container.is-visible {\n  transform: translateX(-50%) translateY(0);\n  opacity: 1;\n  pointer-events: auto;\n}\n\n/* (English Hardcode) Sleek Dark Theme */\n.cockpit-wrapper {\n    background: #181818;\n    border: 1px solid #333;\n    border-radius: 8px;\n    box-shadow: 0 12px 40px rgba(0,0,0,0.6);\n    padding: 4px;\n    display: flex;\n    flex-direction: column;\n    gap: 0;\n    overflow: visible;\n}\n\n/* --- TOP ROW --- */\n.cockpit-main-row {\n    display: flex;\n    align-items: center;\n    height: 46px;\n    padding: 0 8px;\n    gap: 10px;\n}\n\n/* Section Left: Presets */\n.section-left {\n    flex: 1;\n    min-width: 0;\n}\n\n.custom-dropdown-wrapper {\n    position: relative;\n    width: 180px;\n    height: 34px;\n}\n.dropdown-trigger {\n    background: transparent;\n    border: 1px solid transparent;\n    color: #e0e0e0;\n    height: 100%;\n    border-radius: 6px;\n    display: flex;\n    align-items: center;\n    justify-content: space-between;\n    padding: 0 8px;\n    font-size: 0.85rem;\n    font-weight: 500;\n    cursor: pointer;\n    transition: all 0.2s;\n}\n.dropdown-trigger:hover { background: #252525; border-color: #444; }\n.trigger-label { white-space: nowrap; rgba(0,0,0,0.8);\n}\n.dropdown-item {\n    padding: 8px 12px;\n    font-size: 0.85rem;\n    color: #ccc;\n    display: flex;\n    justify-content: space-between;\n    align-items: center;\n    cursor: color: #ccc;\n    cursor: pointer;\n    display: flex;\n    align-items: center;\n    gap: 6px;\n    transition: all 0.2s;\n    height: 100%;\n    background: transparent;\n}\n.btn-simulate { color: }\n.btn-run:disabled { opacity: 0.3; background: #222; color: #555; cursor: not-allowed; }\n\n.btn-stop { color: #ef4444; min-width: 80px; justify-content: center; background: #222; }\n.btn-stop:hover { background: #ef4444; color: #fff; }\n\n.btn-pause, .btn-resume { color: #ccc; padding: 0 10px; background: #222; }\n.btn-pause:hover { color: #fff; background: #333; }\n.btn-resume:hover { color: 1;\n}\n\n/* Vitals Pill (Top) */\n.vitals-pill {\n    display: flex;\n    align-items: center;\n    background: #1a1a1a;\n    border: 1px solid #2a2a2a;\n    border-radius: 4px;\n    padding: 0 monospace; }\n.vital-sep { width: 1px; height: 12px; background: #333; }\n.text-error { color: #666; font-size: 0.65rem; }\n\n/* LED Indicator (Inside Vitals Pill) */\n.led-indicator {\n    position:    background-color: #555;\n    z-index: 2;\n}\n.led-ring {\n    position: absolute;\n    width: 12px;\n    height: 12px;\n    border-radius: 50%;\n    background-color: transparent;\n    z-index: 1;\n    opacity: 0.4;\n}\n/* Status Colors */\n.led-core.online { background-color: #00bd7e; box-shadow: 0 0 6px #00bd7e; animation: breathe 3s infinite ease-in-out; }\n.led-core.connecting { background-color: #fbbf24; animation: blink 0.5s infinite; }\n.led-core.error { background-color: #ef4444; }\n\n.tools-group { display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 2px; }\n.divider-vertical { 4px;\n    cursor: pointer;\n    display: flex;\n    align-items: center;\n    justify-content: center;\n    transition: all 0.2s;\n}\n.icon-btn:hover { color: #fff; background: #252525; }\n.icon-btn.active { color: #00bd7e; background: rgba(0, 189, 126, 0.1); }\n.icon-btn.danger:hover { color: #ef4444; background: rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.1); }\n.spin { animation: spin 1s linear infinite; }\n\n/* --- BOTTOM ROW (DRAWER) --- */\n.cockpit-config-row {\n    background: #111;\n    border-top: 1px solid #252525;\n    padding: 8px 12px;\n    display: flex;\n    align-items: center;\n    gap: center; gap: 6px; cursor: pointer; }\n.switch-group label { font-size: 0.7rem; color: #777; font-weight: 700; cursor: pointer; }\n.switch-group input[type=\"checkbox\"] { accent-color: #00bd7e; cursor: pointer; }\n\n.compact-input {\n    background: #1e1e1e;\n    border: 1px solid #333;\n    color: #ccc;\n    height: 24px;\n    font-size: 0.75rem;\n    text-align: center;\n    border-radius: 3px;\n}\n.compact-input:focus { outline: none; border-color: #00bd7e; }\n.compact-input:disabled { opacity: 0.3; cursor: not-allowed; }\n\n.config-divider { width: 1px; height: 20px; background: #333; }\n.unit-text { color: #555; font-size: 0.7rem; }\n\n.radio-pill-group { display: flex; background: #1e1e1e; border-radius: 3px; overflow: hidden; border: 1px solid #333; }\n.radio-pill-group.disabled { opacity: 0.3; pointer-events: none; }\n.radio-pill {\n    padding: 2px 8px;\n    font-size: 0.7rem;\n    cursor: pointer;\n    color: #777;\n    transition: all 0.2s;\n}\n.radio-pill.active { background: #333; color: #fff; }\n.radio-pill:hover { color: #fff; }\n\n/* Engine Name in Drawer */\n.engine-name-display {\n    display: flex;\n    align-items: center;\n    gap: 6px;\n    color: #666;\n    font-size: 0.75rem;\n    font-family: monospace;\n}\n.eng-label { font-weight: 700; color: #444; }\n.eng-name { color: #aaa; }\n\n/* Extra Actions (Icons) */\n.extra-actions { display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 4px; }\n\n@keyframes breathe {\n    0% { box-shadow: 0 0 2px rgba(0, 189, 126, 0.5); }\n    50% { box-shadow: 0 0 8px rgba(0, 189, 126, 0.8); }\n    100% { box-shadow: 0 0 2px rgba(0, 189, 126, 0.5); }\n}\n@keyframes blink { 0% { opacity: 1; } 50% { opacity: 0.3; } 100% { opacity: 1; } }\n@keyframes spin { 100% { transform: rotate(360deg); } }\n@keyframes slideDown Dynamic Component Discovery (DCD): Hub wajib melakukan scanning file secara otomatis.\n//#2. Lazy Loading: Modul hanya di-import ke RAM saat dipanggil (On-Demand).\n//#3. Atomic Isolation: 1 File = 1 Fungsi dengan nama file yang identik dengan nama fungsi aslinya.\n//#4. Zero Logic Mutation: Dilarang merubah alur logika, nama variabel, atau struktur if/try/loop.\n//#######################################################################\n\n<template>\n  <div\n    v-if=\"manifest\"\n    :class=\"['custom-node', nodeClass, { 'is-selected': selected }, nodeExecutionState]\"\n    :style=\"nodeStyle\"\n  >\n    <div v-if=\"isZoomedOut\" class=\"node-lod\" :style=\"lodStyle\"></div>\n\n    <div v-else class=\"node-inner\">\n\n      <div class=\"node-header\">\n        <div class=\"icon-wrapper\">\n          <img\n            v-if=\"iconUrl && !iconLoadError\"\n            :src=\"iconUrl\"\n            class=\"node-img-icon\"\n            alt=\"icon\"\n            @error=\"iconLoadError = true\"\n          />\n          <v-icon v-else :icon=\"fallbackIcon\" size=\"small\" class=\"node-icon-fallback\"></v-icon>\n        </div>\n\n        <div class=\"title-wrapper\">\n            <span class=\"node-subtitle\">{{ loc(manifest.category || 'Component') }}</span>\n            <span class=\"node-title\" :title=\"loc(displayLabel)\">{{ loc(displayLabel) }}</span>\n        </div>\n\n        <div class=\"status-badge\" v-if=\"nodeExecutionState\">\n            <v-icon v-if=\"nodeExecutionState === 'is-success'\" icon=\"mdi-check\" size=\"10\" color=\"black\"></v-icon>\n            <v-icon v-if=\"nodeExecutionState === 'is-error'\" icon=\"mdi-close\" size=\"10\" color=\"white\"></v-icon>\n            <v-progress-circular v-if=\"nodeExecutionState === 'is-executing'\" indeterminate size=\"12\" width=\"2\" color=\"black\"></v-progress-circular>\n        </div>\n      </div>\n\n      <div v-if=\"manifest.id === 'agent_host'\" class=\"agent-monitor\">\n        <div class=\"terminal-header\">AGI_CONSOLE // MONITOR</div>\n        <div class=\"terminal-body\">{{ agentLog }}</div>\n      </div>\n\n      <div v-if=\"inputPorts.length > 0\" class=\"ports-container left\">\n        <div v-for=\"port in inputPorts\" :key=\"port.name\" class=\"port-item input\">\n          <Handle :id=\"port.name\" type=\"target\" :position=\"Position.Left\" class=\"custom-handle\" />\n          <span class=\"port-label\">{{ port.label || port.name }}</span>\n        </div>\n      </div>\n\n      <div v-if=\"outputPorts.length > 0\" class=\"ports-container right\">\n        <div v-for=\"port in outputPorts\" :key=\"port.name\" class=\"port-item output\">\n         <span class=\"port-label\">{{ port.label || port.name }}</span>\n         <Handle :id=\"port.name\" type=\"source\" :position=\"Position.Right\" class=\"custom-handle\">\n            </Handle>\n         <div class=\"port-status-dot\" :style=\"{ backgroundColor: getOutputPortStyle(port.name).color }\"></div>\n       </div>\n    </div>\n  </div>\n  </div>\n</template>\n\n<script setup>\nimport { computed, ref, watch } from 'vue';\nimport { Handle, Position } from '@vue-flow/core';\nimport { useWorkflowStore } from '@/store/workflow';\nimport { useComponentStore } from '@/store/components';\nimport { useAppStore } from '@/store/apps';\nimport { useEngineStore } from '@/store/engines';\nimport { useSocketStore } from '@/store/socket';\nimport { storeToRefs } from 'pinia';\nimport { getComponentIconUrl } from '@/api';\nimport { useLocaleStore } from '@/store/locale';\n\nconst props = defineProps({\n  id: { type: String, required: true },\n  label: { type: String, required: true },\n  selected: { type: Boolean, required: true },\n  data: { type: Object, required: true },\n  isZoomedOut: { type: Boolean, default: false },\n});\n\nconst workflowStore = useWorkflowStore();\nconst localeStore = useLocaleStore();\nconst componentStore = useComponentStore();\nconst appStore = useAppStore();\nconst engineStore = useEngineStore();\nconst socketStore = useSocketStore();\n\nconst { executionStatus } = storeToRefs(workflowStore);\nconst { loc } = storeToRefs(localeStore);\n\nconst activeEngineId = computed(() => {\n    return engineStore.selectedEngineId || socketStore.engineId || 'local';\n});\n\nconst componentData = computed(() => {\n    const modId = props.data?.moduleId;\n    if (!modId) return null;\n\n    const app = appStore.installedApps.find(a => a.id === modId);\n    if (app) return app;\n\n    return componentStore.findComponentById(modId);\n});\n\nconst manifest = computed(() => componentData.value?.manifest || componentData.value || {});\nconst schema = computed(() => componentData.value?.schema || {});\n\nconst displayLabel = computed(() => {\n    return schema.value.name || manifest.value.name || props.label;\n});\n\nconst agentLog = ref('Agent standing by...');\nconst iconLoadError = ref(false);\n\nwatch(() => props.data.moduleId, () => {\n  iconLoadError.value = false;\n});\n\nconst iconUrl = computed(() => {\n  const app = componentData.value;\n  if (!app) return '';\n\n  if (app.id === 'business_canvas' || (app.path && app.path.includes('apps-cloud'))) {\n      return `/apps-cloud/${app.id}/icon.svg`;\n  }\n\n  let url = app.iconUrl || app.icon_url || app.gui?.iconUrl;\n  if (!url && app.icon_file) {\n      url = `/api/v1/apps/${app.id}/assets/${app.icon_file}`;\n  }\n\n  if (!url) {\n      if (app.manifest?.id) {\n         return `/api/v1/components/app/${app.manifest.id}/icon`;\n      }\n      return '';\n  }\n\n  if (url.startsWith('http') || url.startsWith('data:')) return url;\n\n  const separator = url.includes('?') ? '&' : '?';\n  if (url.includes('engine_id=')) return url;\n\n  return `${url}${separator}engine_id=${activeEngineId.value}`;\n});\n\nconst fallbackIcon = computed(() => {\n    if (manifest.value.category === 'tools') return 'mdi-tools';\n    if (manifest.value.category === 'triggers') return 'mdi-flash';\n    return 'mdi-cube-outline';\n});\n\nconst nodeStyle = computed(() => {\n  const color = props.data?.color || manifest.value.display_properties?.color;\n  if (color) {\n    return { '--node-accent': color };\n  }\n  return { '--node-accent': '#00f3ff' }; // Default Cyan\n});\n\nconst lodStyle = computed(() => {\n    return { backgroundColor: props.data?.color || '#6c757d' };\n});\n\nconst inputPorts = computed(() => {\n    if (schema.value.input_ports && schema.value.input_ports.length > 0) {\n        return schema.value.input_ports;\n    }\n    return [{ name: 'input', label: '' }];\n});\n\nconst outputPorts = computed(() => {\n    if (schema.value.outputs && schema.value.outputs.length > 0) {\n        return schema.value.outputs;\n    }\n    if (schema.value.output_ports && schema.value.output_ports.length > 0) {\n        return schema.value.output_ports;\n    }\n    return [\n         { name: 'success', label: '' },\n         { name: 'error', label: '' }\n    ];\n});\n\nconst getOutputPortStyle = (portName) => {\n  const name = portName.toLowerCase();\n  if (name.includes('success') || name.includes('true') || name.includes('done')) {\n    return { icon: 'mdi-check', color: '#39ff14' }; // Green\n  }\n  if (name.includes('error') || name.includes('fail') || name.includes('false')) {\n    return { icon: 'mdi-close', color: '#ff5252' }; // Red\n  }\n  return { icon: 'mdi-chevron-right', color: '#a59dff' }; // Default Purple\n};\n\nconst nodeExecutionState = computed(() => {\n    const statusData = executionStatus.value[props.id];\n    if (!statusData) return '';\n    const status = statusData.status;\n    const timestamp = statusData.timestamp;\n\n    if (['SUCCESS', 'ERROR', 'FAILED'].includes(status)) {\n        setTimeout(() => {\n            if (executionStatus.value[props.id]?.timestamp === timestamp) {\n                delete executionStatus.value[props.id];\n            }\n        }, 4000);\n    }\n\n    if (status === 'RUNNING') return 'is-executing';\n    if (status === 'SUCCESS') return 'is-success';\n    if (status === 'ERROR' || status === 'FAILED') return 'is-error';\n    return '';\n});\n\nconst nodeClass = computed(() => {\n    const cat = manifest.value.category || 'default';\n    return `node-cat-${cat}`;\n});\n</script>\n\n<style scoped>\n@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Rajdhani:wght@500;600;700&display=swap');\n@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@400;500;600&display=swap');\n\n/* --- MAIN NODE CONTAINER --- */\n.custom-node {\n  min-width: 220px;\n  background: rgba(18, 18, 24, 0.85); /* Glass Dark */\n  backdrop-filter: blur(12px);\n  border-radius: 12px;\n  border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08);\n  box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);\n  color: white;\n  transition: all 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.8, 0.25, 1);\n  position: relative;\n  font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif;\n  overflow: visible; /* Penting biar handle bisa keluar */\n  padding: 0;\n}\n\n/* Hover Effect */\n.custom-node:hover {\n  transform: translateY(-2px);\n  border-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);\n  box-shadow: 0 8px 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6);\n}\n\n/* Selected State */\n.custom-node.is-selected {\n  border: 1px solid var(--node-accent);\n  box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px rgba(0, 243, 255, 0.15), 0 0 20px rgba(0, 243, 255, 0.2);\n}\n\n/* --- EXECUTION STATES (The \"Living\" Node) --- */\n.is-executing {\n  border-color: #FFD600 !important;\n  box-shadow: 0 0 25px rgba(255, 214, 0, 0.4) !important;\n  animation: pulse-executing 1.5s infinite;\n}\n\n.is-success {\n  border-color: #39ff14 !important;\n  box-shadow: 0 0 25px rgba(57, 255, 20, 0.4) !important;\n}\n\n.is-error {\n  border-color: #ff5252 !important;\n  box-shadow: 0 0 25px rgba(255, 82, 82, 0.4) !important;\n  animation: shake-error 0.4s ease-in-out;\n}\n\n@keyframes pulse-executing {\n  0% { box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(255, 214, 0, 0.2); }\n  50% { box-shadow: 0 0 25px rgba(255, 214, 0, 0.6); }\n  100% { box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(255, 214, 0, 0.2); }\n}\n\n@keyframes shake-error {\n  0%, 100% { transform: translateX(0); }\n  25% { transform: translateX(-4px); }\n  75% { transform: translateX(4px); }\n}\n\n/* --- INNER LAYOUT --- */\n.node-inner {\n  display: flex;\n  flex-direction: column;\n}\n\n/* --- HEADER --- */\n.node-header {\n  display: flex;\n  align-items: center;\n  padding: 12px 16px;\n  border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);\n  background: linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(255,255,255,0.03) 0%, transparent 100%);\n  border-radius: 12px 12px 0 0;\n  gap: 12px;\n  position: relative;\n}\n\n.icon-wrapper {\n  width: 36px;\n  height: 36px;\n  background: display: flex;\n  flex-direction: column;\n  overflow: hidden;\n}\n\n.node-title {\n  font-family: 'Rajdhani', sans-serif;\n  font-weight: 700;\n  font-size: 1rem;\n  color: #fff;\n  white-space: nowrap;\n  overflow: hidden;\n  text-overflow: ellipsis;\n  letter-spacing: 0.5px;\n}\n\n.node-subtitle {\n  font-size: 0.65rem;\n  text-transform: uppercase;\n  color: rgba(255,255,255,0.5);\n  font-weight: 600;\n  letter-spacing: 1px;\n}\n\n/* Status Badge */\n.status-badge {\n  width: 20px;\n  height: 20px;\n  border-radius: 50%;\n  display: flex;\n  align-items: center;\n "//#######################################################################\n// WEBSITE https://flowork.cloud\n// File NAME : C:\\FLOWORK\\flowork-gui\\template\\web\\src\\components\\DataViewer.vue total lines 87 \n//#1. Dynamic Component Discovery (DCD): Hub wajib melakukan scanning file secara otomatis.\n//#2. Lazy Loading: Modul hanya di-import ke RAM saat dipanggil (On-Demand).\n//#3. Atomic Isolation: 1 File = 1 Fungsi dengan nama file yang identik dengan nama fungsi aslinya.\n//#4. Zero Logic Mutation: Dilarang merubah alur logika, nama variabel, atau struktur if/try/loop.\n//#######################################################################\n\n<template>\n  <v-dialog\n    v-model=\"uiStore.isDataViewerVisible\"\n    @update:model-value=\"handleClose\"\n    max-width=\"800px\"\n    scrollable\n  >\n    <v-card class=\"data-viewer-card\">\n      <v-card-title class=\"panel-title\">\n        <v-icon icon=\"mdi-code-json\" class=\"mr-2\"></v-icon>\n        {{ viewerTitle }}\n        <v-spacer></v-spacer>\n        <v-btn icon=\"mdi-close\" variant=\"text\" size=\"small\" @click=\"handleClose\"></v-btn>\n      </v-card-title>\n      <v-divider></v-divider>\n      <v-card-text class=\"data-content\">\n        <pre><code>{{ formattedContent }}</code></pre>\n      </v-card-text>\n    </v-card>\n  </v-dialog>\n</template>\n\n<script setup>\nimport { computed } from 'vue';\nimport { useUiStore } from '@/store/ui';\n\nconst uiStore = useUiStore();\n\nconst viewerTitle = computed(() => {\n    return uiStore.dataViewerContent?.title || (uiStore.dataViewerContent?.error ? 'Error' : 'Connection Data Viewer');\n});\n\nconst formattedContent = computed(() => {\n  try {\n    const dataToShow = uiStore.dataViewerContent?.payload ??\n                       uiStore.dataViewerContent?.content ??\n                       uiStore.dataViewerContent?.data ??\n                       uiStore.dataViewerContent?.error ??\n                       uiStore.dataViewerContent;\n\n    if (typeof dataToShow === 'string') {\n        try {\n            return JSON.stringify(JSON.parse(dataToShow), null, 2);\n        } catch (e) {\n            return dataToShow;\n        }\n    }\n    return JSON.stringify(dataToShow, null, 2);\n  } catch (e) {\n    return \"Error parsing data.\";\n  }\n});\n\nfunction handleClose() {\n  uiStore.hideDataViewer();\n}\n</script>\n\n<style scoped>\n.data-viewer-card {\n  background-color: #1e1e2f;\n  border: 1px solid var(--neon-cyan);\n}\n\n.panel-title {\n  color: var(--neon-cyan);\n  font-family: 'Orbitron', monospace;\n}\n\n.data-content {\n  background-color: #161625;\n  color: #e0e0e0;\n  font-family: 'Courier New', Courier, monospace;\n  font-size: 0.85rem;\n}\n\npre {\n  white-space: pre-wrap;\n  word-wrap: break-word;\n}\n</style>\n", "structure": [{"name": "Template", "type": "ui", "line": 648, "icon": "fa-window-maximize"}], "organs": [], "metrics": {"loc": 90, "complexity": "CRITICAL", "todo_count": 2668, "security_risks": ["Potential Hardcoded URL with Creds detected"], "last_modified": 1767761078.7270145}, "raw_imports": ["@/store/ui", "vue"], "raw_calls": [], "raw_assets": [], "inbound_paths": [], "outbound_paths": ["app/flowork_architect/backend/parsers/vue.py"]}, "flowork-gui/template/web/src/components/DebugPopup.vue": {"id": 1061, "content": "//#######################################################################\n// WEBSITE https://flowork.cloud\n// File NAME : C:\\FLOWORK\\flowork-gui\\template\\web\\src\\components\\DebugPopup.vue total lines 292 \n//#1. Dynamic Component Discovery (DCD): Hub wajib melakukan scanning file secara otomatis.\n//#2. Lazy Loading: Modul hanya di-import ke RAM saat dipanggil (On-Demand).\n//#3. Atomic Isolation: 1 File = 1 Fungsi dengan nama file yang identik dengan nama fungsi aslinya.\n//#4. Zero Logic Mutation: Dilarang merubah alur logika, nama variabel, atau struktur if/try/loop.\n//#######################################################################\n\n<template>\n  <v-dialog\n    v-model=\"isOpen\"\n    :max-width=\"800\"\n    :persistent=\"autoCloseTimer > 0\"\n    class=\"debug-popup-dialog\"\n    transition=\"dialog-bottom-transition\"\n  >\n    <div :class=\"['debug-container', currentThemeClass]\">\n\n      <div v-if=\"isRetro\" class=\"crt-scanline\"></div>\n      <div v-if=\"isRetro\" class=\"crt-flicker\"></div>\n\n      <div class=\"debug-header d-flex align-center justify-space-between pa-4\">\n        <div class=\"d-flex align-center\">\n          <v-icon :icon=\"headerIcon\" :color=\"themeColor\" class=\"mr-3 icon-pulse\"></v-icon>\n          <span class=\"text-h6 font-weight-bold font-mono glitch-text\" :data-text=\"title\">\n            {{ title }}\n          </span>\n        </div>\n        <div class=\"d-flex align-center\">\n          <span v-if=\"timeLeft > 0\" class=\"text-caption mr-3 text-red font-weight-bold blink-text\">\n            CLOSING IN {{ timeLeft }}s\n          </span>\n          <v-btn icon variant=\"text\" @click=\"closePopup\" :color=\"themeColor\">\n            <v-icon>mdi-close</v-icon>\n          </v-btn>\n        </div>\n      </div>\n\n      <v-divider :color=\"themeColor\"></v-divider>\n\n      <div class=\"debug-content pa-4\">\n        <div class=\"code-wrapper\">\n            <div class=\"line-numbers text-grey-darken-2 text-caption mr-2 text-end\">\n               <div v-for=\"n in 10\" :key=\"n\">{{ n * 10 }}</div>\n            </div>\n            <pre class=\"code-block\" :style=\"{ color: themeTextColor }\">{{ content }}</pre>\n        </div>\n      </div>\n\n      <div class=\"debug-footer pa-2 px-4 d-flex justify-space-between align-center\">\n        <div class=\"text-caption text-grey\">\n          <v-icon size=\"x-small\" class=\"mr-1\">mdi-server-network</v-icon>\n          ENGINE::RUNTIME_EVENT\n        </div>\n        <v-btn\n          size=\"small\"\n          variant=\"outlined\"\n          :color=\"themeColor\"\n          class=\"hacker-btn\"\n          @click=\"copyToClipboard\"\n        >\n          <v-icon start>mdi-content-copy</v-icon>\n          COPY DATA\n        </v-btn>\n      </div>\n    </div>\n  </v-dialog>\n</template>\n\n<script setup>\nimport { ref, computed, onMounted, onUnmounted, watch } from 'vue';\nimport { useSocketStore } from '@/store/socket';\n\nconst socketStore = useSocketStore();\n\nconst isOpen = ref(false);\nconst title = ref('System Message');\nconst content = ref('');\nconst theme = ref('Default');\nconst autoCloseTimer = ref(0);\nconst timeLeft = ref(0);\nlet intervalId = null;\n\nconst currentThemeClass = computed(() => {\n  const t = theme.value.toLowerCase();\n  if (t.includes('matrix')) return 'theme-matrix';\n  if (t.includes('cyberpunk')) return 'theme-cyberpunk';\n  if (t.includes('minimalist')) return 'theme-minimalist';\n  return 'theme-default';\n});\n\nconst isRetro = computed(() => {\n  return currentThemeClass.value === 'theme-matrix' || currentThemeClass.value === 'theme-cyberpunk';\n});\n\nconst themeColor = computed(() => {\n  if (currentThemeClass.value === 'theme-matrix') return '#00ff00';\n  if (currentThemeClass.value === 'theme-cyberpunk') return '#00f3ff';\n  return 'white';\n});\n\nconst themeTextColor = computed(() => {\n  if (currentThemeClass.value === 'theme-matrix') return '#00ff00';\n  if (currentThemeClass.value === 'theme-cyberpunk') return '#e0fbfc';\n  return '#e0e0e0';\n});\n\nconst headerIcon = computed(() => {\n  if (currentThemeClass.value === 'theme-matrix') return 'mdi-console';\n  if (currentThemeClass.value === 'theme-cyberpunk') return 'mdi-robot-industrial';\n  return 'mdi-information-outline';\n});\n\nlet offListener = null;\n\nfunction setupListener() {\n  if (!socketStore.socket) return;\n\n  const handler = (payload) => {\n    if (payload.event === 'SHOW_DEBUG_POPUP' || (payload.type && payload.type.includes('DEBUG'))) {\n        const data = payload.payload || payload; // Handle wrapped or raw\n\n        title.value = data.title || 'Debug Info';\n\n        if (typeof data.content === 'object') {\n            content.value = JSON.stringify(data.content, null, 2);\n        } else {\n            content.value = data.content;\n        }\n\n        const config = data.config || {};\n        theme.value = config.theme || 'Default';\n        autoCloseTimer.value = config.auto_close || 0;\n\n        openPopup();\n    }\n  };\n\n  socketStore.socket.on('SHOW_DEBUG_POPUP', handler);\n  socketStore.socket.on('message', (msg) => {\n      if(msg.type === 'SHOW_DEBUG_POPUP') handler(msg);\n  });\n\n  return () => {\n    socketStore.socket.off('SHOW_DEBUG_POPUP', handler);\n  };\n}\n\nfunction openPopup() {\n  isOpen.value = true;\n\n  if (autoCloseTimer.value > 0) {\n    timeLeft.value = autoCloseTimer.value;\n    if (intervalId) clearInterval(intervalId);\n\n    intervalId = setInterval(() => {\n      timeLeft.value--;\n      if (timeLeft.value <= 0) {\n        closePopup();\n      }\n    }, 1000);\n  }\n}\n\nfunction closePopup() {\n  isOpen.value = false;\n  if (intervalId) clearInterval(intervalId);\n}\n\nfunction copyToClipboard() {\n  navigator.clipboard.writeText(content.value);\n}\n\nwatch(() => socketStore.isConnected, (connected) => {\n  if (connected) {\n    if (offListener) offListener();\n    offListener = setupListener();\n  }\n});\n\nonMounted(() => {\n  if (socketStore.isConnected) {\n    offListener = setupListener();\n  }\n});\n\nonUnmounted(() => {\n  if (offListener) offListener();\n  if (intervalId) clearInterval(intervalId);\n});\n</script>\n\n<style scoped>\n@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Fira+Code:wght@400;700&family=Orbitron:wght@500;900&display=swap');\n\n.debug-popup-dialog {\n  overflow: hidden;\n}\n\n.debug-container {\n  position: relative;\n  display: flex;\n  flex-direction: column;\n  max-height: 80vh;\n  overflow: hidden;\n  border-radius: 12px;\n  transition: all 0.3s ease;\n}\n\n.font-mono { font-family: 'Orbitron', sans-serif; letter-spacing: 1px; }\n.code-wrapper { display: flex; height: 400px; overflow: hidden; font-family: 'Fira Code', monospace; }\n.code-block { overflow: auto; width: 100%; font-size: 0.85rem; line-height: 1.5; }\n.line-numbers { opacity: 0.3; font-size: 0.8rem; padding-top: 2px; user-select: none; }\n\n/* --- THEME: DEFAULT --- */\n.theme-default {\n  background-color: #1e1e2e;\n  border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);\n  color: white;\n}\n\n/* --- THEME: MATRIX GREEN --- */\n.theme-matrix {\n  background-color: #000000;\n  border: 2px solid #00ff00;\n  box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.2);\n  color: #00ff00;\n}\n.theme-matrix .debug-header { background-color: rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.1); }\n.theme-matrix .hacker-btn { border-color: #00ff00; color: #00ff00; }\n\n/* --- THEME: CYBERPUNK NEON --- */\n.theme-cyberpunk {\n  background-color: #0b001a;\n  border: 2px solid #00f3ff;\n  box-shadow: 0 0 15px #00f3ff, inset 0 0 20px rgba(255, 0, 255, 0.1);\n  color: #00f3ff;\n}\n.theme-cyberpunk .debug-header {\n  background: linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(0, 243, 255, 0.2), transparent);\n  border-bottom: 1px solid #ff00ff;\n}\n\n/* --- ANIMATIONS (CRT / GLITCH) --- */\n.crt-scanline {\n  width: 100%; height: 100px; z-index: 10;\n  background: linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(0,0,0,0) 0%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.04) 50%, rgba(0,0,0,0) 100%);\n  opacity: 0.1; position: absolute; bottom: 100%;\n  animation: scanline 10s linear infinite; pointer-events: none;\n}\n.crt-flicker {\n  width: 100%; height: 100%; position: absolute; z-index: 9;\n  background: rgba(18, 16, 16, 0.02); opacity: 0; pointer-events: none;\n  animation: flicker 0.15s infinite;\n}\n\n@keyframes scanline {\n  0% { bottom: 100%; }\n  100% { bottom: -100%; }\n}\n@keyframes flicker {\n  0% { opacity: 0.02; }\n  50% { opacity: 0.05; }\n  100% { opacity: 0.02; }\n}\n\n.icon-pulse { animation: pulse 2s infinite; }\n@keyframes pulse { 0% { opacity: 1; } 50% { opacity: 0.5; } 100% { opacity: 1; } }\n\n.blink-text { animation: blink 1s infinite; }\n@keyframes blink { 50% { opacity: 0; } }\n\n.glitch-text {\n  position: relative;\n}\n.glitch-text::before, .glitch-text::after {\n  content: attr(data-text); position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; opacity: 0.8;\n}\n.theme-cyberpunk .glitch-text::before {\n  color: #ff00ff; z-index: -1; animation: glitch-anim-1 2s infinite linear alternate-reverse;\n}\n.theme-cyberpunk .glitch-text::after {\n  color: #00f3ff; z-index: -2; animation: glitch-anim-2 3s infinite linear alternate-reverse;\n}\n\n@keyframes glitch-anim-1 {\n  0% { clip-path: inset(20% 0 80% 0); transform: translate(-2px, 1px); }\n  100% { clip-path: inset(60% 0 10% 0); transform: translate(2px, -1px); "//#######################################################################\n// WEBSITE https://flowork.cloud\n// File NAME : C:\\FLOWORK\\flowork-gui\\template\\web\\src\\components\\DigitalFingerprintBackground.vue total lines 198 \n//#1. Dynamic Component Discovery (DCD): Hub wajib melakukan scanning file secara otomatis.\n//#2. Lazy Loading: Modul hanya di-import ke RAM saat dipanggil (On-Demand).\n//#3. Atomic Isolation: 1 File = 1 Fungsi dengan nama file yang identik dengan nama fungsi aslinya.\n//#4. Zero Logic Mutation: Dilarang merubah alur logika, nama variabel, atau struktur if/try/loop.\n//#######################################################################\n\n<template>\n  <canvas ref=\"canvasEl\" class=\"digital-fingerprint-canvas\"></canvas>\n</template>\n\n<script setup>\nimport { ref, onMounted, onUnmounted } from 'vue';\n\nconst canvasEl = ref(null);\nlet animationFrameId = null;\nlet ctx = null;\nlet particles = [];\nlet noise;\nlet noiseSeed = Math.random() * 1000;\nlet frame = 0;\nconst mouse = {\n  x: window.innerWidth / 2,\n  y: window.innerHeight / 2,\n  radius: 150\n};\n\nconst PerlinNoise = function() {\n  this.p = new Uint8Array(512);\n  const permutation = Array.from({length: 256}, (_, i) => i);\n  permutation.sort(() => Math.random() - 0.5);\n  for (let i=0; i < 256; i++) {\n    this.p[i] = this.p[i + 256] = permutation[i];\n  }\n\n  const fade = t => t * t * t * (t * (t * 6 - 15) + 10);\n  const lerp = (t, a, b) => a + t * (b - a);\n  const grad = (hash, x, y, z) => {\n    const h = hash & 15;\n    const u = h < 8 ? x : y;\n    const v = h < 4 ? y : h === 12 || h === 14 ? x : z;\n    return ((h & 1) === 0 ? u : -u) + ((h & 2) === 0 ? v : -v);\n  };\n\n  this.noise = (x, y, z) => {\n    const p = this.p;\n    const X = Math.floor(x) & 255;\n    const Y = Math.floor(y) & 255;\n    const Z = Math.floor(z) & 255;\n    x -= Math.floor(x);\n    y -= Math.floor(y);\n    z -= Math.floor(z);\n    const u = fade(x);\n    const v = fade(y);\n    const w = fade(z);\n    const A = p[X] + Y, AA = p[A] + Z, AB = p[A + 1] + Z;\n    const B = p[X + 1] + Y, BA = p[B] + Z, BB = p[B + 1] + Z;\n\n    return lerp(w, lerp(v, lerp(u, grad(p[AA], x, y, z),\n                                     grad(p[BA], x - 1, y, z)),\n                             lerp(u, grad(p[AB], x, y - 1, z),\n                                     grad(p[BB], x - 1, y - 1, z))),\n                     lerp(v, lerp(u, grad(p[AA + 1], x, y, z - 1),\n                                     grad(p[BA + 1], x - 1, y, z - 1)),\n                             lerp(u, grad(p[AB + 1], x, y - 1, z - 1),\n                                     grad(p[BB + 1], x - 1, y - 1, z - 1))));\n  };\n};\n\nclass Particle {\n  constructor(x, y, color) {\n    this.x = x;\n    this.y = y;\n    this.color = color;\n    this.history = [];\n    this.life = Math.random() * 200 + 100;\n  }\n\n  update(width, height, noise) {\n    const n = noise.noise(this.x * 0.001, this.y * 0.001, frame * 0.001);\n    const angle = n * Math.PI * 4;\n\n    const speed = 1.5;\n    this.x += Math.cos(angle) * speed;\n    this.y += Math.sin(angle) * speed;\n\n    this.history.push({ x: this.x, y: this.y });\n    if (this.history.length > 20) {\n      this.history.shift();\n    }\n\n    this.life--;\n\n    if (this.x > width || this.x < 0 || this.y > height || this.y < 0 || this.life <= 0) {\n      this.reset(width, height);\n    }\n  }\n\n  reset(width, height) {\n    this.x = Math.random() * width;\n    this.y = Math.random() * height;\n    this.history = [];\n    this.life = Math.random() * 200 + 100;\n  }\n\n  draw(ctx) {\n    ctx.beginPath();\n    ctx.moveTo(this.history[0]?.x || this.x, this.history[0]?.y || this.y);\n    for (let i = 1; i < this.history.length; i++) {\n      ctx.lineTo(this.history[i].x, this.history[i].y);\n    }\n\n    const dx = this.x - mouse.x;\n    const dy = this.y - mouse.y;\n    const distance = Math.sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);\n    let opacity = 0.2;\n\n    if (distance < mouse.radius) {\n      opacity = (1 - (distance / mouse.radius)) * 0.8 + 0.2;\n    }\n\n    ctx.strokeStyle = `rgba(${this.color}, ${opacity})`;\n    ctx.lineWidth = 1;\n    ctx.stroke();\n  }\n}\n\nconst setupCanvas = () => {\n  const canvas = canvasEl.value;\n  if (!canvas) return;\n  ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');\n  noise = new PerlinNoise();\n\n  const resizeCanvas = () => {\n    canvas.width = window.innerWidth;\n    canvas.height = window.innerHeight;\n\n    particles = [];\n    const particleCount = Math.floor((canvas.width * canvas.height) / 8000);\n    const colors = [ \"0, 245, 255\", \"191, 0, 255\" ]; // Cyan, Purple\n\n    for (let i = 0; i < particleCount; i++) {\n      particles.push(new Particle(\n        Math.random() * canvas.width,\n        Math.random() * canvas.height,\n        colors[i % colors.length]\n      ));\n    }\n  };\n\n  const animate = () => {\n    ctx.fillStyle = 'rgba(10, 15, 30, 0.1)';\n    ctx.fillRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);\n\n    particles.forEach(p => {\n      p.update(canvas.width, canvas.height, noise);\n      p.draw(ctx);\n    });\n\n    frame++;\n    animationFrameId = requestAnimationFrame(animate);\n  };\n\n  const handleMouseMove = (e) => {\n    mouse.x = e.clientX;\n    mouse.y = e.clientY;\n  };\n\n  window.addEventListener('resize', resizeCanvas);\n  window.addEventListener('mousemove', handleMouseMove);\n\n  resizeCanvas();\n  animate();\n\n  onUnmounted(() => {\n    window.removeEventListener('resize', resizeCanvas);\n    window.removeEventListener('mousemove', handleMouseMove);\n    if (animationFrameId) {\n      cancelAnimationFrame(animationFrameId);\n    }\n  });\n};\n\nonMounted(() => {\n  setupCanvas();\n});\n</script>\n\n<style scoped>\n.digital-fingerprint-canvas {\n  position: absolute;\n  top: 0;\n  left: 0;\n  width: 100%;\n  height: 100%;\n  z-index: 0;\n  opacity: 0.5;\n}\n</style>\n", "structure": [{"name": "Template", "type": "ui", "line": 667, "icon": "fa-window-maximize"}], "organs": [], "metrics": {"loc": 201, "complexity": i < columns; i++) {\n      drops[i] = 1;\n    }\n  };\n\n  const draw = () => {\n    ctx.fillStyle = 'rgba(10, 15, 30, 0.1)';\n    ctx.fillRect(0, 0, width, height);\n\n    ctx.fillStyle = '#0f0'; // Warna hijau Matrix\n    ctx.font = `${fontSize}px Fira Code`;\n\n    for (let i = 0; i < drops.length; i++) {\n      const text = characters[Math.floor(Math.random() * characters.length)];\n      ctx.fillText(text, i * fontSize, drops[i] * fontSize);\n\n      if (drops[i] * fontSize > height && Math.random() > 0.975) {\n        drops[i] = 0;\n      }\n      drops[i]++;\n    }\n  };\n\n  const animate = () => {\n    draw();\n    animationFrameId = requestAnimationFrame(animate);\n  };\n\n  resizeCanvas();\n  window.addEventListener('resize', resizeCanvas);\n  animate();\n};\n\nonMounted(() => {\n  setupDigitalRain();\n});\n\nonUnmounted(() => {\n  if (animationFrameId) {\n    cancelAnimationFrame(animationFrameId);\n  }\n  window.removeEventListener('resize', setupDigitalRain);\n});\n</script>\n\n<style scoped>\n.digital-rain-canvas {\n  position: absolute;        :placeholder=\"field.placeholder || 'Select AI Model'\"\n          variant=\"outlined\"\n          density=\"compact\"\n          hide-details=\"auto\"\n          class=\"hacker-input\"\n          prepend-inner-icon=\"mdi-brain\"\n          clearable\n        >\n            <template v-slot:item=\"{ props, item }\">\n                <v-list-item v-bind=\"props\" :subtitle=\"item.raw.id\" :placeholder=\"field.placeholder || 'Select Prompt Template OR type variable path'\"\n          variant=\"outlined\"\n          density=\"compact\"\n          hide-details=\"auto\"\n          class=\"hacker-input\"\n          prepend-inner-icon=\"mdi-text-box-search-outline\"\n          clearable\n        >\n            <template v-slot:selection=\"{ item }\">\n                <span class=\"text-truncate text-caption font-weight-bold text-white\">\n                    {{ (typeof item.raw === 'object' ? item.raw.title : item.raw) || item.title }}\n                </span>\n            </template>\n\n            <template v-slot:item=\"{ props, item }\">\n                <v-list-item v-bind=\"props\" :title=\"item.raw.title\" class=\"prompt-list-item\">\n                    <template v-slot:subtitle>\n                        <div class=\"text-caption text-grey-darken-1 text-truncate\">\n                            {{ item.raw.content ? item.raw.content.substring(0, 60) + '...' : 'No content' }}\n                        </div>\n                    </template>\n                </v-list-item>\n            </template>\n        </v-combobox>\n        <div class=\"text-caption text-grey mt-1 ml-1\" style=\"font-size: 10px;\">\n            Select a saved template OR type a variable path (e.g. <code>data.prompt</code>).\n        </div>\n      </div>\n\n      <div v-else-if=\"field.component === 'folder_picker' || field.type === 'folderpath'\">\n        <div class=\"field-label\">{{ field.label }} <span v-if=\"field.required\" class=\"text-red\">*</span></div>\n        <v-text-field\n          v-model=\"modelValue[field.id]\"\n          :placeholder=\"field.placeholder || '/path/to/folder'\"\n <template #append-inner>\n            <v-icon @click=\"openGlobalFileBrowser(field.id, 'folder')\" color=\"cyan\" class=\"cursor-pointer\">\n              mdi-folder-search\n            </v-icon>\n          </template>\n        </v-text-field>\n      </div>\n\n      <div v-else-if=\"field.component === 'file_picker' || field.type === 'file' || field.type === 'filepath'\">\n        <div    class=\"hacker-input\"\n        ></v-text-field>\n      </div>\n\n      <div v-else-if=\"field.type === 'number' || field.type === 'integer'\">\n        <div class=\"field-label\">{{ field.label    v-model=\"modelValue[field.id]\"\n          variant=\"outlined\"\n          rows=\"10\"\n          density=\"compact\"\n          class=\"hacker-input font-mono\"\n        ></v-textarea>\n      </div>\n\n      <div v-else class=\"text-caption text-red border-thin pa-2\">\n        [Unknown Field Type: {{ field.type }}]\n      </div>\n\n      <div v-if=\"field.description && field.component !== 'header'\" class=\"text-caption text-grey mt-1 ml-1\">\n        {{ field.description }}\n      </div>\n    </div>\n\n    <FileBrowserModal\n        v-model=\"isGlobalBrowserOpen\"\n        :initial-path=\"globalBrowserPath\"\n        :selection-mode=\"globalBrowserMode\"\n        @select=\"onGlobalFileSelected\"\n    />\n  </div>\n</template>\n\n<script setup>\nimport { ref, onMounted } from 'vue';\nimport FolderPairList from '@/components/custom-properties/FolderPairList.vue';\nimport FileBrowserModal from '@/components/custom-properties/FileBrowserModal.vue';\n\nconst props = defineProps({\n  schema: { type: Array, required: true, default: () => [] },\n  modelValue: { type: Object, required: true, default: () => ({}) },\n  aiProviders: { type: Array, default: () => [] },\n  prompts: { type: Array, default: () => [] }\n});\n\nconst emit = defineEmits(['update:modelValue']);\n\nconst isGlobalBrowserOpen = ref(false);\nconst globalBrowserTargetId = ref(null);\nconst globalBrowserPath = ref('');\nconst globalBrowserMode = ref('folder');\n\nfunction openGlobalFileBrowser(fieldId, mode = 'folder') {\n  globalBrowserTargetId.value = fieldId;\n  globalBrowserMode.value = mode;\n  globalBrowserPath.value = props.modelValue[fieldId] || '';\n  isGlobalBrowserOpen.value = true;\n}\n\nfunction onGlobalFileSelected(path) {\n  if (globalBrowserTargetId.value) {\n    const newData = { ...props.modelValue };\n    newData[globalBrowserTargetId.value] = path;\n    emit('update:modelValue', newData);\n  }\n  isGlobalBrowserOpen.value = false;\n}\n\nonMounted(() => {\n  const initialData = { ...props.modelValue };\n  let hasChanges = false;\n\n  props.schema.forEach(field => {\n    if (field.component === 'header') return;\n    if (initialData[field.id] === undefined && field.default !== undefined) {\n      initialData[field.id] = field.default;\n      hasChanges = true;\n    }\n    if (field.type === 'list' && !Array.isArray(initialData[field.id])) {\n        initialData[field.id] = [];\n        hasChanges = true;\n    }\n  });\n\n  if (hasChanges) {\n    emit('update:modelValue', initialData);\n  }\n});\n</script>\n\n<style scoped>\n.field-label {\n  font-size: 0.75rem;\n  text-transform: uppercase;\n  letter-spacing: 1px;\n  color: var(--text-secondary);\n  margin-bottom: 6px;\n  font-family: </div>\n        </div>\n\n        <div class=\"config-cluster\">\n          <div class=\"config-item\" :class=\"{ active: loopEnabled }\">\n            <div class=\"config-label\" @click=\"loopEnabled         <button :class=\"{ active: activeTab === 'logic' }\" @click=\"setDesignerMode('logic')\">LOGIC</button>\n          <button :class=\"{ active: activeTab === 'data' }\"
