</div>\n  </div>\n</template>\n\n<script setup>\nimport { ref, onMounted, watch } from 'vue';\nimport { useWorkflowStore } from '@/store/workflow';\nimport { useUiStore } from '@/store/ui';\nimport { storeToRefs } from 'pinia';\nimport { getPresets } from '@/api';\n\nconst workflowStore = useWorkflowStore();\nconst uiStore = useUiStore();\nconst { currentPresetName } = storeToRefs(workflowStore);\nconst { loadWorkflow, saveCurrentWorkflow } = workflowStore;\n\nconst presetList = ref([]);\nconst presetsLoading = ref(false);\nconst loopEnabled = ref(false);\nconst loopTimes = ref(1);\nconst delayEnabled = ref(false);\nconst activeTab = ref('logic');\n\nwatch(() => uiStore.designerMode, (newMode) => {\n  if (['logic', 'data'].includes(newMode) && !uiStore.activeRightPanel) {\n    activeTab.value = newMode;\n  }\n});\nwatch(() => uiStore.activeRightPanel, (newPanel) => {\n  if (newPanel === 'log') activeTab.value = 'logs';\n  else activeTab.value = uiStore.designerMode;\n});\n\nfunction setDesignerMode(mode) {\n  uiStore.setDesignerMode(mode);\n  uiStore.closeRightPanel();\n}\nfunction setRightPanel(panel) {\n  uiStore.setActiveRightPanel(panel);\n}\nfunction handleExecution(mode) {\n    const execConfig = { loop: loopEnabled.value ? loopTimes.value : 1 };\n    if (mode === 'SIMULATE') workflowStore.simulateCurrentWorkflow(execConfig);\n    else workflowStore.executeCurrentWorkflow(execConfig);\n}\nfunction handlePresetLoad(val) { if(val) loadWorkflow(val); }\nasync function handlePresetSave() {\n  const newName = prompt(\"Save preset as:\", currentPresetName.value || '');\n  if (newName?.trim()) await saveCurrentWorkflow(newName.trim());\n}\n\nonMounted(async () => {\n  presetsLoading.value = true;\n  try {\n    const presets = await getPresets();\n    presetList.value = presets.map(p => p.name);\n  } catch (error) { console.error(error); }\n  finally { presetsLoading.value = false; }\n});\n</script>\n\n<style scoped>\n/* === CORE CONTAINER === */\n.floating-footer-container {\n  position: fixed;\n  bottom: 20px;\n  left: 50%;\n  transform: "//#######################################################################\n// WEBSITE https://flowork.cloud\n// File NAME : C:\\FLOWORK\\flowork-gui\\template\\web\\src\\components\\GlobalWidgetOverlay.vue total lines 115 \n//#1. Dynamic Component Discovery (DCD): Hub wajib melakukan scanning file secara otomatis.\n//#2. Lazy Loading: Modul hanya di-import ke RAM saat dipanggil (On-Demand).\n//#3. Atomic Isolation: 1 File = 1 Fungsi dengan nama file yang identik dengan nama fungsi aslinya.\n//#4. Zero Logic Mutation: Dilarang merubah alur logika, nama variabel, atau struktur if/try/loop.\n//#######################################################################\n\n<template>\n  <div class=\"global-widget-overlay\" :class=\"{ 'hidden-mode': !isVisible }\">\n    <div\n      v-for=\"w in activeWidgets\"\n      :key=\"w.instanceId\"\n      v-show=\"w.instanceId === currentTab\"\n      class=\"widget-wrapper\"\n    >\n      <iframe\n        :id=\"`iframe-${w.instanceId}`\"\n        :src=\"resolveWidgetUrl(w)\"\n        class=\"widget-frame\"\n        sandbox=\"allow-scripts return route.path === '/widgets' && activeWidgets.value.length > 0;\n});\n\nconst resolveWidgetUrl = (widget) => {\n    if (widget.source === 'cloud') {\n        return widget.targetUrl;\n    } else {\n        return `${getGatewayUrl()}${widget.targetUrl}`;\n    }\n};\n\nconst onIframeLoad = async (w) => {\n    const dataKey = `widget_${w.id}_data`;\n    try {\n        const response = await apiClient.get(`/variables/${dataKey}`);\n        let variableData = response.data;\n        if (!variableData || variableData.value === null) return;\n\n        let savedData = null;\n        try {\n            savedData = JSON.parse(variableData.value);\n            if (typeof savedData === 'string' && (savedData.trim().startsWith('{') || savedData.trim().startsWith('['))) {\n                 savedData = JSON.parse(savedData);\n            }\n        } catch(e) { savedData = variableData.value; }\n\n        const iframe = document.getElementById(`iframe-${w.instanceId}`);\n        if (iframe) iframe.contentWindow.postMessage({ type: 'CMD_LOAD', payload: savedData }, '*');\n    } catch (e) {\n    }\n};\n</script>\n\n<style scoped>\n.global-widget-overlay {\n  position: fixed;\n  /* useMarketplaceStore } from '@/store/marketplace';\nimport { useWorkflowStore } from '@/store/workflow';\nimport { storeToRefs } from 'pinia';\n\nconst props = defineProps({\n  modelValue: Boolean,\n  existingItem: {\n      type: Object,\n      default: null\n  }\n});\nconst emit = defineEmits(['update:modelValue', 'published']);\n\nconst marketplaceStore = useMarketplaceStore();\nconst workflowStore = useWorkflowStore();\nconst { isPublishing } = storeToRefs(marketplaceStore);\nconst { currentPresetName } = storeToRefs(workflowStore);\n\nconst isSmartPackage = computed(() => !!props.existingItem && props.existingItem.source === 'smart_package');\nconst isEditMode = computed(() => !!props.existingItem && props.existingItem.source !== 'smart_package');\n\nconst dialogTitle = computed(() => {\n    if (isEditMode.value) return 'Edit Marketplace Item';\n    if (isSmartPackage.value) return `Publish ${props.existingItem.componentType || 'Item'}`;\n    return 'Publish Workflow Preset';\n});\n\nconst submitButtonText = computed(() => {\n    if (isEditMode.value) return 'Update Item';\n    if (isSmartPackage.value) return 'Publish Smart Package';\n    return 'Publish Now';\n});\n\nconst formData = ref({\n  id: '',\n  name: '',\n  desc: '',\n  price: 0,\n  zip_data: null\n});\n\nwatch(() => props.modelValue, (isOpen) => {\n  if (isOpen) {\n    if (props.existingItem) {\n        if (props.existingItem.source === 'smart_package') {\n            const data = props.existingItem.data;\n            formData.value = {\n                id: '',\n                name: data.name || data.id,\n                desc: data.description || '',\n                price: 0,\n                zip_data: data.zip_data // The Base64 Zip\n            };\n        } else {\n            formData.value = {\n                id: props.existingItem.id,\n                name: props.existingItem.name,\n                desc: props.existingItem.desc || props.existingItem.description || '',\n                price: props.existingItem.price || 0,\n                zip_data: null\n            };\n        }\n    } else {\n        formData.value = {\n            id: '',\n            name: currentPresetName.value || '',\n            desc: '',\n            price: 0,\n            zip_data: null\n        };\n    }\n  }\n});\n\nasync function handlePublish() {\n  formData.value.price = 0;\n  let success = false;\n\n  if (isSmartPackage.value) {\n      const payload = {\n          type: props.existingItem.componentType, // e.g., 'module'\n          name: formData.value.name,\n          description: formData.value.desc,\n          price: 0,\n          zip_file: formData.value.zip_data // Base64 content\n      };\n      success = await marketplaceStore.publishSmartPackage(payload);\n\n  } else if (isEditMode.value) {\n      const payload = {\n          id: formData.value.id,\n          type: props.existingItem.type || 'preset',\n          name: formData.value.name,\n          desc: formData.value.desc,\n          price: 0,\n          data: props.existingItem.data\n      };\n      success = await marketplaceStore.publishComponent(payload);\n\n  } else {\n      success = await marketplaceStore.publishCurrentWorkflow(formData.value);\n  }\n\n  if (success) {\n    emit('update:modelValue', false);\n    emit('published');\n  }\n}\n</script>\n\n<style scoped>\n.dialog-card {\n  background-color: #2a2a4a;\n  border: 1px solid var(--neon-cyan);\n}\n.orbitron-font {\n  font-family: event.dataTransfer.setData('application/json', JSON.stringify({ type: item.componentType || 'module', id: item.id }));\n  event.dataTransfer.effectAllowed = 'move';\n};\n\nconst onDragEnd = () => {\n  console.log('Drag ended.');\n};\n\nconst triggerSmartPublish = async (item, categoryId) => {\n  try {\n    packagingId.value = item.id;\n    console.log(`Initiating smart package for ${item.id} from ${categoryId}`);\n\n    const typeMap = {\n      'modules': 'module',\n      'plugins': 'plugin',\n      'widgets': 'widget',\n      'triggers': 'trigger'\n    };\n    const singularType = typeMap[categoryId] || 'module';\n\n    const response = await axios.post('/api/v1/components/package', {\n      type: singularType,\n      id: item.id\n    });\n\n    const packageData = response.data;\n\n    emit('publish-request', {\n      source: 'smart_package',\n      componentType: singularType,\n      data: packageData\n    });\n\n  } catch (error) {\n    console.error(\"Smart packaging failed:\", error);\n  } finally {\n    packagingId.value = null;\n  }\n};\n\nconst fetchComponents = async () => {\n  try {\n    await componentStore.fetchAllComponents();\n  } catch (err) "outbound_paths": ["app/flowork_architect/backend/parsers/vue.py"]}, "flowork-gui/template/web/src/components/NeuralCanvasBackground.vue": {"id": 1075, "content": "//#######################################################################\n// WEBSITE https://flowork.cloud\n// File NAME : C:\\FLOWORK\\flowork-gui\\template\\web\\src\\components\\NeuralCanvasBackground.vue total lines 143 \n//#1. Dynamic Component Discovery (DCD): Hub wajib melakukan scanning file secara otomatis.\n//#2. Lazy Loading: Modul hanya di-import ke RAM saat dipanggil (On-Demand).\n//#3. Atomic Isolation: 1 File = 1 Fungsi dengan nama file yang identik dengan nama fungsi aslinya.\n//#4. Zero Logic Mutation: Dilarang merubah alur logika, nama variabel, atau struktur if/try/loop.\n//#######################################################################\n\n<template>\n  <canvas ref=\"canvasEl\" class=\"neural-canvas\"></canvas>\n</template>\n\n<script setup>\nimport { ref, onMounted, onUnmounted } from 'vue';\n\nconst canvasEl = ref(null);\nlet animationFrameId = null;\nlet mouse = { x: null, y: null, radius: 150 };\n\nfunction handleMouseMove(event) {\n    mouse.x = event.clientX;\n    mouse.y = event.clientY;\n}\n\nconst setupCanvasAnimation = () => {\n    const canvas = canvasEl.value; if (!canvas) return;\n    const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');\n    let particles = [];\n\n    const resizeCanvas = () => {\n        if(canvas) {\n            canvas.width = window.innerWidth;\n            canvas.height = window.innerHeight;\n        }\n    };\n    resizeCanvas();\n    window.addEventListener('resize', resizeCanvas);\n    window.addEventListener('mousemove', handleMouseMove);\n\n    class Particle {\n        constructor(x, y, size, color, speedX, speedY) {\n            this.x = x; this.y = y;\n            this.originX = x;\n            this.originY = y;\n            this.size = size; this.color = color;\n            this.speedX = speedX; this.speedY = speedY;\n            this.density = (Math.random() * 30) + 1;\n        }\n        update() {\n            let dx = mouse.x - this.x;\n            let dy = mouse.y - this.y;\n            let distance = Math.sqrt(dx*dx + dy*dy);\n            if (distance < mouse.radius) {\n                let forceDirectionX = dx / distance;\n                let forceDirectionY = dy / distance;\n                let force = (mouse.radius - distance) / mouse.radius;\n                let directionX = forceDirectionX * force * this.density * 0.5;\n                let directionY = forceDirectionY * force * this.density * 0.5;\n                this.x -= directionX;\n                this.y -= directionY;\n            } else {\n                if (this.x !== this.originX) {\n                    let dx = this.x - this.originX;\n                    this.x -= dx/10;\n                }\n                if (this.y !== this.originY) {\n                    let dy = this.y - this.originY;\n                    this.y -= dy/10;\n                }\n            }\n            if (this.x > canvas.width || this.x < 0) this.speedX = -this.speedX;\n            if (this.y > canvas.height || this.y < 0) this.speedY = -this.speedY;\n            if (distance >= mouse.radius) {\n                this.x += this.speedX;\n                this.y += this.speedY;\n            }\n        }\n        draw() { ctx.fillStyle = this.color; ctx.beginPath(); ctx.arc(this.x, this.y, this.size, 0, Math.PI * 2); ctx.fill(); }\n    }\n\n    function init() {\n        particles = [];\n        let numberOfParticles = (canvas.height * canvas.width) / 9000;\n        for (let i = 0; i < numberOfParticles; i++) {\n            let size = (Math.random() * 2) + 1;\n            let x = Math.random() * (innerWidth - size * 4) + size * 2;\n            let y = Math.random() * (innerHeight - size * 4) + size * 2;\n            let speedX = (Math.random() * 0.4) - 0.2;\n            let speedY = (Math.random() * 0.4) - 0.2;\n            particles.push(new Particle(x, y, size, 'rgba(0, 245, 255, 0.5)', speedX, speedY));\n        }\n    }\n\n    function connect() {\n        let opacityValue = 1;\n        for (let a = 0; a < particles.length; a++) {\n            for (let b = a; b < particles.length; b++) {\n                let distance = ((particles[a].x - particles[b].x) * (particles[a].x - particles[b].x)) + ((particles[a].y - particles[b].y) * (particles[a].y - particles[b].y));\n                if (distance < (canvas.width / 7) * (canvas.height / 7)) {\n                    opacityValue = 1 - (distance / 20000);\n                    ctx.strokeStyle = `rgba(191, 0, 255, ${opacityValue})`;\n                    ctx.lineWidth = 1;\n                    ctx.beginPath();\n                    ctx.moveTo(particles[a].x, particles[a].y);\n                    ctx.lineTo(particles[b].x, particles[b].y);\n                    ctx.stroke();\n                }\n            }\n        }\n    }\n\n    function animate() {\n        animationFrameId = requestAnimationFrame(animate);\n        ctx.clearRect(0, 0, innerWidth, innerHeight);\n        particles.forEach(p => { p.update(); p.draw(); });\n        connect();\n    }\n\n    init();\n    animate();\n};\n\nonMounted(() => {\n  setupCanvasAnimation();\n});\n\nonUnmounted(() => {\n  if (animationFrameId) {\n    cancelAnimationFrame(animationFrameId);\n  }\n  window.removeEventListener('mousemove', handleMouseMove);\n});\n</script>\n\n<style scoped>\n.neural-canvas {\n  position: absolute;\n  top: 0;\n  left: 0;\n  width: 100%;\n  height: 100%;\n  z-index: 0;\n  opacity: 0.5;\n}\n</style>\n", "structure": [{"name": "Template", "type": "ui", "line": 661, "icon": "fa-window-maximize"}], "organs": [], "metrics": {"loc": 146, "complexity": "MEDIUM", "todo_count": 5243, "security_risks": [], "last_modified": 1767761078.7380464}, "raw_imports": ["vue"], "raw_calls": [], "raw_assets": [], "inbound_paths": [], "outbound_paths": ["app/flowork_architect/backend/parsers/vue.py"]}, "flowork-gui/template/web/src/components/NodeProperties.vue": {"id": 1076, "content": "//#######################################################################\n// WEBSITE https://flowork.cloud\n// File NAME : C:\\FLOWORK\\flowork-gui\\template\\web\\src\\components\\NodeProperties.vue total lines 187 \n//#1. </div>\n  </div>\n</template>\n\n<script setup>\nimport { computed } from 'vue';\nimport { storeToRefs } from 'pinia';\nimport { useWorkflowStore } from '@/store/workflow';\nimport { useComponentStore const manifest = nodeManifest.value;\n\n    if (!comp && !manifest) return [];\n\n    let rawProps = [];\n\n    if (comp && comp.nodes && Array.isArray(comp.nodes) && comp.nodes.length > 0) {\n        if (comp.nodes[0].inputs && comp.nodes[0].inputs.length > 0) {\n            rawProps = comp.nodes[0].inputs;\n        }\n    }\n\n    if (rawProps.length === 0 && manifest.nodes && }\n    }\n\n    if (rawProps.length === 0 && manifest.inputs && Array.isArray(manifest.inputs)) {\n        rawProps = manifest.inputs;\n    }\n\n    if (rawProps.length === 0 && manifest.properties && <v-btn icon=\"mdi-close\" size=\"small\" variant=\"text\" @click=\"fileBrowser.isOpen = false\"></v-btn>\n        </v-card-title>\n\n        <v-card-text>\n          <div class=\"d-flex align-center mb-2 bg-grey-darken-4 pa-2 rounded\">\n             <v-btn icon=\"mdi-arrow-up\" size=\"x-small\" variant=\"text\" color=\"grey\" class=\"mr-2\" @click=\"navigateUp\"></v-btn>\n             <span class=\"text-caption text-mono text-truncate\">{{ fileBrowser.currentPath || '/' }}</span>\n          </div>\n\n          <v-list density=\"compact\" bg-color=\"transparent\" class=\"file-list-scroll\">\n             <div v-if=\"fileBrowser.isLoading\" class=\"text-center pa-4\">\n                <v-progress-circular indeterminate color=\"cyan\" size=\"24\"></v-progress-circular>\n             </div>\n\n             <template v-else>\n                <div v-if=\"fileBrowser.items.length === 0\" class=\"text-center text-grey text-caption pa-4\">\n                   Empty Directory\n                </div>\n                <v-list-item\n                    v-for=\"item in fileBrowser.items\"\n                    :key=\"item.name\"\n                    @click=\"handleFileClick(item)\"\n                    :prepend-icon=\"item.type === 'dir' ? 'mdi-folder' : 'mdi-file'\"\n                    :base-color=\"item.type === 'dir' ? 'amber-lighten-3' : 'grey'\"\n                    class=\"rounded mb-1\"\n                >\n                    <v-list-item-title class=\"text-caption\">{{ item.name }}</v-list-item-title>\n                </v-list-item>\n             </template>\n          </v-list>\n        </v-card-text>\n\n        <v-card-actions class=\"pa-4 bg-grey-darken-4\">\n           <v-spacer></v-spacer>\n           <v-btn variant=\"text\" @click=\"fileBrowser.isOpen = false\">Cancel</v-btn>\n           <v-btn color=\"cyan\" variant=\"flat\" @click=\"selectCurrentPath\">Select This Folder</v-btn>\n        </v-card-actions>\n      </v-card>\n    </v-dialog>\n\n  </div>\n</template>\n\n<script setup>\nimport { computed, ref, reactive, watch } from 'vue';\nimport { storeToRefs } from 'pinia';\nimport { useWorkflowStore } from '@/store/workflow';\nimport { useLocaleStore } from '@/store/locale';\nimport { useUiStore } from '@/store/ui';\nimport { useComponentStore } from '@/store/components';\nimport { useSocketStore } from '@/store/socket'; // [NEW] Use socket for browsing\nimport FolderPairList from './custom-properties/FolderPairList.vue';\nimport CronEditor from './custom-properties/CronEditor.vue';\nimport DynamicKeyValueEditor from '@/components/custom-properties/DynamicKeyValueEditor.vue';\nimport DynamicFormRenderer from '@/components/DynamicFormRenderer.vue';\nimport api from '@/api';\n\nconst workflowStore = useWorkflowStore();\nconst localeStore = useLocaleStore();\nconst uiStore = useUiStore();\nconst componentStore = useComponentStore();\nconst socketStore = useSocketStore(); // [NEW]\n\nconst { selectedNode } = storeToRefs(workflowStore);\nconst { loc } = storeToRefs(localeStore);\n\nconst localConfig = ref({});\n\nwatch(selectedNode, (newNode) => {\n    if (newNode && newNode.data) {\n        localConfig.value = { ...(newNode.data.config_values || {}) };\n\n        nodeProperties.value.forEach(prop => {\n            if (localConfig.value[prop.id] === undefined && prop.default !== undefined) {\n                localConfig.value[prop.id] = prop.default;\n            }\n        });\n\n        console.log(\"[PropertiesPanel] Loaded config for node:\", newNode.id, localConfig.value);\n    } else {\n        localConfig.value = {};\n    }\n}, { immediate: true, deep: true });\n\nfunction updateConfig(key, value) {\n    if (!selectedNode.value) return;\n\n    localConfig.value[key] = value;\n\n    workflowStore.updateNodeConfig({\n      nodeId: selectedNode.value.id,\n      key,\n      value\n    });\n\n    console.log(`[PropertiesPanel] Config Updated: ${key} = ${value}`);\n}\n\nconst componentData = computed(() => {\n    if (!selectedNode.value?.data?.moduleId) return null;\n    return componentStore.findComponentById(selectedNode.value.data.moduleId);\n});\n\nconst nodeManifest = computed(() => componentData.value?.manifest || {});\n\nconst displayTitle = computed(() => {\n    return nodeManifest.value.name || selectedNode.value?.label || 'Node Properties';\n});\n\nconst nodeUiSchema = computed(() => {\n  return nodeManifest.value?.ui_schema || [];\n});\n\nconst nodeProperties = computed(() => {\n    const comp = componentData.value;\n    const manifest = nodeManifest.value;\n\n    if (!comp && !manifest) return [];\n\n    let rawProps = [];\n\n    if (comp?.nodes?.[0]?.inputs?.length > 0) {\n        rawProps = comp.nodes[0].inputs;\n    } else if (manifest.nodes?.[0]?.inputs?.length > 0) {\n        rawProps = manifest.nodes[0].inputs;\n    } else if (manifest.inputs?.length > 0) {\n        rawProps = manifest.inputs;\n    } else if (manifest.properties?.length > 0) {\n        rawProps = manifest.properties;\n    }\n\n    return rawProps.map(p => ({\n        ...p,\n        id: p.id || p.name,\n        label: p.label || p.name || 'Unnamed Parameter',\n        type: p.type || 'string',\n        options: p.options || [],\n        placeholder: p.placeholder || '',\n        description: p.description || '',\n        default: p.default\n    }));\n});\n\nconst isPathProperty = (prop) => {\n    if (prop.type === 'folderpath') return true;\n    if (prop.type !== 'string') return false;\n\n    const name = (prop.id || prop.name || '').toLowerCase();\n    const label = (prop.label || '').toLowerCase();\n\n    const keywords = ['dir', 'path', 'folder', 'directory', 'file', 'location', 'source', 'destination'];\n    return keywords.some(k => name.includes(k) || label.includes(k));\n};\n\nfunction handleDynamicFormUpdate(newConfig) {\n  if (!selectedNode.value) return;\n  Object.keys(newConfig).forEach(key => {\n    if (localConfig.value[key] !== newConfig[key]) {\n      updateConfig(key, newConfig[key]);\n    }\n  });\n}\n\nconst fileBrowser = reactive({\n    isOpen: false,\n    isLoading: false,\n    currentPath: '/app/data/users/system',\n    items: [],\n    targetField: null\n});\n\nfunction openFileBrowser(fieldId) {\n    fileBrowser.targetField = fieldId;\n    const currentVal = localConfig.value[fieldId];\n    if (currentVal && currentVal.startsWith('/')) {\n        fileBrowser.currentPath = currentVal;\n    } else {\n        fileBrowser.currentPath = '/app/data/users/system';\n    }\n    fileBrowser.isOpen = true;\n    fetchFiles(fileBrowser.currentPath);\n}\n\nasync function fetchFiles(path) {\n    fileBrowser.isLoading = true;\n    try {\n        const res = await api.post('/api/v1/system/browse', {\n            path,\n            engine_id: socketStore.engineId // Kirim engine ID biar gateway tau mau browse siapa\n        });\n\n        if (res.data && Array.isArray(res.data)) {\n             fileBrowser.items = res.data;\n        } else {\n             fileBrowser.items = [];\n             uiStore.showNotification({ text: 'Empty directory or access denied.', color: 'warning' });\n        }\n    } catch (e) {\n        console.error(\"Browse error:\", e);\n        uiStore.showNotification({ text: 'Failed to browse directory.', color: 'error' });\n    } finally {\n        fileBrowser.isLoading = false;\n    }\n}\n\nfunction handleFileClick(item) {\n    if (item.type === 'dir') {\n        const separator = fileBrowser.currentPath.endsWith('/') ? '' : '/';\n        const newPath = `${fileBrowser.currentPath}${separator}${item.name}`;\n        fileBrowser.currentPath = newPath;\n        fetchFiles(newPath);\n    } else {\n        const separator = fileBrowser.currentPath.endsWith('/') ? '' : '/';\n        const fullPath = `${fileBrowser.currentPath}${separator}${item.name}`;\n        updateConfig(fileBrowser.targetField, fullPath);\n        fileBrowser.isOpen = false;\n    }\n}\n\nfunction navigateUp() {\n    const path = fileBrowser.currentPath;\n    if (!path || path === '/' || path === '/app') return; // Limit up navigation\n\n    const parts = path.split('/').filter(p => p);\n    parts.pop();\n    fileBrowser.currentPath = '/' + parts.join('/');\n    fetchFiles(fileBrowser.currentPath);\n}\n\nfunction selectCurrentPath() {\n    if (fileBrowser.targetField) {\n        updateConfig(fileBrowser.targetField, fileBrowser.currentPath);\n    }\n    fileBrowser.isOpen = false;\n}\n</script>\n\n<style scoped>\n/* Sama seperti sebelumnya */\n.properties-container {\n  padding: 16px;\n  height: 100%;\n  overflow-y: auto;\n}\n.properties-empty-state {\n  display: flex;\n  flex-direction: column;\n  justify-content: center;\n  align-items: center;\n  height: 100%;\n  text-align: center;\n}\n.node-title {\n  font-family: 'Orbitron', monospace;\n  font-size: 1.1rem;\n  font-weight: 700;\n  color: var(--neon-cyan);\n  margin-bottom: 8px;\n  display: flex;\n  align-items: center;\n}\n.node-description {\n  font-size: 0.85rem;\n  color: var(--text-secondary);\n  line-height: 1.5;\n  padding-bottom: 8px;\n}\n.prop-item {\n  margin-bottom: 16px;\n}\n.code-editor-wrapper .v-label {\n    margin-bottom: 4px;\n    display: block;\n}\n.config-title {\n    font-family: 'Orbitron', monospace;\n    font-size: 0.8rem;\n    font-weight: 700;\n    text-transform: uppercase;\n    letter-spacing: 1.5px;\n    color: var(--text-secondary);\n    margin-bottom: 16px;\n}\n.node-icon-title {\n    width: 24px;\n    height: 24px;\n    color: var(--neon-cyan);\n}\n\n.hacker-input :deep(.v-field) { background-color: rgba(30, 30, 45, 0.6) !important;\ncolor: #FFFFFF !important; }\n.hacker-input :deep(.v-field__outline) { border-color: rgba(0, 245, 255, 0.5) !important;\n}\n\n.border-glow {\n    border: 1px solid var(--neon-cyan);\n    box-shadow: 0 0 15px rgba(0, 245, 255, 0.15);\n}\n.file-list-scroll {\n    max-height: 300px;\n    overflow-y: auto;\n}\n.text-mono {\n    font-family: 'Fira Code', monospace;\n}\n</style>\n", "structure": [{"name": "Template", "type": "ui", "line": 654, "icon": "fa-window-maximize"}], "organs": [], "metrics": {"loc": 488, "complexity": "CRITICAL", "todo_count": 17106, "security_risks": ["Potential Hardcoded URL with Creds detected"], "last_modified": 1767761078.7405581}, "raw_imports": ["@/store/locale", "@/components/custom-properties/DynamicKeyValueEditor.vue", "@/store/ui", "@/store/socket", "./custom-properties/CronEditor.vue", "@/components/DynamicFormRenderer.vue", "@/api", "@/store/components", "vue", "pinia", "./custom-properties/FolderPairList.vue", "@/store/workflow"], "raw_calls": [], "raw_assets": [], "inbound_paths": [], "outbound_paths": ["app/flowork_architect/backend/parsers/vue.py"]}, "flowork-gui/template/web/src/components/PropertiesPopup.vue": {"id": 1078, "content": "//#######################################################################\n// WEBSITE https://flowork.cloud\n// File NAME : C:\\FLOWORK\\flowork-gui\\template\\web\\src\\components\\PropertiesPopup.vue total lines 52 \n//#1. </v-card-title>\n\n      <v-tabs v-model=\"activeTab\" bg-color=\"#161625\" color=\"cyan\" grow>\n        <v-tab value=\"config\">\n          <v-icon start>mdi-tune</v-icon>\n          Configuration\n        </v-tab>\n        <v-tab value=\"log\">\n          <v-icon start>mdi-console</v-icon>\n          Execution Log\n        </v-tab>\n      </v-tabs>\n\n      <v-divider></v-divider>\n\n      <v-card-text class=\"pa-0\">\n        <v-window v-model=\"activeTab\" class=\"runner-window\">\n          <v-window-item value=\"config\">\n            <div class=\"pa-5\">\n              <p <CronEditor\n                  v-if=\"prop.type === 'cron_editor'\"\n                  :label=\"loc(prop.label)\"\n                  :hint=\"loc(prop.description)\"\n                  v-model=\"configValues[prop.id]\"\n                />\n                <DynamicKeyValueEditor\n                  v-else-if=\"prop.type === 'dynamic_key_value_editor'\"\n                  :label=\"loc(prop.label)\"\n                  :hint=\"loc(prop.description)\"\n                  v-model=\"configValues[prop.id]\"\n                />\n                <v-text-field\n                  v-else-if=\"['string', 'integer', 'float', 'folderpath'].includes(prop.type)\"\n                  :label=\"loc(prop.label)\"\n                  :type=\"['integer', 'float'].includes(prop.type) ? 'number' : 'text'\"\n                  v-model=\"configValues[prop.id]\"\n                  variant=\"outlined\"\n                  density=\"compact\"\n                  :hint=\"loc(prop.description)\"\n                  persistent-hint\n                ></v-text-field>\n                <v-switch\n                  v-else-if=\"prop.type === 'boolean'\"\n                  :label=\"loc(prop.label)\"\n                  v-model=\"configValues[prop.id]\"\n                  color=\"cyan\"\n                  inset\n                  :messages=\"loc(prop.description)\"\n                ></v-switch>\n                <v-textarea\n                  v-else-if=\"prop.type === 'textarea'\"\n                  :label=\"loc(prop.label)\"\n             persistent-hint\n                ></v-textarea>\n                <div v-else-if=\"prop.type === 'code'\" class=\"code-editor-wrapper\">\n                  <label class=\"v-label    ></v-textarea>\n                </div>\n                <v-select\n                  v-else-if=\"prop.type === 'enum'\"\n                  :label=\"loc(prop.label)\"\n                  :items=\"prop.options\"\n                  v-model=\"configValues[prop.id]\"\n                  variant=\"outlined\"\n                  density=\"compact\"\n                  :hint=\"loc(prop.description)\"\n                  persistent-hint\n                ></v-select>\n                <FolderPairList\n                  v-else-if=\"prop.type === 'list'\"\n                  :label=\"loc(prop.label)\"\n                  :hint=\"loc(prop.description)\"\n                  v-model=\"configValues[prop.id]\"\n                />\n              </div>\n            </div>\n          </v-window-item>\n\n          <v-window-item value=\"log\" class=\"fill-height\">\n            <LogPanelContent />\n          </v-window-item>\n        </v-window>\n      </v-card-text>\n\n      <v-divider></v-divider>\n      <v-card-actions class=\"pa-4\">\n        <v-chip\n          v-if=\"jobStatus\"\n          :color=\"jobStatus.color\"\n          label\n          size=\"small\"\n          class=\"mr-4\"\n        >\n          <v-icon start :icon=\"jobStatus.icon\"></v-icon>\n          {{ jobStatus.text }}\n        </v-chip>\n        <v-spacer></v-spacer>\n        <v-btn\n          variant=\"outlined\"\n          @click=\"handleExecute('SIMULATE')\"\n          :disabled=\"isExecuting\"\n          :loading=\"isSimulating\"\n        >Simulate</v-btn>\n        <v-btn\n          v-if=\"!isExecuting\"\n          color=\"cyan\"\n          variant=\"flat\"\n          class=\"action-button\"\n          @click=\"handleExecute('EXECUTE')\"\n          :loading=\"isRunning\"\n          :disabled=\"!selectedComponent\"\n        >\n          <v-icon start>mdi-play</v-icon>\n          Run\n        </v-btn>\n        <v-btn\n          v-else\n          color=\"error\"\n          variant=\"flat\"\n          class=\"action-button\"\n          @click=\"handleStop\"\n          :loading=\"isStopping\"\n        >\n          <v-icon start>mdi-stop</v-icon>\n          Stop\n        </v-btn>\n      </v-card-actions>\n    </v-card>\n  </v-dialog>\n</template>\n\n<script setup>\nimport { ref, computed, watch } from 'vue';\nimport { useSocketStore } from '@/store/socket';\nimport { useLogStore } from '@/store/logs';\nimport { useLocaleStore } from '@/store/locale';\nimport { useUiStore } from '@/store/ui';\nimport { getComponentIconUrl } from '@/api';\nimport { v4 as uuidv4 } from 'uuid';\nimport LogPanelContent from '@/components/panels/LogPanelContent.vue'; // Kita akan buat ini selanjutnya\nimport CronEditor from './custom-properties/CronEditor.vue';\nimport DynamicKeyValueEditor from './custom-properties/DynamicKeyValueEditor.vue';\nimport FolderPairList from './custom-properties/FolderPairList.vue';\n\nconst props = defineProps({\n  modelValue: Boolean, // for v-model\n  componentData: {\n    type: Object,\n    default: null\n  }\n});\n\nconst emit = defineEmits(['update:modelValue']);\n\nconst socketStore = useSocketStore();\nconst logStore = useLogStore();\nconst localeStore = useLocaleStore();\nconst uiStore = useUiStore();\nconst { loc } = localeStore;\n\nconst activeTab = ref('config');\nconst configValues = ref({});\nconst currentJobId = ref(null);\nconst jobStatus = ref(null); // { text, color, icon }\n\nconst isRunning = ref(false);\nconst isSimulating = ref(false);\nconst isStopping = ref(false);\n\nconst isExecuting = computed(() => isRunning.value || isSimulating.value);\n\nconst dialog = computed({\n  get: () => props.modelValue,\n  set: (value) => emit('update:modelValue', value)\n});\n\nconst nodeProperties = computed(() => {\n  return props.componentData?.manifest?.properties || [];\n});\n\nwatch(() => props.componentData, (newComponent) => {\n  if (newComponent) {\n    logStore.clearLogs();\n    activeTab.value = 'config';\n    jobStatus.value = null;\n    currentJobId.value = null;\n\n    const defaults = {};\n    (newComponent.manifest?.properties || []).forEach(prop => {\n      if (prop.default !== undefined) {\n        let defaultValue = prop.default;\n        if (prop.type === 'integer' || prop.type === 'float') {\n            defaultValue = Number(defaultValue);\n        } else if (prop.type === 'boolean') {\n            defaultValue = String(defaultValue).toLowerCase() === 'true';\n        } else if (prop.type === 'list' && !Array.isArray(defaultValue)) {\n            defaultValue = [];\n        }\n        defaults[prop.id] = defaultValue;\n      } else {\n        defaults[prop.id] = null;\n      }\n    });\n    configValues.value = defaults;\n  }\n}, { immediate: true });\n\nasync function handleExecute(mode) {\n  if (mode === 'EXECUTE') isRunning.value = true;\n  if (mode === 'SIMULATE') isSimulating.value = true;\n\n  logStore.clearLogs();\n  activeTab.value = 'log'; // Otomatis pindah ke tab log\n  const newJobId = `quickjob-${uuidv4()}`;\n  currentJobId.value = newJobId;\n  jobStatus.value = { text: 'Running...', color: 'info', icon: 'mdi-autorenew' };\n\n  try {\n    await socketStore.sendMessage({\n      type: 'execute_standalone_node',\n      job_id: newJobId,\n      node_data: {\n        module_id: props.componentData.id,\n        config_values: configValues.value\n      },\n      mode: mode\n    });\n  } catch (e) {\n    uiStore.showNotification({ text: `Failed to start: ${e.message}`, color: 'error' });\n    jobStatus.value = { text: 'Failed to Start', color: 'error', icon: 'mdi-alert-circle-outline' };\n    isRunning.value = false;\n    isSimulating.value = false;\n  }\n}\n\nasync function handleStop() {\n    if (!currentJobId.value) return;\n    isStopping.value = true;\n    try {\n        await socketStore.sendMessage({\n            type: 'stop_workflow',\n            job_id: currentJobId.value\n        });\n        uiStore.showNotification({ text: 'Stop signal sent.', color: 'warning' });\n    } catch (e) {\n        uiStore.showNotification({ text: `Failed to send stop signal: ${e.message}`, color: 'error' });\n    } finally {\n        isStopping.value = false; // <-- PERBAIKAN DARI TEMUAN 4\n    }\n}\n\nwatch(() => logStore.executionLogs, (logs) => {\n    if (!currentJobId.value) return;\n\n    const statusLogs = logs.filter(l => l.workflow_context_id === currentJobId.value && l.source === 'Executor' && l.message.startsWith('Workflow finished'));\n    if (statusLogs.length > 0) {\n        const lastStatusMsg = statusLogs[statusLogs.length - 1].message;\n        if (lastStatusMsg.includes('SUCCEEDED')) {\n            jobStatus.value = { text: 'Succeeded', color: 'success', icon: 'mdi-check-circle-outline' };\n        } else if (lastStatusMsg.includes('FAILED')) {\n            jobStatus.value = { text: 'Failed', color: 'error', icon: 'mdi-alert-circle-outline' };\n        } else if (lastStatusMsg.includes('STOPPED')) {\n            jobStatus.value = { text: 'Stopped', color: 'warning', icon: 'mdi-stop-circle-outline' };\n        }\n        isRunning.value = false;\n        isSimulating.value = false;\n        isStopping.value = false;\n        currentJobId.value = null; // Selesaikan job\n    }\n}, { deep: true });\n\nfunction close() {\n    if (isExecuting.value) {\n        if (confirm(\"A job is still running. Are you sure you want to close? The job will continue in the background.\")) {\n            dialog.value = false;\n        }\n    } else {\n        dialog.value = false;\n    }\n}\n\nfunction getToolIcon(item) {\n  if (item.componentType === 'modules') return 'mdi-cog-outline';\n  if (item.componentType === 'plugins') return 'mdi-power-plug-outline';\n  if (item.componentType === 'tools') return 'mdi-hammer-wrench';\n  return 'mdi-cube-outline';\n}\n</script>\n\n<style scoped>\n.runner-card {\n  background-color: #2a2a4a;\n  border: 1px solid rgba(0, 245, 255, 0.3);\n  display: flex;\n  flex-direction: column;\n  height: 80vh; /* Make dialog taller */\n}\n.panel-title {\n  color: #00f5ff !important;\n  font-family: 'Orbitron', monospace;\n  font-weight: 700;\n  font-size: 1.1rem;\n  text-shadow: 0 0 4px rgba(0, 245, 255, 0.5);\n}\n.tool-icon {\n    margin-right: 12px;\n    color: #00f5ff;\n    width: 24px;\n    height: 24px;\n    object-fit: contain;\n}\n.runner-window {\n    height: 100%;\n}\n.v-card-text {\n    flex-grow: 1;\n    overflow-y: auto;\n}\n.prop-item {\n  margin-bottom: 24px;\n}\n.code-editor-wrapper .v-label {\n    margin-bottom: 4px;\n    display: block;\n}\n.code-editor :deep(textarea) {\n  font-family: 'Courier New', Courier, monospace !important;\n  font-size: 0.9rem;\n  line-height: 1.6;\n}\n.action-button {\n  font-weight: bold;\n  color: #010c03 !important;\n}\n</style>\n", "structure": [{"name": "Template", "type": "ui", "line": 655, "icon": "fa-window-maximize"}], "organs": [], "metrics": {"loc": 380, "complexity": "CRITICAL", "todo_count": 12892, "security_risks": ["Potential Hardcoded URL with Creds detected"], "last_modified": 1767761078.7430825}, "raw_imports": ["./custom-properties/DynamicKeyValueEditor.vue", "@/components/panels/LogPanelContent.vue", "@/store/locale", "@/store/ui", "@/store/socket", "./custom-properties/CronEditor.vue", "@/store/logs", "@/api", "vue", "uuid", "./custom-properties/FolderPairList.vue"], "raw_calls": [], "raw_assets": ["getComponentIconUrl(componentData.componentType, componentData.id)"], "inbound_paths": [], "outbound_paths": ["app/flowork_architect/backend/parsers/vue.py"]}, "flowork-gui/template/web/src/components/Toolbox.vue": {"id": 1082, "content": "//#######################################################################\n// WEBSITE https://flowork.cloud\n// File NAME : C:\\FLOWORK\\flowork-gui\\template\\web\\src\\components\\Toolbox.vue total lines 318 \n//#1. Dynamic Component Discovery (DCD): Hub wajib melakukan scanning file secara otomatis.\n//#2. Lazy Loading: Modul hanya di-import ke RAM saat dipanggil (On-Demand).\n//#3. Atomic Isolation: 1 File = 1 Fungsi dengan nama file yang identik dengan nama fungsi aslinya.\n//#4. Zero Logic Mutation: Dilarang merubah alur logika, nama variabel, atau struktur if/try/loop.\n//#######################################################################\n\n<template>\n  <div :label=\"loc('toolbox_search_placeholder')\"\n          prepend-inner-icon=\"mdi-magnify\"\n          variant=\"solo-filled\"\n          density=\"compact\"\n          hide-details\n  directory\n            style=\"display: none\"\n            @change=\"handleFolderSelect\"\n        />\n\n        <v-btn\n          icon=\"mdi-refresh\"\n          variant=\"text\"\n      Quick Apps\n        </h3>\n        <div class=\"badge-counter\" v-if=\"filteredComponents.length > 0\">{{ filteredComponents.length }}</div>\n      </div>\n    </div>\n\n    <div v-if=\"isLoading && !hasAnyItems\" class=\"loading-overlay\">\n      <div class=\"cyber-spinner\"></div>\n      <p class=\"mt-2 text-caption text-cyan blink-text\">INITIALIZING...</p>\n    </div>\n\n    <div v-else class=\"widget-grid-wrapper px-3\">\n      <div class=\"widget-grid\">\n        <div v-if=\"!searchTerm\" class=\"widget-item add-new\" @click=\"triggerItemUpload(null)\">\n          <div class=\"icon-wrapper dashed\">\n            <v-icon size=\"28\" color=\"cyan\">mdi-plus</v-icon>\n          </div>\n          <span class=\"widget-name\">Upload</span>\n        </div>\n\n        <div v-for=\"item in filteredComponents\"\n             :key=\"item.id\"\n             class=\"widget-item\"\n             draggable=\"true\"\n             @dragstart=\"onDragStart($event, item)\"\n             @click=\"handleItemClick(item)\"\n             v-tooltip.top=\"item.description || item.name\"\n        >\n          <div class=\"icon-wrapper glass\">\n             <img\n              v-if=\"resolveIcon(item)\"\n              :src=\"resolveIcon(item)\"\n              class=\"app-icon-img\"\n              @error=\"handleImageError($event)\"\n            />\n            <v-icon v-else class=\"fallback-icon\" color=\"cyan\" size=\"32\">{{ getFallbackIcon(item) }}</v-icon>\n\n            <div v-if=\"item.is_core\" class=\"cloud-badge\" title=\"Core Component\">\n               <v-icon size=\"8\" color=\"white\">mdi-check-decagram</v-icon>\n            </div>\n          </div>\n          <span class=\"widget-name\">{{ item.name }}</span>\n        </div>\n      </div>\n    </div>\n\n    <div v-if=\"error && !hasAnyItems\" class=\"loading-overlay error-state\">\n      <v-icon icon=\"mdi-wifi-off\" color=\"error\" size=\"x-large\"></v-icon>\n      <p class=\"mt-2 text-error\">{{ loc('toolbox_error_load') }}</p>\n      <v-btn size=\"small\" color=\"cyan\" variant=\"tonal\" class=\"mt-2\" @click=\"forceRefresh\">Retry</v-btn>\n    </div>\n\n    <v-dialog v-model=\"showPublishDialog\" max-width=\"500px\" persistent>\n        <v-card class=\"publish-card\">\n            <v-card-title class=\"orbitron-font text-green-accent-3\">\n                <v-icon start>mdi-package-variant-closed</v-icon> Publish {{ pendingPackage?.manifest?.name }}\n            </v-card-title>\n            <v-card-text>\n                <p class=\"text-grey-lighten-1 mb-3\">You are about to update/publish this component to the Marketplace.</p>\n                <v-list density=\"compact\" class=\"bg-transparent border rounded\">\n                    <v-list-item>\n                        <template v-slot:prepend><v-icon color=\"cyan\">mdi-file-code</v-icon></template>\n                        <v-list-item-title>Files Packed</v-list-item-title>\n                        <template v-slot:append><span class=\"text-cyan\">{{ Object.keys(pendingPackage?.files || {}).length }}</span></template>\n                    </v-list-item>\n                     <v-list-item>\n                        <template v-slot:prepend><v-icon color=\"yellow\">mdi-tag-text</v-icon></template>\n                        <v-list-item-title>Version</v-list-item-title>\n                        <template v-slot:append><span class=\"text-yellow\">{{ pendingPackage?.manifest?.version || '0.0.0' }}</span></template>\n                    </v-list-item>\n                </v-list>\n            </v-card-text>\n            <v-card-actions>\n                <v-spacer></v-spacer>\n                <v-btn variant=\"text\" @click=\"showPublishDialog = false\">Cancel</v-btn>\n                <v-btn color=\"green-accent-3\" variant=\"flat\" :loading=\"isPublishing\" :disabled=\"!pendingPackage.manifest?.name\" @click=\"confirmPublish\" class=\"font-weight-bold text-black\">Publish</v-btn>\n            </v-card-actions>\n        </v-card>\n    </v-dialog>\n  </div>\n</template>\n\n<script setup>\nimport { ref, computed, watch, onMounted } from 'vue';\nimport { useComponentStore } from '@/store/components';\nimport { useAppStore } from '@/store/apps'; // WAJIB: Pake AppStore\nimport { useLocaleStore } from '@/store/locale';\nimport { useMarketplaceStore } from '@/store/marketplace';\nimport { storeToRefs } from 'pinia';\nimport { useUiStore } from '@/store/ui';\nimport { useSocketStore } from '@/store/socket';\nimport { useEngineStore } from '@/store/engines';\n\nconst componentStore = useComponentStore();\nconst appStore = useAppStore();\nconst localeStore = useLocaleStore();\nconst uiStore = useUiStore();\nconst socketStore = useSocketStore();\nconst engineStore = useEngineStore();\nconst marketplaceStore = useMarketplaceStore();\n\nconst { loc } = storeToRefs(localeStore);\nconst { isPublishing } = storeToRefs(marketplaceStore);\n\nconst isLoading = computed(() => appStore.isLoading || componentStore.isLoading);\nconst error = computed(() => appStore.error);\n\nconst allComponentsFlat = computed(() => appStore.installedApps || []);\nconst hasAnyItems = computed(() => allComponentsFlat.value.length > 0);\n\nconst activeTab = ref('modules');\nconst searchTerm = ref('');\nconst folderInput = ref(null);\nconst showPublishDialog = ref(false);\nconst pendingPackage = ref({});\nconst targetItemForUpload = ref(null);\n\nconst activeEngineId = computed(() => engineStore.selectedEngineId || socketStore.engineId || 'local');\n\nconst filteredComponents = computed(() => {\n  let items = allComponentsFlat.value;\n\n  items = items.filter(app => {\n      const nodes = app.nodes || (app.manifest ? app.manifest.nodes : []) || [];\n      return Array.isArray(nodes) && nodes.length > 0;\n  });\n\n  if (!searchTerm.value) return items;\n  return items.filter(a =>\n    a.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.value.toLowerCase()) ||\n    a.id.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.value.toLowerCase())\n  );\n});\n\n/**\n * [RESTORED DRAG & DROP]\n * Menggunakan logic asli 'application/json' dan mengirim full item.\n * Ini yang membuat Drag & Drop bekerja di sistem lama lu.\n */\nconst onDragStart = (event, item) => {\n\n    event.dataTransfer.setData('application/json', JSON.stringify(item));\n    event.dataTransfer.effectAllowed = 'move';\n\n    event.target.style.opacity = '0.4';\n    setTimeout(() => { if(event.target) event.target.style.opacity = '1'; }, 0);\n};\n\nconst resolveIcon = (item) => {\n    if (item.id === 'business_canvas' || (item.path && item.path.includes('apps-cloud'))) {\n        return `/apps-cloud/${item.id}/icon.svg`;\n    }\n\n    let url = item.iconUrl || item.icon_url || item.gui?.iconUrl;\n    let iconFile = item.icon || item.manifest?.icon || item.manifest?.icon_file;\n\n    if (url && (url.startsWith('http') || url.startsWith('data:'))) return url;\n\n    if (iconFile && !iconFile.startsWith('mdi-')) {\n        return `/api/v1/apps/${item.id}/assets/${iconFile}?engine_id=${activeEngineId.value}`;\n    }\n\n    if (!iconFile) {\n        return `/api/v1/components/app/${item.id}/icon?engine_id=${activeEngineId.value}`;\n    }\n\n    return null;\n};\n\nconst getFallbackIcon = (item) => {\n    if (item.manifest?.icon?.startsWith('mdi-')) return item.manifest.icon;\n    return 'mdi-cube-outline';\n};\n\nconst handleImageError = (event) => { event.target.style.display = 'none'; };\n\nonMounted(() => {\n    if (appStore.installedApps.length === 0) {\n        appStore.fetchInstalledApps();\n    }\n});\n\nwatch(() => socketStore.isConnected, (connected) => {\n    if (connected) appStore.fetchInstalledApps();\n});\n\nfunction forceRefresh() {\n    uiStore.showNotification({ text: \"Refreshing toolbox...\", color: \"info\" });\n    appStore.fetchInstalledApps();\n}\n\nfunction handleItemClick(item) {\n    if (!socketStore.isConnected) {\n        if (engineStore.selectedEngineId) socketStore.switchEngine(engineStore.selectedEngineId);\n        else uiStore.showConnectEngineDialog();\n        return;\n    }\n    uiStore.showStandaloneRunner(item);\n}\n\nfunction triggerItemUpload(item) {\n    targetItemForUpload.value = item;\n    folderInput.value.click();\n}\n\nasync function handleFolderSelect(event) {\n    const files = event.target.files;\n    if (!files || files.length === 0) return;\n    const packageData = { manifest: {}, files: {}, type: 'app' };\n    const IGNORED = ['node_modules', 'venv', '.git', '__pycache__', '.DS_Store'];\n\n    for (const file of files) {\n        const path = file.webkitRelativePath;\n        if (IGNORED.some(x => path.includes(x))) continue;\n        try {\n            const isBinary = /\\.(png|jpg|jpeg|gif|webp|ico|zip|exe|dll)$/i.test(file.name);\n            let content = isBinary ? await readFileAsBase64(file) : await file.text();\n            if (file.name === 'manifest.json') { try { packageData.manifest = JSON.parse(content); } catch(e){} }\n            packageData.files[path] = content;\n        } catch (e) {}\n    }\n    pendingPackage.value = packageData;\n    showPublishDialog.value = true;\n    event.target.value = '';\n}\n\nfunction readFileAsBase64(file) {\n    return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {\n        const reader = new FileReader();\n        reader.onload = () => resolve(reader.result);\n        reader.readAsDataURL(file);\n    });\n}\n\nasync function confirmPublish() {\n    const payload = {\n        type: pendingPackage.value.type, id: pendingPackage.value.manifest.id,\n        name: pendingPackage.value.manifest.name, data: pendingPackage.value\n    };\n    if (await marketplaceStore.publishComponent(payload)) {\n        showPublishDialog.value = false;\n        pendingPackage.value = {};\n    }\n}\n</script>\n\n<style scoped>\n.toolbox-container { display: flex; flex-direction: column; height: 100%; background-color: transparent; color: #fff; padding-top: '@/store/variables';\nimport { useUiStore } from '@/store/ui';\nimport { storeToRefs } from 'pinia';\n\nconst props = defineProps({ modelValue: Boolean });\nconst emit = defineEmits(['update:modelValue']);\n\nconst store = useVariablesStore();\nconst ui = useUiStore();\nconst { variables, isLoading } = storeToRefs(store);\nconst localVariables = ref([]);\nconst isSaving = ref(false);\n\nconst dialog = computed({\n  get: () => props.modelValue,\n  set: (v) => emit('update:modelValue', v)\n});\n\nwatch(dialog, (open) => { if (open) store.fetchVariables(); });\n\nwatch(variables, (newVal) => {\n  if (!Array.isArray(newVal)) return;\n\n  localVariables.value = newVal.map(v => {\n    let safeValue = '';\n    if (Array.isArray(v.value)) {\n        safeValue = v.value.join('\\n');\n    } else if (typeof v.value === 'object' && v.value !== null) {\n        safeValue = JSON.stringify(v.value);\n    } else {\n        safeValue = String(v.value || '');\n    }\n\n    return {\n      ...v,\n      _id: v.name + '_' + Math.random().toString(36).substr(2, 9), // ID Stabil\n      valueDisplay: safeValue,\n      mode: v.mode || 'single',\n      showRaw: false\n    };\n  });\n}, { deep: true });\n\nfunction addNew() {\n  localVariables.value.push({\n      _id: 'new_' + Date.now(),\n      name: '',\n      valueDisplay: '',\n      mode: 'single',\n      is_enabled: true,\n      is_secret: true,\n      showRaw: false\n  });\n}\n\nfunction removeEntry(idx) { localVariables.value.splice(idx, 1); }\n\nasync function saveAll() {\n  isSaving.value = true;\n  try {\n    const currentNames = localVariables.value.map(l => l.name).filter(n => n); // Filter nama kosong\n\n    for (const v of variables.value) {\n      if (!currentNames.includes(v.name)) await store.removeVariable(v.name);\n    }\n\n    for (const item of localVariables.value) {\n      if (!item.name) continue; // Skip kalau nama kosong\n\n      let finalVal = item.valueDisplay;\n      if (item.mode === 'random' || item.mode === 'sequential') {\n         finalVal = item.valueDisplay.split('\\n').filter(s => s.trim() !== '');\n      }\n\n      await store.saveVariable(item.name, { ...item, value: finalVal });\n    }\n    ui.showNotification({ text: \"Success: Cloud and Local Engine Synced!\", color: \"success\" });\n    closeDialog();\n  } catch (e) {\n    ui.showNotification({ text: \"Sync Failed: \" + e.message, color: \"error\" });\n  } finally {\n    isSaving.value = false;\n  }\n}\n\nfunction closeDialog() { emit('update:modelValue', false); }\n</script>\n\n<style scoped>\n.border-b-gold { border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.3) !important; }\n.border-gold-left { border-left: 4px solid #FFD700 'vue';\n\nconst workflowStore = useWorkflowStore();\nconst componentStore = useComponentStore();\nconst { elements, executionStatus, connectionStatus } = storeToRefs(workflowStore);\nconst { addNode, });\n\nfunction onNodeDragStart(event) { if (event.node) event.node.data.isDragging = true; }\nfunction onNodeDragStop(event) { if (event.node) { setTimeout(() => { if (event.node) event.node.data.isDragging = false; }, 100); } }\n\nfunction getIconUrl(type, id) {\n    const safeType = type?.endsWith('s') ? type : `${type}s`;\n    return getComponentIconUrl(safeType, id);\n}\n\nfunction onDrop(event) {\n  event.preventDefault();\n\n  const rawData = event.dataTransfer?.getData('application/json');\n  if (!rawData) return;\n\n  try {\n    const componentData = JSON.parse(rawData);\n    if (!componentData.id) return;\n\n    const position = screenToFlowCoordinate({ x: event.clientX, y: event.clientY });\n\n    const typeMap = { 'module': 'modules', 'plugin': 'plugins', 'tool': 'tools', 'trigger': 'triggers' };\n    const rawType = componentData.componentType || componentData.type;\n    const finalType = typeMap[rawType] || rawType || 'modules';\n\n    const nodeDef = componentData.nodes?.[0] || {};\n\n    addNode({\n      moduleId: componentData.id,\n      label: componentData.name || componentData.id,\n      componentType: finalType,\n      x: nodeDef.output_ports || []\n      }\n    });\n\n  } catch (e) {\n    console.error(\"[Canvas] Drop processing failed:\", e);\n  }\n}\n\nfunction onDragOver(event) { event.preventDefault(); if (event.dataTransfer) event.dataTransfer.dropEffect = 'move'; }\nfunction onConnect(connection) { addEdge(connection); }\nfunction onNodeClick(event) { setSelectedNode(event.node); }\nfunction onPaneClick() { clearSelectedNode(); }\n\nfunction getNodeClasses(props) {\n    const status = getNodeStatus(props.id);\n    return {\n        'is-dragging': props.data.isDragging,\n        'node-running': status === 'running',\n        'node-success': status === 'success',\n        'node-error': status === 'error'\n    };\n}\n\nfunction getNodeStatus(nodeId) {\n    const statusObj = executionStatus.value[nodeId];\n    if (!statusObj) return null;\n    const s = statusObj.status?.toUpperCase();\n    if (s === 'RUNNING' || s === 'PENDING' || s === 'EXECUTING') return 'running';\n    if (s === 'DONE' || s === 'SUCCEEDED' || s === 'SUCCESS' || s === 'COMPLETED') return 'success';\n    if (s === 'FAILED' || s === 'ERROR' || s === 'CRASHED') return 'error';\n    return null;\n}\n\nwatch(connectionStatus, (newStatus) => {\n    const updatedElements = elements.value.map(el => {\n        if (el.source && el.target) {\n             const statusData = newStatus[el.id];\n             if (statusData && statusData.status === 'ACTIVE') {\n                 return { ...el, animated: true, style: { stroke: '#00ffcc', strokeWidth: 3, opacity: 1, filter: 'drop-shadow(0 0 5px #00ffcc)' } };\n             } else {\n                 return { ...el, animated: false, style: { stroke: '#b1b1b7', strokeWidth: 1, filter: 'none' } };\n             }\n        }\n        return el;\n    });\n    elements.value = updatedElements;\n}, { deep: true });\n\n</script>\n\n<style>\n@import '@vue-flow/core/dist/style.css';\n@import String,\n  hint: String,\n});\n\nconst emit = defineEmits(['update:modelValue']);\n\nconst parts = ref(props.modelValue.split(' '));\n\nwatch(() => props.modelValue, (newValue) => {\n  parts.value = newValue.split(' ');\n});\n\nfunction updateCronString() {\n  const newCronString = parts.value.join(' ');\n  emit('update:modelValue', newCronString);\n}\n</script>\n\n<style scoped>\n.cron-editor () => []\n  },\n  label: String,\n  hint: String,\n});\n\nconst emit = defineEmits(['update:modelValue']);\n\nconst localItems = ref(JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(props.modelValue || [])));\n\nwatch(() => props.modelValue, (newValue) => {\n  localItems.value = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(newValue || []));\n}, { deep: true });\n\nfunction addItem() {\n  localItems.value.push({ name: '', value: '', type: 'Text' }); // Type is kept for compatibility\n  emit('update:modelValue', localItems.value);\n}\n\nfunction removeItem(index) {\n  localItems.value.splice(index, 1);\n  emit('update:modelValue', localItems.value);\n}\n\nfunction updateItem() {\n  emit('update:modelValue', localItems.value);\n}\n</script>\n\n<style scoped>\n.key-value-editor {\n  margin-bottom: 16px;\n}\n.list-header {\n Atomic Isolation: 1 File = 1 Fungsi dengan nama file yang identik dengan nama fungsi aslinya.\n//#4. Zero Logic Mutation: Dilarang merubah alur logika, nama variabel, atau struktur if/try/loop.\n//#######################################################################\n\n<template>\n  <v-dialog v-model=\"dialog\" max-width=\"700px\" @click:outside=\"close\">\n    <v-card class=\"browser-card\">\n      <v-card-title class=\"d-flex align-center py-3 px-4 card-header\">\n        <v-icon :icon=\"selectionMode === 'file' ? 'Select File' : 'Select Video Folder' }}\n        </span>\n\n        <v-spacer></v-spacer>\n\n        <v-tooltip text=\"Go to Drives\" location=\"bottom\">\n          <template v-slot:activator=\"{ props }\">\n            <v-btn v-bind=\"props\" icon=\"mdi-harddisk\" variant=\"text\" size=\"small\" color=\"cyan\" @click=\"fetchFiles('')\" class=\"mr-1\"></v-btn>\n          </template>\n        </v-tooltip>\n\n        <v-tooltip text=\"Show All Drives\" location=\"bottom\">\n          <template v-slot:activator=\"{ props }\">\n            <v-btn v-bind=\"props\" icon=\"mdi-server-network\" icon=\"mdi-arrow-up\"\n            variant=\"text\"\n            size=\"small\"\n            @click=\"goUp\"\n            :disabled=\"!currentPath && currentPath !== ''\"\n            class=\"mr-2\"\n            color=\"grey-lighten-1\"\n            title=\"Up one level\"\n        ></v-btn>\n\n        <v-text-field\n          v-model=\"currentPath\"\n          variant=\"outlined\"\n          density=\"compact\"\n          hide-details\n          class=\"path-input\"\n          placeholder=\"Path...\"\n          prepend-inner-icon=\"mdi-folder\"\n          @keyup.enter=\"fetchFiles(currentPath)\"\n        ></v-text-field>\n      </div>\n\n      <v-card-text class=\"file-list-container pa-0\">\n        <div v-if=\"loading\" class=\"d-flex flex-column align-center justify-center fill-height py-10\">\n          <v-progress-circular indeterminate color=\"cyan\" size=\"48\"></v-progress-circular>\n          <div class=\"mt-3 text-caption text-grey\">Opening folder...</div>\n        </div>\n\n        <div v-else-if=\"error\" class=\"d-flex flex-column align-center justify-center fill-height py-10\">\n          <v-icon icon=\"mdi-lock-alert\" color=\"error\" size=\"48\" class=\"mb-2\"></v-icon>\n          <div class=\"text-body-2 text-error mb-2 px-4 text-center\">{{ error }}</div>\n          <v-btn size=\"small\" variant=\"outlined\" color=\"amber\" @click=\"fetchFiles('')\">Show Available Drives</v-btn>\n        </div>\n\n        <div v-else-if=\"items.length === 0\" class=\"d-flex flex-column align-center justify-center fill-height py-10\">\n          <v-icon icon=\"mdi-folder-open-outline\" color=\"grey-darken-2\" size=\"64\" class=\"mb-2\"></v-icon>\n          <div class=\"text-caption text-grey\">Folder is empty</div>\n        </div>\n\n        <v-list v-else density=\"compact\" class=\"bg-transparent py-0\">\n          <v-list-item\n            v-for=\"item in items\"\n            :key=\"item.path\"\n            :value=\"item\"\n            @click=\"handleItemClick(item)\"\n            class=\"file-item\"\n            :class=\"{ 'bg-cyan-darken-4': isSelected(item) }\"\n            :ripple=\"false\"\n          >\n            <template v-slot:prepend>\n              <v-icon v-if=\"item.type === 'drive'\" icon=\"mdi-harddisk\" color=\"amber\" class=\"mr-2\"></v-icon>\n              <v-icon v-else-if=\"item.is_dir\" icon=\"mdi-folder\" color=\"cyan-lighten-3\" class=\"mr-2\"></v-icon>\n              <v-icon v-else icon=\"mdi-file-video-outline\" :color=\"isSelected(item) ? 'white' : 'grey'\" class=\"mr-2\"></v-icon>\n            </template>\n\n            <v-list-item-title class=\"text-body-2 font-weight-medium text-grey-lighten-1\">{{ item.name }}</v-list-item-title>\n\n            <template v-slot:append>\n               <v-icon v-if=\"item.is_dir\" icon=\"mdi-chevron-right\" size=\"small\" color=\"grey-darken-3\"></v-icon>\n               <v-icon v-if=\"isSelected(item)\" icon=\"mdi-check\" size=\"small\" color=\"cyan-accent-2\"></v-icon>\n            </template>\n          </v-list-item>\n        </v-list>\n      </v-card-text>\n\n      <v-divider></v-divider>\n\n      <v-card-actions class=\"pa-4 bg-grey-darken-4\">\n        <div class=\"text-caption text-grey text-truncate mr-4\" style=\"max-width: 350px;\">\n          <span v-if=\"selectionMode === 'file' && selectedFilePath\">Selected File: <span class=\"text-cyan\">{{ selectedFilePath }}</span></span>\n          <span v-else-if=\"currentPath\">Current Folder: <span class=\"text-cyan\">{{ currentPath }}</span></span>\n        </div>\n        <v-spacer></v-spacer>\n        <v-btn variant=\"text\" color=\"grey\" @click=\"close\">Cancel</v-btn>\n\n        <v-btn\n            color=\"cyan\"\n            variant=\"flat\"\n            @click=\"confirmSelection\"\n            :disabled=\"loading || (selectionMode === 'folder' && !currentPath) || (selectionMode === 'file' && !selectedFilePath)\"\n        >\n            {{ selectionMode === 'file' ? 'Select File' : 'Select Folder' }}\n        </v-btn>\n      </v-card-actions>\n    </v-card>\n  </v-dialog>\n</template>\n\n<script setup>\nimport { ref, computed, watch, onMounted, onUnmounted } from 'vue';\nimport { useSocketStore } from '@/store/socket';\n\nconst props = defineProps({\n  modelValue: Boolean,\n  initialPath: { type: String, default: '' },\n  selectionMode: { type: String, default: 'folder' }\n});\n\nconst emit = defineEmits(['update:modelValue', 'select']);\nconst socketStore = useSocketStore();\nconst dialog = computed({\n  get: () => props.modelValue,\n  set: (val) => emit('update:modelValue', val)\n});\n\nconst DEFAULT_PATH = '';\nconst RESTRICTED_NAMES = ['FLOWORK', '.ENV', '.GIT', 'NODE_MODULES'];\n\nconst currentPath = ref(DEFAULT_PATH);\nconst items = ref([]);\nconst loading = ref(false);\nconst error = ref(null);\nconst selectedFilePath = ref(null);\nlet timeoutId = null;\n\nfunction fetchFiles(path) {\n  if (!socketStore.isConnected) {\n      error.value = \"Engine Disconnected\";\n      return;\n  }\n  loading.value = true;\n  error.value = null;\n  items.value = [];\n  selectedFilePath.value = null;\n\n  console.log('[FileBrowser] Fetching:', path || 'DRIVE_LIST');\n  socketStore.sendMessage({\n    type: 'filesystem_list_request',\n    path: path\n  });\n\n  if (timeoutId) clearTimeout(timeoutId);\n  timeoutId = setTimeout(() => {\n      if (loading.value) {\n          loading.value = false;\n          error.value = \"Timeout. Engine busy.\";\n      }\n  }, 8000);\n}\n\nfunction handleResponseEvent(event) {\n    const payload = event.detail;\n    const data = payload.payload || payload;\n\n    if (data.error) {\n        loading.value = false;\n        if (currentPath.value !== '') {\n             console.warn(\"Path error, fallback to drives\");\n             error.value = data.error;\n        } else {\n             error.value = data.error;\n        }\n        return;\n    }\n\n    currentPath.value = data.path || '';\n\n    let rawItems = data.items || [];\n    items.value = rawItems.filter(item => {\n        const nameUpper = item.name.toUpperCase();\n        if (RESTRICTED_NAMES.some(restricted => nameUpper.includes(restricted))) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        return true;\n    });\n\n    loading.value = false;\n    if (timeoutId) clearTimeout(timeoutId);\n}\n\nfunction handleItemClick(item) {\n  if (item.is_dir) {\n    if (item.type === 'drive') {\n        fetchFiles(item.path);\n    } else {\n        let newPath = currentPath.value;\n        if (newPath) {\n            if (!newPath.endsWith('/') && !newPath.endsWith('\\\\')) newPath += '/';\n        }\n        newPath += item.name;\n\n        const nameUpper = item.name.toUpperCase();\n        if (RESTRICTED_NAMES.some(restricted => nameUpper.includes(restricted))) {\n             error.value = \"Access Denied: Protected Folder\";\n             return;\n        }\n\n        fetchFiles(newPath);\n    }\n  } else {\n      if (props.selectionMode === 'file') {\n          let fullPath = currentPath.value;\n          if (fullPath && !fullPath.endsWith('/') && !fullPath.endsWith('\\\\')) fullPath += '/';\n          fullPath += item.name;\n\n          selectedFilePath.value = fullPath;\n      }\n  }\n}\n\nfunction isSelected(item) {\n    if (props.selectionMode !== 'file') return false;\n    if (item.is_dir) return false;\n\n    let itemFullPath = currentPath.value;\n    if (itemFullPath && !itemFullPath.endsWith('/') && !itemFullPath.endsWith('\\\\')) itemFullPath += '/';\n    itemFullPath += item.name;\n\n    return selectedFilePath.value === itemFullPath;\n}\n\nfunction goUp() {\n  if (!currentPath.value) return;\n\n  let path = currentPath.value.replace(/\\\\/g, '/'); // Normalisasi slash\n  if (path.endsWith('/')) path = path.slice(0, -1); // Buang trailing slash\n\n  if (path === '' || path === '/' || path === '/app') {\n      fetchFiles('');\n      return;\n  }\n\n  const lastSlash = path.lastIndexOf('/');\n  if (lastSlash < 0) {\n      fetchFiles('');\n  } else {\n      let parentPath = path.substring(0, lastSlash);\n      if (parentPath === '') parentPath = '/';\n      fetchFiles(parentPath);\n  }\n}\n\nfunction confirmSelection() {\n  if (props.selectionMode === 'file') {\n      if (selectedFilePath.value) {\n          emit('select', selectedFilePath.value);\n          close();\n      }\n  } else {\n      emit('select', currentPath.value);\n      close();\n  }\n}\n\nfunction close() {\n  dialog.value = false;\n  selectedFilePath.value = null; // Reset\n}\n\nonMounted(() => {\n    window.addEventListener('FILESYSTEM_DATA_READY', handleResponseEvent);\n    fetchFiles(DEFAULT_PATH);\n});\n\nonUnmounted(() => {\n    window.removeEventListener('FILESYSTEM_DATA_READY', handleResponseEvent);\n    if (timeoutId) clearTimeout(timeoutId);\n});\n\nwatch(() => props.modelValue, (val) => {\n    if (val) {\n        error.value = null;\n        selectedFilePath.value = null; // Reset seleksi pas buka baru\n\n        fetchFiles(DEFAULT_PATH);\n    }\n});\n</script>\n\n<style scoped>\n.browser-card { background-color: #1e1e2e; color: #e0e0e0; border: 1px solid #333; }\n.card-header { background-color: #2a2a3c; border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.05); }\n.path-input :deep(.v-field__input) { font-family: monospace; font-size: 0.85rem; }\n.path-input :deep(.v-field) { background-color: #13131a; color: #fff; border: 1px solid #444; }\n.file-list-container { height: 450px; overflow-y: auto; background-color: #13131a; }\n.file-item { border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.03); transition: background 0.1s; min-height: 48px; }\n.file-item:hover { background-color: rgba(0, 229, 255, 0.08); }\n.bg-cyan-darken-4 { background-color: rgba(0, 188, 212, 0.2) !important; } /* Highlight selection */\n::-webkit-scrollbar { width: 8px; }\n::-webkit-scrollbar-track { background: #13131a; }\n::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb { background-color: #444; border-radius: 4px; }\n</style>\n", "structure": [{"name": "Template", "type": color=\"cyan\" class=\"cursor-pointer\">mdi-folder-search-outline</v-icon>\n                    </template>\n                  </v-text-field>\n                </div>\n              </template>\n\n            </div>\n            <v-btn @click=\"removePair(index)\" icon=\"mdi-trash-can-outline\" size=\"small\" variant=\"text\" color=\"red\" class=\"ml-2\"></v-btn>\n          </div>\n        </v-card>\n      </div>\n    </div>\n\n    <div class=\"v-messages__message text-caption mt-1 text-grey\">{{ hint }}</div>\n\n    <FileBrowserModal\n        v-model=\"isModalOpen\"\n        :initial-path=\"initialModalPath\"\n        @select=\"onFolderSelected\"\n    />\n  </div>\n</template>\n\n<script setup>\nimport { ref, watch, computed } from 'vue';\nimport FileBrowserModal from './FileBrowserModal.vue';\n\nconst props = defineProps({\n  modelValue: { type: Array, default: () => [] },\n  label: String,\n  hint: String,\n  leftLabel: String,\n  rightLabel: String\n});\n\nconst emit = defineEmits(['update:modelValue']);\nconst localPairs = ref([]);\nconst isModalOpen = ref(false);\nconst initialModalPath = ref('');\nconst editingIndex = ref(null);\nconst editingKey = ref(null);\nconst activeIndex = ref(null);\n\nconst isStitcherMode = computed(() => {\n  return props.label && (\n    (props.label.toLowerCase().includes('stitch') && !props.label.toLowerCase().includes('sequence')) ||\n    props.label.toLowerCase().includes('job')\n  );\n});\n\nconst isSequenceMode = computed(() => {\n  if (props.leftLabel || props.rightLabel) {\n      return false;\n  }\n  return props.label && (\n    props.label.toLowerCase().includes('sequence') ||\n    props.label.toLowerCase().includes('storyboard')\n  );\n});\n\nwatch(() => props.modelValue, (newValue) => {\n  localPairs.value = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(newValue || []));\n}, { deep: true, immediate: true });\n\nfunction addPair() {\n  const newPairs = [...localPairs.value];\n\n  if (isStitcherMode.value) {\n    newPairs.push({ video_folder: '', audio_folder: '', output_folder: '' });\n  } else if (isSequenceMode.value) {\n    newPairs.push({ folder_path: '' });\n  } else {\n    newPairs.push({ source: '', output: '' });\n  }\n\n  emit('update:modelValue', newPairs);\n}\n\nfunction removePair(index) {\n  const newPairs = [...localPairs.value];\n  newPairs.splice(index, 1);\n  emit('update:modelValue', newPairs);\n}\n\nfunction updatePair(index, key, value) {\n  const newPairs = [...localPairs.value];\n  if (newPairs[index]) {\n    newPairs[index][key] = value;\n    localPairs.value = newPairs;\n    emit('update:modelValue', newPairs);\n  }\n}\n\nfunction openFileBrowser(index, key) {\n    editingIndex.value = index;\n    editingKey.value = key;\n    initialModalPath.value = (localPairs.value[index] && localPairs.value[index][key]) ? localPairs.value[index][key] : '';\n    isModalOpen.value = true;\n}\n\nfunction onFolderSelected(selectedPath) {\n    if (editingIndex.value !== null && editingKey.value !== null) {\n        updatePair(editingIndex.value, editingKey.value, selectedPath);\n    }\n    isModalOpen.value = false;\n}\n</script>\n\n<style scoped>\n.folder-pair-list { margin-bottom: 16px; }\n.list-header { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; margin-bottom: 8px; }\n.pair-card { border-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.1); background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.02); transition: all 0.2s; }\n.pair-card:hover { border-color: rgba(0, 229, 255, 0.5); background-color: rgba(0, 229, 255, 0.05); }\n.gap-2 { gap: 8px; }\n.cursor-pointer { cursor: pointer; opacity: 0.7; }\n.cursor-pointer:hover { opacity: 1; }\n</style>\n", CORE - SKELETON EDITION <<\n        >> OPTIMIZED FOR: ROBOT BRAIN, ANDROID, DOCKER, WSL <<\n`;\n\nconst filteredViewLogs = computed(() => {\n    if (activeFilters.value.length === 5) return displayedLogs.value;\n    return displayedLogs.value.filter(log => activeFilters.value.includes((log.level || 'INFO').toUpperCase()));\n});\n\nconst getLogLevelClass = (level) => {\n  const levelLower = (level || 'info').toLowerCase();\n  if (levelLower.includes('success')) return 'log-success';\n  if (levelLower.includes('warn')) return 'log-warn';\n  if (levelLower.includes('error') || levelLower.includes('critical')) return 'log-error';\n  if (levelLower.includes('debug') || levelLower.includes('detail')) return 'log-debug';\n  return 'log-info';\n};\n\nconst formatTime = (ts) => {\n    if (!ts) return '';\n    const date = new Date(ts * 1000);\n    return date.toLocaleTimeString('en-GB', { hour12: false });\n};\n\nconst copyLog = () => {\n    const logText = filteredViewLogs.value.map(log => `[${log.level?.toUpperCase()}] [${log.source}] ${log.message}`).join('\\n');\n    navigator.clipboard.writeText(logText).then(() => {\n        copyIcon.value = 'mdi-check';\n        setTimeout(() => {\n            copyIcon.value = 'mdi-content-copy';\n        }, 1500);\n    });\n};\n\nconst clearTerminal = () => {\n    logStore.clearLogs();\n    displayedLogs.value = [];\n    logQueue.value = [];\n};\n\nconst scrollToBottom = () => {\n    nextTick(() => {\n        if (logContainer.value) {\n            logContainer.value.scrollTop = logContainer.value.scrollHeight;\n        }\n    });\n};\n\n\nconst processQueue = async () => {\n    if (logQueue.value.length === 0) {\n        isProcessingQueue.value = false;\n        return;\n    }\n\n    isProcessingQueue.value = true;\n\n    const nextLog = logQueue.value.shift();\n    displayedLogs.value.push(nextLog);\n\n    scrollToBottom();\n\n    const delay = logQueue.value.length > 50 ? 5 : Math.floor(Math.random() * 20) + 10;\n\n    setTimeout(() => {\n        processQueue();\n    }, delay);\n};\n\nwatch(executionLogs, (newLogs, oldLogs) => {\n    const oldLength = oldLogs ? oldLogs.length : 0;\n    const newItems = newLogs.slice(oldLength);\n\n    if (newItems.length > 0) {\n        logQueue.value.push(...newItems);\n\n        if (!isProcessingQueue.value) {\n            processQueue();\n        }\n    }\n}, { deep: true });\n\nonMounted(() => {\n    scrollToBottom();\n\n    if (executionLogs.value.length > 0) {\n        logQueue.value.push(...executionLogs.value);\n        processQueue();\n    }\n});\n</script>\n\n<style scoped>\n/* Importing Hacker Font */\n@import }}\n          </div>\n        </div>\n\n        <div v-if=\"agentStore.isStreaming\" class=\"chat-bubble agent\">\n          <v-progress-circular indeterminate color=\"cyan\" size=\"20\" useLogStore } from '@/store/logs';\nimport { storeToRefs } from 'pinia';\n\nimport { useSocketStore } from '@/store/socket';\nimport { apiCancelSession } from '@/api';\nimport MarkdownIt from 'markdown-it';\n\nconst md = new MarkdownIt({\n  html: false,\n  linkify: true,\n  typographer: true\n});\nconst renderMarkdown = (text) => {\n  return md.render(text || '');\n};\n\nconst socketStore = useSocketStore();\nconst agentStore = socketStore.useAgentStore();\nconst chatContainer = ref(null);\n\nconst logStore = useLogStore();\nconst { executionLogs } = storeToRefs(logStore);\n\nconst logContainer = ref(null);\nconst activeFilters = ref(['INFO', 'SUCCESS', 'WARN', 'ERROR', 'DEBUG']);\nconst copyIcon = ref('mdi-content-copy');\n\nconst filteredLogs = computed(() => {\n    if (activeFilters.value.length === 5) return executionLogs.value;\n    return executionLogs.value.filter(log => activeFilters.value.includes(log.level.toUpperCase()));\n});\n\nconst getLogLevelClass = (level) => {\n  const levelLower = (level || 'info').toLowerCase();\n  if (levelLower.includes('success')) return 'log-success';\n  if (levelLower.includes('warn')) return 'log-warn';\n  if (levelLower.includes('error') || levelLower.includes('critical')) return 'log-error';\n  if (levelLower.includes('debug') || levelLower.includes('detail')) return 'log-debug';\n  return 'log-info';\n};\n\nconst getLogLevelIcon = (level) => {\n  const levelLower = (level || 'info').toLowerCase();\n  if (levelLower.includes('success')) return 'mdi-check-circle-outline';\n  if (levelLower.includes('warn')) return 'mdi-alert-outline';\n  if (levelLower.includes('error') || levelLower.includes('critical')) return 'mdi-alert-circle-outline';\n  if (levelLower.includes('debug') || levelLower.includes('detail')) return 'mdi-bug-outline';\n  return 'mdi-information-outline';\n};\n\nconst copyLog = () => {\n    const logText = filteredLogs.value.map(log => `[${log.level.toUpperCase()}] [${log.source}] ${log.message}`).join('\\n');\n    navigator.clipboard.writeText(logText).then(() => {\n        copyIcon.value = 'mdi-check';\n        setTimeout(() => {\n            copyIcon.value = 'mdi-content-copy';\n        }, 1500);\n    });\n};\n\nwatch(executionLogs, () => {\n  nextTick(() => {\n    if (logContainer.value) {\n      logContainer.value.scrollTop = logContainer.value.scrollHeight;\n    }\n  });\n}, { deep: true });\n\nwatch(() => agentStore.conversation, () => {\n  nextTick(() => {\n    if (chatContainer.value) {\n      chatContainer.value.scrollTop = chatContainer.value.scrollHeight;\n    }\n  });\n}, { deep: true });\n\nasync function endSession() {\n  const sessionId = agentStore.currentSessionId;\n  if (!sessionId) return;\n\n  console.log(`[LogPanel] User requested to end session ${sessionId}`);\n  agentStore.reset();\n\n  try {\n    await apiCancelSession(sessionId);\n  } catch (e) {\n    console.error(`[LogPanel] Error sending cancel request:`, e);\n  }\n}\n</script>\n\n<style scoped>\n.log-panel-content-wrapper {\n  height: 100%;\n  display: flex;\n  flex-direction: border-top-left-radius: 0;\n  min-width: 60px;\n}\n.chat-bubble.error {\n  background-color: rgba(100, 30, 30, 0.7);\n  align-self: flex-start;\n  border-top-left-radius: 0;\n}\n.message-content
