Store\n\nconst currentMode = ref('chat'); // 'chat' | 'command'\n\nconst prompt = ref('');\nconst commandPrompt = ref('');\n\nconst isLoading = computed(() => agentStore.currentPhase === 'running' || agentStore.isStreaming);\n\nasync function handleAgentSubmit() {\n  const currentIntent = prompt.value;\n  if (!currentIntent.trim()) return;\n  prompt.value = '';\n\n  if (!engineStore.selectedEngineId) {\n    uiStore.showNotification({ text: \"Please select an engine first.\", color: 'error' });\n    return;\n  }\n\n  if (workflowStore.workflowData) {\n      console.log(\"[PromptSender] \ud83d\ude80 Triggering Active Workflow with Prompt...\");\n\n      socketStore.sendMessage({\n          type: 'execute_workflow',\n          job_id: uuidv4(),\n          target_engine_id: engineStore.selectedEngineId,\n          payload: {\n              workflow_data: workflowStore.workflowData, // Kirim struktur workflow lengkap\n              initial_payload: { prompt: currentIntent }\n          }\n      });\n  } else {\n      engineStore.runModule(\n          engineStore.selectedEngineId,\n          'prompt_receiver_module',\n          { prompt: currentIntent }\n      ).catch(e => console.warn(\"Shadow send failed:\", e));\n  }\n\n  try {\n    if (!agentStore.currentSessionId) {\n      agentStore.addUserMessage(currentIntent);\n      const result = await apiStartSession(engineStore.selectedEngineId, currentIntent);\n\n      if (result.error) throw new Error(result.error);\n\n      if (result.session_id && result.ws_token) {\n        socketStore.joinAgentSession(result.session_id, result.ws_token);\n      } else {\n        throw new Error(\"Invalid response from server.\");\n      }\n    } else {\n      socketStore.sendAgentInput(currentIntent);\n    }\n  } catch (err) {\n    console.error(\"[Agent] Error:\", err);\n    uiStore.showNotification({ text: err.message, color: 'error' });\n    if (!agentStore.currentSessionId) agentStore.reset();\n  }\n}\n\nasync function handleCommandSubmit() {\n    const txt = commandPrompt.value;\n    if (!txt.trim()) return;\n\n    if (!engineStore.selectedEngineId) {\n        uiStore.showNotification({ text: \"Please select an engine first.\", color: 'error' });\n        return;\n    }\n\n    if (workflowStore.workflowData) {\n        uiStore.showNotification({ text: \"Injecting to Workflow...\", color: 'info' });\n\n        try {\n            socketStore.sendMessage({\n                type: 'execute_workflow',\n                job_id: uuidv4(),\n                target_engine_id: engineStore.selectedEngineId,\n                payload: {\n                    workflow_data: workflowStore.workflowData,\n                    initial_payload: { prompt: txt }\n                }\n            });\n            commandPrompt.value = '';\n        } catch (err) {\n            console.error(\"Workflow Trigger Failed:\", err);\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: \"Failed to trigger workflow.\", color: 'error' });\n        }\n    } else {\n        try {\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: \"Running Receiver (Standalone)...\", color: 'info' });\n            await engineStore.runModule(\n                engineStore.selectedEngineId,\n                'prompt_receiver_module',\n                { prompt: txt }\n            );\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: \"Command Sent (No Active Workflow)\", color: 'success' });\n            commandPrompt.value = '';\n        } catch (err) {\n            console.error(\"Command Failed:\", err);\n        }\n    }\n}\n</script>\n\n<style scoped>\n.sidebar-content-card {\n  height: 100%;\n  display: flex;\n  flex-direction: column;\n  background-color: 'trigger_backup' : 'trigger_restore'\n    });\n\n    setTimeout(() => {\n        if (loadingAction.value === action) {\n            loadingAction.value = null;\n            lastStatus.value = 'error';\n            lastMessage.value = 'Request timed out. Is the Engine online?';\n        }\n    }, 10000);\n}\n\nonMounted(() => {\n    socketStore.addListener('backup_restore_result', onBackupRestoreResult);\n});\n\nonUnmounted(() => {\n    socketStore.removeListener('backup_restore_result', onBackupRestoreResult);\n});\n</script>\n", "structure": [{"name": "Template", "type": "ui", "line": 665, "icon": "fa-window-maximize"}], "organs": [], "metrics": {"loc": 103, "complexity": "CRITICAL", "todo_count": 3697, "security_risks": ["Potential Hardcoded URL with Creds detected"], "last_modified": 1767761078.7515502}, "raw_imports": ["@/store/locale", "@/store/ui", "@/store/socket", "vue", "pinia", "@/components/settings/SettingsField.vue"], "raw_calls": [], "raw_assets": [], "inbound_paths": [], "outbound_paths": ["app/flowork_architect/backend/parsers/vue.py"]}, "flowork-gui/template/web/src/components/settings/ProfileSettings.vue": {"id": 1093, "content": "//#######################################################################\n// WEBSITE https://flowork.cloud\n// File NAME : C:\\FLOWORK\\flowork-gui\\template\\web\\src\\components\\settings\\ProfileSettings.vue total lines 198 \n//#1. Zero Logic Mutation: Dilarang merubah alur logika, nama variabel, atau struktur if/try/loop.\n//#######################################################################\n\n<template>\n  <div>\n    <h2 class=\"section-title\">Public Cloud Profile</h2>\n    <p class=\"section-description\">\n      This information is stored on the Flowork cloud server and is visible to other users.\n    </p>\n\n    <v-skeleton-loader\n      v-if=\"profileStore.isLoading && !profileStore.profile\"\n      type=\"list-item-two-line, list-item-two-line\"\n      color=\"transparent\"\n      class=\"mb-4\"\n    ></v-skeleton-loader>\n\n    <v-alert\n      v-else-if=\"profileStore.error\"\n      type=\"error\"\n      variant=\"tonal\"\n      class=\"mb-4\"\n      closable\n    >\n      {{ profileStore.error }}\n      <template v-slot:append>\n        <v-btn size=\"small\" variant=\"text\" @click=\"profileStore.fetchProfile()\">Retry</v-btn>\n      </template>\n    </v-alert>\n\n    <v-form v-else-if=\"localProfile\" @submit.prevent=\"handleSave\">\n      <SettingsField\n        label=\"Public Username\"\n        hint=\"Must be 3-20 characters (letters, numbers, underscore).\"\n      >\n        <v-text-field\n          v-model=\"localProfile.name\"\n          variant=\"outlined\"\n          density=\"compact\"\n          hide-details=\"auto\"\n          placeholder=\"Your unique username\"\n          :rules=\"[usernameRule]\"\n          :error-messages=\"profileStore.error && profileStore.error.includes('Username') ? profileStore.error : ''\"\n          class=\"hacker-input\"\n        ></v-text-field>\n      </SettingsField>\n\n      <v-btn\n        color=\"cyan\"\n        @click=\"handleSave\"\n        :loading=\"isSaving\"\n        :disabled=\"!isFormValid\"\n        class=\"mt-4 save-button\"\n        block\n        size=\"large\"\n      >\n        Save Profile\n      </v-btn>\n    </v-form>\n\n    <div v-else class=\"text-center pa-8\">\n         <v-icon icon=\"mdi-account-off\" size=\"64\" color=\"grey\"></v-icon>\n         <p class=\"mt-4 text-grey\">Please connect your wallet to view profile.</p>\n    </div>\n  </div>\n</template>\n\n<script setup>\nimport { ref, watch, computed, onMounted } from 'vue';\nimport { useProfileStore } from '@/store/profile';\nimport { useAuthStore } from '@/store/auth';\nimport { useUiStore } from '@/store/ui';\nimport SettingsField from '@/components/settings/SettingsField.vue';\n\nconst profileStore = useProfileStore();\nconst authStore = useAuthStore();\nconst uiStore = useUiStore();\n\nconst localProfile = ref(null);\nconst isSaving = ref(false);\n\nconst usernameRule = (value) => {\n  if (!value) return true;\n  return /^[a-zA-Z0-9_]{3,20}$/.test(value) || 'Must be 3-20 alphanumeric characters or underscore.';\n};\n\nconst isFormValid = computed(() => {\n    if (!localProfile.value || !localProfile.value.name) return true;\n    return usernameRule(localProfile.value.name) === true;\n});\n\nwatch(() => profileStore.profile, (newProfile) => {\n  if (newProfile) {\n    localProfile.value = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(newProfile));\n  } else if (authStore.user) {\n    localProfile.value = {\n        name: authStore.user.username || '',\n        bio: '',\n        addr: authStore.user.public_address || ''\n    };\n  }\n}, { immediate: true, deep: true });\n\nwatch(() => authStore.token, (newToken) => {\n    if (newToken && !profileStore.profile) {\n         console.log('[ProfileSettings] Auth token ready. Retrying fetch...');\n         profileStore.fetchProfile();\n    }\n});\n\nonMounted(() => {\n    if (authStore.token || authStore.privateKey) {\n        profileStore.fetchProfile();\n    }\n});\n\nasync function handleSave() {\n  if (localProfile.value && isFormValid.value) {\n    isSaving.value = true;\n    try {\n        const success = await profileStore.saveProfile({\n          name: localProfile.value.name,\n          bio: localProfile.value.bio, // Tetap dikirim (hidden value)\n          avatar: localProfile.value.avatar,\n        });\n\n        if (success) {\n             uiStore.showNotification({ text: 'Profile updated successfully!', color: 'success' });\n             await profileStore.fetchProfile();\n        } else {\n             uiStore.showNotification({ text: 'Failed to update profile.', color: 'error' });\n        }\n    } catch (e) {\n        console.error(e);\n        uiStore.showNotification({ text: 'Error saving profile: ' + e.message, color: 'error' });\n    } finally {\n        isSaving.value = false;\n    }\n  }\n}\n</script>\n\n<style scoped>\n.section-title {\n  font-family: 'Orbitron', monospace;\n  font-size: 1.5rem;\n Flowork' }\n    },\n];\n\nconst router = createRouter({\n    history: createWebHistory(),\n    routes,\n});\n\nfunction updateMetaTag(name, content) {\n    let el = document.querySelector(`meta[name=\"${name}\"], meta[property=\"${name}\"]`);\n    if (!el) {\n        el = document.createElement('meta');\n        if (name.startsWith('og:')) {\n            el.setAttribute('property', name);\n        } else {\n            el.setAttribute('name', name);\n        }\n        el.setAttribute('data-vue-router-controlled', '');\n        document.head.appendChild(el);\n    }\n    el.setAttribute('content', content || '');\n}\n\nfunction updateLinkTag(rel, href) {\n    let el = document.querySelector(`link[rel=\"${rel}\"]`);\n    if (!el) {\n        el = document.createElement('link');\n        el.setAttribute('rel', rel);\n        el.setAttribute('data-vue-router-controlled', '');\n        document.head.appendChild(el);\n    }\n    el.setAttribute('href', href);\n}\n\nrouter.beforeEach((to, from, next) => {\n    const nearestWithTitle = to.matched.slice().reverse().find(r => r.meta && r.meta.title);\n    const nearestWithMeta = to.matched.slice().reverse().find(r => r.meta && r.meta.description);\n\n    const defaultTitle = 'Flowork | Free AI Workflow Automation: Open Source Platform (with Training)';\n    const defaultDesc = 'Build, train, and command AI agents with a visual, self-hosted workflow automation platform. The powerful, secure alternative to Zapier and Make.com.';\n    const title = nearestWithTitle ? nearestWithTitle.meta.title : defaultTitle;\n    const description = nearestWithMeta ? nearestWithMeta.meta.description : defaultDesc;\n    const fullUrl = `https://flowork.cloud${to.path}`;\n\n    document.title = title;\n    updateMetaTag('description', description);\n    updateMetaTag('og:title', title);\n    updateMetaTag('og:description', description);\n    updateMetaTag('og:url', fullUrl);\n    updateLinkTag('canonical', fullUrl);\n\n    const authStore = useAuthStore();\n    const isAuthenticated = authStore.isAuthenticated;\n\n    if (to.meta.requiresAuth && !isAuthenticated) {\n        return next({ name: 'Login', query: { redirect: to.fullPath } });\n    }\n\n    if (isAuthenticated && ['Lander', 'Login', 'Register'].includes(to.name)) {\n        return next({ name: 'Designer' });\n    }\n\n    next();\n});\n\nexport default router;\n", C:\\FLOWORK\\flowork-gui\\template\\web\\src\\store\\agent.js total lines 66 \n//#1. Dynamic Component Discovery (DCD): Hub wajib melakukan scanning file secara otomatis.\n//#2. Lazy Loading: Modul hanya di-import ke RAM saat dipanggil (On-Demand).\n//#3. Atomic Isolation: 1 File = 1 Fungsi dengan nama file yang identik dengan nama fungsi aslinya.\n//#4. Zero Logic Mutation: Dilarang merubah alur logika, nama variabel, atau struktur if/try/loop.\n//#######################################################################\n\nimport { defineStore } from 'pinia';\nimport { ref } from 'vue';\n\nexport const useAgentStore = defineStore('agent', () => {\n    const currentSessionId = ref(null);\n    const currentWsToken = ref(null);\n    const currentPhase = ref('idle');\n    const conversation = ref([]);\n    const isStreaming = ref(false);\n\n    function startSession(sessionId, wsToken) {\n        currentSessionId.value = sessionId;\n        currentWsToken.value = wsToken;\n        currentPhase.value = 'queued';\n        conversation.value = [];\n        isStreaming.value = false;\n    }\n\n    function addUserMessage(text) {\n        conversation.value.push({ type: 'user', content: text });\n    }\n\n    function addAgentChunk(chunk) {\n        isStreaming.value = true;\n        if (conversation.value.length > 0 && conversation.value[conversation.value.length - 1].type === 'agent') {\n            conversation.value[conversation.value.length - 1].content += chunk;\n        } else {\n            conversation.value.push({ type: 'agent', content: chunk });\n        }\n    }\n\n    function setPhase(phase) {\n        currentPhase.value = phase;\n        if (phase === 'running') isStreaming.value = false;\n        if (phase === 'done' || phase === 'error' || phase === 'cancelled') isStreaming.value = false;\n    }\n\n    function setDone(outcome) {\n        setPhase('done');\n    }\n\n    function setError(code, message) {\n        setPhase('error');\n        conversation.value.push({ type: 'error', content: `[${code}] ${message}` });\n    }\n\n    function reset() {\n        currentSessionId.value = null;\n        currentWsToken.value = null;\n        currentPhase.value = 'idle';\n        conversation.value = [];\n        isStreaming.value = false;\n    }\n\n    return {\n        currentSessionId, currentWsToken, currentPhase, conversation,\n        isStreaming, startSession, addUserMessage, addAgentChunk,\n        setPhase, setDone, setError, reset,\n    };\n});\n", "structure": [{"name": "startSession", "type": "function", "line": 20, "icon": "fa-code"}, {"name": "addUserMessage", "type": "function", "line": 28, "icon": "fa-code"}, {"name": 1100, "content": "//#######################################################################\n// WEBSITE https://flowork.cloud\n// File NAME : C:\\FLOWORK\\flowork-gui\\template\\web\\src\\store\\apps.js total lines 174 \n//#1. Dynamic Component Discovery (DCD): Hub wajib melakukan scanning file secara otomatis.\n//#2. Lazy Loading: Modul hanya di-import ke RAM saat dipanggil (On-Demand).\n//#3. Atomic Isolation: 1 File = 1 Fungsi dengan nama file yang identik dengan nama fungsi aslinya.\n//#4. Zero Logic Mutation: Dilarang merubah alur logika, nama variabel, atau struktur if/try/loop.\n//#######################################################################\n\nimport { defineStore } from 'pinia';\nimport { apiClient, getComponentIconUrl } from '@/api';\nimport { useAuthStore } from '@/store/auth';\nimport { useSocketStore } from '@/store/socket'; // [REQUIRED] Ambil Engine ID\n\nexport const useAppStore = defineStore('apps', {\n    state: () => ({\n        installedApps: [],\n        isLoading: false,\n        activeApps: [],\n        isSyncing: false,\n        currentTab: null\n    }),\n\n    getters: {\n        getAppById: (state) => (id) => state.installedApps.find(a => a.id === id),\n        getAppBySlug: (state) => (slug) => state.installedApps.find(a => a.slug === slug || a.id === slug),\n        getAllAppProperties: (state) => {\n            let props = [];\n            state.installedApps.forEach(app => {\n                if (app.properties) props = [...props, ...app.properties];\n            });\n            return props;\n        }\n    },\n\n    actions: {\n        setCurrentTab(instanceId) {\n            this.currentTab = instanceId;\n        },\n\n        async fetchInstalledApps() {\n            this.isLoading = true;\n            let localApps = [];\n            let cloudApps = [];\n            const authStore = useAuthStore();\n            const socketStore = useSocketStore();\n\n            console.log(\"[AppStore] Skeleton Sync: Fetching apps...\");\n\n            try {\n                const registryReq = await fetch('/apps-cloud/registry.json').catch(() => null);\n                if (registryReq && registryReq.ok) {\n                    const registry = await registryReq.json();\n                    const appPromises = registry.map(async (item) => {\n                        try {\n                            const manifestPath = `/apps-cloud/${item.path}/manifest.json`;\n                            const manifestReq = await fetch(manifestPath);\n                            if (!manifestReq.ok) return null;\n                            const manifest = await manifestReq.json();\n                            return {\n                                ...manifest,\n                                source: 'cloud',\n                                id: item.id,\n                                slug: item.slug || item.id,\n                                iconUrl: manifest.icon_file ? `/apps-cloud/${item.path}/${manifest.icon_file}` : `/assets/icons/app_default.svg`,\n                                targetUrl: `/apps-cloud/${item.path}/${manifest.entry_point || 'index.html'}`,\n                                tier: manifest.tier || 'free',\n                                properties: manifest.properties || []\n                            };\n                        } catch (e) { return null; }\n                    });\n                    const results = await Promise.all(appPromises);\n                    cloudApps = results.filter(a => a !== null);\n                }\n            } catch (error) {\n                console.warn(\"[AppStore] Cloud registry isolated.\");\n            }\n\n            if (authStore.isAuthenticated) {\n                try {\n                    const response = await apiClient.get('/apps').catch((err) => {\n                        console.warn(\"[AppStore] Skeleton Core /apps busy or offline.\");\n                        return { data: { apps: [] } };\n                    });\n\n                    const remoteData = response.data?.apps || response.data || [];\n\n                    if (Array.isArray(remoteData)) {\n                        const currentEngineId = socketStore.engineId;\n\n                        localApps = remoteData.map(a => {\n                            const manifest = a.manifest || {};\n                            const entryPoint = manifest.entry_point || 'index.html';\n\n                            const baseProxyPath = `/api/v1/apps/${a.id}/assets/${entryPoint}`;\n\n                            const finalTargetUrl = currentEngineId\n                                ? `${baseProxyPath}?engine_id=${currentEngineId}`\n                                : baseProxyPath;\n\n                            return {\n                                ...a,\n                                ...manifest,\n                                source: 'local',\n                                id: a.id,\n                                name: manifest.name || a.id,\n                                description: manifest.description || '',\n                                iconUrl: getComponentIconUrl('app', a.id),\n                                targetUrl: finalTargetUrl,\n                                properties: a.properties || manifest.properties || []\n                            };\n                        });\n                    }\n                } catch (error) {\n                    console.error(\"[AppStore] Error syncing with Skeleton Core:\", error);\n                }\n            }\n\n            this.installedApps = [...cloudApps, ...localApps];\n            console.log(`[AppStore] Sync Complete. Active Senses: ${this.installedApps.length}`);\n            this.isLoading = false;\n        },\n\n        async openApp(appId) {\n            if (this.installedApps.length === 0) await this.fetchInstalledApps();\n            const app = this.getAppById(appId);\n            if (!app) return;\n\n            const existing = this.activeApps.find(a => a.id === appId);\n            if (!existing) {\n                const newInstanceId = `app-${Date.now()}`;\n                this.activeApps.push({ ...app, instanceId: newInstanceId });\n                this.currentTab = newInstanceId;\n                this.syncRemoteState();\n            } else {\n                this.currentTab = existing.instanceId;\n            }\n        },\n\n        async restoreRemoteState() {\n            try {\n                if (this.installedApps.length === 0) await this.fetchInstalledApps();\n                const response = await apiClient.get('/user/state/active_apps').catch(() => ({ data: [] }));\n                const savedApps = response.data;\n\n                if (Array.isArray(savedApps) && savedApps.length > 0) {\n                    this.activeApps = savedApps.map(saved => {\n                        const original = this.installedApps.find(a => a.id === saved.id);\n                        return original ? { ...original, instanceId: saved.instanceId } : null;\n                    }).filter(a => a !== null);\n\n                    if (this.activeApps.length > 0 && !this.currentTab) {\n                        this.currentTab = this.activeApps[0].instanceId;\n                    }\n                }\n            } catch (error) {}\n        },\n\n        async syncRemoteState() {\n            if (this.isSyncing) return;\n            this.isSyncing = true;\n            try {\n                const payload = this.activeApps.map(a => ({ id: a.id, instanceId: a.instanceId, name: a.name }));\n                await apiClient.put('/user/state/active_apps', payload).catch(() => {});\n            } catch (error) {\n            } finally { this.isSyncing = false; }\n        },\n\n        closeApp(instanceId) {\n            this.activeApps = this.activeApps.filter(a => a.instanceId !== instanceId);\n            if (this.currentTab === instanceId) {\n                this.currentTab = this.activeApps.length ? this.activeApps[this.activeApps.length - 1].instanceId : null;\n            }\n            this.syncRemoteState();\n        }\n    }\n});\n", "structure": [{"name": "useAppStore", "type": "const", "line": 15, "icon": "fa-cube"}], "organs": [], "metrics": {"loc": 177, "complexity": "MEDIUM", "todo_count": 0, "security_risks": [], "last_modified": 1767761078.7591383}, "raw_imports": ["socket", "api", "app_default.svg", "index.html", "auth", "manifestReq.js", "manifest.js", "pinia", "registryReq.js", "registry.js"], "raw_calls": [], "raw_assets": [], "inbound_paths": ["flowork-gui/template/web/src/store/variables.js"], "outbound_paths": ["flowork-gui/template/web/src/store/socket.js", "flowork-gateway/app/queue/api.py", "app/flowork_architect/backend/parsers/html.py", "flowork-gui/template/web/src/api/modules/auth.js", "app/flowork_architect/backend/parsers/js.py"]}, "flowork-gui/template/web/src/store/articles.js": {"id": 1101, "content": "//#######################################################################\n// WEBSITE https://flowork.cloud\n// File NAME : C:\\FLOWORK\\flowork-gui\\template\\web\\src\\store\\articles.js total lines 101 \n//#1. Atomic Isolation: 1 File = 1 Fungsi dengan nama file yang identik dengan nama fungsi aslinya.\n//#4. Zero Logic Mutation: Dilarang merubah alur logika, nama variabel, atau struktur if/try/loop.\n//#######################################################################\n\nimport { defineStore } from 'pinia';\nimport { ref } from 'vue';\nimport { apiGetMyArticles, apiCreateArticle, apiUpdateArticle, apiDeleteArticle, apiGetArticleForEdit } from '@/api';\nimport { useUiStore } from './ui';\nimport router from '@/router';\n\nexport const useArticlesStore = defineStore('articles', () => {\n    const myArticles = ref([]);\n    const currentArticle = ref(null);\n    const isLoading = ref(false);\n    const uiStore = useUiStore();\n    async function fetchMyArticles() {\n        isLoading.value = true;\n        const result = await apiGetMyArticles();\n        if (result.error) {\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: result.error, color: 'error' });\n        } else {\n            myArticles.value = result;\n        }\n        isLoading.value = false;\n    }\n\n    async function loadArticleForEdit(articleId) {\n        isLoading.value = true;\n        currentArticle.value = null;\n        const result = await apiGetArticleForEdit(articleId);\n        if (result.error) {\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: result.error, color: 'error' });\n            router.push('/my-articles');\n            isLoading.value = false;\n            return { success: false, error: result.error };\n        } else {\n            currentArticle.value = result;\n            isLoading.value = false;\n            return { success: true, data: result };\n        }\n    }\n\n    async function saveArticle(articleData, mode) {\n        isLoading.value = true;\n        const uiStore = useUiStore();\n        const payload = { ...articleData };\n\n        try {\n            let result;\n            if (mode === 'edit') {\n                if (!articleData.id) {\n                    throw new Error(\"Article ID is missing for update operation.\");\n                }\n                result = await apiUpdateArticle(articleData.id, payload);\n            } else { // Mode 'create'\n                result = await apiCreateArticle(payload);\n            }\n            if (result.error) throw new Error(result.error);\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: 'Article saved successfully!', color: 'success' });\n            await fetchMyArticles();\n            router.push('/my-articles');\n\n            return { success: true, data: result };\n        } catch (e) {\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: e.message || 'Failed to save article.', color: 'error' });\n            return { success: false, error: e.message };\n        } finally {\n            isLoading.value = false;\n        }\n    }\n\n    async function deleteArticle(articleId) {\n        isLoading.value = true;\n        const uiStore = useUiStore();\n        try {\n            const result = await apiDeleteArticle(articleId);\n            if (result.error) throw new Error(result.error);\n            if (result.message) { // api/index.js mengembalikan { message: ... }\n                uiStore.showNotification({ text: 'Article deleted successfully.', color: 'info' });\n                await fetchMyArticles();\n            } else {\n                throw new Error('Delete API did not confirm success.');\n            }\n        } catch (e) {\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: e.message || 'Failed to delete article.', color: 'error' });\n        } finally {\n            isLoading.value = false;\n        }\n    }\n    return {\n "//#######################################################################\n// WEBSITE https://flowork.cloud\n// File NAME : C:\\FLOWORK\\flowork-gui\\template\\web\\src\\store\\auth.js total lines 231 \n//#1. Dynamic Component Discovery (DCD): Hub wajib melakukan scanning file secara otomatis.\n//#2. Lazy Loading: Modul hanya di-import ke RAM saat dipanggil (On-Demand).\n//#3. Atomic Isolation: 1 File = 1 Fungsi dengan nama file yang identik dengan nama fungsi aslinya.\n//#4. Zero Logic Mutation: Dilarang merubah alur logika, nama variabel, atau struktur if/try/loop.\n//#######################################################################\n\nimport { defineStore } from 'pinia';\nimport { ref, computed } from 'vue';\nimport { useSocketStore } from './socket';\nimport { ethers } from 'ethers';\nimport { useUiStore } from './ui';\nimport { apiDownloadLicenseFile, apiGetProfile } from '@/api';\nimport { useEngineStore } from './engines';\nimport { useWorkflowStore } from './workflow';\nimport { useComponentStore } from './components';\nimport { useSettingsStore } from './settings';\nimport { useProfileStore } from './profile';\n\nexport const useAuthStore = defineStore('auth', () => {\n  const privateKey = ref(localStorage.getItem('flowork_private_key'));\n  const user = ref(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('flowork_user_identity')));\n  const isMnemonicDialogVisible = ref(false);\n  const newMnemonic = ref('');\n  const isLoading = ref(false);\n  const error = ref(null);\n\n  const vipAddresses = ref([\n    \"0xF39733B34131c13E35733E9Af1adD78a5e768929\",\n    \"0x9f655D3e73FF7347aeabe61E475102d9914C8403\",\n    \"0x0F1F31783A93C94f5055E2A11AA28B2368bA982d\"\n  ]);\n\n  const isAuthenticated = computed(() => !!privateKey.value && !!user.value);\n\n  const hasPermission = computed(() => (permissionName) => {\n    if (isPremium.value) return true;\n    return isAuthenticated.value;\n  });\n\n  const isPremium = computed(() => {\n    if (!user.value || !user.value.id) return false;\n    return vipAddresses.value.map(a => a.toLowerCase()).includes(user.value.id.toLowerCase());\n  });\n\n  async function handleLoginSuccess() {\n    console.log(\"[AuthStore] handleLoginSuccess called. Syncing with GATEWAY...\");\n    const router = (await import('@/router')).default;\n\n    const engineStore = useEngineStore();\n    const socketStore = useSocketStore();\n    const uiStore = useUiStore();\n    const workflowStore = useWorkflowStore();\n    const componentStore = useComponentStore();\n    const settingsStore = useSettingsStore();\n    const profileStore = useProfileStore();\n    await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 50));\n    await workflowStore.fetchUserFavorites();\n    await componentStore.fetchUserFavorites();\n\n    await profileStore.fetchProfile();\n\n    console.log(\"[AuthStore] Fetching engine list from Gateway...\");\n    await engineStore.fetchEngines();\n    if (engineStore.allAvailableEngines.length === 0) {\n        console.warn(\"[AuthStore] User has no engines registered. Stopping connection sequence.\");\n        uiStore.showNotification({ text: \"Login successful, but no engines are registered. Please register an engine in 'My Engines'.\", color: 'warning', timeout: 7000 });\n        const currentRoute = router.currentRoute.value;\n        if (currentRoute.meta.requiresAuth && currentRoute.name !== 'MyEngines') {\n             console.log(`[AuthStore] User is on private page '${currentRoute.name}', forcing redirect to 'MyEngines'.`);\n             router.push({ name: 'MyEngines' });\n        } else {\n             console.log(`[AuthStore] User is on public page '${currentRoute.name}', allowing them to stay.`);\n        }\n        return;\n    }\n    console.log(`[AuthStore] Engine list fetched. Selected engine: ${engineStore.selectedEngineId}. Connecting WebSocket...`);\n    socketStore.connect();\n\n  }\n\n  async function createNewIdentity() {\n    isLoading.value = true;\n    error.value = null;\n    try {\n      const wallet = ethers.Wallet.createRandom();\n      newMnemonic.value = wallet.mnemonic.phrase;\n      isMnemonicDialogVisible.value = true;\n      localStorage.setItem('flowork_private_key_temp', wallet.privateKey);\n      const identity = {\n          id: wallet.address,\n          publicKey: wallet.publicKey,\n          username: wallet.address\n      };\n      localStorage.setItem('flowork_user_identity_temp', JSON.stringify(identity));\n      return true;\n    } catch (e) {\n      error.value = e.message || \"Failed to create identity.\";\n      return false;\n    } finally {\n      isLoading.value = false;\n    }\n  }\n\n  async function handleBackupConfirmation() {\n       const tempKey = localStorage.getItem('flowork_private_key_temp');\n       const tempIdentity = localStorage.getItem('flowork_user_identity_temp');\n       if (!tempKey || !tempIdentity) {\n           error.value = \"Failed to finalize identity. Temporary data not found.\";\n           isMnemonicDialogVisible.value = false;\n           return false;\n       }\n       localStorage.setItem('flowork_private_key', tempKey);\n       localStorage.setItem('flowork_user_identity', tempIdentity);\n       privateKey.value = tempKey;\n       user.value = JSON.parse(tempIdentity);\n\n       localStorage.removeItem('flowork_private_key_temp');\n       localStorage.removeItem('flowork_user_identity_temp');\n\n       isMnemonicDialogVisible.value = false;\n       newMnemonic.value = '';\n\n\n       return true;\n  }\n\n  async function importIdentity(keyOrMnemonic) {\n    isLoading.value = true;\n    error.value = null;\n    let wallet;\n    try {\n        wallet = keyOrMnemonic.startsWith('0x') ? new ethers.Wallet(keyOrMnemonic) : ethers.Wallet.fromPhrase(keyOrMnemonic);\n      localStorage.setItem('flowork_private_key', wallet.privateKey);\n        const identity = {\n            id: wallet.address,\n            publicKey: wallet.publicKey,\n            username: wallet.address\n        };\n        localStorage.setItem('flowork_user_identity', JSON.stringify(identity));\n        privateKey.value = wallet.privateKey;\n        user.value = identity;\n\n\n        return true;\n    } catch (e) {\n        console.error(\"Error importing identity:\", e);\n        error.value = \"Invalid Private Key or Mnemonic Phrase.\";\n        return false;\n    } finally {\n        isLoading.value = false;\n    }\n  }\n\n  async function downloadLicenseFile() {\n       const uiStore = useUiStore();\n\n       if (isPremium.value) {\n           uiStore.showNotification({ text: 'VIP Access Activated: Global Neural License Granted.', color: 'success' });\n           return;\n       }\n\n       if (!isAuthenticated.value) {\n           uiStore.showNotification({ text: 'You must be logged in to download a license.', color: 'error' });\n           return;\n       }\n       uiStore.showNotification({ text: 'Requesting license file from server...', color: 'info' });\n       try {\n           const licenseContent = await apiDownloadLicenseFile();\n           if (licenseContent.error) throw new Error(licenseContent.error);\n\n           const licenseString = JSON.stringify(licenseContent, null, 2);\n           const blob = new Blob([licenseString], { type: 'application/json' });\n           const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);\n           const a = document.createElement('a');\n           a.href = url;\n           a.download = 'license.lic';\n           document.body.appendChild(a);\n           a.click();\n             document.body.removeChild(a);\n           URL.revokeObjectURL(url);\n           uiStore.showNotification({ text: 'License file download started!', color: 'success' });\n       } catch (error) {\n           uiStore.showNotification({ text: error.message || 'Could not download license file.', color: 'error' });\n       }\n  }\n\n  async function logout() {\n    const socketStore = useSocketStore();\n    socketStore.disconnect();\n    privateKey.value = null;\n    user.value = null;\n    const profileStore = useProfileStore();\n    profileStore.clearProfile();\n\n    localStorage.removeItem('flowork_private_key');\n    localStorage.removeItem('flowork_user_identity');\n    localStorage.removeItem('flowork_selected_engine_id');\n\n    const router = (await import('@/router')).default;\n    router.push({ name: 'Lander' });\n\n    window.location.reload();\n  }\n  function handleLogoutError() {\n       console.warn(\"[AuthStore] handleLogoutError called (e.g., 401 Unauthorized). Logging out fully.\");\n       logout();\n  }\n\n  async function tryAutoLogin() {\n    isLoading.value = true;\n   if (privateKey.value && user.value) {\n     console.log(\"[AuthStore] Found existing local identity. Handling post-login sequence...\");\n   } else {\n        console.log(\"[AuthStore] No local identity found. Waiting for user action.\");\n   }\n    isLoading.value = false;\n  }\n\n  return {\n\n    user, privateKey, isAuthenticated, isLoading, error,\n    isMnemonicDialogVisible, newMnemonic,\n "//#######################################################################\n// WEBSITE https://flowork.cloud\n// File NAME : C:\\FLOWORK\\flowork-gui\\template\\web\\src\\store\\components.js total lines 289 \n//#1. Dynamic Component Discovery (DCD): Hub wajib melakukan scanning file secara otomatis.\n//#2. Lazy Loading: Modul hanya di-import ke RAM saat dipanggil (On-Demand).\n//#3. Atomic Isolation: 1 File = 1 Fungsi dengan nama file yang identik dengan nama fungsi aslinya.\n//#4. Zero Logic Mutation: Dilarang merubah alur logika, nama variabel, atau struktur if/try/loop.\n//#######################################################################\n\nimport { defineStore } from 'pinia';\nimport { ref, computed } from 'vue';\nimport { useSocketStore } from './socket';\nimport { useLocaleStore } from './locale';\nimport { apiGetUserComponentFavorites, apiSetUserComponentFavorites, apiSaveCustomComponent } from '@/api';\nimport { debounce } from '@/utils/debounce.js';\nimport { useAuthStore } from './auth';\nimport { useUiStore } from './ui';\nimport { useEngineStore } from './engines';\n\nconst CACHE_KEY_PREFIX = 'flowork_component_cache_';\n\nexport const useComponentStore = defineStore('components', () => {\n\n  const unifiedRegistry = ref({\n    items: [],      // All components from all types live here\n    isLoading: false,\n    hasFetched: false\n  });\n\n  const modules = computed(() => ({\n    items: unifiedRegistry.value.items.filter(i => i.componentType === 'modules' || i.type === 'module'),\n    isLoading: unifiedRegistry.value.isLoading,\n    hasFetched: unifiedRegistry.value.hasFetched\n  }));\n\n  const plugins = computed(() => ({\n    items: unifiedRegistry.value.items.filter(i => i.componentType === 'plugins' || i.type === 'plugin'),\n    isLoading: unifiedRegistry.value.isLoading,\n    hasFetched: unifiedRegistry.value.hasFetched\n  }));\n\n  const tools = computed(() => ({\n    items: unifiedRegistry.value.items.filter(i => i.componentType === 'tools' || i.type === 'tool'),\n    isLoading: unifiedRegistry.value.isLoading,\n    hasFetched: unifiedRegistry.value.hasFetched\n  }));\n\n  const triggers = computed(() => ({\n    items: unifiedRegistry.value.items.filter(i => i.componentType === 'triggers' || i.type === 'trigger'),\n    isLoading: unifiedRegistry.value.isLoading,\n    hasFetched: unifiedRegistry.value.hasFetched\n  }));\n\n  const favoriteComponents = ref([]);\n  const installingComponentId = ref(null);\n  const uninstallingComponentId = ref(null);\n\n  const fetchTimers = ref({});\n  const error = ref(null);\n\n  const isLoading = computed(() => unifiedRegistry.value.isLoading);\n  const allComponents = computed(() => unifiedRegistry.value.items);\n\n  const findComponentById = (id) => {\n    return unifiedRegistry.value.items.find(c => c.id === id);\n  };\n\n  /**\n   * Clears timers for a specific component type. Helper function.\n   * @param {string} type - Component type ('modules', 'plugins', etc.)\n   */\n  function clearTimersForType(type) {\n    if (fetchTimers.value[type]) {\n      clearTimeout(fetchTimers.value[type]?.realDataTimeoutId);\n      delete fetchTimers.value[type];\n    }\n  }\n\n  const saveFavoritesDebounced = debounce(async () => {\n    const authStore = useAuthStore();\n    if (!authStore.isAuthenticated) return;\n    try {\n        console.log(\"%c[ComponentStore] Debounced save: Updating favorites...\", \"color: #FFD600; font-weight: bold;\");\n        await apiSetUserComponentFavorites(favoriteComponents.value);\n    } catch (error) {\n        console.error(\"[ComponentStore] Failed to save favorites:\", error);\n        useUiStore().showNotification({ text: `Sync Error: ${error.message}`, color: 'error'});\n    }\n  }, 1500);\n\n  async function fetchUserFavorites() {\n    const authStore = useAuthStore();\n    if (!authStore.isAuthenticated) return;\n    try {\n        console.log(\"%c[ComponentStore] Loading Favorites from Cloud...\", \"color: #00E5FF;\");\n        const favorites = await apiGetUserComponentFavorites();\n        if (favorites.error) throw new Error(favorites.error);\n        favoriteComponents.value = favorites;\n    } catch (error) {\n        favoriteComponents.value = [];\n    }\n  }\n\n  function toggleFavorite(componentId) {\n    const index = favoriteComponents.value.indexOf(componentId);\n    if (index > -1) {\n        favoriteComponents.value.splice(index, 1);\n    } else {\n        favoriteComponents.value.push(componentId);\n    }\n    saveFavoritesDebounced();\n  }\n\n  async function installComponent(componentType, componentId) {\n    if (installingComponentId.value || uninstallingComponentId.value) return;\n    const socketStore = useSocketStore();\n    installingComponentId.value = componentId;\n    try {\n        await socketStore.sendMessage({\n            type: 'install_component',\n            component_type: componentType,\n            component_id: componentId,\n        });\n        console.log(`%c[ComponentStore] Installation requested: ${componentId}`, \"color: #FFD600;\");\n    } catch (e) {\n        installingComponentId.value = null;\n    }\n  }\n\n  async function uninstallComponent(componentType, componentId) {\n    if (installingComponentId.value || uninstallingComponentId.value) return;\n    const socketStore = useSocketStore();\n    uninstallingComponentId.value = componentId;\n    try {\n        await socketStore.sendMessage({\n            type: 'uninstall_component',\n            component_type: componentType,\n            component_id: componentId,\n        });\n    } catch (e) {\n        uninstallingComponentId.value = null;\n    }\n  }\n\n  function handleInstallStatusUpdate(data) {\n    const { component_id, success, message, is_installed } = data;\n\n    if (installingComponentId.value === component_id) installingComponentId.value = null;\n    if (uninstallingComponentId.value === component_id) uninstallingComponentId.value = null;\n\n    const uiStore = useUiStore();\n    uiStore.showNotification({ text: `${component_id}: ${message}`, color: success ? 'success' : 'error' });\n\n    const item = unifiedRegistry.value.items.find(i => i.id === component_id);\n    if (item) {\n        item.is_installed = is_installed;\n        saveToCache('unified', unifiedRegistry.value.items);\n    }\n  }\n\n  function updateComponentsList(type, components, errorMessage = null) {\n    unifiedRegistry.value.isLoading = false;\n    unifiedRegistry.value.hasFetched = true;\n\n    if (errorMessage) {\n        console.warn(`[ComponentStore] Skeleton Error for ${type}: ${errorMessage}`);\n        return;\n    }\n\n    console.log(`%c[ComponentStore] Hydrating ${type}: Found ${components.length} nodes.`, \"color: #00E5FF; font-weight: bold;\");\n\n    const processedNewItems = components.map(c => ({\n        ...c,\n        componentType: type,\n        is_example: false,\n        is_installed: c.is_installed ?? true // Default true for Skeleton Mode (PnP)\n    }));\n\n    const otherTypeItems = unifiedRegistry.value.items.filter(i => i.componentType !== type);\n    unifiedRegistry.value.items = [...otherTypeItems, ...processedNewItems];\n\n    error.value = null;\n    saveToCache('unified', unifiedRegistry.value.items);\n  }\n\n  function saveToCache(type, items) {\n      try { localStorage.setItem(CACHE_KEY_PREFIX + type, JSON.stringify(items)); } catch (e) {}\n  }\n\n  async function fetchComponentsForType(type, options = { reset: false }) {\n    clearTimersForType(type);\n\n    if (options.reset) {\n        unifiedRegistry.value.items = unifiedRegistry.value.items.filter(i => i.componentType !== type);\n    }\n\n    const hasThisType = unifiedRegistry.value.items.some(i => i.componentType === type);\n    if (!hasThisType) {\n        try {\n            const cachedData = localStorage.getItem(CACHE_KEY_PREFIX + 'unified');\n            if (cachedData) {\n                const parsedItems = JSON.parse(cachedData);\n                if (Array.isArray(parsedItems)) unifiedRegistry.value.items = parsedItems;\n            }\n        } catch (e) {}\n    }\n\n    unifiedRegistry.value.isLoading = true;\n    error.value = null;\n    const socketStore = useSocketStore();\n    const engineStore = useEngineStore();\n\n    if (socketStore.isConnected) {\n        try {\n            const payload = {\n                type: 'request_components_list',\n                component_type: type,\n                target_engine_id: engineStore.selectedEngineId\n            };\n            socketStore.sendMessage(payload);\n\n            fetchTimers.value[type] = {\n                realDataTimeoutId: setTimeout(() => {\n                    if (unifiedRegistry.value.isLoading) unifiedRegistry.value.isLoading = false;\n                }, 8000)\n            };\n        } catch (e) {\n            unifiedRegistry.value.isLoading = false;\n        }\n    } else {\n        if (unifiedRegistry.value.items.length > 0) unifiedRegistry.value.isLoading = false;\n    }\n  }\n\n  async function fetchAllComponents() {\n      console.log(\"%c[ComponentStore] Skeleton Deep Scan Triggered.\", \"color: #FFD600; font-weight: bold;\");\n      await Promise.all([\n          fetchComponentsForType('modules'),\n          fetchComponentsForType('plugins'),\n          fetchComponentsForType('tools'),\n          fetchComponentsForType('triggers')\n      ]);\n  }\n\n  async function forceRefetchAllComponents() {\n      await Promise.all([\n          fetchComponentsForType('modules',  { reset: true }),\n          fetchComponentsForType('plugins',  { reset: true }),\n          fetchComponentsForType('tools',    { reset: true }),\n          fetchComponentsForType('triggers', { reset: true })\n      ]);\n  }\n\n  /**\n   * Saves a new custom component created in Component Forge (Muscle).\n   */\n  async function saveCustomComponent(componentData) {\n      const uiStore = useUiStore();\n      try {\n          console.log(`[ComponentStore] Forging component: ${componentData.id}...`);\n          const result = await apiSaveCustomComponent(componentData);\n          if (result.error) throw new Error(result.error);\n          uiStore.showNotification({ text: `Component ${componentData.id} forged successfully!`, color: 'success' });\n          await fetchComponentsForType(componentData.type + 's', { reset: true });\n          return { success: true };\n      } catch (e) {\n          uiStore.showNotification({ text: `Forge Failed: ${e.message}`, color: 'error' });\n          return { success: false, error: e.message };\n      }\n  }\n\n  return {\n    modules, plugins, tools, triggers,\n    favoriteComponents,\n    installingComponentId,\n    uninstallingComponentId,\n    isLoading,\n    allComponents,\n    fetchComponentsForType,\n    fetchAllComponents,\n    forceRefetchAllComponents,\n    updateComponentsList,\n    findComponentById,\n    fetchUserFavorites,\n    toggleFavorite,\n    installComponent,\n    uninstallComponent,\n Dynamic Component Discovery (DCD): Hub wajib melakukan scanning file secara otomatis.\n//#2. Lazy Loading: Modul hanya di-import ke RAM saat dipanggil (On-Demand).\n//#3. Atomic Isolation: 1 File = 1 Fungsi dengan nama file yang identik dengan nama fungsi aslinya.\n//#4. Zero Logic Mutation: Dilarang merubah alur logika, nama variabel, atau struktur if/try/loop.\n//#######################################################################\n\nimport { defineStore } from 'pinia';\nimport { ref } from 'vue';\nimport { apiGetDashboardSummary } from '@/api';\n\nexport const useDashboardStore = defineStore('dashboard', () => {\n    const summary = ref({\n        active_jobs: [],\n        recent_activity: [],\n        execution_stats_24h: { success: 0, failed: 0 },\n        execution_timeseries_24h: { labels: [], datasets: [] },\n        system_overview: {\n widgets: 0,\n            triggers: 0,\n            presets: 0,\n            status: 'online'\n        },\n        top_failing_presets: [],\n        top_slowest_presets: [],\n        usage_stats: {\n            used: 0\n        },\n        total_engines: 0,\n        total_shared_with_me: 0\n    });\n    const isInitialLoading = ref(true);\n    const isRefreshing = ref(false);\n    const error = ref(null);\n\n    /**\n     * [English Note] Skeleton-Safe Summary Fetching\n     * Since 'ops_service' and 'diagnostics' are purged, this function\n     * now merges partial data from Core with GUI safe-defaults.\n     */\n    async function fetchDashboardSummary(isRefresh = false, engineId = null) {\n        if (!isRefresh) {\n            isInitialLoading.value = true;\n        }\n  const data = await apiGetDashboardSummary(engineId).catch(() => {\n                return { status: 'success', system_overview: { status: 'online' } };\n            });\n\n            summary.value = {\n                ...summary.value,\n                ...data,\n                execution_stats_24h: data.execution_stats_24h || summary.value.execution_stats_24h,\n                system_overview: {\n                    ...summary.value.system_overview,\n                    ...(data.system_overview || {}),\n                    status: 'online'\n                }\n            };\n\n            console.log(\"%c[DashboardStore] SKELETON SYNC OK\", \"color: #FFD600;\");\n\n        } catch (e) {\n            console.debug('[STORE] Summary muscle skipped (Skeleton Mode).');\n        } finally {\n            isInitialLoading.value = false;\n            isRefreshing.value = false;\n        }\n    }\n\n    function updateActiveJobs(activeJobsList) {\n        if (summary.value) {\n            summary.value.active_jobs = activeJobsList;\n        }\n    }\n\n    return {\n        summary,\n        isInitialLoading,\n        isRefreshing,\n        error,\n        fetchDashboardSummary,\n https://flowork.cloud\n// File NAME : C:\\FLOWORK\\flowork-gui\\template\\web\\src\\store\\engines.js total lines 299 \n//#1. Dynamic Component Discovery (DCD): Hub wajib melakukan scanning file secara otomatis.\n//#2. Lazy Loading: Modul hanya di-import ke RAM saat dipanggil (On-Demand).\n//#3. Atomic Isolation: 1 File = 1 Fungsi dengan nama file yang identik dengan nama fungsi aslinya.\n//#4. Zero Logic Mutation: Dilarang merubah alur logika, nama variabel, atau struktur if/try/loop.\n//#######################################################################\n\nimport { defineStore } from 'pinia';\nimport { ref, computed } from 'vue';\nimport { useAuthStore } from './auth';\nimport { useUiStore } from './ui';\nimport { useSocketStore } from './socket';\n\nimport api, {\n    apiFetchEngines,\n    apiRegisterEngine,\n    apiDeleteEngine,\n    apiFetchSharedEngines,\n    apiGrantShare,\n    apiRevokeShare,\n    apiFetchEngineShares\n} from '@/api';\n\nimport { useWorkflowStore } from './workflow';\nimport { useComponentStore } from './components';\nimport { useVariablesStore } from './variables';\nimport { useSettingsStore } from './settings';\n\nexport const useEngineStore = defineStore('engines', () => {\n    const engines = ref([]);\n    const sharedEngines = ref([]);\n    const isLoading = ref(false);\n    const error = ref(null);\n\n    const selectedEngineId = ref(localStorage.getItem('flowork_active_engine_id'));\n\n    const allAvailableEngines = computed(() => {\n        const owned = engines.value.map(e => ({\n            ...e,\n            isOwner: true,\n            owner: { username: useAuthStore().user?.username || 'You' }\n        }));\n        const shared = sharedEngines.value.map(e => ({\n            ...e,\n            isOwner: false\n        }));\n        return [...owned, ...shared].sort((a, b) => a.name.localeCompare(b.name));\n    });\n\n    const selectedEngine = computed(() => {\n        return allAvailableEngines.value.find(e => e.id === selectedEngineId.value);\n    });\n\n    const hasOnlineEngine = computed(() => {\n        return allAvailableEngines.value.some(e => e.status === 'online');\n    });\n\n    async function runModule(engineId, moduleId, payload) {\n        isLoading.value = true;\n        const uiStore = useUiStore();\n\n        console.log(`[EngineStore] Skeleton Execution: Module ${moduleId}`);\n\n        try {\n            if (!api) throw new Error(\"API Client not initialized\");\n\n            const rawWorkflowBody = {\n                nodes: [\n                    {\n                        id: \"direct_exec_node\",\n                        type: moduleId,\n                        config: {},\n                        position: { x: 0, y: 0 }\n                    }\n                ],\n                connections: [],\n                initial_payload: payload,\n                start_node_id: \"direct_exec_node\",\n                mode: \"EXECUTE\"\n            };\n\n            const response = await api.post('/workflow/execute_raw', rawWorkflowBody);\n\n            if (response.data && response.data.error) throw new Error(response.data.error);\n\n            console.log(\"[EngineStore] Raw Execution Queued. Job ID:\", response.data.job_id);\n            return response.data;\n\n        } catch (e) {\n            const errorMsg = e.response?.data?.error || e.message || 'Failed to execute module.';\n            console.error('[EngineStore] Module execution failed:', errorMsg);\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: errorMsg, color: 'error' });\n            throw e;\n        } finally {\n            isLoading.value = false;\n        }\n    }\n\n    async function fetchEngines() {\n        isLoading.value = true;\n        error.value = null;\n        console.log(\"[EngineStore] Syncing Engine List...\");\n        try {\n            const ownedResponseData = await apiFetchEngines();\n            if (ownedResponseData.error) throw new Error(ownedResponseData.error);\n\n            const currentStatusMap = {};\n            [...engines.value, ...sharedEngines.value].forEach(e => {\n                if (e.status) currentStatusMap[e.id] = e.status;\n            });\n            engines.value = ownedResponseData.map(engine => ({\n                ...engine,\n                status: currentStatusMap[engine.id] || engine.status || 'offline', // Default to offline if unknown\n                vitals: engine.vitals || null,\n                isOwner: true\n            }));\n\n            await fetchSharedEngines();\n\n            const currentSelectionValid = allAvailableEngines.value.some(e => e.id === selectedEngineId.value);\n            const activeIsOnline = allAvailableEngines.value.find(e => e.id === selectedEngineId.value)?.status === 'online';\n\n            if (!selectedEngineId.value || !currentSelectionValid || !activeIsOnline) {\n                const firstOnline = allAvailableEngines.value.find(e => e.status === 'online');\n                if (firstOnline) {\n                    console.log(`[EngineStore] Auto-switching to Online Engine: ${firstOnline.id}`);\n                    await setSelectedEngineId(firstOnline.id, true);\n                }\n            }\n\n        } catch (e) {\n            error.value = e.error || e.message || 'Failed to fetch engines.';\n            console.error('[EngineStore] Error fetching engines:', error.value);\n        } finally {\n            isLoading.value = false;\n        }\n    }\n\n    async function fetchSharedEngines() {\n        try {\n            const sharedData = await apiFetchSharedEngines();\n            if (sharedData.error) throw new Error(sharedData.error);\n\n            const currentStatusMap = {};\n            sharedEngines.value.forEach(e => { if(e.status) currentStatusMap[e.id] = e.status; });\n\n            sharedEngines.value = sharedData.map(engine => ({\n                ...engine,\n                status: currentStatusMap[engine.id] || engine.status || 'offline',\n                vitals: engine.vitals || null,\n                isOwner: false\n            }));\n        } catch (e) {\n            sharedEngines.value = [];\n        }\n    }\n\n    async function registerEngine(name) {\n        isLoading.value = true;\n        error.value = null;\n        const uiStore = useUiStore();\n        try {\n            const newEngineData = await apiRegisterEngine({ name });\n            if (newEngineData.error) throw new Error(newEngineData.error);\n\n            uiStore.showTokenDialog({\n                title: 'New Engine Registered',\n                text: \"Copy these credentials to your engine's .env file:\",\n                items: [\n                    { label: 'FLOWORK_ENGINE_ID', value: newEngineData.id },\n                    { label: 'FLOWORK_ENGINE_TOKEN', value: newEngineData.raw_token }\n                ]\n            });\n            await fetchEngines();\n            await setSelectedEngineId(newEngineData.id, true);\n            return true;\n        } catch (e) {\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: e.message, color: 'error' });\n            return false;\n        } finally {\n            isLoading.value = false;\n        }\n    }\n\n    async function deleteEngine(engineId) {\n        isLoading.value = true;\n        const uiStore = useUiStore();\n        try {\n            const result = await apiDeleteEngine(engineId);\n            if (result.error) throw new Error(result.error);\n            engines.value = engines.value.filter(e => e.id !== engineId);\n            if (selectedEngineId.value === engineId) {\n                await setSelectedEngineId(allAvailableEngines.value[0]?.id || null);\n            }\n            return true;\n        } catch (e) {\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: e.message, color: 'error' });\n            return false;\n        } finally {\n            isLoading.value = false;\n        }\n    }\n\n    function updateEngineStatus(statusData) {\n        const engineRef = engines.value.find(e => e.id === statusData.engine_id) ||\n            sharedEngines.value.find(e => e.id === statusData.engine_id);\n\n        if (engineRef) {\n            const oldStatus = engineRef.status;\n            engineRef.status = statusData.status || engineRef.status;\n            if (statusData.vitals) engineRef.vitals = statusData.vitals;\n\n            if (engineRef.id === selectedEngineId.value && engineRef.status === 'online' && oldStatus !== 'online') {\n                console.log(`[EngineStore] Active engine ${engineRef.id} is now ONLINE. Syncing components...`);\n                useComponentStore().forceRefetchAllComponents();\n            }\n        }\n    }\n\n    function syncEngineStatuses(statusList) {\n        if (!Array.isArray(statusList)) return;\n        statusList.forEach(s => {\n            const engine = engines.value.find(e => e.id === s.engine_id) || sharedEngines.value.find(e => e.id === s.engine_id);\n            if (engine) {\n                engine.status = s.status;\n                if (s.vitals) engine.vitals = s.vitals;\n            }\n        });\n    }\n\n    function updateEngineVitals(vitalsData) {\n        const engineRef = engines.value.find(e => e.id === vitalsData.engine_id) ||\n            sharedEngines.value.find(e => e.id === vitalsData.engine_id);\n        if (engineRef) {\n            engineRef.vitals = vitalsData.vitals;\n            if (engineRef.status !== 'online') {\n                engineRef.status = 'online';\n                if (engineRef.id === selectedEngineId.value) {\n                    useComponentStore().fetchAllComponents();\n                }\n            }\n        }\n    }\n\n    async function setSelectedEngineId(engineId, triggerReconnect = true) {\n        const socketStore = useSocketStore();\n        if (selectedEngineId.value !== engineId || engineId === null) {\n            selectedEngineId.value = engineId;\n\n            if (engineId) {\n                localStorage.setItem('flowork_active_engine_id', engineId);\n\n                const targetEngine = allAvailableEngines.value.find(e => e.id === engineId);\n                if (targetEngine) {\n                    const endpoint = targetEngine.tunnel_url || targetEngine.public_url || targetEngine.base_url;\n                    if (endpoint) {\n                        localStorage.setItem('flowork_active_engine_url', endpoint);\n                        console.log(`[EngineStore] \ud83c\udfaf Target Set: ${endpoint}`);\n                    } else {\n                        localStorage.removeItem('flowork_active_engine_url');\n                    }\n                }\n\n                if (triggerReconnect) socketStore.switchEngine(engineId);\n            } else {\n                localStorage.removeItem('flowork_active_engine_id');\n                localStorage.removeItem('flowork_active_engine_url'); // Clean up\n                if (triggerReconnect) socketStore.disconnect();\n            }\n        }\n    }\n\n    async function fetchEngineShares(engineId) {\n        try {\n            return await apiFetchEngineShares(engineId);\n        } catch (e) { return []; }\n    }\n\n    async function grantShare(engineId, shareWithIdentifier, role = 'reader') {\n        try {\n            await apiGrantShare(engineId, shareWithIdentifier, role);\n            return true;\n        } catch (e) { return false; }\n    }\n\n    async function revokeShare(engineId, sharedUserId) {\n         try {\n            await apiRevokeShare(engineId, sharedUserId);\n            return true;\n        } catch (e) { return false; }\n    }\n\n    return {\n        engines, sharedEngines, isLoading, error, selectedEngineId,\n        allAvailableEngines, selectedEngine, hasOnlineEngine,\n        fetchEngines, registerEngine, deleteEngine, updateEngineStatus, updateEngineVitals, setSelectedEngineId,\n = useAuthStore();\n\t\t\tconst enginesStore = useEngineStore();\n\t\t\tconst componentsStore = useComponentStore();\n\t\t\tconst logsStore = useLogStore();\n\n\t\t\tif (state.socket) ['websocket'],\n\t\t\t\treconnectionAttempts: 5,\n\t\t\t\treconnectionDelay: 1000,\n\t\t\t});\n\n\t\t\tsocket.on('connect', () => {\n\t\t\t\tconsole.log('Socket.IO connected to Gateway.');\n\t\t\t\tcommit('SET_GATEWAY_CONNECTED', true);\n\n\t\t\t\tconst token = authStore.token;\n\t\t\t\tif (token) {\n\t\t\t\t\tsocket.emit('authenticate', { token ${state.activeEngineId}`);\n\t\t\t\t\tsocket.emit('request_engine_status', { engine_id: state.activeEngineId });\n\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t});\n\n\t\t\tsocket.on('disconnect', (reason) => {\n\t\t\t\tconsole.log(`Socket.IO disconnected: ${reason}`);\n\t\t\t\tcommit('SET_GATEWAY_CONNECTED', false);\n\t\t\t\tconst enginesStore = data);\n\t\t\t});\n\n\t\t\tsocket.on('log_message', (data) => {\n\t\t\t\tlogsStore.addLog(data);\n\t\t\t});\n\n\t\t\tsocket.on('execution_update', (data) => {\n\t\t\t\tconsole.log('Execution update:', data);\n\t\t\t});\n\n\t\t\tsocket.on('node_status_update', (data) => {\n\t\t\t\tconsole.log('Node status update:', data);\n\t\t\t});\n\n\t\t\tcommit('SET_SOCKET', socket);\n\t\t},\n\n\t\thandleEngineStatusUpdate({ commit, dispatch, rootGetters, rootState }, data) {\n\t\t\tconsole.log('Socket: Received engine_status_updated', data);\n\t\t\tlet activeEngineId = rootState.gateway.activeEngineId;\n\t\t\tconst enginesStore = useEngineStore();\n\t\t\tconst componentsStore = useComponentStore();\n\n\t\t\tenginesStore.updateEngineInList(data);\n\n\t\t\tif Auto-activating ${data.engine_id}`);\n\t\t\t\tdispatch('setActiveEngine', data.engine_id);\n\t\t\t\tactiveEngineId = data.engine_id;\n\t\t\t}\n\n\t\t\tif (data.engine_id === activeEngineId) {\n\t\t\t\tenginesStore.SET_ENGINE_STATUS(data.status);\n\n\t\t\t\tif (data.status === 'online') {\n\t\t\t\t\tconsole.log(`Socket: Active engine ${activeEngineId} is online. Fetching components.`);\n\t\t\t\t\tcomponentsStore.fetchComponents();\n\t\t\t\t} else {\n\t\t\t\t\tconsole.log(`Socket: Active engine ${activeEngineId} went offline. Loading examples.`);\n\t\t\t\t\tcomponentsStore.loadExampleComponents();\n\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t},\n\n\t\tasync checkGatewayStatus({ commit, state }) {\n\t\t\tif (!state.api) return;\n\t\t\ttry else {\n\t\t\t\t\tcommit('SET_API_STATUS', 'unhealthy');\n\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t} catch (error) {\n\t\t\t\tconsole.error('Gateway API health check failed:', error);\n\t\t\t\tcommit('SET_API_STATUS', 'unhealthy');\n\t\t\t\tcommit('SET_GATEWAY_CONNECTED', false);\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t},\n\n\t\tasync setActiveEngine({ commit, dispatch, state, rootState }, engineId) {\n\t\t\tconst enginesStore = components for new engine.');\n\t\t\tconst componentsStore = useComponentStore();\n\t\t\tawait componentsStore.initializeComponents();\n\t\t},\n\n\t\tSET_GATEWAY_URL(state, url) const worker = ref(null);\n    const isWorking = ref(false);\n\n    function initWorker() {\n        if (window.Worker) {\n            if (worker.value) {\n                worker.value.terminate();\n            }\n            worker.value = new Worker(new URL('../workers/layout.worker.js', import.meta.url), { type: 'module' });\n            worker.value.onmessage = (event) => {\n                const uiStore = useUiStore();\n                const workflowStore = useWorkflowStore();\n\n                const { type, nodes } = event.data;\n\n                if (type === 'LAYOUT_COMPLETE') {\n                    console.log('[Main Thread] Menerima layout baru dari worker.');\n                    workflowStore.applyAutoLayout(nodes);\n                    uiStore.showNotification({ text: 'Auto-layout applied successfully!', color: 'success' });\n                }\n                isWorking.value = false;\n            };\n            worker.value.onerror = (error) => {\n                console.error('[Worker Error]', error);\n                const uiStore = useUiStore();\n                uiStore.showNotification({ text: `Layout worker error: ${error.message}`, color: 'error' });\n                isWorking.value = false;\n            };\n        } else {\n            console.error('Web Workers are not supported in this browser.');\n            alert('Your browser does not support Web Workers, this feature will be unavailable.');\n        }\n    }\n\n    function runAutoLayout() {\n        if (!worker.value) {\n            initWorker();\n        }\n\n        if (isWorking.value) {\n            console.warn('Layout worker is already busy.');\n            return;\n        }\n\n        const workflowStore = useWorkflowStore();\n        const uiStore = useUiStore();\n\n        if (workflowStore.nodes.length === 0) {\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: 'Canvas is empty, nothing to layout.', color: 'info' });\n            return;\n        }\n\n        isWorking.value = true;\n        uiStore.showNotification({ text: 'Calculating optimal layout in background...', color: 'info' });\n\n        const nodesToProcess = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(workflowStore.nodes));\n        worker.value.postMessage({\n            nodes: nodesToProcess\n        });\n    }\n\n    return {\n        isWorking,\n        initWorker,\n Dynamic Component Discovery (DCD): Hub wajib melakukan scanning file secara otomatis.\n//#2. Lazy Loading: Modul hanya di-import ke RAM saat dipanggil (On-Demand).\n//#3. Atomic Isolation: 1 File = 1 Fungsi dengan nama file yang identik dengan nama fungsi aslinya.\n//#4. Zero Logic Mutation: Dilarang merubah alur logika, nama variabel, atau struktur if/try/loop.\n//#######################################################################\n\nimport { defineStore } from 'pinia';\nimport { ref, computed } from 'vue';\nimport en from '@/locales/en.json';\nimport id from '@/locales/id.json';\n\nexport const useLocaleStore = defineStore('locale', () => {\n    const currentLang = ref(localStorage.getItem('flowork_language') || 'en');\n    const dictionaries = { en, id };\n    const isDictionaryLoaded = ref(false); // Biar kompatibel sama UI loader kalo ada\n\n    const loc = computed(() => {\n        return (key) => {\n            const dict = dictionaries[currentLang.value] || dictionaries['en'];\n\n            const cleanKey = key.startsWith('loc.') ? key.substring(4) : key;\n\n            return dict[cleanKey] || key;\n        };\n    });\n\n    function setLanguage(lang) {\n        if (!dictionaries[lang]) {\n            console.warn(`[Locale] Language ${lang} not supported, falling back to en`);\n            lang = 'en';\n        }\n\n        currentLang.value = lang;\n\n        localStorage.setItem('flowork_language', lang);\n\n        document.documentElement.lang = lang;\n\n        console.log(`[Locale] Switched to: ${lang}`);\n    }\n\n    async function fetchDictionary() {\n        console.log('[Locale] Initializing dictionary...');\n\n        const saved = localStorage.getItem('flowork_language');\n\n        if (saved) {\n            setLanguage(saved);\n        } else {\n            const browserLang = navigator.language.split('-')[0];\n            setLanguage(dictionaries[browserLang] ? browserLang : 'en');\n        }\n\n        isDictionaryLoaded.value = true;\n        return true;\n    }\n\n    return {\n        currentLang,\n        loc,\n        setLanguage,\n        fetchDictionary, // Ini dia penyelamatnya\n        isDictionaryLoaded\n    };\n});\n", "structure": [{"name": "setLanguage", "type": "function", "line": 30, "icon": "fa-code"}, {"name": "fetchDictionary", "type": "function", "line": 45, "icon": "fa-code"}, {"name": "useLocaleStore", "type": "const", "line": 15, "icon": "fa-cube"}], "organs": [], "metrics": {"loc": 68, "complexity": "LOW", "todo_count": 0, "security_risks": [], "last_modified": 1767761078.7653925}, "raw_imports": ["id.json", "id.js", "vue", "en.json", "pinia", "en.js"], "raw_calls": [], "raw_assets": [], "inbound_paths": ["flowork-gui/template/web/src/main.js", "flowork-gui/template/web/src/store/components.js", "flowork-gui/template/web/src/store/settings.js"], "outbound_paths": ["app/flowork_architect/backend/parsers/json.py", "app/flowork_architect/backend/parsers/js.py", "app/flowork_architect/backend/parsers/vue.py"]}, "flowork-gui/template/web/src/store/logs.js": {"id": 1109, "content": "//#######################################################################\n// WEBSITE https://flowork.cloud\n// File NAME : C:\\FLOWORK\\flowork-gui\\template\\web\\src\\store\\logs.js total lines 80 \n//#1. Dynamic Component Discovery (DCD): Hub wajib melakukan scanning file secara otomatis.\n//#2. Lazy Loading: Modul hanya di-import ke RAM saat dipanggil (On-Demand).\n//#3. Atomic Isolation: 1 File = 1 Fungsi dengan nama file yang identik dengan nama fungsi aslinya.\n//#4. Zero Logic Mutation: Dilarang merubah alur logika, nama variabel, atau struktur if/try/loop.\n//#######################################################################\n\nimport { defineStore } from 'pinia';\nimport { ref, computed } from 'vue';\nimport { useComponentStore } from './components';\nimport { useWorkflowStore } from './workflow';\n\nexport const useLogStore = defineStore('logs', () => {\n    const timelineEntries = ref([]);\n    const executionLogs = ref([]);\n    const componentStore = useComponentStore();\n\n    const detailedTimeline = computed(() => {\n        const workflowStore = useWorkflowStore();\n\n        return timelineEntries.value.map(entry => {\n            const node = workflowStore.nodes.find(n => n.id === entry.node_id);\n\n            let displayName = entry.node_id || 'System Event';\n\n            if (node) {\n                displayName = node.label;\n            } else if (entry.module_id) {\n                 const component = componentStore.findComponentById(entry.module_id);\n                 if (component) displayName = component.name;\n            }\n\n            return {\n                ...entry,\n                node_name: displayName,\n                status: entry.status ? entry.status.toUpperCase() : 'UNKNOWN'\n            };\n        }).sort((a, b) => (a.timestamp || 0) - (b.timestamp || 0));\n    });\n\n\n    function updateTimelineEntry(log) {\n        if (!log.node_id) return;\n\n        if (!log.timestamp && log.ts) log.timestamp = log.ts;\n        if (!log.timestamp) log.timestamp = Date.now() / 1000;\n\n        const existingEntryIndex = timelineEntries.value.findIndex(e => e.node_id === log.node_id);\n        if (existingEntryIndex > -1) {\n            timelineEntries.value[existingEntryIndex] = { ...timelineEntries.value[existingEntryIndex], ...log };\n        } else {\n            timelineEntries.value.push(log);\n        }\n    }\n\n    function addExecutionLog(log) {\n        const safeLog = {\n            message: log.message || JSON.stringify(log),\n            level: (log.level || 'INFO').toUpperCase(),\n            timestamp: log.ts || log.timestamp || Date.now() / 1000,\n            source: log.source || 'SYSTEM',\n            node_id: log.node_id\n        };\n        executionLogs.value.push(safeLog);\n\n    }\n\n    function clearLogs() {\n        timelineEntries.value = [];\n        executionLogs.value = [];\n    }\n\n    return {\n        timelineEntries,\n        detailedTimeline,\n        executionLogs,\n        updateTimelineEntry,\n        addExecutionLog,\n        clearLogs,\n    };\n});\n", "structure": [{"name": "updateTimelineEntry", "type": "function", "line": 44, "icon": "fa-code"}, {"name":
