"//#######################################################################\n// WEBSITE https://flowork.cloud\n// File NAME : C:\\FLOWORK\\flowork-gui\\template\\web\\src\\store\\marketplace.js total lines 427 \n//#1. Dynamic Component Discovery (DCD): Hub wajib melakukan scanning file secara otomatis.\n//#2. Lazy Loading: Modul hanya di-import ke RAM saat dipanggil (On-Demand).\n//#3. Atomic Isolation: 1 File = 1 Fungsi dengan nama file yang identik dengan nama fungsi aslinya.\n//#4. Zero Logic Mutation: Dilarang merubah alur logika, nama variabel, atau struktur if/try/loop.\n//#######################################################################\n\nimport { defineStore } from 'pinia';\nimport { ref } from 'vue';\nimport {\n    apiGetMarketplaceItems,\n    apiPublishMarketplaceItem,\n    apiDeleteMarketplaceItem,\n    apiVoteMarketplaceItem,\n    apiListCapsules,\n    apiGetCapsule,\n    apiInstallCapsule,\n    apiRemixCapsule\n} from '@/api';\nimport { useUiStore } from './ui';\nimport { useWorkflowStore } from './workflow';\nimport { useAuthStore } from './auth';\n\nconst GITHUB_USER = 'flowork-dev';\nconst GITHUB_REPO = 'flowork-presets';\nconst GITHUB_BRANCH = 'main';\nconst BASE_RAW_URL = `https://raw.githubusercontent.com/${GITHUB_USER}/${GITHUB_REPO}/${GITHUB_BRANCH}`;\n\nconst LOCAL_ENGINE_API_BASE = 'http://localhost:8989/api/v1';\n\nexport const useMarketplaceStore = defineStore('marketplace', () => {\n    const items = ref([]);\n    const selectedItem = ref(null);\n    const isLoadingList = ref(false);\n    const isLoadingDetail = ref(false);\n    const isPublishing = ref(false);\n    const error = ref(null);\n    const userVotes = ref({});\n\n    const capsules = ref([]);\n    const selectedCapsule = ref(null);\n    const isLoadingCapsuleList = ref(false);\n    const isLoadingCapsuleDetail = ref(false);\n    const capsuleError = ref(null);\n\n    /**\n     * HYBRID LIST: Fetch from Database (D1) via API Gateway\n     */\n    async function fetchItems(filters = { type: 'preset' }) {\n        isLoadingList.value = true;\n        error.value = null;\n        try {\n            const itemList = await apiGetMarketplaceItems(filters);\n            if (itemList.error) throw new Error(itemList.error);\n\n            items.value = itemList.map(i => ({\n                ...i,\n                desc: i.desc || i.description || 'No description available.',\n                likes: i.likes || 0,\n                dislikes: i.dislikes || 0\n            }));\n\n            console.log(`[MarketStore] Fetched ${itemList.length} items.`);\n        } catch (e) {\n            error.value = e.message || 'Failed to fetch marketplace items.';\n            console.error(`[MarketStore] ${error.value}`);\n        } finally {\n            isLoadingList.value = false;\n        }\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * (English Hardcode) ROBUST DETAIL FETCHING\n     * Fixes \"Description Empty\" and \"Data Missing\" by aggressively searching the JSON structure.\n     */\n    async function fetchItemDetail(id) {\n        isLoadingDetail.value = true;\n        error.value = null;\n        selectedItem.value = null;\n\n        try {\n            let itemMeta = items.value.find(i => i.id === id) || {};\n\n            let downloadUrl = itemMeta.download_url;\n            if (!downloadUrl) {\n                 downloadUrl = `${BASE_RAW_URL}/presets/${id}.json`;\n            }\n\n            console.log(`[MarketStore] Fetching detail from: ${downloadUrl}`);\n\n            const response = await fetch(downloadUrl);\n            if (!response.ok) throw new Error(`Failed to download: ${response.statusText}`);\n\n            const rawText = await response.text();\n            let fullData = {};\n            try {\n                fullData = JSON.parse(rawText);\n            } catch (e) {\n                console.warn(\"[MarketStore] Not valid JSON, assuming raw content.\");\n                fullData = { data: rawText }; // Fallback wrapper\n            }\n\n\n            const contentObj = fullData.content || fullData.data || fullData;\n\n            const hasZip = contentObj.zip_data || contentObj.zip_file || fullData.zip_data;\n            let finalType = itemMeta.type || fullData.type || (hasZip ? 'module' : 'preset');\n\n            let finalZipData = contentObj.zip_data || contentObj.zip_file || fullData.zip_data;\n\n            let finalDesc =\n                   contentObj.description || contentObj.desc\n                || fullData.description || fullData.desc\n                || fullData.meta?.description || fullData.meta?.desc\n                || itemMeta.desc || itemMeta.description\n                || 'No description provided.';\n\n            let finalAuthor =\n                   fullData.author || fullData.owner\n                || fullData.meta?.author\n                || itemMeta.author || 'Community';\n\n            selectedItem.value = {\n                id: fullData.id || itemMeta.id || id,\n                name: fullData.name || itemMeta.name || id,\n                type: finalType,\n                desc: finalDesc,\n                author: finalAuthor,\n                price: fullData.price || itemMeta.price || 0,\n                likes: itemMeta.likes || 0,\n                dislikes: itemMeta.dislikes || 0,\n                created_at: fullData.created_at || itemMeta.created_at,\n                version: fullData.version || '1.0.0',\n\n                data: hasZip ? finalZipData : contentObj\n            };\n\n            console.log(\"[MarketStore] Detail Loaded:\", {\n                type: finalType,\n                hasData: !!selectedItem.value.data,\n                descLen: finalDesc.length\n            });\n\n            return selectedItem.value;\n\n        } catch (e) {\n            error.value = e.message || 'Failed to fetch item detail.';\n            console.error(\"[MarketStore] Error:\", e);\n            return null;\n        } finally {\n            isLoadingDetail.value = false;\n        }\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * PUBLISH PRESET (From Workflow Canvas)\n     */\n    async function publishCurrentWorkflow(formData) {\n        const uiStore = useUiStore();\n        const workflowStore = useWorkflowStore();\n\n        if (!formData.name) {\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: 'Item name is required.', color: 'error' });\n            return false;\n        }\n\n        const workflowData = workflowStore.getWorkflowForPublishing;\n        if (!workflowData || workflowData.nodes.length === 0) {\n             uiStore.showNotification({ text: 'Cannot publish an empty workflow.', color: 'error' });\n            return false;\n        }\n\n        isPublishing.value = true;\n        error.value = null;\n\n        const payload = {\n            type: 'preset',\n            name: formData.name,\n            desc: formData.desc,\n            price: formData.price || 0,\n            data: workflowData\n        };\n\n        try {\n            const result = await apiPublishMarketplaceItem(payload);\n            if (result.error) throw new Error(result.error);\n\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: 'Preset published successfully!', color: 'success' });\n            await fetchItems();\n            return true;\n        } catch (e) {\n            const msg = e.message || 'Unknown Error';\n            error.value = msg;\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: `Publish Error: ${msg}`, color: 'error' });\n            return false;\n        } finally {\n            isPublishing.value = false;\n        }\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * (English Hardcode) PUBLISH SMART PACKAGE (Pre-zipped by Frontend)\n     * Used by ModuleToolbox -> MarketplacePublishDialog flow\n     */\n    async function publishSmartPackage(payload) {\n        const uiStore = useUiStore();\n        isPublishing.value = true;\n        error.value = null;\n\n        try {\n            console.log(`[MarketStore] Publishing smart package: ${payload.name}`);\n\n            const apiPayload = {\n                type: payload.type,\n                name: payload.name,\n                desc: payload.description || payload.desc,\n                price: payload.price || 0,\n                data: {\n                    id: payload.name,\n                    type: payload.type,\n                    name: payload.name,\n                    description: payload.description,\n                    zip_data: payload.zip_file // This is the Base64 content\n                }\n            };\n\n            const result = await apiPublishMarketplaceItem(apiPayload);\n            if (result.error) throw new Error(result.error);\n\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: `${payload.name} published successfully!`, color: 'success' });\n            await fetchItems({ type: payload.type });\n            return true;\n\n        } catch (e) {\n            const msg = e.message || 'Publish Failed';\n            error.value = msg;\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: `Publish Error: ${msg}`, color: 'error' });\n            return false;\n        } finally {\n            isPublishing.value = false;\n        }\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * (English Hardcode) LEGACY/BACKUP: Server-side Zipping\n     */\n    async function publishComponent(componentPayload) {\n        const uiStore = useUiStore();\n        isPublishing.value = true;\n        error.value = null;\n\n        try {\n            const targetId = componentPayload.id || componentPayload.name;\n            console.log(`[MarketStore] Preparing to package ${componentPayload.type}: ${targetId}`);\n\n            const packageResp = await fetch(`${LOCAL_ENGINE_API_BASE}/components/package`, {\n                method: 'POST',\n                headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },\n                body: JSON.stringify({\n                    type: componentPayload.type,\n                    id: targetId\n                })\n            });\n\n            if (!packageResp.ok) {\n                const errText = await packageResp.text();\n                throw new Error(`Local Engine Packaging Failed: ${errText}`);\n            }\n\n            const packageData = await packageResp.json();\n\n            const fileContent = {\n                id: targetId,\n                type: componentPayload.type,\n                name: componentPayload.name,\n                description: componentPayload.desc || packageData.description,\n                zip_data: packageData.zip_data\n            };\n\n            componentPayload.data = fileContent;\n\n            if (!componentPayload.desc) {\n                componentPayload.desc = packageData.description;\n            }\n\n            const result = await apiPublishMarketplaceItem(componentPayload);\n            if (result.error) throw new Error(result.error);\n\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: `${componentPayload.type} published successfully!`, color: 'success' });\n            await fetchItems({ type: componentPayload.type });\n            return true;\n        } catch (e) {\n             const msg = e.message || 'Unknown Error';\n             error.value = msg;\n             uiStore.showNotification({ text: `Publish Error: ${msg}`, color: 'error' });\n             return false;\n        } finally {\n            isPublishing.value = false;\n        }\n    }\n\n    async function deleteItem(id) {\n        const uiStore = useUiStore();\n        try {\n            const response = await apiDeleteMarketplaceItem(id);\n            if (response.error) throw new Error(response.error);\n\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: 'Item deleted successfully!', color: 'success' });\n            await fetchItems();\n            selectedItem.value = null;\n            return true;\n        } catch(e) {\n             const msg = e.message || 'Delete Failed';\n             uiStore.showNotification({ text: `Delete Failed: ${msg}`, color: 'error' });\n             return false;\n        }\n    }\n\n    async function handleVote(itemId, voteType) {\n        const authStore = useAuthStore();\n        const uiStore = useUiStore();\n\n        if (!authStore.isAuthenticated) {\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: 'Please connect your wallet to vote.', color: 'warning' });\n            return;\n        }\n\n        try {\n            const result = await apiVoteMarketplaceItem(itemId, voteType);\n            if (result.error) throw new Error(result.error);\n\n            const newStatus = result.newVoteStatus;\n            const itemIndex = items.value.findIndex(i => i.id === itemId);\n            if (itemIndex > -1) {\n                const oldStatus = userVotes.value[itemId] || 0;\n                let deltaLike = 0;\n                let deltaDislike = 0;\n\n                if (oldStatus === 1) deltaLike--;\n                if (oldStatus === -1) deltaDislike--;\n                if (newStatus === 1) deltaLike++;\n                if (newStatus === -1) deltaDislike++;\n\n                items.value[itemIndex].likes = Math.max(0, items.value[itemIndex].likes + deltaLike);\n                items.value[itemIndex].dislikes = Math.max(0, items.value[itemIndex].dislikes + deltaDislike);\n\n                if (selectedItem.value && selectedItem.value.id === itemId) {\n                    selectedItem.value.likes = items.value[itemIndex].likes;\n                    selectedItem.value.dislikes = items.value[itemIndex].dislikes;\n                }\n            }\n\n            userVotes.value[itemId] = newStatus;\n            let msg = newStatus === 1 ? 'Liked!' : (newStatus === -1 ? 'Disliked!' : 'Vote removed.');\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: msg, color: 'info' });\n\n        } catch (e) {\n            const msg = e.message || 'Voting Failed';\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: `Vote Error: ${msg}`, color: 'error' });\n        }\n    }\n\n    async function fetchCapsules() {\n        isLoadingCapsuleList.value = true;\n        capsuleError.value = null;\n        try {\n            const data = await apiListCapsules();\n            if (data.error) throw new Error(data.error);\n            capsules.value = data.items || [];\n        } catch (e) {\n            capsuleError.value = e.message;\n        } finally {\n            isLoadingCapsuleList.value = false;\n        }\n    }\n\n    async function fetchCapsuleDetails(capsuleId) {\n        isLoadingCapsuleDetail.value = true;\n        selectedCapsule.value = null;\n        try {\n            const data = await apiGetCapsule(capsuleId);\n            if (data.error) throw new Error(data.error);\n            selectedCapsule.value = data;\n            return data;\n        } catch (e) {\n            capsuleError.value = e.message;\n            return null;\n        } finally {\n            isLoadingCapsuleDetail.value = false;\n        }\n    }\n\n    async function installCapsule(capsulePayload) {\n        const ui = useUiStore();\n        try {\n            const installed = await apiInstallCapsule(capsulePayload);\n            if (installed.error) throw new Error(installed.error);\n            ui.showNotification({ text: `Capsule '${installed.capsule_id}' installed!`, color: 'success' });\n            await fetchCapsules();\n            return true;\n        } catch (e) {\n            ui.showNotification({ text: `Install failed: ${e.message}`, color: 'error' });\n            return false;\n        }\n    }\n\n    async function remixCapsule(baseId, newId, patch) {\n        const ui = useUiStore();\n        try {\n "//#######################################################################\n// WEBSITE https://flowork.cloud\n// File NAME : C:\\FLOWORK\\flowork-gui\\template\\web\\src\\store\\news.js total lines 137 \n//#1. Dynamic Component Discovery (DCD): Hub wajib melakukan scanning file secara otomatis.\n//#2. Lazy Loading: Modul hanya di-import ke RAM saat dipanggil (On-Demand).\n//#3. Atomic Isolation: 1 File = 1 Fungsi dengan nama file yang identik dengan nama fungsi aslinya.\n//#4. Zero Logic Mutation: Dilarang merubah alur logika, nama variabel, atau struktur if/try/loop.\n//#######################################################################\n\nimport { defineStore } from 'pinia';\nimport { ref, computed } from 'vue';\nimport { apiFetchNews } from '@/api';\n\nasync function fetchYouTubeNews() {\n    const YOUTUBE_CHANNEL_ID = 'UCULzlhJUh-_VjdCXu-GouOQ'; // Contoh: Google Developers\n    const RSS_URL = `https://www.youtube.com/feeds/videos.xml?channel_id=${YOUTUBE_CHANNEL_ID}`;\n\n    const API_URL = `https://api.rss2json.com/v1/api.json?rss_url=${encodeURIComponent(RSS_URL)}`;\n\n    console.log('[STORE] Fetching YouTube news from:', API_URL);\n\n    try {\n        const response = await fetch(API_URL);\n        if (!response.ok) {\n            throw new Error(`rss2json API returned status ${response.status}`);\n        }\n        const data = await response.json();\n\n        if (data.status !== 'ok') {\n            throw new Error(`rss2json API error: ${data.message}`);\n        }\n\n        return data.items.map(item => ({\n            title: item.title,\n            link: item.link,\n            pubDate: item.pubdate,\n            imageUrl: item.thumbnail,\n            source: 'YouTube'\n        }));\n\n    } catch (e) {\n        console.error('[STORE] Failed to fetch YouTube news:', e);\n        return [];\n    }\n}\n\n\nexport const useNewsStore = defineStore('news', () => {\n    const articles = ref([]);\n    const isLoading = ref(false);\n    const error = ref(null);\n    const currentPage = ref(1);\n    const itemsPerPage = ref(10);\n\n    const totalPages = computed(() => {\n        return Math.ceil(articles.value.length / itemsPerPage.value);\n    });\n\n    const paginatedArticles = computed(() => {\n        const startIndex = (currentPage.value - 1) * itemsPerPage.value;\n        const endIndex = startIndex + itemsPerPage.value;\n        return articles.value.slice(startIndex, endIndex);\n    });\n\n    async function fetchNews() {\n        isLoading.value = true;\n        error.value = null;\n\n        try {\n            const [coreResult, youtubeResult] = await Promise.allSettled([\n                apiFetchNews(),\n                fetchYouTubeNews()\n            ]);\n\n            let coreArticles = [];\n            let youtubeArticles = [];\n            if (coreResult.status === 'fulfilled' && !coreResult.value.error) {\n                console.log('[STORE] Fetched Core news:', coreResult.value.length);\n                coreArticles = coreResult.value;\n            } else if (coreResult.status === 'rejected' || (coreResult.value && coreResult.value.error)) {\n                console.warn('[STORE] Failed to fetch Core news (core/gateway might be offline):', coreResult.reason || coreResult.value.error);\n            }\n\n            if (youtubeResult.status === 'fulfilled') {\n                console.log('[STORE] Fetched YouTube news:', youtubeResult.value.length);\n                youtubeArticles = youtubeResult.value;\n            } else {\n                console.error('[STORE] YouTube fetch promise was rejected:', youtubeResult.reason);\n                error.value = 'Failed to load YouTube news feed.';\n            }\n\n            const allArticles = [...coreArticles, ...youtubeArticles];\n\n            const uniqueLinks = new Set();\n            const uniqueAndSortedArticles = allArticles\n                .filter(article => {\n                    if (!article.link || uniqueLinks.has(article.link)) {\n                        return false;\n                    }\n                    uniqueLinks.add(article.link);\n                    return true;\n                })\n                .sort((a, b) => new Date(b.pubDate) - new Date(a.pubDate));\n\n            articles.value = uniqueAndSortedArticles;\n\n            if (articles.value.length === 0 && error.value) {\n                console.error('[STORE] No articles loaded and an error occurred.');\n            } else if (articles.value.length === 0) {\n                console.warn('[STORE] No articles found from any source.');\n                error.value = \"No news or videos found.\"\n            }\n\n\n        } catch (e) {\n            error.value = e.message || 'Failed to fetch news.';\n            console.error('[STORE] Global failure in fetchNews:', e);\n        } finally {\n            isLoading.value = false;\n        }\n    }\n\n    function setPage(page) {\n        if (page > 0 && page <= totalPages.value) {\n            currentPage.value = page;\n        }\n    }\n\n    return {\n        articles,\n        isLoading,\n        error,\n        fetchNews,\n        currentPage,\n        itemsPerPage,\n        totalPages,\n        paginatedArticles,\n        setPage\n    };\n});\n", "structure": [{"name": "fetchYouTubeNews", "type": "function", "line": 14, "icon": "fa-code"}, {"name": webhook_enabled: false,\n        global_error_handler_enabled: false,\n        global_error_workflow_preset: null\n    };\n\n    const settings = ref({ ...defaultSettings });\n    const isLoading =     }\n    }\n\n    async function fetchSettings() {\n        isLoading.value = true;\n        try {\n            const response = await cloudApiClient.get('/user/preferences');\n            if (response.data && !response.data.error) {\n                settings.value = { ...settings.value, ...response.data };\n\n                const localeStore = useLocaleStore();\n                if (settings.value.language && settings.value.language !== localeStore.currentLang) {\n                    localeStore.setLanguage(settings.value.language);\n                }\n            }\n        } "//#######################################################################\n// WEBSITE https://flowork.cloud\n// File NAME : C:\\FLOWORK\\flowork-gui\\template\\web\\src\\store\\share.js total lines 128 \n//#1. Dynamic Component Discovery (DCD): Hub wajib melakukan scanning file secara otomatis.\n//#2. Lazy Loading: Modul hanya di-import ke RAM saat dipanggil (On-Demand).\n//#3. Atomic Isolation: 1 File = 1 Fungsi dengan nama file yang identik dengan nama fungsi aslinya.\n//#4. Zero Logic Mutation: Dilarang merubah alur logika, nama variabel, atau struktur if/try/loop.\n//#######################################################################\n\nimport { defineStore } from 'pinia';\nimport { ref } from 'vue';\nimport { apiGetWorkflowShares, apiCreateShareLink, apiUpdateSharePermission, apiDeleteShare } from '@/api';\nimport { useUiStore } from './ui';\n\nexport const useShareStore = defineStore('share', () => {\n    const isModalOpen = ref(false);\n    const workflowToShare = ref(null);\n    const shares = ref([]);\n    const isLoading = ref(false);\n    const isLoadingShares = ref(false);\n\n\n    /**\n     * Membuka modal sharing untuk workflow tertentu.\n     * @param {object} workflow - Objek workflow yang akan di-share, minimal punya 'name'.\n     */\n    async function openShareModal(workflow) {\n        if (!workflow || !workflow.name) {\n            console.error('[ShareStore] Failed to open share modal: workflow data incomplete.');\n            return;\n        }\n        workflowToShare.value = workflow;\n        isModalOpen.value = true;\n        shares.value = []; // Kosongkan dulu\n        await fetchShares(); // Langsung fetch daftar link yang sudah ada\n    }\n\n    function closeShareModal() {\n        isModalOpen.value = false;\n        workflowToShare.value = null;\n        shares.value = [];\n    }\n\n    async function fetchShares() {\n        if (!workflowToShare.value) return;\n        isLoadingShares.value = true;\n        const uiStore = useUiStore();\n        try {\n            console.log(`[ShareStore] Fetching shares for workflow: ${workflowToShare.value.name}`);\n            const result = await apiGetWorkflowShares(workflowToShare.value.name);\n            if (result.error) throw new Error(result.error);\n            shares.value = result; // Simpan daftar link\n        } catch (error) {\n            console.error('[ShareStore] Failed to fetch shares:', error);\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: error.message || 'Failed to fetch share links.', color: 'error' });\n            shares.value = [];\n        } finally {\n            isLoadingShares.value = false;\n        }\n    }\n\n    async function createShareLink(permissionLevel, linkName) {\n        if (!workflowToShare.value) return;\n\n        const uiStore = useUiStore();\n        isLoading.value = true;\n        try {\n            console.log(`[ShareStore] Creating share link for ${workflowToShare.value.name} with permission ${permissionLevel}`);\n            const newShare = await apiCreateShareLink(workflowToShare.value.name, permissionLevel, linkName);\n            if (newShare.error) throw new Error(newShare.error); // Handle error dari API\n            shares.value.push(newShare); // Tambahkan link baru ke list\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: 'Share link created successfully!', color: 'success' });\n        } catch (error) {\n            console.error('[ShareStore] Failed to create share link:', error);\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: error.message || 'Failed to create share link.', color: 'error' });\n        } finally {\n            isLoading.value = false;\n        }\n    }\n\n    async function updateShare(shareId, newPermission) {\n        const uiStore = useUiStore();\n        isLoading.value = true; // Bisa gunakan isLoading atau state terpisah\n        try {\n            console.log(`[ShareStore] Updating permission for share ${shareId} to ${newPermission}`);\n            const updatedShare = await apiUpdateSharePermission(shareId, newPermission);\n            if (updatedShare.error) throw new Error(updatedShare.error);\n            const shareIndex = shares.value.findIndex(s => s.share_id === shareId); // PERBAIKAN: Gunakan share_id\n            if (shareIndex > -1) {\n                shares.value[shareIndex].permission_level = newPermission;\n            }\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: 'Permission updated.', color: 'info' });\n        } catch (error) {\n            console.error('[ShareStore] Failed to update permission:', error);\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: error.message || 'Failed to update permission.', color: 'error' });\n        } finally {\n            isLoading.value = false;\n        }\n    }\n\n    async function deleteShare(shareId) {\n        const uiStore = useUiStore();\n        isLoading.value = true;\n        try {\n            console.log(`[ShareStore] Deleting share link ${shareId}`);\n            const result = await apiDeleteShare(shareId);\n            if (result.error) throw new Error(result.error);\n            shares.value = shares.value.filter(s => s.share_id !== shareId); // PERBAIKAN: Gunakan share_id\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: 'Share link deleted.', color: 'info' });\n        } catch (error) {\n            console.error('[ShareStore] Failed to delete share link:', error);\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: error.message || 'Failed to delete share link.', color: 'error' });\n        } finally {\n            isLoading.value = false;\n        }\n    }\n\n    return {\n        isModalOpen,\n        workflowToShare,\n        shares,\n        isLoading,\n        isLoadingShares,\n        openShareModal,\n        closeShareModal,\n        fetchShares,\n        createShareLink,\n        updateShare,\n        deleteShare\n    };\n});\n", "structure": [{"name": "openShareModal", "type": "function", "line": 27, "icon": "fa-code"}, {"name": "closeShareModal", "type": "function", "line": 38, "icon": "fa-code"}, {"name": "fetchShares", "type": "function", "line": 44, "icon": "fa-code"}, {"name": "createShareLink", "type": "function", "line": 62, "icon": "fa-code"}, {"name": "updateShare", "type": "function", "line": 81, "icon": "fa-code"}, {"name": "deleteShare", "type": "function", "line": 101, "icon": "fa-code"}, {"name": "useShareStore", "type": "const", "line": 15, "icon": "fa-cube"}], "organs": [], "metrics": {"loc": 131, "complexity": "MEDIUM", "todo_count": 0, "security_risks": [], "last_modified": 1767761078.7705805}, "raw_imports": ["ui", "api", "pinia", "vue"], "raw_calls": [], "raw_assets": [], "inbound_paths": [], "outbound_paths": ["flowork-gateway/app/queue/api.py", "app/flowork_architect/backend/parsers/vue.py", "flowork-gui/template/web/src/store/ui.js"]}, "flowork-gui/template/web/src/store/socket.js": {"id": 1116, "content": "//#######################################################################\n// WEBSITE https://flowork.cloud\n// File NAME : C:\\FLOWORK\\flowork-gui\\template\\web\\src\\store\\socket.js total lines 219 \n//#1. Dynamic Component Discovery (DCD): Hub wajib melakukan scanning file secara otomatis.\n//#2. Lazy Loading: Modul hanya di-import ke RAM saat dipanggil (On-Demand).\n//#3. Atomic Isolation: 1 File = 1 Fungsi dengan nama file yang identik dengan nama fungsi aslinya.\n//#4. Zero Logic Mutation: Dilarang merubah alur logika, nama variabel, atau struktur if/try/loop.\n//#######################################################################\n\nimport { defineStore } from 'pinia';\nimport { ref, computed } from 'vue';\nimport { io } from 'socket.io-client';\nimport { useAuthStore } from './auth';\nimport { useUiStore } from './ui';\nimport { useEngineStore } from './engines';\nimport { useAgentStore } from './agent'; // Import new independent store\n\nimport { getGatewayUrl } from '@/api';\nimport { getAuthHeaders, PAYLOAD_VERSION } from './socket/auth';\nimport { registerSocketListeners } from './socket/listeners';\n\nexport const useSocketStore = defineStore('socket', () => {\n    const socket = ref(null);\n    const isConnecting = ref(false);\n    const connectionError = ref(null);\n    const resolvedGatewayUrl = ref(null);\n    const isGracePeriod = ref(true);\n    const currentEngineStatus = ref({\n        isBusy: false,\n        cpuPercent: null,\n        memoryPercent: null\n    });\n    const engineVitals = ref(null);\n\n    const isConnected = computed(() => socket.value?.connected || false);\n    const isDevEngine = computed(() => {\n        const engineStore = useEngineStore();\n        return engineStore.selectedEngine?.isDev || false;\n    });\n\n    async function connect() {\n        if (socket.value?.connected) return;\n        if (isConnecting.value) return;\n\n        const authStore = useAuthStore();\n        const engineStore = useEngineStore();\n        if (!authStore.isAuthenticated) {\n            isGracePeriod.value = false;\n            return;\n        }\n\n        isConnecting.value = true;\n        isGracePeriod.value = true;\n        setTimeout(() => { if (!isConnected.value) isGracePeriod.value = false; }, 3000);\n\n        connectionError.value = null;\n\n        const gatewayUrl = getGatewayUrl();\n        resolvedGatewayUrl.value = gatewayUrl;\n        console.log(`[Socket] Targeting: ${gatewayUrl}`);\n\n        let authHeaders;\n        try {\n            authHeaders = await getAuthHeaders();\n        } catch (error) {\n            connectionError.value = `Auth Failed: ${error.message}`;\n            isConnecting.value = false;\n            isGracePeriod.value = false;\n            authStore.logout();\n            return;\n        }\n\n        const socketPath = \"/api/socket.io\";\n        const socketNamespace = \"/gui-socket\";\n\n        let baseSocketUrl = gatewayUrl;\n\n        if (import.meta.env.VITE_SOCKET_URL) {\n             baseSocketUrl = import.meta.env.VITE_SOCKET_URL.replace(/\\/$/, \"\");\n        }\n\n        const socketUrl = baseSocketUrl + socketNamespace;\n\n        let targetEngineId = engineStore.selectedEngineId;\n        if (!targetEngineId) targetEngineId = localStorage.getItem('flowork_selected_engine_id');\n\n        const queryParams = {};\n        if (targetEngineId) queryParams.engine_id = targetEngineId;\n\n        try {\n            const newSocket = io(socketUrl, {\n                path: socketPath,\n                transports: ['websocket'],\n                autoConnect: false,\n                reconnection: true,\n                reconnectionAttempts: Infinity,\n                reconnectionDelay: 1000,\n                reconnectionDelayMax: 5000,\n                timeout: 60000,\n                ackTimeout: 60000,\n                auth: { headers: authHeaders },\n                extraHeaders: authHeaders, // [TUNNEL FIX] Kadang tunnel butuh header di handshake awal\n                query: queryParams\n            });\n\n            socket.value = newSocket;\n\n            registerSocketListeners(socket.value, {\n                currentEngineStatus,\n                engineVitals,\n                isConnecting,\n                isGracePeriod,\n                connectionError,\n                CURRENT_PAYLOAD_VERSION: PAYLOAD_VERSION\n            });\n\n            socket.value.connect();\n        } catch (error) {\n            isConnecting.value = false;\n            isGracePeriod.value = false;\n        }\n    }\n\n    function disconnect() {\n        if (socket.value) {\n            socket.value.disconnect();\n            socket.value = null;\n        }\n        isConnecting.value = false;\n        connectionError.value = null;\n        resolvedGatewayUrl.value = null;\n        currentEngineStatus.value = { isBusy: false, cpuPercent: null, memoryPercent: null };\n        engineVitals.value = null;\n        isGracePeriod.value = false;\n        useAgentStore().reset(); // Call external agent store\n    }\n\n    async function sendMessage(payload) {\n        if (!isConnected.value || !socket.value) {\n            useUiStore().showConnectEngineDialog();\n            throw new Error(\"Socket not connected\");\n        }\n\n        const eventName = payload.type;\n        if (!eventName) return;\n        const engineStore = useEngineStore();\n        if (!payload.target_engine_id && engineStore.selectedEngineId) {\n            payload.target_engine_id = engineStore.selectedEngineId;\n        }\n\n        const versionedPayload = {\n            v: PAYLOAD_VERSION,\n            payload: { ...payload }\n        };\n        try {\n            console.log(`%c[SocketStore] SENDING ${eventName}:`, \"color: #FFA000; font-weight: bold;\", versionedPayload);\n            socket.value.emit(eventName, versionedPayload);\n        } catch (error) {\n            console.error(`[SocketStore] Error emitting '${eventName}':`, error);\n        }\n    }\n\n    async function dispatchAppEvent(appId, eventName, eventData = {}) {\n        if (!isConnected.value) return;\n\n        const payload = {\n            type: 'gw:dispatch_event',\n            payload: {\n                event_name: eventName,\n                event_data: eventData,\n                source: 'gui_user_action',\n                target_app_id: appId\n            }\n        };\n\n        console.log(`%c[Nervous] Dispatching to App ${appId}: ${eventName}`, \"color: #e91e63\", eventData);\n        await sendMessage(payload);\n    }\n\n    async function joinAgentSession(sessionId, wsToken) {\n        if (!isConnected.value || !socket.value) return;\n        const agentStore = useAgentStore();\n        agentStore.startSession(sessionId, wsToken);\n        socket.value.emit('gui:join', { session_id: sessionId, ws_token: wsToken }, (ack) => {\n            if (!ack.ok) agentStore.setError('JOIN_FAILED', ack.error);\n        });\n    }\n\n    async function sendAgentInput(input) {\n        const agentStore = useAgentStore();\n        const sessionId = agentStore.currentSessionId;\n        if (!isConnected.value || !socket.value || !sessionId) return;\n\n        let payload;\n        if (typeof input === 'string') {\n            payload = { session_id: sessionId, text: input };\n            agentStore.addUserMessage(input);\n        } else {\n            payload = { session_id: sessionId, tool: input };\n        }\n        socket.value.emit('gui:input', payload);\n    }\n\n    function switchEngine(newEngineId) {\n        console.log(`%c[SocketStore] PURGE MODE: Switching to ${newEngineId}`, \"color: #FFD600; font-weight: bold;\");\n        if (isConnected.value || socket.value) {\n            socket.value.disconnect();\n            socket.value = null;\n        }\n        useEngineStore().setSelectedEngineId(newEngineId);\n        setTimeout(() => { connect(); }, 200); // Sedikit delay biar localstorage sync dulu\n    }\n\n    return {\n        socket, isConnected, isConnecting, connectionError, resolvedGatewayUrl,\n        currentEngineStatus, engineVitals, isDevEngine, isGracePeriod,\n        connect, disconnect, sendMessage, switchEngine,\n "outbound_paths": ["app/flowork_architect/backend/parsers/vue.py"]}, "flowork-gui/template/web/src/store/variables.js": {"id": 1118, "content": "//#######################################################################\n// WEBSITE https://flowork.cloud\n// File NAME : C:\\FLOWORK\\flowork-gui\\template\\web\\src\\store\\variables.js total lines 130 \n//#1. Dynamic Component Discovery (DCD): Hub wajib melakukan scanning file secara otomatis.\n//#2. Lazy Loading: Modul hanya di-import ke RAM saat dipanggil (On-Demand).\n//#3. Atomic Isolation: 1 File = 1 Fungsi dengan nama file yang identik dengan nama fungsi aslinya.\n//#4. Zero Logic Mutation: Dilarang merubah alur logika, nama variabel, atau struktur if/try/loop.\n//#######################################################################\n\nimport { defineStore } from 'pinia';\nimport { ref } from 'vue';\nimport { apiGetVariables, apiSaveVariable, apiDeleteVariable, apiSyncVariableToLocal } from '@/api';\nimport { useAppStore } from './apps';\n\nexport const useVariablesStore = defineStore('variables', () => {\n    const variables = ref([]);\n    const isLoading = ref(false);\n    const error = ref(null);\n\n    const BASE_SYSTEM_VARIABLES = [\n        { name: 'OPENAI_API_KEY', defaultValue: 'CHANGE THIS API' },\n        { name: 'GEMINI_API_KEY', defaultValue: 'CHANGE THIS API' },\n        { name: 'DEEPSEEK_API_KEY', defaultValue: 'CHANGE THIS API' }\n    ];\n\n    async function fetchVariables() {\n        isLoading.value = true;\n        error.value = null;\n        try {\n            const cloudData = await apiGetVariables().catch(() => []);\n            let varList = Array.isArray(cloudData) ? cloudData : [];\n\n            for (const v of varList) {\n                if (v.name && v.value) {\n                    await apiSyncVariableToLocal(v.name, v.value);\n                }\n            }\n\n            const appStore = useAppStore();\n            if (appStore.installedApps.length === 0) {\n                await appStore.fetchInstalledApps();\n            }\n\n            let dynamicRequirements = [...BASE_SYSTEM_VARIABLES];\n\n            appStore.installedApps.forEach(app => {\n                if (app.properties && Array.isArray(app.properties)) {\n                    app.properties.forEach(prop => {\n                        dynamicRequirements.push({\n                            name: prop.id || prop.name,\n                            defaultValue: prop.default || '',\n                            description: prop.description,\n                            label: prop.label,\n                            isAppConfig: true,\n                            appName: app.name,\n                            isTypeSecret: prop.type === 'secret' || prop.type === 'password'\n                        });\n                    });\n                }\n            });\n\n            dynamicRequirements.forEach(req => {\n                const exists = varList.find(v => v.name === req.name);\n                if (!exists) {\n                    varList.unshift({\n                        name: req.name,\n                        value: String(req.defaultValue || ''), // [FIX] Force String\n                        is_enabled: true,\n                        is_secret: !!req.isTypeSecret,\n                        is_protected: true,\n                        description: req.description,\n                        label: req.label,\n                        appName: req.appName\n                    });\n                } else {\n                    exists.is_protected = true;\n                    if (req.label) exists.label = req.label;\n                    if (req.description) exists.description = req.description;\n                    if (req.appName) exists.appName = req.appName;\n                    if (req.isTypeSecret) exists.is_secret = true;\n\n                    if (typeof exists.value !== 'string') {\n                        exists.value = String(exists.value || '');\n                    }\n                }\n            });\n\n            variables.value = varList;\n        } catch (e) {\n            console.error('[Variables] Fetch/Sync failed:', e);\n            error.value = e.message;\n        } finally {\n            isLoading.value = false;\n        }\n    }\n\n    async function saveVariable(name, variableData) {\n        try {\n            const payload = {\n                value: String(variableData.value || ''), // Force String\n                is_enabled: variableData.is_enabled !== false,\n                is_secret: !!variableData.is_secret,\n                mode: variableData.mode || 'single'\n            };\n\n            await apiSaveVariable(name, payload);\n            await apiSyncVariableToLocal(name, payload.value);\n\n            const idx = variables.value.findIndex(v => v.name === name);\n            if (idx !== -1) {\n                variables.value[idx] = { ...variables.value[idx], ...payload };\n            } else {\n                variables.value.push({ name, ...payload });\n            }\n            return true;\n        } catch (e) {\n            console.error(`[Variables] Save failed:`, e);\n            return false;\n        }\n    }\n\n    async function removeVariable(name) {\n        if (BASE_SYSTEM_VARIABLES.some(sv => sv.name === name)) return false;\n        try {\n            await apiDeleteVariable(name);\n            variables.value = variables.value.filter(v => v.name !== name);\n            return true;\n        } catch (e) {\n            return false;\n        }\n    }\n    return { variables, isLoading, error, fetchVariables, saveVariable, removeVariable };\n});\n", "structure": [{"name": "fetchVariables", "type": "function", "line": 26, "icon": "fa-code"}, {"name": "saveVariable", "type":      delayRandomMax: 5\n    });\n\n    const isStopRequested = ref(false);\n    const permissionLevel = ref('edit');\n    const error = ref(null);\n    const isModified = ref(false);\n    const Zero Logic Mutation: Dilarang merubah alur logika, nama variabel, atau struktur if/try/loop.\n//#######################################################################\n\nimport { ethers } from 'ethers';\nimport { useAuthStore } from '@/store/auth'; // Adjust path if needed\n\nconst CURRENT_PAYLOAD_VERSION = 2;\n\nexport const getAuthHeaders = async () => {\n    const authStore = useAuthStore();\n    if (!authStore.privateKey || !authStore.user?.id) {\n        throw new Error(\"User not authenticated\");\n    }\n    try {\n        const wallet = new ethers.Wallet(authStore.privateKey);\n        const timestamp = Math.floor(Date.now() / 1000);\n        const messageToSign = `flowork_socket_auth|${wallet.address}|${timestamp}`;\n        const signature = await wallet.signMessage(messageToSign);\n        return {\n            'X-User-Address': wallet.address,\n            'X-Signed-Message': messageToSign,\n            'X-Signature': signature,\n            'X-Payload-Version': CURRENT_PAYLOAD_VERSION\n        };\n    } catch (error) {\n        console.error('[SocketStore] Failed to generate auth headers:', error);\n        throw error;\n    }\n};\n\nexport const PAYLOAD_VERSION = CURRENT_PAYLOAD_VERSION;\n", "structure": [{"name": "getAuthHeaders", "type": "const", "line": 15, "icon": "fa-cube"}, {"name": "PAYLOAD_VERSION", "type": "const", "line": 37, "icon": "fa-cube"}], "organs": [], "metrics": {"loc": 37, "complexity": "LOW", "todo_count": 0, "security_risks": [], "last_modified": 1767761078.774851}, "raw_imports": ["ethers", "auth"], "raw_calls": [], "raw_assets": [], "inbound_paths": [], "outbound_paths": ["flowork-gui/template/web/src/api/modules/auth.js"]}, "flowork-gui/template/web/src/store/socket/listeners.js": {"id": 1121, "content": "//#######################################################################\n// WEBSITE https://flowork.cloud\n// File NAME : C:\\FLOWORK\\flowork-gui\\template\\web\\src\\store\\socket\\listeners.js total lines 267 \n//#1. location\n\nexport function registerSocketListeners(socket, context) {\n    if (!socket) return;\n\n    const uiStore = useUiStore();\n    const logStore = useLogStore();\n    const workflowStore = useWorkflowStore();\n    const componentStore = useComponentStore();\n    const engineStore = useEngineStore();\n    const variableStore = useVariablesStore();\n    const settingsStore = useSettingsStore();\n    const agentStore = useAgentStore();\n\n    const { currentEngineStatus, engineVitals, isConnecting, isGracePeriod, connectionError, CURRENT_PAYLOAD_VERSION } = context;\n\n    socket.on('connect', () => {\n        isConnecting.value = false;\n        isGracePeriod.value = false;\n        connectionError.value = null;\n        console.log(`%c[SocketStore] SKELETON HANDSHAKE OK`, \"color: #00E5FF; font-weight: bold;\");\n\n        socket.emit('join_workflow_room', { v: CURRENT_PAYLOAD_VERSION });\n\n        componentStore.fetchAllComponents();\n        workflowStore.fetchPresets();\n        variableStore.fetchVariables();\n        settingsStore.fetchSettings();\n        workflowStore.fetchUserFavorites();\n        componentStore.fetchUserFavorites();\n    });\n\n    socket.on('connect_error', (error) => {\n        if (!isGracePeriod.value) connectionError.value = `Connection Failed: ${error.message}`;\n        isConnecting.value = false;\n    });\n\n    socket.on('disconnect', (reason) => { agentStore.setError('DISCONNECTED', reason); });\n\n    socket.on('error', (data) => {\n        const message = data?.payload?.message || data?.message || \"Unknown error\";\n        uiStore.showNotification({ text: `Gateway Error: ${message}`, color: 'error' });\n    });\n\n    socket.on('initial_engine_statuses', (statuses) => {\n        engineStore.syncEngineStatuses(statuses);\n    });\n\n    socket.on('engine_status_update', (data) => {\n        engineStore.updateEngineStatus(data);\n        if (data.engine_id === engineStore.selectedEngineId) {\n            currentEngineStatus.value.isBusy = data.vitals?.is_busy || false;\n            currentEngineStatus.value.cpuPercent = data.vitals?.cpu_percent || null;\n            currentEngineStatus.value.memoryPercent = data.vitals?.memory_percent || null;\n        }\n    });\n\n    socket.on('engine_vitals_update', (data) => {\n        if (data.engine_id) engineStore.updateEngineVitals(data);\n        const vitals = data.vitals || data;\n        currentEngineStatus.value.isBusy = vitals.is_busy || false;\n        currentEngineStatus.value.cpuPercent = vitals.cpu_percent || null;\n        currentEngineStatus.value.memoryPercent = vitals.memory_percent || null;\n        engineVitals.value = vitals;\n    });\n\n    socket.on('response_presets_list', (data) => {\n        const payload = data.payload || data;\n        if (!payload.error) workflowStore.updatePresetsList(payload.presets, payload.favorites);\n    });\n\n    socket.on('response_load_preset', (data) => {\n        const payload = data.payload || data;\n        if (!payload.error) workflowStore.updateSinglePresetData(payload.name, payload.workflow_data);\n    });\n\n    socket.on('response_variables', (data) => {\n        const payload = data.payload || data;\n        if (!payload.error) {\n            variableStore.variables = payload.variables;\n            variableStore.isLoading = false;\n        }\n    });\n\n    socket.on('response_component_list', (data) => {\n        const payload = data.payload || data;\n        if (!payload.error) componentStore.updateComponentsList(payload.component_type, payload.components);\n    });\n\n CAPTURED:\", \"background: #222; color: #bada55\", payload);\n\n        const normalizedLog = {\n            message: payload.message || JSON.stringify(payload),\n            level: payload.level || 'INFO',\n            timestamp: payload.ts || payload.timestamp || Date.now() / 1000,\n            node_id: payload.node_id || null,\n            source: payload.source || 'SYSTEM',\n            ...payload\n        };\n        logStore.addExecutionLog(normalizedLog);\n\n        if (payload.node_id) {\n            let status = 'RUNNING';\n            const lvl = (payload.level || '').toUpperCase();\n            if (lvl.includes('SUCCESS') || lvl.includes('INFO')) status = 'SUCCESS';\n            if (lvl.includes('ERROR') || lvl.includes('FAIL')) status = 'FAILED';\n\n            workflowStore.updateNodeExecutionStatus({\n                node_id: payload.node_id,\n                status: status,\n                timestamp: normalizedLog.timestamp,\n                workflow_context_id: payload.job_id\n            });\n        }\n    };\n    socket.on('log_received', handleLog);\n    socket.on('execution_log', handleLog);\n    socket.on('WORKFLOW_LOG_ENTRY', handleLog);\n    socket.on('EXECUTION_LOG', handleLog);\n    socket.on('engine_log', handleLog);\n\n    socket.on('APP_LOG_STREAM', (data) => {\n        const payload = data.payload || data;\n || 'MUSCLE'}`,\n            node_id: payload.pid\n        });\n    });\n\n    socket.on('APP_PROGRESS', (data) => {\n        const payload = data.payload || data;\n        logStore.addExecutionLog({\n            message: payload.raw,\n            level: 'INFO',\n            timestamp: Date.now() / 1000,\n            source: `APP:${payload.app_id || 'MUSCLE'}`,\n            node_id: payload.pid\n        });\n    });\n\n    socket.on('APP_RESULT', (data) => {\n        const payload = data.payload || data;\n        logStore.addExecutionLog({\n            message: \"\u2705 RESULT PAYLOAD: \" + JSON.stringify(payload.data),\n            level: 'SUCCESS',\n            timestamp: Date.now() / 1000,\n            source: `APP:${payload.app_id || 'MUSCLE'}`\n        });\n    });\n\n    socket.on('APP_JOB_FINISHED', (data) => {\n        const payload = data.payload || data;\n        logStore.addExecutionLog({\n            message: `\ud83c\udfc1 Process Finished (PID: ${payload.pid}). Status: ${payload.status}`,\n            level: payload.status === 'completed' ? 'SUCCESS' : 'ERROR',\n            timestamp: Date.now() / 1000,\n            source: `APP:${payload.app_id || 'MUSCLE'}`\n        });\n\n        workflowStore.updateExecutionStatus({\n            status: 'COMPLETED',\n            job_id: payload.pid\n        });\n    });\n\n    const handleNodeStatus = (data) => {\n        const payload = data.payload || data;\n        console.log(\"%c[MATA-MATA] NODE UPDATE:\", \"background: #222; color: #00ffff\", payload.node_id, payload.status);\n        if (!payload.timestamp && payload.ts) payload.timestamp = payload.ts;\n        workflowStore.updateNodeExecutionStatus(payload);\n        logStore.updateTimelineEntry(payload);\n    };\n    socket.on('node_status_update', handleNodeStatus);\n    socket.on('NODE_STATUS_UPDATE', handleNodeStatus);\n\n    const handleExecUpdate = (data) => {\n        const payload = data.payload || data;\n        console.log(\"%c[MATA-MATA] JOB STATUS:\", \"background: #222; color: #ff00ff\", payload);\n        if (payload.node_id && payload.status) {\n             workflowStore.updateNodeExecutionStatus({\n                 node_id: payload.node_id,\n                 status: payload.status,\n                 timestamp: payload.timestamp || Date.now() / 1000\n             });\n        }\n        workflowStore.updateExecutionStatus(payload);\n        logStore.updateTimelineEntry(payload);\n    };\n    socket.on('execution_update', handleExecUpdate);\n    socket.on('WORKFLOW_EXECUTION_UPDATE', handleExecUpdate);\n\n    socket.on('NODE_METRIC_UPDATE', (data) => {\n        const payload = data.payload || data;\n        workflowStore.updateNodeExecutionStatus(payload.metric);\n        logStore.updateTimelineEntry(payload.metric);\n    });\n\n    socket.on('SHOW_DEBUG_POPUP', (data) => {\n        uiStore.showDataViewer(data.payload || data);\n    });\n\n    socket.on('agent:status', (data) => {\n        if (data.session_id === agentStore.currentSessionId) agentStore.setPhase(data.phase);\n    });\n    socket.on('agent:token', (data) => {\n        if (data.session_id === agentStore.currentSessionId) agentStore.addAgentChunk(data.chunk);\n    });\n    socket.on('agent:done', (data) => {\n        if (data.session_id === agentStore.currentSessionId) agentStore.setDone(data.outcome);\n    });\n    socket.on('agent:error', (data) => {\n        if (data.session_id === agentStore.currentSessionId) agentStore.setError(data.code, data.message);\n    });\n\n    socket.on('FILESYSTEM_LIST_RESPONSE', (data) => {\n        window.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('FILESYSTEM_DATA_READY', { detail: data.payload || data }));\n    });\n\n    socket.on('forward_event_to_gui', (data) => {\n        const wrapper = data.payload || data;\n        const eventName = wrapper.event_name;\n        const eventData = wrapper.event_data;\n        const source = wrapper.source;\n\n        window.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent(eventName, {\n            detail: { data: eventData, source: source }\n        }));\n\n        if (eventName === 'SHOW_NOTIFICATION') {\n            uiStore.showNotification({\n                text: eventData.message,\n                color: eventData.type || 'info'\n            });\n        }\n    });\n}\n", "//#######################################################################\n// WEBSITE https://flowork.cloud\n// File NAME : C:\\FLOWORK\\flowork-gui\\template\\web\\src\\store\\workflow\\canvasActions.js total lines 272 \n//#1. Dynamic Component Discovery (DCD): Hub wajib melakukan scanning file secara otomatis.\n//#2. Lazy Loading: Modul hanya di-import ke RAM saat dipanggil (On-Demand).\n//#3. Atomic Isolation: 1 File = 1 Fungsi dengan nama file yang identik dengan nama fungsi aslinya.\n//#4. Zero Logic Mutation: Dilarang merubah alur logika, nama variabel, atau struktur if/try/loop.\n//#######################################################################\n\nimport { v4 as uuidv4 } from 'uuid';\nimport { useUiStore } from '@/store/ui';\nimport { useComponentStore } from '@/store/components';\n\nexport const createCanvasActions = (context) => {\n    const { elements, selectedNode, clipboard, isModified, isReadOnly } = context;\n\n    function applyChanges(changes) {\n        if (isReadOnly.value) return;\n        let tempElements = [...elements.value];\n        let selectionChanged = false;\n\n        changes.forEach(change => {\n            const index = tempElements.findIndex(el => el.id === change.id);\n\n            if (change.type === 'remove' && index !== -1) {\n                if (selectedNode.value && selectedNode.value.id === change.id) {\n                    selectionChanged = true;\n                }\n                tempElements.splice(index, 1);\n                isModified.value = true;\n            } else if (change.type === 'position' && change.position && index !== -1) {\n                tempElements[index].position = change.position;\n                isModified.value = true;\n            }\n        });\n        elements.value = tempElements;\n\n        if (selectionChanged) {\n            clearSelectedNode();\n        }\n    }\n\n    function addNode(componentData) {\n        const uiStore = useUiStore();\n        if (isReadOnly.value) {\n             uiStore.showNotification({ text: 'Cannot add node: Workflow is read-only.', color: 'warning' });\n             return;\n        }\n        if (!componentData?.moduleId) {\n            console.error('[WorkflowStore] addNode called without valid component data.');\n            return;\n        }\n\n        const componentStore = useComponentStore();\n        const fullComponentData = componentStore.findComponentById(componentData.moduleId);\n        if (!fullComponentData) {\n            console.error(`[WorkflowStore] Component with ID ${componentData.moduleId} not found in componentStore.`);\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: `Failed to add node: Component ${componentData.moduleId} not found.`, color: 'error'});\n            return;\n        }\n\n        let nodeDefinition = fullComponentData.manifest;\n        let nodeSpecificId = null;\n        if (componentData.type === 'node_v2') {\n            nodeSpecificId = componentData.id;\n            const shortNodeId = nodeSpecificId.split('.').pop();\n\n            if (fullComponentData.manifest && fullComponentData.manifest.nodes) {\n                const found = fullComponentData.manifest.nodes.find(n => n.id === shortNodeId);\n                if (found) {\n                    nodeDefinition = found;\n                } else {\n                    console.warn(`[WorkflowStore] Node definition '${shortNodeId}' not found in app manifest. Using default.`);\n                }\n            }\n        }\n\n        const schema = nodeDefinition.inputs || nodeDefinition.properties || [];\n\n        const defaultConfig = schema.reduce((acc, prop) => {\n            const key = prop.name || prop.id;\n\n            if (prop.default !== undefined) {\n                let defaultValue = prop.default;\n                if (prop.type === 'integer' || prop.type === 'float' || prop.type === 'number') {\n                    defaultValue = Number(defaultValue);\n                } else if (prop.type === 'boolean' || prop.type === 'toggle') {\n                    defaultValue = String(defaultValue).toLowerCase() === 'true';\n                } else if ((prop.type === 'list' || prop.type === 'key-value') && !Array.isArray(defaultValue)) {\n                    defaultValue = [];\n                }\n                acc[key] = defaultValue;\n            }\n            return acc;\n        }, {});\n        const newNode = {\n            id: uuidv4(),\n            type: 'default',\n            label: componentData.label || nodeDefinition.name || fullComponentData.name,\n            position: { x: componentData.x, y: componentData.y },\n            data: {\n                moduleId: fullComponentData.id,\n                componentType: fullComponentData.componentType,\n                type: nodeSpecificId || fullComponentData.id, // Store specific V2 ID if available\n                config_values: defaultConfig,\n            }\n        };\n        elements.value = [...elements.value, newNode];\n        console.log(`[WorkflowStore] Added node: ${newNode.id} (${newNode.label})`);\n        isModified.value = true;\n    }\n\n    function addEdge(connectionData) {\n        const uiStore = useUiStore();\n        if (isReadOnly.value) {\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: 'Cannot add connection: Workflow is read-only.', color: 'warning' });\n            return;\n        }\n        const newEdge = {\n            id: `edge-${uuidv4()}`,\n            type: 'default',\n            animated: true,\n            source: connectionData.source,\n            target: connectionData.target,\n            sourceHandle: connectionData.sourceHandle,\n            targetHandle: connectionData.targetHandle,\n        };\n        elements.value = [...elements.value, newEdge];\n        console.log(`[WorkflowStore] Added edge from ${newEdge.source} to ${newEdge.target}`);\n        isModified.value = true;\n    }\n\n    function setSelectedNode(node) {\n        if (selectedNode.value?.id !== node.id) {\n            selectedNode.value = node;\n            console.log(`[WorkflowStore] Node selected: ${node.id}`);\n        }\n    }\n\n    function clearSelectedNode() {\n        if (selectedNode.value) {\n            console.log(`[WorkflowStore] Node deselected: ${selectedNode.value.id}`);\n            selectedNode.value = null;\n        }\n    }\n\n    function updateNodeConfig({ nodeId, key, value }) {\n        if (isReadOnly.value) return;\n        const nodeIndex = elements.value.findIndex(el => el.id === nodeId && 'position' in el);\n        if (nodeIndex !== -1) {\n            if (!elements.value[nodeIndex].data.config_values) {\n                elements.value[nodeIndex].data.config_values = {};\n            }\n            elements.value[nodeIndex].data.config_values[key] = value;\n            console.log(`[WorkflowStore] Updated config '${key}' for node ${nodeId}`);\n            isModified.value = true;\n        } else {\n             console.warn(`[WorkflowStore] Attempted to update config for non-existent node: ${nodeId}`);\n        }\n    }\n\n    function setNodeColor({ nodeId, color }) {\n      if (isReadOnly.value) return;\n      const node = elements.value.find(el => el.id === nodeId);\n      if (node) {\n        if (!node.data) node.data = {};\n        node.data.color = color;\n        isModified.value = true;\n      }\n    }\n\n    function removeElements(elementsToRemove) {\n      if (isReadOnly.value) return;\n      const idsToRemove = new Set(elementsToRemove.map(el => el.id));\n      elements.value = elements.value.filter(el => !idsToRemove.has(el.id));\n      if (selectedNode.value && idsToRemove.has(selectedNode.value.id)) {\n          clearSelectedNode();\n      }\n      isModified.value = true;\n    }\n\n    function copyNode(node) {\n        clipboard.value = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(node));\n        console.log('[WorkflowStore] Node copied to clipboard:', node.id);\n    }\n\n    function pasteNode({ x, y }) {\n        const uiStore = useUiStore();\n        if (isReadOnly.value) {\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: 'Cannot paste: Workflow is read-only.', color: 'warning' });\n            return;\n        }\n        if (!clipboard.value) {\n            console.warn('[WorkflowStore] Clipboard is empty.');\n            return;\n        }\n\n        const nodeDataToPaste = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(clipboard.value.data));\n        const componentStore = useComponentStore();\n        const component = componentStore.findComponentById(nodeDataToPaste.moduleId);\n\n        if (!component) {\n            console.error(`[WorkflowStore] Component not found for pasted node: ${nodeDataToPaste.moduleId}. Cannot paste.`);\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: `Cannot paste: Component '${nodeDataToPaste.moduleId}' not found.`, color: 'error' });\n            return;\n        }\n\n        const defaultConfig = (component.manifest?.properties || []).reduce((acc, prop) => {\n            if (prop.default !== undefined) {\n              let defaultValue = prop.default;\n              if (prop.type === 'integer' || prop.type === 'float') {\n                  defaultValue = Number(defaultValue);\n              } else if (prop.type === 'boolean') {\n                  defaultValue = String(defaultValue).toLowerCase() === 'true';\n              } else if (prop.type === 'list' && !Array.isArray(defaultValue)) {\n                  defaultValue = [];\n              }\n              acc[prop.id] = defaultValue;\n            }\n            return acc;\n        }, {});\n        const newNode = {\n            id: uuidv4(),\n            type: 'default',\n            label: clipboard.value.label,\n            position: { x, y },\n            data: {\n              moduleId: nodeDataToPaste.moduleId,\n              componentType: nodeDataToPaste.componentType,\n              type: nodeDataToPaste.type, // V2 support for paste\n              config_values: { ...defaultConfig, ...(nodeDataToPaste.config_values || {}) },\n              color: nodeDataToPaste.color,\n            },\n        };\n        elements.value = [...elements.value, newNode];\n        console.log('[WorkflowStore] Node pasted from clipboard:', newNode.id);\n        isModified.value = true;\n    }\n\n    function duplicateNode(node) {\n        const uiStore = useUiStore();\n        if (isReadOnly.value) {\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: 'Cannot duplicate: Workflow is read-only.', color: 'warning' });\n            return;\n        }\n        const { x, y } = node.position;\n        const offset = 40;\n        copyNode(node);\n        pasteNode({ x: x + offset, y: y + offset });\n    }\n\n    function applyAutoLayout(updatedNodes) {\n        if (isReadOnly.value) return;\n        if (!Array.isArray(updatedNodes)) {\n             console.warn(\"[WorkflowStore] applyAutoLayout received invalid data:\", updatedNodes);\n             return;\n        }\n        const nodeMap = new Map(updatedNodes.map(n => [n.id, n.position]));\n        const newElements = elements.value.map(el => {\n            if ('position' in el && nodeMap.has(el.id)) {\n                return { ...el, position: nodeMap.get(el.id) };\n            }\n            return el;\n        });\n        elements.value = newElements;\n        isModified.value = true;\n        console.log(\"[WorkflowStore] Applied auto-layout positions.\");\n    }\n\n    return {\n        applyChanges, addNode, addEdge, setSelectedNode, clearSelectedNode,\n        updateNodeConfig, setNodeColor, removeElements, copyNode, pasteNode,\n        duplicateNode, applyAutoLayout\n    };\n};\n", "structure": [{"name": "applyChanges", "type": "function", "line": 17, "icon": "fa-code"}, {"name": "addNode", "type": "function", "line": 43, "icon": "fa-code"}, {"name": "addEdge", "type": "function", "line": 113, "icon": "fa-code"}, {"name": "setSelectedNode", "type": "function", "line": 133, "icon": "fa-code"}, {"name": "clearSelectedNode", "type": "function", "line": 140, "icon": "fa-code"}, {"name":
