"line": 14, "icon": "fa-cube"}], "organs": [], "metrics": {"loc": 275, "complexity": "MEDIUM", "todo_count": 0, "security_risks": [], "last_modified": 1767761078.7758498}, "raw_imports": ["components", "uuid", "ui"], "raw_calls": [], "raw_assets": [], "inbound_paths": ["flowork-gui/template/web/src/store/workflow.js"], "outbound_paths": ["flowork-gui/template/web/src/api/modules/components.js", "flowork-gui/template/web/src/store/ui.js"]}, "flowork-gui/template/web/src/store/workflow/executionActions.js": {"id": 1123, "content": "//#######################################################################\n// WEBSITE https://flowork.cloud\n// File NAME : C:\\FLOWORK\\flowork-gui\\template\\web\\src\\store\\workflow\\executionActions.js total lines 391 \n//#1. Dynamic Component Discovery (DCD): Hub wajib melakukan scanning file secara otomatis.\n//#2. Lazy Loading: Modul hanya di-import ke RAM saat dipanggil (On-Demand).\n//#3. Atomic Isolation: 1 File = 1 Fungsi dengan nama file yang identik dengan nama fungsi aslinya.\n//#4. Zero Logic Mutation: Dilarang merubah alur logika, nama variabel, atau struktur if/try/loop.\n//#######################################################################\n\nimport { v4 as uuidv4 } from 'uuid';\nimport { useUiStore } from '@/store/ui';\nimport { useSocketStore } from '@/store/socket';\nimport { useLogStore } from '@/store/logs';\n\nexport const createExecutionActions = (context) => {\n    const { elements, isExecuting, isPaused, isStopRequested, jobId, executionStatus,\n            connectionStatus, currentPresetName, isModified, canExecute, globalLoopConfig, isReadOnly, isCanvasEmpty } = context;\n\n    async function _startExecutionLoop(startNodeId = null, mode = 'EXECUTE') {\n        const uiStore = useUiStore();\n        const socketStore = useSocketStore();\n\n        if (!socketStore.isConnected) {\n            uiStore.showConnectEngineDialog();\n            return;\n        }\n\n        if (isExecuting.value) {\n            console.warn(\"[WorkflowStore] Execution already in progress.\");\n            return;\n        }\n\n        if (!canExecute.value) {\n            if (isCanvasEmpty.value) {\n                uiStore.showNotification({ text: 'Cannot run an empty workflow. Add some nodes first!', color: 'warning' });\n            } else if (isReadOnly.value && mode === 'EXECUTE') {\n                uiStore.showNotification({ text: 'You do not have permission to run this workflow.', color: 'warning' });\n            } else if (isReadOnly.value && mode === 'SIMULATE') {\n                 console.log(\"[WorkflowStore] Allowing SIMULATE in read-only mode.\");\n            } else {\n                 uiStore.showNotification({ text: 'Cannot execute workflow at this time.', color: 'warning' });\n            }\n            if (!(isReadOnly.value && mode === 'SIMULATE')) {\n                 return;\n            }\n        }\n\n        const logStore = useLogStore();\n        let nodesToExecute, connectionsToExecute;\n\n        nodesToExecute = elements.value.filter(el => 'position' in el).map(node => ({\n            id: node.id,\n            name: node.label,\n            x: node.position.x,\n            y: node.position.y,\n            module_id: node.data.moduleId,\n            type: node.data.type, // V2 Execution ID\n            config_values: node.data.config_values || {},\n            ...(node.data.color && { data: { color: node.data.color } })\n        }));\n\n        connectionsToExecute = elements.value.filter(el => 'source' in el).map(edge => ({\n            id: edge.id,\n            source: edge.source,\n            target: edge.target,\n            source_port_name: edge.sourceHandle,\n            target_port_name: edge.targetHandle,\n            type: edge.type,\n            animated: edge.animated,\n        }));\n\n        let effectivePresetName = currentPresetName.value || 'unsaved-workflow';\n\n        let presetNameToSend = effectivePresetName;\n        if (isModified.value) {\n            console.log(\"[WorkflowStore] Workflow modified, forcing raw execution (ignoring saved preset name)\");\n            presetNameToSend = null;\n        }\n\n        isExecuting.value = true;\n        isPaused.value = false;\n        isStopRequested.value = false;\n        logStore.clearLogs();\n        executionStatus.value = {}; // Reset visual status\n        connectionStatus.value = {};\n        const newJobId = uuidv4();\n        jobId.value = newJobId;\n\n        const notificationText = mode === 'SIMULATE'\n            ? `Simulating '${effectivePresetName}'...`\n            : `Executing '${effectivePresetName}'...`;\n        uiStore.showNotification({ text: notificationText, color: 'info' });\n\n        const payload = {\n            type: 'execute_workflow',\n            job_id: newJobId,\n            preset_name: presetNameToSend, // Kirim null kalau modified\n            workflow_data: {\n                nodes: nodesToExecute,\n                connections: connectionsToExecute,\n                global_loop_config: globalLoopConfig.value\n            },\n            initial_payload: {},\n            start_node_id: startNodeId,\n            mode: mode,\n        };\n        console.log('[WorkflowStore] Preparing to send execution payload:', JSON.stringify(payload, null, 2));\n\n        try {\n            await socketStore.sendMessage(payload);\n            console.log(`[WorkflowStore] ${mode} request sent for job ${newJobId}`);\n        } catch (error) {\n             console.error(`[WorkflowStore] Failed to send ${mode} request:`, error);\n             uiStore.showNotification({ text: `Failed to start ${mode.toLowerCase()}: ${error.message || error}`, color: 'error'});\n             isExecuting.value = false;\n             jobId.value = null;\n        }\n    }\n\n    function executeCurrentWorkflow(startNodeId = null) {\n        _startExecutionLoop(startNodeId, 'EXECUTE');\n    }\n\n    function simulateCurrentWorkflow(startNodeId = null) {\n        _startExecutionLoop(startNodeId, 'SIMULATE');\n    }\n\n    function updateExecutionStatus(data) {\n        const statusData = data.status_data || {};\n        const receivedJobId = data.job_id;\n        const jobStatus = (statusData.status || data.status)?.toUpperCase();\n\n        console.log(`[WorkflowStore] Received status update for job ${receivedJobId}: ${jobStatus}`);\n        const isCurrentJob = receivedJobId === jobId.value;\n        const isTerminalStatus = ['SUCCEEDED', 'FAILED', 'STOPPED', 'COMPLETED', 'DONE'].includes(jobStatus);\n        const isCurrentlyExecuting = isExecuting.value;\n\n        const isNodeUpdate = !!(data.node_id || statusData.node_id);\n        if (isNodeUpdate && jobStatus !== 'FAILED') {\n            console.log(`[WorkflowStore] Ignoring terminal status from sub-job/node (${data.node_id}) to prevent early stop.`);\n            return;\n        }\n\n        if (isCurrentJob || (isTerminalStatus && isCurrentlyExecuting)) {\n\n            if (jobStatus === 'RUNNING') {\n                isExecuting.value = true;\n                isPaused.value = false;\n                if (!isCurrentJob) jobId.value = receivedJobId;\n                isStopRequested.value = false;\n            } else if (jobStatus === 'PAUSED') {\n                isPaused.value = true;\n                isExecuting.value = true;\n            } else if (isTerminalStatus) {\n                const uiStore = useUiStore();\n                let notificationColor = 'info';\n                 let notificationText = `Run finished with status: ${jobStatus}`;\n                if (jobStatus === 'SUCCEEDED' || jobStatus === 'COMPLETED' || jobStatus === 'DONE') {\n                     notificationColor = 'success';\n                     notificationText = `Run finished successfully.`;\n                } else if (jobStatus === 'FAILED') {\n                    notificationColor = 'error';\n                    notificationText = `Run failed: ${statusData.error || 'Unknown error'}`;\n                } else if (jobStatus === 'STOPPED') {\n                    notificationColor = 'warning';\n                    notificationText = `Run was stopped.`;\n                }\n\n                if (isCurrentJob) {\n                    uiStore.showNotification({ text: notificationText, color: notificationColor });\n                } else if (isCurrentlyExecuting) {\n                    uiStore.showNotification({ text: `Forcing UI reset. Received terminal status from a different job.`, color: 'warning' });\n                    console.warn(`[WorkflowStore] Force resetting UI state. Was tracking job ${jobId.value} but received terminal status for ${receivedJobId}.`);\n                }\n\n                const finalState = (jobStatus === 'FAILED') ? 'FAILED' : 'SUCCESS';\n                const nextStatus = { ...executionStatus.value };\n\n                Object.keys(nextStatus).forEach(key => {\n                    const s = nextStatus[key]?.status?.toUpperCase();\n                    if (s === 'RUNNING' || s === 'PENDING' || s === 'EXECUTING' || s === 'RETRYING') {\n                        nextStatus[key] = {\n                            ...nextStatus[key],\n                            status: finalState,\n                            timestamp: Date.now() / 1000\n                        };\n                    }\n                });\n                executionStatus.value = nextStatus;\n\n                isExecuting.value = false;\n                isPaused.value = false;\n                isStopRequested.value = false;\n                jobId.value = null;\n                 console.log(`[WorkflowStore] Resetting execution state due to terminal status: ${jobStatus}`);\n            }\n        } else {\n             console.log(`[WorkflowStore] Ignoring status update for different job: ${receivedJobId} (current: ${jobId.value})`);\n        }\n    }\n\n    function updateNodeExecutionStatus(metric) {\n        if (!metric?.node_id) return;\n        const ts = metric.timestamp || metric.ts || Date.now() / 1000;\n\n        const nextStatus = { ...executionStatus.value };\n        const currentNodeState = nextStatus[metric.node_id] || {};\n\n        let newStatus = metric.status ? metric.status.toUpperCase() : 'UNKNOWN';\n        if (newStatus === 'SUCCESS') newStatus = 'COMPLETED';\n\n        if ((currentNodeState.status === 'COMPLETED' || currentNodeState.status === 'FAILED') &&\n            (newStatus === 'RUNNING' || newStatus === 'PENDING')) {\n            console.warn(`[WorkflowStore] Ignored outdated status ${newStatus} for node ${metric.node_id}`);\n            return;\n        }\n\n        if (metric.status === 'RUNNING') {\n            Object.keys(nextStatus).forEach(key => {\n                if (key !== metric.node_id && nextStatus[key].status === 'RUNNING') {\n                    nextStatus[key] = { ...nextStatus[key], status: 'COMPLETED' };\n                }\n            });\n        }\n\n        nextStatus[metric.node_id] = {\n            status: newStatus,\n            timestamp: ts,\n            error: metric.error\n        };\n\n        executionStatus.value = nextStatus;\n    }\n\n    async function stopCurrentWorkflow() {\n        if (!jobId.value) {\n            console.warn(\"[WorkflowStore] No active job ID to stop.\");\n            if (isExecuting.value) {\n                isExecuting.value = false;\n                isPaused.value = false;\n                 console.warn(\"[WorkflowStore] UI was stuck in executing state, forcing reset.\");\n            }\n            return;\n        }\n        if (!isExecuting.value) {\n            console.warn(\"[WorkflowStore] Workflow is not currently executing, cannot stop.\");\n            return;\n        }\n        isStopRequested.value = true;\n        const uiStore = useUiStore();\n        try {\n            console.log(`[WorkflowStore] Sending stop request for job: ${jobId.value}`);\n            const socketStore = useSocketStore();\n            await socketStore.sendMessage({ type: 'stop_workflow', job_id: jobId.value });\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: 'Stop signal sent to workflow.', color: 'warning' });\n        } catch (error) {\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: `Failed to send stop signal: ${error.message || error}`, color: 'error' });\n            isStopRequested.value = false;\n        }\n    }\n\n    async function stopJobById(jobIdToStop) {\n        if (!jobIdToStop) return;\n        const uiStore = useUiStore();\n        try {\n            console.log(`[WorkflowStore] Sending stop request for specific job: ${jobIdToStop}`);\n            const socketStore = useSocketStore();\n            await socketStore.sendMessage({ type: 'stop_workflow', job_id: jobIdToStop });\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: `Stop signal sent to job ${jobIdToStop.substring(0,8)}...`, color: 'warning' });\n        } catch (error) {\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: `Failed to send stop signal: ${error.message || error}`, color: 'error' });\n        }\n    }\n\n    async function pauseCurrentWorkflow() {\n        if (!jobId.value) {\n             console.warn(\"[WorkflowStore] No active job ID to pause.\");\n             return;\n        }\n        if (!isExecuting.value || isPaused.value) {\n            console.warn(\"[WorkflowStore] Workflow not running or already paused, cannot pause.\");\n            return;\n        }\n        const uiStore = useUiStore();\n        try {\n            console.log(`[WorkflowStore] Sending pause request for job: ${jobId.value}`);\n            const socketStore = useSocketStore();\n            await socketStore.sendMessage({ type: 'pause_workflow', job_id: jobId.value });\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: 'Pause signal sent.', color: 'info' });\n        } catch (error) {\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: `Failed to pause workflow: ${error.message || error}`, color: 'error' });\n        }\n    }\n\n    async function resumeCurrentWorkflow() {\n        if (!jobId.value) {\n            console.warn(\"[WorkflowStore] No active job ID to resume.\");\n            return;\n        }\n        if (!isExecuting.value || !isPaused.value) {\n            console.warn(\"[WorkflowStore] Workflow not paused, cannot resume.\");\n            return;\n        }\n        const uiStore = useUiStore();\n        try {\n            console.log(`[WorkflowStore] Sending resume request for job: ${jobId.value}`);\n            const socketStore = useSocketStore();\n            await socketStore.sendMessage({ type: 'resume_workflow', job_id: jobId.value });\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: 'Resume signal sent.', color: 'info' });\n        } catch (error) {\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: `Failed to resume workflow: ${error.message || error}`, color: 'error' });\n        }\n    }\n\n    async function fetchConnectionData(connectionId) {\n        const uiStore = useUiStore();\n        const currentJobId = jobId.value;\n\n        if (!currentJobId) {\n            console.warn(\"[WorkflowStore] Cannot fetch connection history, no active or recent job ID stored.\");\n            uiStore.showDataViewer({\n                title: `Data for ${connectionId.substring(0,8)}...`,\n                error: \"Workflow has not been run in this session.\",\n                details: \"Run the workflow at least once to see connection data.\"\n            });\n            return;\n        }\n\n        try {\n            const socketStore = useSocketStore();\n            await socketStore.sendMessage({\n                type: 'request_connection_history',\n                job_id: currentJobId,\n                connection_id: connectionId\n            });\n            console.log(`[WorkflowStore] Requested history for connection ${connectionId} (Job: ${currentJobId})`);\n        } catch (error) {\n            console.error(`[WorkflowStore] Failed to request history for connection ${connectionId}:`, error);\n            uiStore.showDataViewer({\n                title: `Data for ${connectionId.substring(0,8)}...`,\n                error: \"No history data found for this connection in the last run.\",\n                details: error.message\n            });\n        }\n    }\n\n    function updateConnectionStatus(data) {\n        if (!data?.connection_id) return;\n        connectionStatus.value = {\n            ...connectionStatus.value,\n            [data.connection_id]: {\n                status: data.status,\n                timestamp: Date.now()\n            }\n        };\n        if (data.status === 'ACTIVE') {\n            setTimeout(() => {\n                 if (connectionStatus.value[data.connection_id]) {\n                     connectionStatus.value = {\n                         ...connectionStatus.value,\n                         [data.connection_id]: {\n                             ...connectionStatus.value[data.connection_id],\n                             status: 'IDLE' // Back to boring gray\n                         }\n                     };\n                 }\n            }, 2000);\n        }\n    }\n\n    function animateIncomingEdges(targetNodeId) {\n        const incomingEdges = elements.value.filter(el => 'source' in el && el.target === targetNodeId);\n        incomingEdges.forEach(edge => {\n            updateConnectionStatus({\n                connection_id: edge.id,\n                status: 'ACTIVE'\n            });\n        });\n    }\n\n    function updateGlobalLoopConfig(newConfig) {\n        if (isReadOnly.value) return;\n        globalLoopConfig.value = { ...globalLoopConfig.value, ...newConfig };\n        isModified.value = true;\n        console.log(\"[WorkflowStore] Global loop config updated:\", globalLoopConfig.value);\n    }\n\n    return {\n        _startExecutionLoop, executeCurrentWorkflow, simulateCurrentWorkflow,\n        updateExecutionStatus, updateNodeExecutionStatus, stopCurrentWorkflow, stopJobById,\n        pauseCurrentWorkflow, resumeCurrentWorkflow, fetchConnectionData,\n        updateConnectionStatus, animateIncomingEdges, updateGlobalLoopConfig\n    };\n};\n", "structure": [{"name": "_startExecutionLoop", "type": "function", "line": 19, "icon": "fa-code"}, {"name": "executeCurrentWorkflow", "type": "function", "line": 120, "icon": "fa-code"}, {"name": "simulateCurrentWorkflow", "type": "function", "line": 124, "icon": "fa-code"}, {"name": "updateExecutionStatus", "type": "function", "line": 128, "icon": "fa-code"}, {"name": "updateNodeExecutionStatus", "type": "function", "line": 202, "icon": "fa-code"}, {"name": "stopCurrentWorkflow", "type": "function", "line": 235, "icon": "fa-code"}, {"name": "stopJobById", "type": "function", "line": 262, "icon": "fa-code"}, {"name": "pauseCurrentWorkflow", "type": "function", "line": 275, "icon": "fa-code"}, {"name": "resumeCurrentWorkflow", "type": "function", "line": 295, "icon": "fa-code"}, {"name": "//#######################################################################\n// WEBSITE https://flowork.cloud\n// File NAME : C:\\FLOWORK\\flowork-gui\\template\\web\\src\\store\\workflow\\helpers.js total lines 46 \n//#1. Dynamic Component Discovery (DCD): Hub wajib melakukan scanning file secara otomatis.\n//#2. Lazy Loading: Modul hanya di-import ke RAM saat dipanggil (On-Demand).\n//#3. Atomic Isolation: 1 File = 1 Fungsi dengan nama file yang identik dengan nama fungsi aslinya.\n//#4. Zero Logic Mutation: Dilarang merubah alur logika, nama variabel, atau struktur if/try/loop.\n//#######################################################################\n\nexport const delay = (ms) => new Promise(res => setTimeout(res, ms));\n\n/**\n * Robust stringify for deep sorting.\n * Ensures deterministic JSON strings for signing.\n */\nexport function stableStringify(obj) {\n    const replacer = (key, value) => {\n        if (value === null) {\n            return null;\n        }\n        if (typeof value === 'object' && !Array.isArray(value)) {\n            return Object.keys(value)\n                .sort() // Sort keys alphabetically\n                .reduce((sorted, key) => {\n                    sorted[key] = value[key];\n                    return sorted;\n                }, {});\n        }\n        return value;\n    };\n    try {\n        const initiallySortedString = JSON.stringify(obj, replacer);\n        const fullySortedObject = JSON.parse(initiallySortedString);\n        return JSON.stringify(fullySortedObject, replacer, undefined);\n    } catch (e) {\n        console.warn(\"[WorkflowHelpers] Error during stableStringify, falling back to basic stringify:\", e);\n        return JSON.stringify(obj);\n    }\n}\n\nexport function sanitizeForFilename(name) {\n    if (!name || typeof name !== 'string') return 'untitled_workflow';\n    return name\n        .trim()\n        .replace(/[<>:\"/\\\\|?*]/g, '')\n        .replace(/\\s+/g, '-')\n        .replace(/-+/g, '-')\n        .substring(0, 50);\n}\n", "structure": [{"name": "stableStringify", "type": "function", "line": 16, "icon": "fa-code"}, {"name": "sanitizeForFilename", "type": "function", "line": 41, "icon": "fa-code"}, {"name": "delay", "//#######################################################################\n// WEBSITE https://flowork.cloud\n// File NAME : C:\\FLOWORK\\flowork-gui\\template\\web\\src\\store\\workflow\\presetActions.js total lines 363 \n//#1. Dynamic Component Discovery (DCD): Hub wajib melakukan scanning file secara otomatis.\n//#2. Lazy Loading: Modul hanya di-import ke RAM saat dipanggil (On-Demand).\n//#3. Atomic Isolation: 1 File = 1 Fungsi dengan nama file yang identik dengan nama fungsi aslinya.\n//#4. Zero Logic Mutation: Dilarang merubah alur logika, nama variabel, atau struktur if/try/loop.\n//#######################################################################\n\nimport { v4 as uuidv4 } from 'uuid';\nimport { useUiStore } from '@/store/ui';\nimport { useSocketStore } from '@/store/socket';\nimport { useAuthStore } from '@/store/auth';\nimport { useComponentStore } from '@/store/components';\nimport { ethers } from 'ethers';\nimport { delay, stableStringify, sanitizeForFilename } from './helpers';\nimport { watch, nextTick } from 'vue';\n\nexport const createPresetActions = (context) => {\n    const { elements, presets, currentPresetName, isLoadingPresets, isModified,\n            isReadOnly, globalLoopConfig, error, isExecuting,\n            executionStatus, connectionStatus, jobId, isPaused, isStopRequested, clearSelectedNode, clearCanvas, _startExecutionLoop } = context;\n\n    async function fetchPresets() {\n        isLoadingPresets.value = true;\n        try {\n            console.log(\"[WorkflowStore] Requesting presets list from local engine via WebSocket...\");\n            const socketStore = useSocketStore();\n            if (socketStore.isConnected) {\n                await socketStore.sendMessage({ type: 'request_presets_list' });\n            } else {\n                console.warn(\"[WorkflowStore] Cannot fetch presets, socket not connected.\");\n                isLoadingPresets.value = false;\n            }\n        } catch (error) {\n            console.error(\"[WorkflowStore] Failed to send preset list request via WebSocket:\", error);\n            presets.value = [];\n            const uiStore = useUiStore();\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: 'Failed to request preset list.', color: 'error' });\n            isLoadingPresets.value = false;\n        }\n    }\n\n    function updatePresetsList(presetList) {\n        console.log(`[WorkflowStore] Received ${presetList.length} presets from engine.`);\n        presets.value = presetList.map(p => ({\n             id: p.name,\n             name: p.name\n        }));\n        isLoadingPresets.value = false;\n    }\n\n    function handleFetchError(errorMessage) {\n        console.warn(`[WorkflowStore] Fetch presets failed: ${errorMessage}`);\n        isLoadingPresets.value = false;\n        error.value = errorMessage;\n    }\n\n    async function loadWorkflow(presetName, ownerId = null) {\n        if (!presetName) return false;\n        const uiStore = useUiStore();\n        const socketStore = useSocketStore();\n\n        try {\n            console.log(`[WorkflowStore] Requesting workflow '${presetName}' data (Owner: ${ownerId || 'Self'}) from local engine...`);\n            const componentStore = useComponentStore();\n             if (componentStore.modules.items.length === 0 ||\n                 componentStore.plugins.items.length === 0 ||\n                 componentStore.tools.items.length === 0 ||\n                 componentStore.triggers.items.length === 0)\n             {\n                 console.log(\"[WorkflowStore] Component lists seem empty, ensuring they are fetched before loading preset...\");\n                 await Promise.all([\n                     componentStore.fetchComponentsForType('modules', { reset: true }),\n                     componentStore.fetchComponentsForType('plugins', { reset: true }),\n                     componentStore.fetchComponentsForType('tools', { reset: true }),\n                     componentStore.fetchComponentsForType('triggers', { reset: true })\n                 ]);\n                 await delay(200);\n             }\n\n            if (socketStore.isConnected) {\n                await socketStore.sendMessage({\n                    type: 'load_preset',\n                    name: presetName,\n                    owner_id: ownerId\n                });\n                return true;\n            } else {\n                 console.error(`[WorkflowStore] Cannot load workflow '${presetName}', socket not connected.`);\n                 uiStore.showConnectEngineDialog();\n                 throw new Error(\"Socket not connected\");\n            }\n\n        } catch (error) {\n            console.error(`[WorkflowStore] Failed to send load request for workflow ${presetName}:`, error);\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: `Error loading workflow: ${error.message || error}`, color: 'error'});\n            clearCanvas();\n            return false;\n        }\n    }\n\n     function updateSinglePresetData(presetName, presetData) {\n        if (!presetData) {\n             console.warn(`[WorkflowStore] Received empty data for preset '${presetName}'. Clearing canvas.`);\n             clearCanvas();\n             currentPresetName.value = presetName;\n             const uiStore = useUiStore();\n             uiStore.showNotification({ text: `Could not load data for '${presetName}'. It might be empty or corrupted.`, color: 'warning'});\n             return;\n        }\n        console.log(`[WorkflowStore] Received data for preset '${presetName}'. Updating canvas...`);\n        const componentStore = useComponentStore();\n\n        const newNodes = (presetData.nodes || []).map(node => {\n            const component = componentStore.findComponentById(node.module_id);\n            if (!component) {\n                console.warn(`[WorkflowStore] Component '${node.module_id}' for node '${node.name || node.id}' not found during preset load. Node may not function correctly.`);\n            }\n            const nodeConfig = node.config_values || {};\n\n            let manifestProps = [];\n\n            if (component?.manifest?.nodes) {\n                const nodeTypeSuffix = node.type ? node.type.split('.').pop() : '';\n                const v2Node = component.manifest.nodes.find(n => n.id === nodeTypeSuffix);\n                if (v2Node && v2Node.inputs) {\n                    manifestProps = v2Node.inputs;\n                }\n            }\n\n            if (manifestProps.length === 0) {\n                manifestProps = component?.manifest?.properties || [];\n            }\n\n            manifestProps.forEach(prop => {\n                const key = prop.name || prop.id;\n                if (!(key in nodeConfig) && prop.default !== undefined) {\n                    let defaultValue = prop.default;\n                    if (prop.type === 'integer' || prop.type === 'float' || prop.type === 'number') {\n                         defaultValue = Number(defaultValue);\n                    } else if (prop.type === 'boolean' || prop.type === 'toggle') {\n                         defaultValue = String(defaultValue).toLowerCase() === 'true';\n                    } else if ((prop.type === 'list' || prop.type === 'key-value') && !Array.isArray(defaultValue)) {\n                         defaultValue = [];\n                    }\n                    nodeConfig[key] = defaultValue;\n                }\n            });\n            return {\n                id: node.id || uuidv4(),\n                type: 'default',\n                label: node.name || component?.name || node.module_id,\n                position: { x: node.x || 0, y: node.y || 0 },\n                data: {\n                    moduleId: node.module_id,\n                    componentType: component ? component.componentType : 'modules',\n                    type: node.type || node.module_id, // Preserve V2 Type if present\n                    config_values: nodeConfig,\n                    color: node.data?.color,\n                }\n            }\n        });\n        const newConnections = (presetData.connections || []).map(conn => ({\n            id: conn.id || `edge-${uuidv4()}`,\n            type: conn.type || 'default',\n            animated: conn.animated !== undefined ? conn.animated : true,\n            source: conn.source || conn.from,\n            target: conn.target || conn.to,\n            sourceHandle: conn.source_port_name || conn.sourceHandle || null,\n            targetHandle: conn.target_port_name || conn.targetHandle || null,\n        }));\n        executionStatus.value = {};\n        connectionStatus.value = {};\n        jobId.value = null;\n        isExecuting.value = false;\n        isPaused.value = false;\n        isStopRequested.value = false;\n        isModified.value = false;\n\n        elements.value = [...newNodes, ...newConnections];\n\n        const roVal = isReadOnly.value;\n        if (typeof roVal === 'string' && !roVal.startsWith('view')) {\n             currentPresetName.value = presetName;\n        } else if (!roVal) {\n             currentPresetName.value = presetName;\n        }\n\n        if (presetData.global_loop_config) {\n            globalLoopConfig.value = { ...globalLoopConfig.value, ...presetData.global_loop_config };\n        } else {\n            globalLoopConfig.value = {\n                isEnabled: false, iterations: 1, isDelayEnabled: false,\n                delayType: 'static', delayStatic: 1, delayRandomMin: 1, delayRandomMax: 5\n            };\n        }\n\n        clearSelectedNode();\n        console.log(`[WorkflowStore] Workflow '${presetName}' loaded and rendered successfully.`);\n    }\n\n    async function saveCurrentWorkflow(newPresetName) {\n        if (isReadOnly.value) {\n            const uiStore = useUiStore();\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: 'You do not have permission to save this workflow.', color: 'warning' });\n            return false;\n        }\n        const uiStore = useUiStore();\n        const socketStore = useSocketStore();\n        const authStore = useAuthStore();\n\n        if (!socketStore.isConnected) {\n             uiStore.showConnectEngineDialog();\n             return false;\n        }\n\n        if (!authStore.privateKey) {\n             uiStore.showNotification({ text: 'Error: Private key not found. Cannot sign and save workflow.', color: 'error' });\n            return false;\n        }\n\n        try {\n            const sanitizedNameForRequest = sanitizeForFilename(newPresetName);\n            if (!sanitizedNameForRequest) {\n                uiStore.showNotification({ text: 'Invalid preset name.', color: 'error' });\n                return false;\n            }\n\n            const workflowData = {\n                nodes: elements.value.filter(el => 'position' in el).map(node => ({\n                    id: node.id,\n                    name: node.label,\n                    x: node.position.x,\n                    y: node.position.y,\n                    module_id: node.data.moduleId,\n                    type: node.data.type,\n                    config_values: node.data.config_values || {},\n                    ...(node.data.color && { data: { color: node.data.color } })\n                })),\n                connections: elements.value.filter(el => 'source' in el).map(edge => ({\n                    id: edge.id,\n                    source: edge.source,\n                    target: edge.target,\n                    source_port_name: edge.sourceHandle,\n                    target_port_name: edge.targetHandle,\n                    type: edge.type,\n                    animated: edge.animated,\n                })),\n                 global_loop_config: globalLoopConfig.value\n            };\n            const wallet = new ethers.Wallet(authStore.privateKey);\n            const unsignedDataBlock = {\n                \"workflow_data\": workflowData\n            };\n            const messageToSign = stableStringify(unsignedDataBlock);\n            const dataSignature = await wallet.signMessage(messageToSign);\n\n            const payload = {\n                type: 'save_preset',\n                name: sanitizedNameForRequest,\n                workflow_data: workflowData,\n                signature: dataSignature\n            };\n            console.log('[WorkflowStore] Preparing to send save payload:', JSON.stringify(payload, null, 2));\n\n            await socketStore.sendMessage(payload);\n\n            currentPresetName.value = newPresetName;\n            isModified.value = false;\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: `Workflow '${newPresetName}' save request sent.`, color: 'success' });\n            await fetchPresets();\n            return true;\n        } catch (error) {\n            console.error(`[WorkflowStore] Failed to save workflow as ${newPresetName}:`, error);\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: `Error saving workflow: ${error.message || error}`, color: 'error' });\n            return false;\n        }\n    }\n\n    async function deletePresetAction(presetName) {\n        const uiStore = useUiStore();\n        if (isReadOnly.value) {\n             uiStore.showNotification({ text: 'Cannot delete: Workflow is read-only.', color: 'warning' });\n             return false;\n        }\n        const socketStore = useSocketStore();\n        if (!socketStore.isConnected) {\n             uiStore.showConnectEngineDialog();\n             return false;\n        }\n\n        try {\n             const presetToDelete = presets.value.find(p => p.id === presetName);\n             if (!presetToDelete) throw new Error(\"Preset not found in local list.\");\n\n            await socketStore.sendMessage({ type: 'delete_preset', name: presetToDelete.id });\n            if (currentPresetName.value === presetName) {\n                clearCanvas();\n            }\n\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: `Preset '${presetName}' delete request sent.`, color: 'info' });\n            await fetchPresets();\n            return true;\n        } catch (error) {\n            console.error(`[WorkflowStore] Failed to delete preset ${presetName}:`, error);\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: `Error deleting preset: ${error.message || error}`, color: 'error' });\n            return false;\n        }\n    }\n\n    async function executePresetByName(presetName) {\n        const uiStore = useUiStore();\n        const socketStore = useSocketStore();\n\n        if (!socketStore.isConnected) {\n            uiStore.showConnectEngineDialog();\n            return;\n        }\n\n        if (isExecuting.value) {\n            console.warn(\"[WorkflowStore] Execution already in progress.\");\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: 'Another workflow is already running.', color: 'warning' });\n            return;\n        }\n\n        uiStore.showNotification({ text: `Loading & running '${presetName}'...`, color: 'info' });\n        try {\n            const loadRequestSent = await loadWorkflow(presetName);\n            if (!loadRequestSent) {\n                return;\n            }\n\n            const targetPresetName = presetName;\n            await new Promise((resolve, reject) => {\n                const unwatch = watch(currentPresetName, (newName) => {\n                    if (newName === targetPresetName) {\n                        unwatch();\n                        nextTick(() => {\n                            console.log(`[WorkflowStore] Quick Run: Preset '${targetPresetName}' loaded. Starting execution...`);\n                            resolve();\n                        });\n                    }\n                });\n\n                setTimeout(() => {\n                    unwatch();\n                    if (!isExecuting.value && currentPresetName.value !== targetPresetName) {\n                         console.error(`[WorkflowStore] Quick Run: Timeout waiting for preset '${targetPresetName}' to load.`);\n                         reject(new Error(`Timeout loading data for '${targetPresetName}'. Aborted run.`));\n                    } else {\n                        resolve();\n                    }\n                }, 10000);\n            });\n\n            _startExecutionLoop(null, 'EXECUTE');\n\n        } catch (error) {\n            console.error(`[WorkflowStore] Quick Run failed for '${presetName}':`, error);\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: `Failed to start Quick Run: ${error.message || error}`, color: 'error'});\n        }\n    }\n\n    return { fetchPresets, updatePresetsList, handleFetchError, loadWorkflow, updateSinglePresetData, saveCurrentWorkflow, deletePresetAction, executePresetByName };\n}\n", "structure": [{"name": "fetchPresets", "type": "function", "line": 24, "icon": "fa-code"}, {"name": "updatePresetsList", "type": "function", "line": "updateSinglePresetData", "type": "function", "line": 103, "icon": "fa-code"}, {"name": "saveCurrentWorkflow", "type": "function", "line": 203, "icon": "fa-code"}, {"name": "deletePresetAction", "auth", "vue", "helpers", "uuid", "ethers", "ui"], "raw_calls": [], "raw_assets": [], "inbound_paths": ["flowork-gui/template/web/src/store/workflow.js"], "outbound_paths": "flowork-gui/template/web/src/store/workflow/sharingActions.js": {"id": 1126, "content": "//#######################################################################\n// WEBSITE https://flowork.cloud\n// File NAME : C:\\FLOWORK\\flowork-gui\\template\\web\\src\\store\\workflow\\sharingActions.js total lines 123 \n//#1. Dynamic Component Discovery (DCD): Hub wajib melakukan scanning file secara otomatis.\n//#2. Lazy Loading: Modul hanya di-import ke RAM saat dipanggil (On-Demand).\n//#3. Atomic Isolation: 1 File = 1 Fungsi dengan nama file yang identik dengan nama fungsi aslinya.\n//#4. Zero Logic Mutation: Dilarang merubah alur logika, nama variabel, atau struktur if/try/loop.\n//#######################################################################\n\nimport { useUiStore } from '@/store/ui';\nimport { useAuthStore } from '@/store/auth';\nimport { useSocketStore } from '@/store/socket';\nimport { useEngineStore } from '@/store/engines';\nimport { useComponentStore } from '@/store/components';\nimport { apiGetUserFavorites, apiSetUserFavorites, apiResolveShareToken } from '@/api';\nimport { debounce } from '@/utils/debounce.js';\nimport { delay } from './helpers';\n\nexport const createSharingActions = (context) => {\n    const { favoritePresets, currentPresetName, permissionLevel, clearCanvas, error, loadWorkflow } = context;\n\n    async function fetchUserFavorites() {\n        const authStore = useAuthStore();\n        if (!authStore.isAuthenticated) return;\n        try {\n            console.log(\"[WorkflowStore] Fetching user favorite presets from Gateway...\");\n            const favorites = await apiGetUserFavorites();\n            if (favorites.error) throw new Error(favorites.error);\n            favoritePresets.value = favorites;\n            console.log(`[WorkflowStore] User favorites loaded: ${favorites.length} items.`);\n        } catch (error) {\n            console.error(\"[WorkflowStore] Failed to fetch user favorites:\", error);\n            favoritePresets.value = [];\n        }\n    }\n\n    const saveFavoritesDebounced = debounce(async () => {\n        const authStore = useAuthStore();\n        if (!authStore.isAuthenticated) return;\n        try {\n            console.log(\"[WorkflowStore] Debounced save: Sending updated favorites to Gateway...\");\n            await apiSetUserFavorites(favoritePresets.value);\n            console.log(\"[WorkflowStore] Debounced save: Favorites successfully saved to Gateway.\");\n        } catch (error) {\n            console.error(\"[WorkflowStore] Debounced save: Failed to save favorites:\", error);\n            const uiStore = useUiStore();\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: `Error saving favorites: ${error.error || error.message}`, color: 'error'});\n        }\n    }, 1500);\n\n    function toggleFavorite(presetName) {\n        const index = favoritePresets.value.indexOf(presetName);\n        if (index > -1) {\n            favoritePresets.value.splice(index, 1);\n        } else {\n            favoritePresets.value.push(presetName);\n        }\n        saveFavoritesDebounced();\n    }\n\n    async function loadSharedWorkflow(token) {\n        error.value = null;\n        const uiStore = useUiStore();\n        uiStore.showNotification({ text: 'Loading shared workflow...', color: 'info' });\n        try {\n            const shareDetails = await apiResolveShareToken(token);\n            if (shareDetails.error) throw new Error(shareDetails.error);\n\n            const { preset_name: presetName, owner_id: ownerPublicAddress, permission_level: sharedPermission, workflow_name: sharedName } = shareDetails;\n            const componentStore = useComponentStore();\n             await Promise.all([\n                 componentStore.fetchComponentsForType('modules', { reset: true }),\n                 componentStore.fetchComponentsForType('plugins', { reset: true }),\n                 componentStore.fetchComponentsForType('tools', { reset: true }),\n                 componentStore.fetchComponentsForType('triggers', { reset: true })\n             ]);\n            await delay(200);\n\n            const socketStore = useSocketStore();\n            const engineStore = useEngineStore();\n            const ownerEngine = engineStore.allAvailableEngines.find(e =>\n                e.isOwner === false &&\n                e.owner?.public_address?.toLowerCase() === ownerPublicAddress?.toLowerCase() &&\n                e.status === 'online'\n            );\n            let targetEngineId = null;\n\n            if (ownerEngine) {\n                targetEngineId = ownerEngine.id;\n                console.log(`[WorkflowStore] Found owner's online engine for shared workflow: ${targetEngineId}`);\n            } else {\n                targetEngineId = engineStore.selectedEngineId;\n                if (targetEngineId) {\n                     console.log(`[WorkflowStore] Owner engine not found/offline. Falling back to user's active engine: ${targetEngineId}`);\n                } else {\n                     throw new Error(\"No active engine (yours or the owner's) is available to load the shared workflow.\");\n                }\n            }\n\n            socketStore.switchEngine(targetEngineId);\n            await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 1500));\n\n            if (!socketStore.isConnected) {\n                 throw new Error(`Failed to connect to the required engine (${targetEngineId.substring(0,8)}...).`);\n            }\n\n            const loadSuccess = await loadWorkflow(presetName, ownerPublicAddress);\n            if (!loadSuccess) {\n                 throw new Error(`Engine connected, but failed to load preset '${presetName}' from it.`);\n            }\n\n            permissionLevel.value = sharedPermission || 'view';\n            currentPresetName.value = `Shared: ${sharedName || presetName}`;\n\n            uiStore.showNotification({ text: `Shared workflow loaded (${permissionLevel.value} mode).`, color: 'success' });\n            return true;\n        } catch (e) {\n            error.value = e.error || e.message || 'Failed to load https://flowork.cloud\n// File NAME : C:\\FLOWORK\\flowork-gui\\template\\web\\src\\utils\\debounce.js total lines 26 \n//#1. Dynamic Component Discovery (DCD): Hub wajib melakukan scanning file secara otomatis.\n//#2. Lazy Loading: Modul hanya di-import ke RAM saat dipanggil (On-Demand).\n//#3. Atomic Isolation: 1 File = 1 Fungsi dengan nama file yang identik dengan nama fungsi aslinya.\n//#4. Zero Logic Mutation: Dilarang merubah alur logika, nama variabel, atau struktur if/try/loop.\n//#######################################################################\n\n/**\n * Creates a debounced function that delays invoking `func` until after `wait`\n * milliseconds have elapsed since the last time the debounced function was invoked.\n * @param {Function} func The function to debounce.\n * @param {number} wait The number of milliseconds to delay.\n * @returns {Function} Returns the new debounced function.\n */\nexport function debounce(func, wait) {\n  let timeout;\n\n  return function executedFunction(...args) {\n    const later = () => {\n      clearTimeout(timeout);\n      func(...args);\n    };\n\n    clearTimeout(timeout);\n    timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);\n  };\n}\n", "structure": [{"name": "debounce", "type": "function", "line": 17, "icon": "fa-code"}, {"name": "executedFunction", "type": "function", "line": 20, "icon": "fa-code"}], "organs": [], "metrics": {"loc": 29, "complexity": "LOW", "todo_count": 0, "security_risks": [], "last_modified": 1767761078.7805014}, "raw_imports": [], "raw_calls": [], "raw_assets": [], "inbound_paths": [], "outbound_paths": []}, "flowork-gui/template/web/src/views/AboutUs.vue": {"id": 1132, "content": "//#######################################################################\n// WEBSITE https://flowork.cloud\n// File NAME : C:\\FLOWORK\\flowork-gui\\template\\web\\src\\views\\AboutUs.vue total lines 192 \n//#1. Dynamic Component Discovery (DCD): Hub wajib melakukan scanning file secara otomatis.\n//#2. Lazy Loading: Modul hanya di-import ke RAM saat dipanggil (On-Demand).\n//#3. Atomic Isolation: 1 File = 1 Fungsi dengan nama file yang identik dengan nama fungsi aslinya.\n//#4. Zero Logic Mutation: Dilarang merubah alur logika, nama variabel, atau struktur if/try/loop.\n//#######################################################################\n\n<template>\n  <div class=\"dashboard-layout\">\n    <div class=\"ambient-background\"></div>\n\n    <aside class=\"sidebar-area\">\n      <AppToolbox @open-marketplace=\"openMarketplace\" @request-publish=\"handleRequestPublish\" />\n    </aside>\n\n    <main class=\"canvas-area\">\n      <div v-if=\"activeApps.length > 0\" class=\"app-toolbar\">\n        <div class=\"active-tabs\">\n          <button\n            v-for=\"a in activeApps\"\n            :key=\"a.instanceId\"\n            :class=\"['tab-btn', { active: currentTab === a.instanceId }]\"\n            @click=\"currentTab = a.instanceId\"\n          >\n            <img\n              v-if=\"resolveIcon(a)\"\n              :src=\"resolveIcon(a)\"\n              class=\"tab-icon-img\"\n              alt=\"\"\n              @error=\"handleIconError($event)\"\n            />\n            <svg v-else style=\"width:16px;height:16px;fill:#FFFFFF;margin-right:6px;\" viewBox=\"0 0 24 24\">\n                <path d=\"M21,16.5C21,16.88 20.79,17.21 20.47,17.38L12.57,21.82C12.41,21.94 12.21,22 12,22C11.79,22 11.59,21.94 11.43,21.82L3.53,17.38C3.21,17.21 3,16.88 3,16.5V7.5C3,7.12 3.21,6.79 a.name }}</span>\n            <span class=\"close-btn\" @click.stop=\"closeApp(a.instanceId)\">\n              <svg style=\"width:14px;height:14px;fill:#FF5555;\" viewBox=\"0 0 24 24\">\n                  <path d=\"M19,6.41L17.59,5L12,10.59L6.41,5L5,6.41L10.59,12L5,17.59L6.41,19L12,13.41L17.59,19L19,17.59L13.41,12L19,6.41Z\" />\n              </svg>\n            </span>\n          </button>\n        </div>\n\n        <div class=\"toolbar-actions\">\n           <button class=\"action-btn save-btn\" @click=\"triggerAppSave\" :disabled=\"isSaving\">\n              <svg v-if=\"!isSaving\" style=\"width:16px;height:16px;fill:#00FFFF;margin-right:6px;\" viewBox=\"0 0 24 24\">\n                  <path d=\"M15,9H5V5H15M12,19A3,3 0 0,1 9,16A3,3 0 0,1 12,13A3,3 0 0,1 15,16A3,3 0 0,1 12,19M17,3H5C3.89,3 3,3.9 3,5V19A2,2 0 0,0 5,21H19A2,2 0 0,0 21,19V7L17,3Z\" />\n              </svg>\n              <div v-else class=\"spinner-small\"></div>\n              <span>{{ isSaving ? 'Saving...' : 'Save State' }}</span>\n           </button>\n           <button class=\"action-btn\" @click=\"triggerAppRefresh\" title=\"Reload App\">\n              <svg style=\"width:16px;height:16px;fill:white;\" viewBox=\"0 0 24 24\">\n                  <path d=\"M17.65,6.35C16.2,4.9 14.21,4 12,4A8,8 0 0,0 4,12A8,8 0 0,0 12,20C15.73,20 18.84,17.45 19.73,14H17.65C16.83,16.33 14.61,18 12,18A6,6 0 0,1 6,12A6,6 0 0,1 12,6C13.66,6 15.14,6.69 16.22,7.78L13,11H20V4L17.65,6.35Z\" />\n              </svg>\n           </button>\n        </div>\n      </div>\n\n      <div class=\"launcher-state\" :class=\"{ 'with-active-apps': activeApps.length > 0 }\">\n        <div v-if=\"activeApps.length === 0\" class=\"launcher-header\">\n            <h2>Applications Center</h2>\n            <p>Select an app to launch into your hybrid workspace</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <div class=\"launcher-grid\">\n            <div\n                v-for=\"app in allApps\"\n                :key=\"app.id\"\n                class=\"launcher-card\"\n                @click=\"openApp(app.id)\"\n            >\n                <div class=\"card-icon\">\n                    <img\n                        v-if=\"resolveIcon(app)\"\n                        :src=\"resolveIcon(app)\"\n                        alt=\"icon\"\n                        @error=\"handleIconError($event)\"\n                    />\n                    <svg v-else class=\"default-icon\" viewBox=\"0 0 24 24\">\n                        <path d=\"M21,16.5C21,16.88 20.79,17.21 20.47,17.38L12.57,21.82C12.41,21.94 12.21,22 12,22C11.79,22 11.59,21.94 11.43,21.82L3.53,17.38C3.21,17.21 3,16.88 3,16.5V7.5C3,7.12 3.21,6.79 3.53,6.62L11.43,2.18C11.59,2.06 11.79,2 12,2C12.21,2 12.41,2.06 12.57,2.18L20.47,6.62C20.79,6.79 21,7.12 21,7.5V16.5M12,4.15L6.04,7.5L12,10.85L17.96,7.5L12,4.15M5,15.91L11,19.29V12.58L5,9.21V15.91M19,15.91V9.21L13,12.58V19.29L19,15.91Z\" />\n                    </svg>\n                    <div v-if=\"app.source === 'cloud'\" class=\"cloud-tag\" title=\"Cloud App\">\n                        <svg viewBox=\"0 0 24 24\"><path d=\"M19.35 10.04C18.67 6.59 15.64 4 12 4C9.11 4 6.6 5.64 5.35 8.04C2.34 8.36 0 10.91 0 14C0 17.31 2.69 20 6 20H19C21.76 20 24 17.76 24 15C24 12.36 21.95 10.22 19.35 10.04Z\" /></svg>\n                    </div>\n                </div>\n                <div class=\"card-info\">\n                    <h3>{{ app.name }}</h3>\n                    <p>{{ app.description || 'No description available' }}</p>\n                </div>\n                <div class=\"card-footer\">\n                    <span class=\"tier-badge\" :class=\"app.tier\">{{ app.tier || 'free' }}</span>\n                    <span class=\"open-txt\">Open App</span>\n                </div>\n            </div>\n        </div>\n      </div>\n\n      <div v-show=\"activeApps.length > 0\" class=\"app-content\">\n          <div v-for=\"a in activeApps\" :key=\"a.instanceId\" v-show=\"currentTab === a.instanceId\" class=\"app-instance-wrapper\">\n\n              <div v-if=\"!activeEngineId\" class=\"engine-wait-overlay\">\n                  <div class=\"spinner-large\"></div>\n                  <p>CONNECTING TO ENGINE...</p>\n              </div>\n\n              <iframe\n                v-else\n                :id=\"`iframe-${a.instanceId}`\"\n                :src=\"resolveAppUrl(a)\"\n                frameborder=\"0\"\n                class=\"app-iframe\"\n                allow=\"clipboard-read; clipboard-write\"\n              ></iframe>\n          </div>\n      </div>\n    </main>\n\n    <MarketplacePublishDialog v-model=\"showPublishDialog\" :existing-item=\"pendingPublishItem\" @published=\"onPublished\" />\n  </div>\n</template>\n\n<script setup>\nimport { ref, computed, watch, onMounted, onUnmounted } from 'vue';\nimport { useAppStore } from '@/store/apps';\nimport { useVariablesStore } from '@/store/variables';\nimport { useUiStore } from '@/store/ui';\nimport { useSocketStore } from '@/store/socket';\nimport { useEngineStore } from '@/store/engines';\nimport { apiClient } from '@/api';\nimport AppToolbox from '@/components/AppToolbox.vue';\nimport MarketplacePublishDialog from '@/components/MarketplacePublishDialog.vue';\n\nconst appStore = useAppStore();\nconst variablesStore = useVariablesStore();\nconst uiStore = useUiStore();\nconst socketStore = useSocketStore();\nconst engineStore = useEngineStore();\n\nconst activeApps = computed(() => appStore.activeApps);\nconst allApps = computed(() => appStore.installedApps);\n\nconst activeEngineId = computed(() => {\n    return engineStore.selectedEngineId || socketStore.engineId || localStorage.getItem('flowork_active_engine_id');\n});\n\nconst currentTab = ref(null);\nconst isSaving = ref(false);\nconst showPublishDialog = ref(false);\nconst pendingPublishItem = ref(null);\n\nconst isCloudStatic = (app) => {\n    if (app.id === 'business_canvas') return true;\n    if (app.path && app.path.includes('apps-cloud')) return true;\n    return false;\n};\n\nconst resolveIcon = (app) => {\n    if (isCloudStatic(app)) {\n        return `/apps-cloud/${app.id}/icon.svg`;\n    }\n\n    let url = app.iconUrl || app.icon_url;\n    if (!url && app.icon_file) {\n        url = `/api/v1/apps/${app.id}/assets/${app.icon_file}`;\n    }\n\n    if (!url) return null;\n\n    if (url.startsWith('http') || url.startsWith('data:')) return url;\n\n    const separator = url.includes('?') ? '&' : '?';\n    if (url.includes('engine_id=')) return url;\n\n    const eid = activeEngineId.value || 'local';\n    return `${url}${separator}engine_id=${eid}`;\n};\n\nconst handleIconError = (e) => {\n    e.target.style.display = 'none';\n};\n\nconst formatProxyUrl = (url) => {\n    if (!url) return '';\n    const eid = activeEngineId.value;\n    if (!eid) return '';\n    if (url.startsWith('http') && !url.includes(window.location.hostname)) {\n        return url;\n    }\n    if (url.includes('engine_id=')) return url;\n    const separator = url.includes('?') ? '&' : '?';\n    return `${url}${separator}engine_id=${eid}`;\n};\n\nconst resolveAppUrl = (activeAppInstance) => {\n    const appId = activeAppInstance.id;\n    const appDef = allApps.value.find(app => app.id === appId);\n    let dashboardPath = 'index.html';\n\n    if (activeAppInstance.targetUrl && (activeAppInstance.source === 'cloud' || appDef?.source === 'cloud')) {\n        return formatProxyUrl(activeAppInstance.targetUrl);\n    }\n\n    if (appDef && appDef.manifest && appDef.manifest.gui && appDef.manifest.gui.dashboard_path) {\n        dashboardPath = appDef.manifest.gui.dashboard_path;\n    } else if (activeAppInstance.targetUrl) {\n        return formatProxyUrl(activeAppInstance.targetUrl);\n    }\n\n    const baseUrl = `/api/v1/apps/${appId}/assets/${dashboardPath}`;\n    return formatProxyUrl(baseUrl);\n};\n\nwatch(currentTab, (newVal) => {\n    appStore.setCurrentTab(newVal);\n});\n\nconst triggerAppSave = () => {\n  if (!currentTab.value) return;\n  isSaving.value = true;\n  const iframe = document.getElementById(`iframe-${currentTab.value}`);\n  if (iframe && iframe.contentWindow) {\n      iframe.contentWindow.postMessage({ type: 'CMD_SAVE' }, '*');\n      setTimeout(() => { if(isSaving.value) isSaving.value = false; }, 5000);\n  } else { isSaving.value = false; }\n};\n\nconst triggerAppRefresh = () => {\n    if (!currentTab.value) return;\n    const iframe = document.getElementById(`iframe-${currentTab.value}`);\n    if (iframe) iframe.src = iframe.src;\n};\n\nconst handleAppMessage = async (event) => {\n  if (!event.data || !event.data.type) return;\n  const { type, payload } = event.data;\n\n  if (type === 'APP_SAVE_REQUEST' || type === 'WIDGET_SAVE_REQUEST') {\n    try {\n      let senderApp = activeApps.value.find(a => a.instanceId === currentTab.value);\n      if (!senderApp) return;\n\n      const enforcedKey = `app_${senderApp.id}_data`;\n      const dataToSave = JSON.stringify(payload.data);\n\n      await variablesStore.saveVariable(enforcedKey, {\n          value: dataToSave,\n          is_enabled: true,\n          is_secret: false\n      });\n\n      uiStore.showNotification({ text: `${senderApp.name} state saved!`, color: \"success\" });\n\n      if (event.source) {\n          event.source.postMessage({ type: 'APP_SAVE_SUCCESS' }, '*');\n      }\n\n    } catch (e) {\n      uiStore.showNotification({ text: \"Save Failed\", color: \"error\" });\n    } finally {\n      isSaving.value = false;\n    }\n  }\n};\n\nonMounted(() => {\n    if (appStore.installedApps.length === 0) {\n        appStore.fetchInstalledApps();\n    }\n    window.addEventListener('message', handleAppMessage);\n});\n\nonUnmounted(() => {\n    window.removeEventListener('message', handleAppMessage);\n});\n\nwatch(() => activeApps.value.length, (newLen, oldLen) => {\n    if (newLen > oldLen) {\n        currentTab.value = activeApps.value[newLen - 1].instanceId;\n    } else if (newLen === 0) {\n        currentTab.value = null;\n    }\n});\n\nconst openApp = (id) => { appStore.openApp(id); };\nconst closeApp = (id) => { appStore.closeApp(id); };\nconst openMarketplace = () => { alert(\"Marketplace Coming Soon!\"); };\n\nconst handleRequestPublish = (packageData) => {\n  pendingPublishItem.value = {\n    source: 'smart_package',\n    componentType: packageData.type,\n    data: { ...packageData.manifest, zip_data: packageData.files }\n  };\n  showPublishDialog.value = true;\n};\n\nconst onPublished = () => { appStore.fetchInstalledApps(); };\n</script>\n\n<style scoped>\n.dashboard-layout { display: flex; height: calc(100vh - 64px); background: var(--surface-ground); position: relative; overflow: hidden; }\n.ambient-background { position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; background: radial-gradient(circle at 50% 50%, rgba(0, 255, 255, 0.05) 0%, transparent 60%); pointer-events: none; z-index: 0; }\n.sidebar-area { z-index: 2; background: rgba(30, 30, 46, 0.95); border-right: 1px solid var(--surface-border); width: 280px; }\n.canvas-area { flex: 1; padding: 1rem; overflow: hidden; position: relative; display: flex; flex-direction: column; z-index: 1; gap: 0.5rem; }\n\n.app-toolbar { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; background: var(--surface-card); border: 1px solid var(--surface-border); padding: 0.5rem; border-radius: 12px; z-index: 10; }\n\n.active-tabs { display: flex; gap: 0.5rem; overflow-x: auto; scrollbar-width: none; }\n.tab-btn { background: transparent; border: 1px solid transparent; color: #ccc; padding: 0.5rem 1rem; border-radius: 8px; cursor: pointer; display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 0.5rem; transition: all 0.2s; font-size: 0.85rem; }\n.tab-btn:hover { background: rgba(255,255,255,0.05); color: white; }\n.tab-btn.active { background: rgba(0, 255, 255, 0.1); color: #00FFFF; border-color: #00FFFF; font-weight: 600; }\n.tab-icon-img { width: 16px; height: 16px; object-fit: contain; margin-right: 6px; }\n.close-btn { opacity: 0.5; margin-left: 5px; display: flex; align-items: center; }\n.close-btn:hover { opacity: 1; color: #FF5555; }\n\n.launcher-state { flex: 1; display: flex; flex-direction: column; padding: 2rem 4rem; overflow-y: auto; z-index: 5; position: relative; }\n.launcher-state.with-active-apps { padding: 1rem 4rem; }\n\n.launcher-header { margin-bottom: 2rem; }\n.launcher-header h2 { font-size: 2rem; color: white; font-family: 'Orbitron', sans-serif; letter-spacing: 1px; margin-bottom: 0.5rem; }\n.launcher-header p { color: #aaa; }\n.launcher-grid { display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(240px, 1fr)); gap: 1.5rem; }\n.launcher-card { background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.03); border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1); border-radius: 16px; padding: 1.5rem; cursor: pointer; transition: all 0.3s ease; display: flex; padding: 4px; width: 20px; height: 20px; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; }\n.cloud-tag svg { width: 12px; height: 12px; fill: #000; }\n.card-info { flex: 1; margin-bottom: 1rem; }\n.card-info h3 { color: #fff; margin-bottom: 0.5rem; font-size: 1.1rem; }\n.card-info p { color: #888; font-size: 0.85rem; line-height: 1.4; display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; line-clamp: 2; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; }\n.card-footer { width: 100%; display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; border-top: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.1); padding-top: 1rem; }\n.tier-badge { font-size: 0.7rem; text-transform: uppercase; padding: 2px 8px; border-radius: 4px; font-weight: bold; background: #333; color: #aaa; }\n.tier-badge.free { background: rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.2); color: #00ff00; }\n.tier-badge.paid { background: rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.2); color: #ffd700; }\n.open-txt { color: #00FFFF; font-size: 0.85rem; font-weight: 600; }\n\n.toolbar-actions { display: flex; gap: 0.5rem;   </div>\n                </div>\n\n                <div class=\"editor-container\">\n                    <v-skeleton-loader\n                        v-if=\"articlesStore.isLoading && mode === setup>\nimport { ref, onMounted, computed, watch } from 'vue';\nimport { useRoute, useRouter } from 'vue-router';\nimport { useArticlesStore } from '@/store/articles';\nimport { useUiStore } from '@/store/ui';\nimport { useLocaleStore } from '@/store/locale';\nimport { storeToRefs } from 'pinia';\nimport NeuralCanvasBackground from '@/components/NeuralCanvasBackground.vue';\n\nconst localeStore = useLocaleStore();\nconst { loc } = storeToRefs(localeStore);\nconst t = loc;\n\nconst route = useRoute();\nconst router = useRouter();\nconst articlesStore = useArticlesStore();\nconst uiStore = useUiStore();\nconst { currentArticle, isLoading } = storeToRefs(articlesStore);\n\nconst mode = ref('create');\nconst isEditMode = computed(() => mode.value === 'edit');\n\nconst categoryOptions = computed(() => [\n  { value: 'tutorial', title: t.value('articles.categories.tutorial') },\n  { value: 'news', title: t.value('articles.categories.news') },\n  { value: 'documentation', title: t.value('articles.categories.documentation') },\n  { value: 'marketplace', title: t.value('articles.categories.marketplace') },\n  { value: 'other', title: t.value('articles.categories.other') },\n]);\nconst visibilityOptions = computed(() => [\n  { value: 'public', title: t.value('articles_visibility_public') },\n  { value: 'login_only', title: t.value('articles_visibility_login') },\n]);\nconst languageOptions = computed(() => [\n  { value: 'en', title: t.value('articles_lang_en') },\n  { value: 'id', title: t.value('articles_lang_id') },\n]);\n\nconst form = ref({ captcha: '' });\nconst captcha = ref({ q: '', realAnswer: 0 });\n\nconst rules = {\n  required: value => !!value || t.value('validation_required'),\n};\n\nconst article = ref({\n  id: null,\n  title: '',\n  slug: '',\n  category: 'tutorial',\n  language: 'en',\n  visibility: 'public',\n  content: '',\n  publish_at: null,\n  status: 'pending',\n  price: null,\n  product_url: null,\n  meta_description: null,\n  keywords: null,\n  tags: null,\n  full_slug_preview: '/fs-default-slug-en.html'\n});\n\nconst primaryButtonTextKey = computed(() => {\n  if (article.value.publish_at && new Date(article.value.publish_at) > new Date()) {\n    return 'articles_schedule_btn';\n  }\n  return 'articles_publish_btn';\n});\n\nfunction handlePrimaryAction() {\n  if (article.value.publish_at && new Date(article.value.publish_at) > new Date()) {\n    saveArticle('scheduled');\n  } else {\n    saveArticle('published');\n  }\n}\n\nfunction slugify(text) {\n  if (!text) return '';\n  return text.toString().toLowerCase()\n    .replace(/\\s+/g, '-')\n    .replace(/[^\\w-]+/g, '')\n    .replace(/--+/g, '-')\n    .replace(/^-+/, '')\n    .replace(/-+$/, '')\n    .substring(0, 70);\n}\n\nfunction onTitleChange(newTitle) {\n  if (mode.value === 'create' || !article.value.slug) {\n    article.value.slug = slugify(newTitle);\n  }\n  updateSlugPreview();\n}\n\nfunction onSlugChange(newSlug) {\n  article.value.slug = slugify(newSlug);\n  updateSlugPreview();\n}\n\nfunction updateSlugPreview() {\n  const lang = article.value.language || 'en';\n  const slug = article.value.slug || '';\n  article.value.full_slug_preview = `/fs-${slug}-${lang}.html`;\n}\n\nwatch(() => article.value.category, updateSlugPreview);\nwatch(() => article.value.language, updateSlugPreview);\n\nfunction generateCaptcha() {\n  const num1 = Math.floor(Math.random() * 10) + 1;\n  const num2 = Math.floor(Math.random() * 5) + 1;\n  captcha.value.q = `${num1} + ${num2}`;\n  captcha.value.realAnswer = num1 + num2;\n  form.value.captcha = '';\n}\n\nasync function saveArticle(desiredStatus) {\n  if (!desiredStatus) {\n    desiredStatus = 'draft';\n  }\n  if (['published', 'scheduled', 'pending'].includes(desiredStatus)) {\n    if (parseInt(form.value.captcha, 10) !== captcha.value.realAnswer) {\n      uiStore.showNotification({ text: t.value('articles.captchaInvalid'), color: 'error' });\n      generateCaptcha();\n      return;\n    }\n  }\n\n  if (desiredStatus === 'published') {\n    article.value.publish_at = null;\n  }\n\n  article.value.status = desiredStatus;\n\n  const result = await articlesStore.saveArticle(\n      article.value,\n      mode.value\n  );\n\n  if (result.success) {\n      if (desiredStatus !== 'draft') {\n        generateCaptcha();\n      }\n  }\n}\n\nonMounted(() => {\n  generateCaptcha();\n  if (route.params.id) {\n    mode.value = 'edit';\n    articlesStore.loadArticleForEdit(route.params.id);\n  } else {\n    mode.value = 'create';\n    article.value = {\n      id: null, title: '', slug: '', category: 'tutorial', language: 'en',\n      visibility: 'public', content: '# Start writing...', publish_at: null, status: 'pending',\n      price: null, product_url: null,\n      meta_description: null, keywords: null, tags: null,\n      full_slug_preview: '/fs-en.html'\n    };\n    updateSlugPreview();\n  }\n});\n\nwatch(currentArticle, (newVal) => {\n  if (isEditMode.value && newVal) {\n    article.value = {\n        ...article.value,\n        ...newVal\n    };\n    updateSlugPreview();\n  }\n}, { deep: true });\n</script>\n\n<style scoped>\n.article-editor-page {\n  min-height: 100vh;\n  position: relative;\n </v-card-actions>\n                  </v-card>\n                </a>\n              </div>\n            </div>\n            </v-col>\n        </v-row>\n      </v-container>\n    </div>\n  </v-main>\n  <LanderFooter />\n</template>\n\n<script setup>\nimport { ref, computed, onMounted, onUnmounted, watch } from 'vue';\nimport { useRoute } from 'vue-router';\nimport LanderFooter from '@/components/LanderFooter.vue';\n\nconst props = defineProps({\n  public_address: String,\n  category_slug: String,\n  tag_slug: String,\n  language: String\n});\n\nconst route = useRoute();\nconst articles = ref([]);\nconst isLoading = ref(true);\nconst error = ref(null);\nconst pageTitle = ref('Articles');\n\nfunction truncateTitle(title, length = 48) {\n    if (!title) return '';\n    if (title.length <= length) {\n        return title;\n    }\n    return title.substring(0, length) + '...';\n}\n\nconst mode = computed(() => {\n  if (props.public_address) return 'author';\n  if (props.category_slug) return 'category';\n  if (props.tag_slug) return 'tag';\n  if (props.language) return 'language';\n  return 'all';\n});\n\nconst filterValue = computed(() => {\n    if (props.public_address) return props.public_address;\n    if (props.category_slug) return decodeURIComponent(props.category_slug);\n    if (props.tag_slug) return decodeURIComponent(props.tag_slug);\n    if (props.language) return props.language;\n    return null;\n});\n\nfunction updateStructuredData(articleList) {\n  const oldScript = document.getElementById('list-structured-data');\n  if (oldScript) {\n    oldScript.remove();\n  }\n  if (!articleList || articleList.length === 0) return;\n  const itemListElements = articleList.map((article, index) => {\n    const lang = article.language || 'en';\n    const url = `https://flowork.cloud/p-${article.slug}-${lang}.html`;\n    return {\n      \"@type\": \"ListItem\",\n      \"position\": index + 1,\n      \"url\": url,\n      \"name\": article.title\n    };\n  });\n  const schema = {\n    \"@context\": \"https://schema.org\",\n    \"@type\": \"ItemList\",\n    \"name\": pageTitle.value,\n    \"itemListElement\": itemListElements\n  };\n  const script = document.createElement('script');\n  script.type = 'application/ld+json';\n  script.id = 'list-structured-data';\n  script.text = JSON.stringify(schema);\n  document.head.appendChild(script);\n  console.log('[SEO] Updated Structured Data (JSON-LD) for this ItemList.'); // English Log\n}\n\nasync function fetchArticles() {\n  isLoading.value = true;\n  error.value = null;\n  articles.value = [];\n\n  if (!filterValue.value) {\n    error.value = \"No filter specified.\";\n    isLoading.value = false;\n    return;\n  }\n\n  if (mode.value === 'author') {\n    pageTitle.value = `Articles by ${filterValue.value.substring(0, 6)}...`;\n  } else if (mode.value === 'category') {\n    pageTitle.value = `Category: ${filterValue.value}`;\n  } else if (mode.value === 'tag') {\n    pageTitle.value = `Tag: ${filterValue.value}`;\n  } else if (mode.value === 'language') {\n    pageTitle.value = props.language === 'id' ? 'Artikel (Bahasa Indonesia)' : 'Articles (English)';\n  }\n\n  try {\n    const apiUrl = `/api/v1/content/articles/list?${mode.value}=${encodeURIComponent(filterValue.value)}`;\n    console.log(`[ArticleListView] Fetching: ${apiUrl}`); // English Log\n    const response = await fetch(apiUrl);\n    const data = await response.json();\n    if (!response.ok) {\n        throw new Error(data.error || 'Failed to fetch articles');\n    }\n    articles.value = data;\n    updateStructuredData(data);\n  } catch (e) {\n      console.error(`[ArticleListView] Error: ${e.message}`); // English Log\n      error.value = e.message;\n  } finally {\n      isLoading.value = false;\n  }\n}\n\nfunction getPublicUrl(article) {\n  const lang = article.language || 'en';\n  return `/p-${article.slug}-${lang}.html`;\n}\n\nwatch(() => route.params, fetchArticles, { immediate: true });\n\nconst canvasEl = ref(null);\nlet animationFrameId = null;\nlet mouse = { x: null, y: null, radius: 100 };\nfunction handleMouseMove(event) {\n    mouse.x = event.clientX;\n    mouse.y = event.clientY;\n}\nconst setupCanvasAnimation = () => {\n    const canvas = canvasEl.value; if (!canvas) return;\n    const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');\n    let particles = [];\n    const resizeCanvas = () => { if(canvas) { canvas.width = window.innerWidth; canvas.height = window.innerHeight; } };\n    resizeCanvas();\n    window.addEventListener('resize', resizeCanvas);\n    window.addEventListener('mousemove', handleMouseMove);\n\n    class Particle {\n        constructor(x, y, size, color, speedX, speedY) {\n            this.x = x; this.y = y;\n            this.originX = x;\n            this.originY = y;\n            this.size = size; this.color = color;\n            this.speedX = speedX; this.speedY = speedY;\n            this.density = (Math.random() * 30) + 1;\n        }\n        update() {\n            let dx = mouse.x - this.x;\n            let dy = mouse.y - this.y;\n            let distance = Math.sqrt(dx*dx + dy*dy);\n            if (distance < mouse.radius) {\n                let forceDirectionX = dx / distance;\n                let forceDirectionY = dy / distance;\n                let force = (mouse.radius - distance) / mouse.radius;\n                let directionX = forceDirectionX * force * this.density * 0.5;\n                let directionY = forceDirectionY * force * this.density * 0.5;\n                this.x -= directionX;\n                this.y -= directionY;\n            } else {\n                if (this.x !== this.originX) {\n                    let dx = this.x - this.originX;\n                    this.x -= dx/10;\n                }\n                if (this.y !== this.originY) {\n                    let dy = this.y - this.originY;\n                    this.y -= dy/10;\n                }\n            }\n            if (this.x > canvas.width || this.x < 0) this.speedX = -this.speedX;\n            if (this.y > canvas.height || this.y < 0) this.speedY = -this.speedY;\n            if (distance >= mouse.radius) {\n                this.x += this.speedX;\n                this.y += this.speedY;\n            }\n        }\n        draw() { ctx.fillStyle = this.color; ctx.beginPath(); ctx.arc(this.x, this.y, this.size, 0, Math.PI * 2); ctx.fill(); }\n    }\n    function init() {\n        particles = []; let numberOfParticles = (canvas.height * canvas.width) / 15000;\n        for (let i = 0; i < numberOfParticles; i++) {\n            let size = (Math.random() * 2) + 1; let x = Math.random() * (innerWidth - size * 4) + size * 2; let y = Math.random() * (innerHeight - size * 4) + size * 2;\n            let speedX = (Math.random() * 0.3) - 0.15; let speedY = (Math.random() * 0.3) - 0.15;\n            particles.push(new Particle(x, y, size, 'rgba(0, 245, 255, 0.3)', speedX, speedY));\n        }\n    }\n    function connect() {\n        let opacityValue = 1;\n        for (let a = 0; a < particles.length; a++) {\n            for (let b = a; b < particles.length; b++) {\n                let distance = ((particles[a].x - particles[b].x) * (particles[a].x - particles[b].x)) + ((particles[a].y - particles[b].y) * (particles[a].y - particles[b].y));\n                if (distance < (canvas.width / 8) * (canvas.height / 8)) {\n                    opacityValue = 1 - (distance / 25000);\n                    ctx.strokeStyle = `rgba(191, 0, 255, ${opacityValue * 0.3})`; ctx.lineWidth = 1;\n                    ctx.beginPath(); ctx.moveTo(particles[a].x, particles[a].y); ctx.lineTo(particles[b].x, particles[b].y); ctx.stroke();\n                }\n            }\n        }\n    }\n    function animate() {\n        animationFrameId = requestAnimationFrame(animate);\n        ctx.clearRect(0, 0, innerWidth, innerHeight);\n        particles.forEach(p => { p.update(); p.draw(); });\n        connect();\n    }\n    init(); animate();\n};\n\nonMounted(() => {\n    setupCanvasAnimation();\n});\n\nonUnmounted(() => {\n    if (animationFrameId) {\n        cancelAnimationFrame(animationFrameId);\n    }\n    window.removeEventListener('mousemove', handleMouseMove);\n});\n</script>\n\n<style scoped>\n.article-list-page {\n  position: relative;\n  z-index: 1;\n  background-color: #0A0F1E;\n}\n.neural-canvas {\n  position: fixed;\n  top: 0;\n  left: 0;\n  width: 100%;\n  height: 100%;\n  z-index: -1;\n  opacity: 0.5;\n}\n.page-content-container {\n  position: relative;\n  z-index: 2;\n}\n.legal-page { padding: 120px 0; min-height: 100vh; }\n.legal-card {\n  background: transparent;\n  backdrop-filter: none;\n  border: none;\n  box-shadow: none !important;\n}\n.headline { color: #00f5ff; }\n.orbitron-font { font-family: 'Orbitron', monospace; }\n\n@property --angle {\n  syntax: '<angle>';\n  initial-value: 0deg;\n  inherits: false;\n}\n.masonry-grid {\n  column-gap: 16px;\n  column-count: 1;\n}\n@media (min-width: 600px) {\n  .masonry-grid {\n    column-count: 2;\n  }\n}\n@media (min-width: 960px) {\n  .masonry-grid {\n    column-count: 3;\n  }\n}\n.masonry-item {\n  break-inside: avoid;\n  margin-bottom: 16px;\n}\n.article-grid-link {\n  display: block;\n  text-decoration: none;\n}\n.article-grid-item {\n  background: rgba(23, 33, 65, 0.7);\n  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);\n\n  border: 2px solid transparent;\n  background-clip: padding-box, border-box;\n  background-origin: padding-box, border-box;\n  background-image:\n    linear-gradient(rgba(23, 33, 65, 0.7), rgba(23, 33, 65, 0.7)),\n    conic-gradient(from var(--angle), transparent 25%, #64ffda, #bf00ff, transparent 75%);\n\n  transition: all 0.3s ease-out;\n  animation: border-chase 4s linear infinite;\n\n  display: flex;\n  flex-direction: column;\n  height: 100%;\n  position: relative;\n  overflow: hidden;\n}\n\n.article-grid-item::before {\n  content: '';\n  position: absolute;\n  top: 0;\n  left: -75%;\n  width: 50%;\n  height: 100%;\n  background: linear-gradient(\n    90deg,\n    transparent,\n    rgba(0, 245, 255, 0.15),\n    transparent\n  );\n  transform: skewX(-25deg);\n  transition: left 0.7s ease-in-out;\n  z-index: 1;\n}\n\n.article-grid-link:hover .article-grid-item {\n  transform: translateY(-10px) perspective(1000px) rotateX(3deg) rotateY(-4deg);\n  box-shadow: 0 20px 50px rgba(0,0,0,0.5);\n}\n\n.article-grid-link:hover .article-grid-item::before {\n  left: 125%;\n}\n\n@keyframes border-chase {\n  to {\n    --angle: 360deg;\n  }\n}\n\n.item-title {\n  color: #f0f0f0;\n  font-weight: 500;\n  white-space: normal;\n  font-family: 'Exo 2', sans-serif;\n  font-size: 1.1rem;\n  line-height: 1.4;\n  position: relative;\n  z-index: 2;\n}\n.item-snippet {\n  color: #B0BEC5;\n  font-size: 0.9rem;\n  line-height: 1.5;\n  padding-bottom: 16px;\n  position: relative;\n  z-index: 2;\n}\n.article-grid-item .v-card-actions {\n  margin-top: auto;\n  background-color:   metaDesc = document.createElement('meta');\n    metaDesc.setAttribute('name', 'description');\n    document.head.appendChild(metaDesc);\n  }\n  metaDesc.setAttribute('content',
