class=\"text-caption font-mono text-grey\">NO ENGINE LINKED</div>\n                   <v-btn to=\"/my-engines\" variant=\"outlined\" color=\"amber-darken-3\" size=\"small\" class=\"mt-3 font-mono\">\n                      LINK NEW ENGINE\n                   </v-btn>\n                </div>\n\n                <div v-else>\n                   <v-row align=\"center\">\n                      <v-col cols=\"12\" md=\"4\" class=\"d-flex justify-center\">\n                          <div class=\"globe-container\">\n                              <div class=\"wireframe-globe\"></div>\n                              <div class=\"globe-grid\"></div>\n                              <div class=\"globe-marker\"></div>\n                          </div>\n                      </v-col>\n\n                      <v-col cols=\"12\" md=\"8\">\n                          <v-row dense>\n                              <v-col cols=\"6\" sm=\"3\" class=\"text-center\">\n                                 <div class=\"chart-container\">\n                                    <Doughnut :data=\"getCpuChartData(selectedEngine)\" :options=\"donutOptions\" />\n                                    <div class=\"chart-value\">\n                                       <div class=\"text-h6 font-weight-bold text-white orbitron-font\">{{ (selectedEngine.vitals?.cpu_percent || 0).toFixed(0) }}%</div>\n                                       <div class=\"text-caption2 text-grey-darken-1 font-mono\">CPU</div>\n                                    </div>\n                                 </div>\n                              </v-col>\n\n                              <v-col cols=\"6\" sm=\"3\" class=\"text-center\">\n                                 <div class=\"chart-container\">\n                                    <Doughnut :data=\"getRamChartData(selectedEngine)\" :options=\"donutOptions\" />\n                                    <div class=\"chart-value\">\n                                       <div class=\"text-h6 font-weight-bold text-white orbitron-font\">{{ (selectedEngine.vitals?.memory_percent || 0).toFixed(0) }}%</div>\n                                       <div class=\"text-caption2 text-grey-darken-1 font-mono\">RAM</div>\n                                    </div>\n                                 </div>\n                              </v-col>\n\n                              <v-col cols=\"6\" sm=\"3\" class=\"text-center\">\n                                 <div class=\"chart-container\">\n                                    <Doughnut :data=\"getThermalChartData(selectedEngine)\" :options=\"donutOptions\" />\n                                    <div class=\"chart-value\">\n                                       <div class=\"text-h6 font-weight-bold text-white orbitron-font\">{{ getSimulatedTemp(selectedEngine) }}\u00b0</div>\n                                       <div class=\"text-caption2 text-grey-darken-1 font-mono\">TEMP</div>\n                                    </div>\n                                 </div>\n                              </v-col>\n\n                              <v-col cols=\"6\" sm=\"3\" class=\"text-center\">\n                                 <div class=\"chart-container\">\n                                    <Doughnut :data=\"getLoadChartData(selectedEngine)\" :options=\"donutOptions\" />\n                                    <div class=\"chart-value\">\n                                       <div class=\"text-h6 font-weight-bold text-white orbitron-font\">{{ selectedEngine.status === 'online' ? 'ON' : 'OFF' }}</div>\n                                       <div class=\"text-caption2 text-grey-darken-1 font-mono\">LINK</div>\n                                    </div>\n                                 </div>\n                              </v-col>\n                          </v-row>\n                      </v-col>\n                   </v-row>\n\n                   <v-divider class=\"my-4 border-dashed\"></v-divider>\n\n                   <div style=\"height: 150px; position: relative;\" class=\"mt-2\">\n                      <div class=\"d-flex justify-space-between align-center mb-1\">\n                          <div class=\"text-caption font-mono text-grey-darken-2\">>> NEURAL_TRAFFIC_ANALYSIS</div>\n                          <div class=\"text-caption2 font-mono text-amber-darken-1 blink\">STREAMING_PACKETS...</div>\n                      </div>\n                      <Bar v-if=\"chartData.datasets[0].data.some(v => v > 0)\" :data=\"chartData\" :options=\"barChartOptions\" />\n                      <div v-else class=\"empty-chart-overlay\">\n                         <div class=\"text-caption font-mono text-grey-darken-3 blink\">AWAITING SKELETON DATA...</div>\n                      </div>\n                   </div>\n                </div>\n             </v-card-text>\n          </v-card>\n\n          <v-card class=\"cyber-card flex-grow-1\" variant=\"flat\">\n             <div class=\"card-header\">\n                <span class=\"header-icon\"><v-icon icon=\"mdi-console-line\" size=\"x-small\"></v-icon></span>\n                <span class=\"header-title\">SKELETON_CORE_PROCESSES</span>\n             </div>\n             <v-card-text class=\"pa-0 terminal-bg relative\">\n                <div class=\"matrix-rain-overlay\"></div> <div class=\"terminal-scroll-area custom-scrollbar\">\n                    <div v-if=\"!summary.active_jobs || summary.active_jobs.length === 0\" class=\"d-flex align-center justify-center fill-height\" style=\"min-height: 150px;\">\n                       <div class=\"text-caption font-mono text-grey-darken-2 opacity-50\">>> CORE_IDLE // STANDBY_FOR_ACTION</div>\n                    </div>\n\n                    <v-table v-else density=\"compact\" class=\"bg-transparent terminal-table font-mono\">\n                        <tbody>\n                            <tr v-for=\"job in summary.active_jobs\" :key=\"job.id\" class=\"terminal-row\">\n                                <td style=\"width: 20px;\" class=\"text-amber-darken-3\">></td>\n                                <td class=\"text-white\">\n                                    <span class=\"text-green-accent-3\">RUN</span> {{ job.preset }}\n                                    <div class=\"text-caption2 text-grey-darken-2\">{{ job.id.substring(0,8) }}</div>\n                                </td>\n                                <td class=\"text-grey-lighten-1 text-right\">{{ job.duration_seconds?.toFixed(1) || 0 }}s</td>\n                                <td class=\"text-right\" style=\"width: 40px;\">\n                                   <v-btn\n                                     icon=\"mdi-close-circle\"\n                                     color=\"red-darken-3\"\n                                     variant=\"text\"\n                                     size=\"x-small\"\n                                     @click=\"workflowStore.stopJobById(job.id)\"\n                                   ></v-btn>\n                                </td>\n                            </tr>\n                        </tbody>\n                    </v-table>\n                </div>\n             </v-card-text>\n          </v-card>\n\n        </v-col>\n\n        <v-col cols=\"12\" lg=\"3\" class=\"d-flex flex-column gap-4\">\n\n           <v-card class=\"cyber-card\" variant=\"flat\">\n              <div class=\"card-header\">\n                 <span class=\"header-icon\"><v-icon icon=\"mdi-lan\" size=\"x-small\"></v-icon></span>\n                 <span class=\"header-title\">ENGINE_STATUS</span>\n              </div>\n              <v-card-text class=\"pa-0\">\n                 <div class=\"scroll-container\" style=\"height: 250px;\">\n                     <div class=\"pa-2\">\n                         <div v-if=\"!engines.length && !isLoadingEngines\" class=\"text-center pa-4\">\n                            <span class=\"text-caption font-mono text-grey\">NO NODES DETECTED</span>\n                         </div>\n\n                         <div\n                           v-for=\"engine in engines\"\n                           :key=\"engine.id\"\n                           class=\"engine-item mb-2\"\n                           :class=\"{'selected': selectedEngineId === engine.id, 'online': engine.status === 'online'}\"\n                           @click=\"engine.status === 'online' ? engineStore.setSelectedEngineId(engine.id) : null\"\n                         >\n                             <div class=\"d-flex align-center justify-space-between w-100\">\n                                <div class=\"d-flex align-center\">\n                                   <v-icon :icon=\"engine.status === 'online' ? 'mdi-wifi' : 'mdi-wifi-off'\" size=\"small\" :class=\"engine.status === 'online' ? 'text-amber-darken-1' : 'text-grey-darken-2'\" class=\"mr-3\"></v-icon>\n                                   <div>\n                                      <div class=\"text-caption font-weight-bold text-white font-mono\">{{ engine.name }}</div>\n                                      <div class=\"text-caption2 text-grey-darken-1 font-mono\">SKELETON_VER: 7.2</div>\n                                   </div>\n                                </div>\n                                <v-icon v-if=\"selectedEngineId === engine.id\" icon=\"mdi-radiobox-marked\" color=\"amber-darken-3\" size=\"small\"></v-icon>\n                             </div>\n                             <div class=\"engine-line mt-2\" :style=\"{width: (engine.vitals?.cpu_percent || 0) + '%', backgroundColor: engine.status === 'online' ? '#FFC107' : '#424242'}\"></div>\n                         </div>\n                     </div>\n                 </div>\n              </v-card-text>\n           </v-card>\n\n           <v-card class=\"cyber-card flex-grow-1\" variant=\"flat\">\n              <div class=\"card-header\">\n                 <span class=\"header-icon\"><v-icon icon=\"mdi-robot-industrial-outline\" size=\"x-small\"></v-icon></span>\n                 <span class=\"header-title\">MUSCLE_APP_SCANNER</span>\n              </div>\n              <v-card-text class=\"pa-0\">\n                 <div class=\"scroll-container\" style=\"height: 200px;\">\n                     <div class=\"pa-3\">\n                         <div v-if=\"appStore.installedApps.length === 0\" class=\"d-flex flex-column align-center justify-center py-6 opacity-50\">\n                             <v-icon icon=\"mdi-magnify-scan\" color=\"amber-darken-3\" size=\"32\" class=\"mb-2\"></v-icon>\n                             <span class=\"text-caption font-mono text-amber-darken-1\">SCANNING FOR MUSCLES...</span>\n                         </div>\n                         <div v-else class=\"font-mono\">\n                            <div class=\"text-caption2 text-cyan-accent-2 mb-1 border-bottom-subtle\">>> DETECTED_APPS</div>\n                            <div v-for=\"app in appStore.installedApps\" :key=\"app.id\" class=\"d-flex justify-space-between align-center my-1 text-caption\">\n                               <span class=\"text-white text-truncate\" style=\"max-width: 70%;\">\n                                 <v-icon icon=\"mdi-cube-outline\" size=\"x-small\" class=\"mr-1\"></v-icon>\n                                 {{ app.name }}\n                               </span>\n                               <v-chip size=\"x-small\" color=\"green-accent-3\" variant=\"text\" class=\"pa-0\">ACTIVE</v-chip>\n                            </div>\n                         </div>\n                     </div>\n                 </div>\n              </v-card-text>\n           </v-card>\n\n        </v-col>\n      </v-row>\n    </v-container>\n  </div>\n</template>\n\n<script setup>\nimport { onMounted, onUnmounted, computed, watch, ref } from 'vue';\nimport { useDashboardStore } from '@/store/dashboard';\nimport { useEngineStore } from '@/store/engines';\nimport { useWorkflowStore } from '@/store/workflow';\nimport { useAppStore } from '@/store/apps';\nimport { useSocketStore } from '@/store/socket';\nimport { useAuthStore } from '@/store/auth';\nimport { useUiStore } from '@/store/ui';\nimport { storeToRefs } from 'pinia';\nimport { Bar, Doughnut } from 'vue-chartjs';\nimport {\n  Chart as ChartJS,\n  Title,\n  Tooltip,\n  Legend,\n  BarElement,\n  CategoryScale,\n  LinearScale,\n  ArcElement\n} from 'chart.js';\nimport NeuralCanvasBackground from '@/components/NeuralCanvasBackground.vue';\n\nChartJS.register(Title, Tooltip, Legend, BarElement, CategoryScale, LinearScale, ArcElement);\n\nconst dashboardStore = useDashboardStore();\nconst engineStore = useEngineStore();\nconst workflowStore = useWorkflowStore();\nconst appStore = useAppStore();\nconst socketStore = useSocketStore();\nconst authStore = useAuthStore();\nconst uiStore = useUiStore();\n\nconst { summary, isInitialLoading, error } = storeToRefs(dashboardStore);\nconst { allAvailableEngines: engines, isLoading: isLoadingEngines, selectedEngineId } = storeToRefs(engineStore);\nconst { favoritePresets, isExecuting } = storeToRefs(workflowStore);\nconst isEngineOnline = computed(() => engineStore.hasOnlineEngine);\n\nconst selectedEngine = computed(() => engines.value.find(e => e.id === selectedEngineId.value));\nconst timeString = ref(new Date().toLocaleTimeString());\n\nlet refreshInterval = null;\nlet clockInterval = null;\n\nfunction formatUserId(id) {\n    if (!id) return 'UNKNOWN';\n    return id.substring(0, 8) + '...' + id.substring(id.length - 4);\n}\n\nconst donutOptions = {\n    responsive: true,\n    cutout: '75%',\n    plugins: {\n       legend: { display: false },\n       tooltip: { enabled: false }\n    },\n    maintainAspectRatio: false,\n    borderColor: '#000000',\n    borderWidth: 2\n};\n\nconst barChartOptions = {\n    responsive: true,\n    maintainAspectRatio: false,\n    plugins: { legend: { display: false } },\n    scales: {\n        x: {\n            display: true,\n            ticks: { color: '#616161', font: { family: 'Fira Code', size: 9 } },\n            grid: { display: false }\n        },\n        y: {\n            display: true,\n            ticks: { color: '#616161', stepSize: 5, font: { family: 'Fira Code', size: 9 } },\n            grid: { color: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.03)' }\n        }\n    },\n    elements: {\n       bar: { borderRadius: 2 }\n    }\n};\n\nfunction getCpuChartData(engine) {\n    const usage = engine?.vitals?.cpu_percent || 0;\n    return {\n        labels: ['Used', 'Free'],\n        datasets: [{\n            data: [usage, 100 - usage],\n            backgroundColor: ['#FFC107', 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05)'],\n            hoverBackgroundColor: ['#FFD54F', 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05)'],\n            borderWidth: 0\n        }]\n    };\n}\nfunction getRamChartData(engine) {\n    const usage = engine?.vitals?.memory_percent || 0;\n    return {\n        labels: ['Used', 'Free'],\n        datasets: [{\n            data: [usage, 100 - usage],\n            backgroundColor: ['#00E676', 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05)'],\n            hoverBackgroundColor: ['#69F0AE', 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05)'],\n            borderWidth: 0\n        }]\n    };\n}\nfunction getThermalChartData(engine) {\n    const cpu = engine?.vitals?.cpu_percent || 0;\n    const simTemp = 40 + (cpu * 0.4);\n    const maxTemp = 90;\n    let color = '#29B6F6';\n    if(simTemp > 60) color = '#FFC107';\n    if(simTemp > 80) color = '#FF5252';\n    return {\n        labels: ['Temp', 'Limit'],\n        datasets: [{\n            data: [simTemp, maxTemp - simTemp],\n            backgroundColor: [color, 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05)'],\n            borderWidth: 0\n        }]\n    };\n}\nfunction getSimulatedTemp(engine) {\n    const cpu = engine?.vitals?.cpu_percent || 0;\n    return Math.round(40 + (cpu * 0.4));\n}\nfunction getLoadChartData(engine) {\n    const online = engine?.status === 'online';\n    return {\n        datasets: [{\n            data: [online ? 100 : 0, online ? 0 : 100],\n            backgroundColor: ['#E0E0E0', 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05)'],\n            borderWidth: 0\n        }]\n    };\n}\n\nconst chartData = computed(() => {\n    const ts = summary.value?.execution_stats_24h || { success: 0, failed: 0 };\n    return {\n        labels: ['SUCCESS', 'FAIL'],\n        datasets: [{\n            label: 'Jobs',\n            backgroundColor: ['rgba(0, 229, 255, 0.6)', 'rgba(211, 47, 47, 0.6)'],\n            borderColor: ['#00E5FF', '#D32F2F'],\n            borderWidth: 1,\n            data: [ts.success || 0, ts.failed || 0],\n            barThickness: 30,\n        }]\n    }\n});\n\n\nwatch(selectedEngineId, (newId) => {\n    if (newId) {\n        dashboardStore.fetchDashboardSummary(false, newId);\n        appStore.fetchInstalledApps();\n    }\n});\n\nonMounted(async () => {\n  clockInterval = setInterval(() => {\n     timeString.value = new Date().toLocaleTimeString();\n  }, 1000);\n\n  if (authStore.isAuthenticated) {\n      await engineStore.fetchEngines();\n      await appStore.fetchInstalledApps();\n  }\n  dashboardStore.fetchDashboardSummary(false, engineStore.selectedEngineId);\n  refreshInterval = setInterval(() => {\n    if (authStore.isAuthenticated && engineStore.selectedEngineId) {\n        dashboardStore.fetchDashboardSummary(true, engineStore.selectedEngineId);\n    }\n  }, 5000);\n});\n\nonUnmounted(() => {\n  clearInterval(refreshInterval);\n  clearInterval(clockInterval);\n});\n</script>\n\n<style scoped>\n/* IMPORTS */\n@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Fira+Code:wght@400;500;600&display=swap');\n@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Orbitron:wght@400;500;700;900&display=swap');\n\n/* GLOBAL LAYOUT */\n.dashboard-page {\n  height: 100%;\n  padding: 0;\n  position: relative;\n  z-index: 1;\n  background-color: #050505;\n  color: #FFFFFF !important;\n  overflow: hidden;\n}\n\n/* BACKGROUND FX */\n.bg-grid-moving {\n    position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 200%; height: 200%;\n    background-image:\n        linear-gradient(rgba(0, 229, 255, 0.05) 1px, transparent 1px),\n        linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(0, 229, 255, 0.05) 1px, transparent 1px);\n    background-size: 40px 40px;\n    transform: perspective(500px) rotateX(60deg);\n    animation: gridMove 20s linear infinite;\n    pointer-events: none; z-index: 0;\n}\n@keyframes gridMove { 0% { transform: 100%; height: 100%;\n    background: linear-gradient(rgba(18, 18, 18, 0) 50%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25) 50%), linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(255, 214, 0, 0.02), rgba(0, 229, 255, 0.02));\n    background-size: 100% 2px, 3px 100%;\n    pointer-events: none; z-index: 0;\n}\n.vignette-overlay {\n    position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%;\n    background: radial-gradient(circle, transparent 50%, rgba(0,0,0,0.9) 100%);\n    pointer-events: none; z-index: 1;\n}\n\n.dashboard-container {\n    position: relative; z-index: 2; height: 100%; overflow-y: auto;\n}\n\n/* TYPOGRAPHY & HEADER */\n.orbitron-font { font-family: 'Orbitron', sans-serif; letter-spacing: 1px; }\n.font-mono { font-family: 'Fira Code', monospace; }\n.tracking-wide { letter-spacing: 2px; }\n.lh-1 { line-height: 1.2; }\n.text-caption2 { font-size: 0.65rem; }\n\n.hud-logo-mark {\n    position: relative;\n    border: 1px solid rgba(0, 229, 255, 0.3);\n    padding: 8px;\n    background: rgba(0, 229, 255, 0.05);\n    border-radius: 4px;\n    display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center;\n}\n.logo-inner-spin {\n    position: absolute; top: 2px; left: 2px; right: 2px; bottom: 2px;\n    border: 1px dashed rgba(255, 214, 0, 0.5);\n    border-radius: 4px;\n    animation: spin 10s linear infinite;\n}\n\n/* RADAR WIDGET ANIMATION */\n.radar-widget {\n    width: 60px; height: 60px;\n    border: 2px solid rgba(0, 229, 255, 0.3);\n    border-radius: 50%;\n    position: relative;\n    background: rgba(0, 10, 20, 0.5);\n    box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0, 229, 255, 0.1);\n    overflow: hidden;\n}\n.radar-grid {\n    position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%;\n    background-image: radial-gradient(transparent 60%, rgba(0, 229, 255, 0.2) 60%),\n                      linear-gradient(0deg, transparent 49%, rgba(0, 229, 255, 0.2) 50%, transparent 51%),\n                      linear-gradient(90deg, transparent 49%, rgba(0, 229, 255, 0.2) 50%, transparent 51%);\n    background-size: 100% 100%, 100% 100%, 100% 100%;\n    border-radius: 50%;\n}\n.radar-sweep {\n    position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%;\n    background: conic-gradient(from 0deg, transparent 0deg, rgba(0, 229, 255, 0.4) 30deg, transparent 30deg);\n    border-radius: 50%;\n    animation: spin 2s linear infinite;\n}\n\n/* HOLOGRAPHIC GLOBE ANIMATION (CSS ONLY) */\n.globe-container {\n    width: 100px; height: 100px;\n    position: relative;\n    perspective: 800px;\n    margin: 10px;\n}\n.wireframe-globe {\n    width: 100%; height: 100%;\n    border-radius: 50%;\n    border: 1px solid rgba(255, 214, 0, 0.3);\n    position: absolute;\n    box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(255, 214, 0, 0.1) inset;\n    background:\n        repeating-linear-gradient(0deg, transparent 0, transparent 10px, rgba(255, 214, 0, 0.1) 10px, rgba(255, 214, 0, 0.1) 11px),\n        repeating-linear-gradient(90deg, transparent 0, transparent 10px, rgba(255, 214, 0, 0.1) 10px, rgba(255, 214, 0, 0.1) 11px);\n    background-size: 200% 200%;\n    animation: globeRotate 10s linear infinite;\n}\n.globe-grid {\n    position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%;\n    border-radius: 50%;\n    border: 1px dashed rgba(0, 229, 255, 0.5);\n    transform: rotateX(60deg);\n    animation: spin 5s linear infinite;\n}\n@keyframes globeRotate {\n    0% { background-position: 0 0; }\n    100% { background-position: 100px 0; }\n}\n\n/* CARDS & PANELS */\n.cyber-card {\n  background: rgba(10, 15, 25, 0.95) !important;\n  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);\n  border: 1px solid rgba(0, 229, 255, 0.15);\n  box-shadow: 0 8px 32px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);\n  color: white;\n  transition: all 0.3s ease;\n  border-radius: 4px;\n  position: relative;\n  overflow: hidden;\n  display: flex; flex-direction: column;\n}\n.cyber-card:hover { border-color: rgba(0, 229, 255, 0.5); box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(0, 229, 255, 0.1); }\n\n/* SCROLL CONTAINERS (INDEPENDENT }\n.scroll-container::-webkit-scrollbar-track { background: transparent; }\n\n.terminal-scroll-area {\n    height: 200px;\n    overflow-y: auto;\n    overflow-x: hidden;\n}\n\n/* IDENTITY CARD FX */\n.identity-card { border-top: 2px solid #FFD600; }\n.card-decoration-tl { position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 20px; height: 20px; border-top: 2px solid #FFD600; border-left: 2px solid #FFD600; opacity: 0.5; }\n.card-decoration-br { position: absolute; bottom: 0; right: 0; width: 20px; height: 20px; border-bottom: 2px solid #FFD600; border-right: 2px solid #FFD600; opacity: 0.5; }\n.scan-line {\n    position: absolute; width: 100%; height: 2px; background: rgba(0, 229, 255, 0.5);\n    box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0, 229, 255, 0.8);\n    top: 0; left: 0;\n    animation: scanDown 4s linear infinite;\n    pointer-events: none; opacity: 0.3;\n}\n@keyframes scanDown { 0% { top: -10%; opacity: 0; } 50% { opacity: 0.5; } 100% { top: 110%; opacity: 0; } }\n\n/* AVATAR RING */\n.avatar-container { position: relative; width: 64px; height: 64px; }\n.avatar-ring {\n    position: absolute; top: -5px; left: -5px; right: -5px; bottom: -5px;\n    border: 1px dashed rgba(0, 229, }\n.terminal-table { background: transparent !important; }\n.terminal-table td { border: none !important; font-size: 0.75rem; color: #FFFFFF; padding: 0 8px !important; height: 24px !important; }\n.terminal-row:hover td { background: rgba(0, 229, 255, 0.1); color: #FFD600; }\n\n.matrix-rain-overlay {\n    position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%;\n    background: opacity: 0.3;\n}\n@keyframes rain { from { background-position: 0 0; } to { background-position: 0 20px; } }\n\n/* UTILS */\n.glass-panel { backdrop-filter: blur(4px); }\n.status-indicator { position:                  <template v-slot:prepend>\n                              <v-icon :icon=\"subItem.icon\" :color=\"subItem.color || '#D4AF37'\"></v-icon>\n                          </template>\n </v-list-item>\n        </template>\n      </v-list>\n    </v-menu>\n\n    <DataViewer />\n    <ShareWorkflowModal />\n\n  </v-layout>\n</template>\n\n<script setup>\nimport { ref, onMounted, computed, nextTick, watch } from 'vue';\nimport { VueFlow, useVueFlow } from '@vue-flow/core';\nimport { storeToRefs } from 'pinia';\nimport { Background, BackgroundVariant } from '@vue-flow/background';\nimport Toolbox from '@/components/Toolbox.vue';\nimport CustomNode from '@/components/CustomNode.vue';\nimport RightSidebar from '@/components/RightSidebar.vue';\nimport ControlsFooter from '@/components/ControlsFooter.vue';\nimport DataViewer from '@/components/DataViewer.vue';\nimport CommunityLinks from '@/components/CommunityLinks.vue';\nimport ShareWorkflowModal from '@/components/ShareWorkflowModal.vue';\nimport LogPanelContent from '@/components/panels/LogPanelContent.vue';\n\nimport { useComponentStore } from '@/store/components';\nimport { useWorkflowStore } from '@/store/workflow';\nimport { useUiStore } from '@/store/ui';\nimport { useLocaleStore } from '@/store/locale';\nimport { useAuthStore } from '@/store/auth';\nimport { useSocketStore } from '@/store/socket';\nimport { useLogStore } from '@/store/logs';\nimport { useRouter, useRoute } from 'vue-router';\nimport { v4 as uuidv4 } from 'uuid';\nimport DataflowView from '@/views/DataflowView.vue';\nimport DebuggerView from '@/views/DebuggerView.vue';\nimport NeuralCanvasBackground from '@/components/NeuralCanvasBackground.vue';\n\nconst componentStore = useComponentStore();\nconst workflowStore = useWorkflowStore();\nconst uiStore = useUiStore();\nconst localeStore = useLocaleStore();\nconst authStore = useAuthStore();\nconst socketStore = useSocketStore();\nconst logStore = useLogStore();\nconst router = useRouter();\nconst route = useRoute();\n\nconst { elements, selectedNode, connectionStatus, isReadOnly, isCanvasEmpty } = storeToRefs(workflowStore);\nconst { loc } = storeToRefs(localeStore);\nconst isRightPanelOpen = computed(() => !!uiStore.activeRightPanel);\n\nconst visibleLogs = ref([]);\n\nwatch(() => logStore.executionLogs.length, (newLen, oldLen) => {\n    if (newLen > oldLen) {\n        const newLogs = logStore.executionLogs.slice(oldLen - newLen);\n\n        newLogs.forEach(log => {\n            const id = uuidv4();\n            const logItem = { ...log, id };\n\n            visibleLogs.value.push(logItem);\n\n            setTimeout(() => {\n                const idx = visibleLogs.value.findIndex(l => l.id === id);\n                if (idx !== -1) visibleLogs.value.splice(idx, 1);\n            }, 15000);\n        });\n    } else if (newLen === 0) {\n        visibleLogs.value = [];\n    }\n});\n\nconst { project, screenToFlowCoordinate, fitView, zoom } = useVueFlow();\nconst isZoomedOut = computed(() => zoom?.value < 0.4);\nfunction goToMyEngines() { router.push('/my-engines'); }\n\nconst contextMenu = ref({ visible: false, x: 0, y: 0, items: [], target: null });\nconst lastPaneClickPosition = ref({ x: 0, y: 0 });\n\nconst colorPalette = [\n  { name: 'Default', value: null, icon: 'mdi-circle-off-outline', color: 'grey' },\n  { name: 'Blue', value: '#2196F3', icon: 'mdi-circle', color: '#2196F3' },\n  { name: 'Green', value: '#4CAF50', icon: 'mdi-circle', color: '#4CAF50' },\n  { name: 'Orange', value: '#FF9800', icon: 'mdi-circle', color: '#FF9800' },\n  { name: 'Red', value: '#F44336', icon: 'mdi-circle', color: '#F44336' },\n];\n\nfunction onPaneReady() {\n    setTimeout(() => { fitView(); }, 100);\n}\n\nfunction getEdgeClass(edge) {\n    const status = connectionStatus.value[edge.id]?.status;\n    if (status === 'ACTIVE') {\n        return 'connection-active';\n    }\n    return '';\n}\n\nfunction handleEdgeClick({ event, edge }) {\n    workflowStore.fetchConnectionData(edge.id);\n}\n\nfunction handleRightPanelClose(isOpen) {\n    if (!isOpen) {\n        if (!uiStore.isPropertiesPanelPinned || uiStore.activeRightPanel !== 'properties') {\n             uiStore.closeRightPanel();\n        }\n    }\n}\n\nfunction onPaneContextMenu(event) {\n  event.preventDefault();\n  lastPaneClickPosition.value = { x: event.clientX, y: event.clientY };\n  contextMenu.value.target = null;\n  contextMenu.value.items = [\n    { title: 'Paste Node', icon: 'mdi-content-paste', action: () => {\n        const { x, y } = project(lastPaneClickPosition.value);\n        workflowStore.pasteNode({ x, y });\n    }, disabled: !workflowStore.clipboard || isReadOnly.value },\n  ];\n  contextMenu.value.x = event.clientX;\n  contextMenu.value.y = event.clientY;\n  nextTick(() => { contextMenu.value.visible = true; });\n}\n\nfunction onNodeContextMenu({ event, node }) {\n  event.preventDefault();\n  contextMenu.value.target = node;\n  contextMenu.value.items = [\n    { title: 'Run From This Node', icon: 'mdi-play-box-outline', color: '#4CAF50', action: () => workflowStore.executeCurrentWorkflow(node.id), disabled: !workflowStore.canExecute },\n    {\n      title: 'Change Color',\n      icon: 'mdi-palette',\n      items: colorPalette.map(color => ({\n        title: color.name,\n        icon: color.icon,\n        color: color.color,\n        action: () => workflowStore.setNodeColor({ nodeId: node.id, color: color.value })\n      })),\n      disabled: isReadOnly.value\n    },\n    { isDivider: true },\n    { title: 'Copy Node', icon: 'mdi-content-copy', action: () => workflowStore.copyNode(node) },\n    { title: 'Duplicate Node', icon: 'mdi-content-duplicate', action: () => workflowStore.duplicateNode(node), disabled: isReadOnly.value },\n    { title: 'View Execution Log', icon: 'mdi-console-line', action: () => console.log('View logs for', node.id) },\n    { isDivider: true },\n    { title: 'Delete Node', icon: 'mdi-delete-outline', color: 'red', action: () => workflowStore.removeElements([node]), disabled: isReadOnly.value }\n  ];\n  contextMenu.value.x = event.clientX;\n  contextMenu.value.y = event.clientY;\n  nextTick(() => { contextMenu.value.visible = true; });\n}\n\nfunction onEdgeContextMenu({ event, edge }) {\n  event.preventDefault();\n  contextMenu.value.target = edge;\n  contextMenu.value.items = [\n    { title: 'View Data History', icon: 'mdi-history', action: () => workflowStore.fetchConnectionData(edge.id) },\n    { isDivider: true },\n    { title: 'Delete Connection', icon: 'mdi-delete-outline', color: 'red', action: () => workflowStore.removeElements([edge]), disabled: isReadOnly.value }\n  ];\n  contextMenu.value.x = event.clientX;\n  contextMenu.value.y = event.clientY;\n  nextTick(() => { contextMenu.value.visible = true; });\n}\n\nonMounted(() => {\n  const token = route.params.token;\n  if (token) {\n    console.log(`[Designer] Found share token: ${token}, loading workflow...`);\n    workflowStore.loadSharedWorkflow(token);\n  } else {\n    console.log('[Designer] Normal session. Waiting for WebSocket connection to fetch data.');\n  }\n  uiStore.isToolboxOpen = true;\n});\n\nfunction handleDragOver(event) {\n  event.preventDefault();\n  if (event.dataTransfer) event.dataTransfer.dropEffect = 'move';\n}\n\nfunction handleDrop(event) {\n  if (isReadOnly.value) return;\n\n  try {\n      const jsonData = event.dataTransfer?.getData('application/json');\n      if (!jsonData) return;\n\n      const droppedData = JSON.parse(jsonData);\n      if (!droppedData.id) return;\n\n      const position = screenToFlowCoordinate({ x: event.clientX, y: event.clientY - 64 });\n      workflowStore.addNode({\n          moduleId: droppedData.id,\n          x: position.x,\n          y: position.y,\n      });\n  } catch (e) {\n      console.error(\"[Designer] Failed to parse dropped item:\", e);\n  }\n}\n\nfunction onConnect(connectionData) {\n    if (isReadOnly.value) return;\n    workflowStore.addEdge(connectionData);\n}\n\nfunction handlePaneClick() {\n    workflowStore.clearSelectedNode();\n    if (uiStore.activeRightPanel !== 'properties' || !uiStore.isPropertiesPanelPinned) {\n        uiStore.closeRightPanel();\n    }\n    contextMenu.value.visible = false;\n}\n\nfunction handleNodeClick({ event, node }) {\n    workflowStore.setSelectedNode(node);\n    uiStore.setActiveRightPanel('properties');\n}\n\nfunction onNodeDragStart(event) {\n  const node = event.node;\n  if (node) {\n    if (!node.data) node.data = {};\n    node.data.isDragging = true;\n  }\n}\nfunction onNodeDragStop({ event, node }) {\n  if (node) {\n    if (!node.data) node.data = {};\n    node.data.isDragging = false;\n  }\n}\n</script>\n\n<style scoped>\n/* ==========================================================================\n   ROYAL DARK GOLD THEME - \"GOD MODE\" (Scoped)\n   ========================================================================== */\n\n/* --- CORE LAYOUT --- */\n.god-mode-theme {\n    background-color: #050505;      </div>\n                      </div>\n\n                      <div class=\"gold-divider\"></div>\n\n                      <div class=\"card-footer d-flex align-center\">\n 'orange',\n        tool: 'blue',\n        trigger: 'green',\n    };\n    return map[type] || 'grey';\n}\n\nwatch(activeTab, (newTab) => {\n  if (newTab === 'capsules') {\n    if (capsules.value.length === 0) marketplaceStore.fetchCapsules();\n  } else {\n    const typeMap = {\n        presets: 'preset',\n        modules: 'module',\n        plugins: 'plugin',\n        tools: 'tool',\n 'Instantly add this workflow to your active Designer canvas.'\n                                    : 'Download and install this component to your local engine.'\n                                }}\n                            </p>\n                        </v-card>\n                    </div>\n                </div>\n            </v-card-text>\n            </v-card>\n          </div>\n\n </v-container>\n  </div>\n</template>\n\n<script setup>\nimport { onMounted, computed, ref } from 'vue';\nimport { useRoute, useRouter } from 'vue-router';\nimport { useMarketplaceStore } from '@/store/marketplace';\nimport { useWorkflowStore } from '@/store/workflow';\nimport { useAuthStore } from '@/store/auth';\nimport { useUiStore } from '@/store/ui';\nimport { storeToRefs } from 'pinia';\nimport NeuralCanvasBackground from '@/components/NeuralCanvasBackground.vue';\nimport MarketplacePublishDialog from '@/components/MarketplacePublishDialog.vue';\nimport axios from 'axios';\n\nconst route = useRoute();\nconst router = useRouter();\nconst marketplaceStore = useMarketplaceStore();\nconst workflowStore = useWorkflowStore();\nconst authStore = useAuthStore();\nconst uiStore = useUiStore();\nconst { selectedItem, isLoadingDetail, error, userVotes } = storeToRefs(marketplaceStore);\nconst itemType = computed(() => route.query.type);\n\nconst widgetData = ref(null);\nconst isWidgetMode = computed(() => !!widgetData.value);\n\nconst showEditDialog = ref(false);\nconst isInstalling = ref(false);\nconst userVoteStatus = computed(() => {\n    const itemId = selectedItem.value?.id;\n    return itemId ? userVotes.value[itemId] : 0;\n});\nconst canDelete = computed(() => {\n    if (!selectedItem.value || !authStore.user) return false;\n    const currentUser = authStore.user.id.toLowerCase();\n    const author = (selectedItem.value.author || '').toLowerCase();\n    const admins = [\n        \"0xF39733B34131c13E35733E9Af1adD78a5e768929\".toLowerCase(),\n        \"0x0F1F31783A93C94f5055E2A11AA28B2368bA982d\".toLowerCase()\n    ];\n    return currentUser === author || admins.includes(currentUser);\n});\nonMounted(async () => {\n  const slug = route.params.slug;\n  const itemId = route.params.id;\n\n  if (slug) {\n      await checkRegistryForWidget(slug);\n  } else if (itemId) {\n      if (itemType.value === 'capsule') {\n        marketplaceStore.fetchCapsuleDetails(itemId);\n      } else {\n        marketplaceStore.fetchItemDetail(itemId);\n      }\n  }\n});\nasync function checkRegistryForWidget(slug) {\n    try {\n        const res = await fetch('/widgets-cloud/registry.json');\n        const registry = await res.json();\n        const found = registry.find(w => w.slug === slug || w.id === slug);\n        if (found) {\n            widgetData.value = found;\n            const manifestPath = `/widgets-cloud/${found.path}/${found.manifest_file || 'manifest.json'}`;\n            const mRes = await fetch(manifestPath);\n            if(mRes.ok) {\n                const m = await mRes.json();\n                widgetData.value.iconUrl = m.icon_file ? `/widgets-cloud/${found.path}/${m.icon_file}` : null;\n            }\n\n            document.title = found.seo?.title || `${found.name} - Flowork App`;\n            updateMeta('description', found.seo?.description);\n        } else {\n            error.value = \"App not found in registry.\";\n        }\n    } catch(e) {\n        console.error(\"Registry fetch error\", e);\n    }\n}\n\nfunction launchWidget() {\n    console.warn(\"Widget launching is currently disabled.\");\n}\n\nfunction copyLink() {\n    navigator.clipboard.writeText(window.location.href);\n    uiStore.showNotification({ text: \"Link copied!\", color: \"info\" });\n}\n\nfunction handleImgError(e) {\n    e.target.src = '/assets/default_plugin.png';\n}\n\nfunction updateMeta(name, content) {\n    let el = document.querySelector(`meta[name=\"${name}\"]`);\n    if(el && content) el.setAttribute('content', content);\n}\n\nfunction formatAuthor(address) {\n  if (!address) return 'Anonymous';\n  if (address.startsWith('0x')) {\n    return `${address.substring(0, 6)}...${address.substring(address.length - 4)}`;\n  }\n  return address;\n}\n\nfunction getTypeColor(type) {\n    if (!type) return 'grey';\n    if (type === 'preset') return 'cyan';\n    if (type === 'module') return 'purple-accent-2';\n    return 'blue';\n}\n\nasync function handleVote(type) {\n    if (!selectedItem.value) return;\n    await marketplaceStore.handleVote(selectedItem.value.id, type);\n}\n\nasync function handleImportPreset() {\n  if (!selectedItem.value || !selectedItem.value.data) return;\n  try {\n    let workflowData = selectedItem.value.data;\n    if (typeof workflowData === 'string') {\n        try { workflowData = JSON.parse(workflowData);\n        } catch(e) { }\n    }\n    const newPresetName = `Imported - ${selectedItem.value.name}`;\n    workflowStore.updateSinglePresetData(newPresetName, workflowData);\n    workflowStore.currentPresetName = newPresetName;\n    router.push({ name: 'Designer' });\n  } catch (e) { }\n}\n\nasync function handleInstallComponent() {\n    if (!selectedItem.value?.data) return;\n\n    const manifest = widgetData.value || selectedItem.value; // Fallback ke item data\n    if (manifest.permissions && manifest.permissions.length > 0) {\n        const permissionList = manifest.permissions.map(p => `\u2022 ${p}`).join('\\n');\n\n        const confirmed = await uiStore.showConfirmation({\n            title: '\u26a0\ufe0f Review Permissions',\n            message: `This app requests the following access rights:\\n\\n${permissionList}\\n\\nDo you trust this application?`,\n            color: 'warning',\n            confirmText: 'Yes, Install',\n            cancelText: 'Cancel'\n        });\n\n        if (!confirmed) return;\n    }\n\n\n    isInstalling.value = true;\n    try {\n        await axios.post('/api/v1/marketplace/component/install', {\n            id: selectedItem.value.id,\n            type: selectedItem.value.type,\n            zip_data: selectedItem.value.data\n        });\n        uiStore.showNotification({ text: `Success! ${selectedItem.value.name} installed.`, color: 'success' });\n    } catch (error) {\n        const errorMsg = error.response?.data?.error || error.message;\n        uiStore.showNotification({ text: `Installation Failed: ${errorMsg}`, color: 'error' });\n    } finally {\n        isInstalling.value = false;\n    }\n}\n\nasync function handleDelete() {\n    const confirmed = await uiStore.showConfirmation({ title: 'Delete', message: 'Sure?', color: 'red' });\n    if (confirmed && (await marketplaceStore.deleteItem(selectedItem.value.id))) {\n        router.push({ name: 'Marketplace' });\n    }\n}\n\nasync function handleItemUpdated() {\n    if (selectedItem.value?.id) await marketplaceStore.fetchItemDetail(selectedItem.value.id);\n}\n</script>\n\n<style scoped>\n.item-detail-page { height: 100%; overflow-y: auto;\npadding: 48px 0; position: relative; z-index: 1; // Mapped to Properties\n    outputs: [] // Mapped to Output Ports\n});\n\nconst engines = computed(() => engineStore.engines || []);\nconst activeEngine = computed(() => engineStore.activeEngine);\n\nfunction selectEngine(eng) {\n    engineStore.setActiveEngine(eng);\n}\n\nwatch([meta, schema, codeContent, requirementsContent, htmlContent], () => {\n    if (activeComponent.value) {\n        hasUnsavedChanges.value = true;\n    }\n}, { deep: true });\n\nconst manifest = reactive({\n    id: '',\n    name: '',\n    author: 'Unknown',\n    description: '',\n    type: 'module',\n    entry_point: 'processor.py',\n    version: '1.0',\n    requires_input: true,\n    properties: [],\n    output_ports: [],\n    output_schema: [],\n    display_properties: { color: '', text_color: '' },\n    supported_languages: ['python']\n});\n\nconst manifestJsonString = computed(() => {\n    return JSON.stringify(manifest, null, 4);\n});\n\nconst iconSearch = ref('');\nconst commonIcons = [\n    'mdi-robot', 'mdi-brain', 'mdi-database', 'mdi-cloud', 'mdi-api', 'mdi-webhook',\n    'mdi-email', 'mdi-file-document', 'mdi-image', 'mdi-chart-bar', 'mdi-console',\n    'mdi-spider', 'mdi-shield-bug', 'mdi-lock', 'mdi-key', 'mdi-wifi', 'mdi-server',\n    'mdi-monitor-dashboard', 'mdi-play-circle', 'mdi-stop-circle', 'mdi-timer', 'mdi-bell',\n    'mdi-check-circle', 'mdi-alert', 'mdi-information', 'mdi-twitter', 'mdi-instagram'\n];\nconst neonColors = ['#FFC107', '#FFA000', '#FFD54F', '#FF6F00', '#F57F17', '#E91E63', '#00E676', '#2979FF'];\n\nconst filteredIcons = computed(() => {\n    if(!iconSearch.value) return commonIcons;\n    return commonIcons.filter(i => i.includes(iconSearch.value.toLowerCase()));\n});\n\nconst componentTypes = [\n    { id: 'module', name: 'Logic Module', desc: 'Process data and return results.', icon: 'mdi-puzzle', color: '#FFCA28', tag: 'CORE' },\n    { id: 'trigger', name: 'Event Trigger', desc: 'Watch for events and start flows.', icon: 'mdi-lightning-bolt', color: '#FFD54F', tag: 'EVENT' },\n    { id: 'action', name: 'Action Node', desc: 'Perform external API actions.', icon: 'mdi-hammer-wrench', color: '#FFA000', tag: 'ACT' },\n    { id: 'cron', name: 'Cron Job', desc: 'Scheduled execution task.', icon: 'mdi-clock-outline', color: '#00E676', tag: 'TIME' },\n    { id: 'scanner', name: 'System Scanner', desc: 'Diagnostic health checks.', icon: 'mdi-radar', color: '#E91E63', tag: 'DIAG' },\n    { id: 'web-hybrid', name: 'Hybrid App', desc: 'Cloud Frontend + Local Engine.', icon: 'mdi-web', color: '#2979FF', tag: 'HYBRID' }\n];\n\nasync function initForge(type) {\n    activeComponent.value = type;\n\n    meta.color = type.color;\n    meta.icon = type.icon;\n    meta.name = `New ${type.name}`;\n    meta.id = `com.flowork.${type.id}_${Math.floor(Math.random() * 1000)}`;\n    meta.description = type.desc;\n\n    schema.inputs = [];\n    schema.outputs = [];\n\n    codeContent.value = generatePythonTemplate(type.id);\n    htmlContent.value = generateHtmlTemplate(type.id); // [ADDED]\n\n    syncManifest();\n\n    await nextTick();\n    hasUnsavedChanges.value = false;\n}\n\nfunction generateHtmlTemplate(typeId) {\n    return `<!DOCTYPE html>\n<html>\n<head>\n    <title>Hybrid Interface</title>\n    <style>\n        body { background: #121212; color: white; font-family: sans-serif; display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; height: 100vh; margin: 0; }\n        .btn { background: #FFC107; border: none; padding: 10px 20px; font-weight: bold; cursor: pointer; }\n    </style>\n</head>\n<body>\n    <div class=\"container\">\n        <h2>${meta.name} UI</h2>\n        <button class=\"btn\" onclick=\"runAction()\">Run on Engine</button>\n        <div id=\"output\" style=\"margin-top: 20px; color: #aaa;\"></div>\n    </div>\n\n    <script>\n        window.addEventListener('message', (event) => {\n            if(event.data.type === 'APP_ACTION_RESULT') {\n                document.getElementById('output').innerText = JSON.stringify(event.data.data);\n            }\n        });\n\n        function runAction() {\n            window.parent.postMessage({\n                type: 'APP_REQUEST_ACTION',\n                action: 'process',\n                params: { sample: 'data' }\n            }, '*');\n        }\n    <\\/script>\n</body>\n</html>`;\n}\n\nfunction generatePythonTemplate(typeId) {\n    const header = `\"\"\"\\nFlowork Component: ${meta.name}\\nType: ${typeId.toUpperCase()}\\nCreated: ${new Date().toISOString()}\\n\"\"\"\\n\\n`;\n\n    if (typeId === 'trigger') {\n        return header + `import time\n\nclass CustomTrigger:\n    def __init__(self, context):\n        self.context = context\n        self.running = False\n\n    def start(self):\n        \"\"\"Called when workflow starts\"\"\"\n        self.running = True\n        self.context.log(\"Trigger Started\")\n        self.loop()\n\n    def loop(self):\n        \"\"\"Main polling loop\"\"\"\n        while self.running:\n            # Check for events here\n            # event = check_api()\n            # if event:\n            #     self.context.emit(event)\n\n            time.sleep(5) # Prevent CPU hogging\n\n    def stop(self):\n        self.running = False\n`;\n    }\n\n    else if (typeId === 'module' || typeId === 'action' || typeId === 'web-hybrid') { // [UPDATED] Added hybrid support\n        return header + `def process(input_data, context):\n    \"\"\"\n    Main processing function.\n    Args:\n        input_data (dict): Data passed from previous node or trigger.\n        context (Context): Flowork execution context (logger, env, etc).\n    \"\"\"\n    context.log(f\"Processing data: {input_data}\")\n\n    # 1. Get Property (Input)\n    # api_key = context.get_property('api_key')\n\n    # 2. Logic\n    result = {\n        \"status\": \"success\",\n        \"processed_at\": context.timestamp(),\n        \"data\": input_data,\n        \"message\": \"Processed by Flowork Engine\"\n    }\n\n    # 3. Return Output\n    return result\n`;\n    }\n\n    else if (typeId === 'scanner') {\n        return header + `def scan(context):\n    \"\"\"\n    Diagnostic Scan Function\n    \"\"\"\n    health_score = 100\n    issues = []\n\n    # Check something\n    # if not check_db():\n    #     health_score -= 50\n    #     issues.append(\"DB Connection Failed\")\n\n    return {\n        \"healthy\": health_score > 80,\n        \"score\": health_score,\n        \"issues\": issues\n    }\n`;\n    }\n\n    return header + `# Unknown Type`;\n}\n\nfunction syncManifest() {\n    manifest.id = meta.id;\n    manifest.name = meta.name;\n    manifest.description = meta.description;\n    manifest.display_properties.color = meta.color;\n    manifest.type = activeComponent.value?.id || 'module';\n\n    manifest.properties = schema.inputs.map(inp => ({\n        id: inp.name,\n        type: inp.type,\n        label: inp.label || inp.name,\n        default: null,\n        description: \"\"\n    }));\n\n    manifest.output_ports = schema.outputs.map(outp => ({\n        name: outp.name,\n        display_name: outp.name,\n        tooltip: outp.description || \"\",\n        type: outp.type\n    }));\n\n    manifest.output_schema = schema.outputs.map(outp => ({\n        name: outp.name,\n        type: outp.type,\n        description: outp.description\n    }));\n}\n\nfunction updateColor(color) {\n    meta.color = color;\n    syncManifest();\n}\n\nfunction updateIcon(icon) {\n    meta.icon = icon;\n}\n\nfunction addPort(type) {\n    if(type === 'input') {\n        schema.inputs.push({ name: 'new_property', label: 'New Property', type: 'string' });\n    } else {\n        schema.outputs.push({ name: 'result', description: 'Main result', type: 'json' });\n    }\n    syncManifest();\n}\n\nfunction removePort(type, index) {\n    if(type === 'input') schema.inputs.splice(index, 1);\n    else schema.outputs.splice(index, 1);\n    syncManifest();\n}\n\nfunction injectCode(snippet) {\n    let code = \"\";\n    if(snippet === 'input_handler') {\n        code = `\\n    # Validate Input\\n    if 'target' not in input_data:\\n        raise ValueError(\"Missing 'target' in input data\")\\n`;\n    } else if (snippet === 'http_request') {\n        code = `\\n    # HTTP Request\\n    response = requests.get('https://api.example.com/data')\\n    if response.status_code != 200:\\n        raise Exception(\"API Failed\")\\n    data = response.json()\\n`;\n    } else if (snippet === 'logger') {\n        code = `\\n    context.log(\"Info: Operation started...\", level=\"info\")\\n`;\n    } else if (snippet === 'error_handling') {\n        code = `\\n    try:\\n        # Unsafe code here\\n        pass\\n    except Exception as e:\\n        context.log(f\"Error: {str(e)}\", level=\"error\")\\n        return {\"status\": \"error\", \"message\": str(e)}\\n`;\n    }\n\n    codeContent.value += code;\n}\n\nasync function handleBack() {\n    if (activeComponent.value) {\n        if (hasUnsavedChanges.value) {\n            const confirmed = await uiStore.showConfirmation({\n                title: 'Unsaved Changes',\n                text: 'Return to Hub? Unsaved changes will be lost.',\n                color: 'warning',\n                confirmText: 'Discard & Leave'\n            });\n            if (!confirmed) return;\n        }\n        activeComponent.value = null;\n        hasUnsavedChanges.value = false;\n    } else {\n        router.push({ name: 'Dashboard' });\n    }\n}\n\n/**\n * [MODIFIED BY FLOWORK DEV]\n * Now calls the Component Store to persist data to Gateway/Core.\n * Supports Hybrid Apps (Sends HTML content as well).\n */\nasync function saveComponent() {\n    if (!activeEngine.value) {\n        uiStore.showNotification({ text: \"Please select a Target Engine first!\", color: \"warning\" });\n        return;\n    }\n\n    isSaving.value = true;\n    syncManifest();\n\n    if (!manifest.id.includes(\".\")) {\n        uiStore.showNotification({ text: \"ID must contain dots (e.g. com.user.module)\", color: \"error\" });\n        isSaving.value = false;\n        return;\n    }\n\n    const payload = {\n        id: manifest.id,\n        type: manifest.type,\n        code: codeContent.value,\n        html: htmlContent.value, // [ADDED] Hybrid HTML\n        manifest: manifest,\n        requirements: requirementsContent.value,\n        engineId: activeEngine.value.id // [ADDED] Target specific engine\n    };\n\n    const result = await componentStore.saveCustomComponent(payload);\n\n    if (result.success) {\n        hasUnsavedChanges.value = false;\n        uiStore.showNotification({ text: \"Build Saved to Engine & Cloud!\", color: \"success\" });\n    } else {\n        uiStore.showNotification({ text: \"Save Failed: \" + result.error, color: \"error\" });\n    }\n\n    isSaving.value = false;\n}\n\n/**\n * [MODIFIED] Real Test Run on Hybrid Engine\n */\nasync function testRun() {\n    if (!activeEngine.value) {\n        uiStore.showNotification({ text: \"No Engine Selected. Connect to an Engine via Tunnel first.\", color: \"error\" });\n        return;\n    }\n\n    isTesting.value = true;\n\n\n    try {\n        const result = await engineStore.executeTask({\n            engineId: activeEngine.value.id,\n            componentId: meta.id,\n            action: 'test_run', // Special action or default entry point\n            payload: {\n                test_input: \"Flowork Hybrid Test\"\n            },\n            temporary_code: codeContent.value // Send code directly for hot-testing?\n        });\n\n        uiStore.showNotification({ text: \"Test Execution Sent!\", color: \"info\" });\n        console.log(\"Test Result:\", result);\n\n    } catch (error) {\n        uiStore.showNotification({ text: \"Test Failed: \" + error.message, color: \"error\" });\n    } finally {\n        isTesting.value = false;\n    }\n}\n</script>\n\n<style scoped>\n@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Fira+Code:wght@400;500&display=swap');\n@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Orbitron:wght@500;700;900&display=swap');\n\n.orbitron-font { font-family: 'Orbitron', sans-serif; storeToRefs } from 'pinia';\nimport NeuralCanvasBackground from '@/components/NeuralCanvasBackground.vue';\n\nconst articleStore = useArticlesStore();\nconst localeStore = useLocaleStore();\nconst { myArticles, isLoading, error } = storeToRefs(articleStore);\nconst t = localeStore.loc;\n\nconst publicArticles = ref([]);\nconst loadingPublic = ref(false);\n\nasync function fetchPublicInspiration() {\n    loadingPublic.value = true;\n    try {\n        const response = await fetch('/api/v1/content/articles/list?mode=all&limit=6');\n        if (response.ok) {\n            const data = await response.json();\n            publicArticles.value = Array.isArray(data) ? data : (data.data || []);\n        }\n    } catch (e) {\n        console.warn(\"Signal lost:\", e);\n    } finally {\n        loadingPublic.value = false;\n    }\n}\n\nonMounted(() => {\n  const initData = async () => {\n    await articleStore.fetchMyArticles();\n    if (myArticles.value.length === 0) {\n        await fetchPublicInspiration();\n    }\n  };\n\n  if (typeof t !== 'function') {\n    localeStore.fetchDictionary().then(() => {\n        initData();\n    });\n  } else {\n    initData();\n  }\n});\n\nfunction getDisplayStatus(item) {\n    let statusKey = item.status.toLowerCase();\n    let colorClass = 'status-grey'; // Default\n\n    if (statusKey === 'pending' && item.publish_at && new Date(item.publish_at) > new Date()) {\n        statusKey = 'scheduled';\n    }\n\n    switch (statusKey) {\n        case 'published': colorClass = 'status-green'; break;\n        case 'pending': colorClass = 'status-orange'; break;\n        case 'scheduled': colorClass = 'status-blue'; break;\n        case 'draft': colorClass = 'status-gold'; break; // Gold for draft\n        case 'hidden': colorClass = 'status-grey'; break;\n    }\n\n    const text = t(`articles.statuses.${statusKey}`) || item.status;\n    return { text, colorClass };\n}\n\nasync function handleDelete(articleId) {\n    const articleToDelete = myArticles.value.find(art => art.id === articleId);\n    const title = articleToDelete ? articleToDelete.title : 'this article';\n    const confirmMessage = t('articles_delete_confirm', { title: title });\n    if (confirm(confirmMessage)) {\n        await articleStore.deleteArticle(articleId);\n    }\n}\n\nfunction getPublicUrl(item) {\n  const lang = item.language || 'en';\n  return `/p-${item.slug}-${lang}.html`;\n}\n</script>\n\n<style scoped>\n.my-articles-page {\n  min-height: 100vh;\n  position: relative;\n  z-index: 1;\n  padding-bottom: content-class=\"cyber-tooltip\">\n                                        <template v-slot:activator=\"{ props }\">\n                                            <v-btn icon=\"mdi-link-off\" variant=\"text\" size=\"small\" v-bind=\"props\" color=\"grey-darken-1\" @click.stop=\"handleLeaveEngine(engine)\"></v-btn>\n                                        </template>\n                                    </v-tooltip>\n                                </div>\n                            </div>\n                        </div>\n                    </div>\n\n                </div>\n            </div>\n        </v-card>\n      </div>\n    </v-container>\n\n    <v-dialog v-model=\"isRegisterDialogOpen\" max-width=\"500px\" persistent>\n      <v-card class=\"pro-dialog-card\">\n        <div class=\"dialog-header\">\n            <span class=\"text-subtitle-2 font-weight-bold font-mono text-amber-darken-1\">DEPLOY NEW REACTOR</span>\n        </div>\n        <v-card-text class=\"pa-4\">\n          <p class=\"text-caption mb-3 font-mono text-grey-lighten-1\">Initialize new processing node parameters.</p>\n          <v-text-field\n            v-model=\"newEngineName\"\n            label=\"NODE_IDENTIFIER\"\n            variant=\"outlined\"\n            autofocus\n            hide-details\n            bg-color=\"rgba(255,255,255,0.05)\"\n            color=\"amber-darken-1\"\n            class=\"font-mono terminal-input-field\"\n            @keyup.enter=\"confirmRegisterEngine\"\n          ></v-text-field>\n        </v-card-text>\n        <v-card-actions class=\"pa-4 pt-0 justify-end\">\n          <v-btn color=\"grey\" variant=\"text\" @click=\"isRegisterDialogOpen = false\" class=\"font-mono\">ABORT</v-btn>\n          <v-btn color=\"amber-darken-1\" variant=\"flat\" @click=\"confirmRegisterEngine\" :loading=\"isLoading\" class=\"font-mono font-weight-bold text-black\">\n            INITIALIZE\n          </v-btn>\n        </v-card-actions>\n      </v-card>\n    </v-dialog>\n\n    <v-dialog v-model=\"isRenameDialogOpen\" max-width=\"400px\">\n        <v-card class=\"pro-dialog-card\">\n            <div class=\"dialog-header\"><span class=\"font-mono text-white\">RENAME_NODE</span></div>\n            <v-card-text class=\"pa-4\">\n                <v-text-field v-model=\"renameEngineName\" variant=\"outlined\" density=\"compact\" hide-details class=\"font-mono terminal-input-field\"></v-text-field>\n            </v-card-text>\n            <v-card-actions class=\"pa-4 pt-0 justify-end\">\n                <v-btn color=\"amber-darken-1\" variant=\"tonal\" @click=\"confirmRenameEngine\">UPDATE</v-btn>\n            </v-card-actions>\n        </v-card>\n    </v-dialog>\n\n    <v-dialog v-model=\"isShareDialogOpen\" max-width=\"600px\">\n        <v-card class=\"pro-dialog-card\">\n            <div class=\"dialog-header\"><span class=\"font-mono text-white\">ACCESS_CONTROL</span></div>\n            <v-card-text class=\"pa-4\">\n                <div class=\"d-flex gap-2 mb-4\">\n                    <v-text-field v-model=\"newShareIdentifier\" placeholder=\"User Public Address\" variant=\"outlined\" density=\"compact\" hide-details class=\"font-mono terminal-input-field flex-grow-1\"></v-text-field>\n                    <v-btn color=\"amber-darken-1\" variant=\"flat\" @click=\"handleGrantShare\" :loading=\"isShareLoading\" class=\"font-mono\">GRANT</v-btn>\n                </div>\n                <div class=\"text-caption font-mono text-grey mb-2\">ACTIVE_SHARES</div>\n                <div v-if=\"sharesForEngine.length === 0\" class=\"text-center pa-2 text-grey-darken-2 font-mono text-caption\">NONE</div>\n                <div v-else class=\"share-list\">\n                    <div v-for=\"share in sharesForEngine\" :key=\"share.user_id\" class=\"d-flex justify-space-between align-center py-2 border-bottom-subtle\">\n                        <span class=\"font-mono text-caption text-white\">{{ share.username || share.public_address }}</span>\n                        <v-btn icon=\"mdi-close\" size=\"x-small\" variant=\"text\" color=\"red\" @click=\"handleRevokeShare(share.user_id)\"></v-btn>\n                    </div>\n                </div>\n            </v-card-text>\n        </v-card>\n    </v-dialog>\n\n  </div>\n</template>\n\n<script setup>\nimport { ref, onMounted, computed } from 'vue';\nimport { useEngineStore } from '@/store/engines';\nimport { useUiStore } from '@/store/ui';\nimport { storeToRefs } from 'pinia';\nimport { apiUpdateEngine, apiResetEngineToken } from '@/api';\nimport NeuralCanvasBackground from '@/components/NeuralCanvasBackground.vue';\n\nconst uiStore = useUiStore();\nconst engineStore = useEngineStore();\n\nconst { allAvailableEngines, isLoading, error, selectedEngineId } = storeToRefs(engineStore);\nconst ownedEngines = computed(() => allAvailableEngines.value.filter(e => e.isOwner));\nconst sharedWithMeEngines = computed(() => allAvailableEngines.value.filter(e => !e.isOwner));\n\nconst maxSlots = 16;\nconst reactorSlots = computed(() => {\n    const slots = [...ownedEngines.value];\n    const placeholdersCount = Math.max(0, maxSlots - slots.length);\n\n    for (let i = 0; i < placeholdersCount; i++) {\n        slots.push({ isPlaceholder: true });\n    }\n    return slots;\n});\n\nconst isRegisterDialogOpen = ref(false);\nconst newEngineName = ref('');\nconst isRenameDialogOpen = ref(false);\nconst engineToRename = ref(null);\nconst renameEngineName = ref('');\nconst isShareDialogOpen = ref(false);\nconst engineToManageShares = ref(null);\nconst sharesForEngine = ref([]);\nconst newShareIdentifier = ref('');\nconst newShareRole = ref('reader');\nconst isShareLoading = ref(false);\n\nconst refreshData = () => { engineStore.fetchEngines(); };\nfunction isEngineSelected(id) { return selectedEngineId.value === id; }\n\nasync function handleConnectEngine(engine) {\n    if (engine.isPlaceholder) {\n        openRegisterDialog();\n        return;\n    }\n    if (engine.status !== 'online') {\n        uiStore.showNotification({ text: 'Node OFFLINE. Cannot engage.', color: 'red-darken-4' });\n        return;\n    }\n    if (isEngineSelected(engine.id)) return;\n    await engineStore.setSelectedEngineId(engine.id, true);\n    uiStore.showNotification({ text: `Engine '${engine.name}' engaged.`, color: 'amber-darken-4' });\n}\n\nfunction getReactorClass(engine) {\n    if (isEngineSelected(engine.id)) return 'reactor-active';\n    if (engine.status === 'online') return 'reactor-online';\n    return 'reactor-offline';\n}\n\nfunction getLoadColor(val) {\n    if (!val) return 'text-grey-darken-1';\n    if (val > 80) return 'text-red-accent-2';\n    if (val > 50) return 'text-amber-accent-2';\n    return 'text-green-accent-3';\n}\nfunction getLoadColorHex(val) {\n    if (!val) return '#333';\n    if (val > 80) return '#FF5252';\n    if (val > 50) return '#FFAB40';\n    return '#69F0AE';\n}\n\nfunction openRegisterDialog() { newEngineName.value = ''; isRegisterDialogOpen.value = true; }\nasync function confirmRegisterEngine() {\n  if (newEngineName.value.trim()) {\n    const success = await engineStore.registerEngine(newEngineName.value.trim());\n    if (success) isRegisterDialogOpen.value = false;\n  }\n}\n\nasync function handleDeleteEngine(engine) {\n    const confirmed = await uiStore.showConfirmation({\n        title: 'CONFIRM DECOMMISSION',\n        text: `Permanently remove reactor \"${engine.name}\"? This will sever all connections.`,\n        color: 'error',\n        confirmText: 'NUKE IT'\n    });\n    if (confirmed) await engineStore.deleteEngine(engine.id);\n}\n\nasync function handleLeaveEngine(engine) {\n    const confirmed = await uiStore.showConfirmation({\n        title: 'SEVER UPLINK',\n        text: `Disconnect from shared node \"${engine.name}\"?`,\n        color: 'warning',\n        confirmText: 'DISCONNECT'\n    });\n}\n\nasync function handleResetToken(engine) {\n    const confirmed = await uiStore.showConfirmation({\n        title: 'REKEY AUTHENTICATION',\n        text: `Regenerate secure token for \"${engine.name}\"? Existing connections will terminate.`,\n        color: 'warning',\n        confirmText: 'REKEY'\n    });\n    if (confirmed) {\n        try {\n            const response = await apiResetEngineToken(engine.id);\n            uiStore.showTokenDialog({\n                title: 'NEW ACCESS CREDENTIALS',\n                text: 'UPDATE .ENV CONFIGURATION:',\n                items: [ { label: 'FLOWORK_ENGINE_ID', value: response.engine_id }, { label: 'FLOWORK_ENGINE_TOKEN', value: response.token } ]\n            });\n        } catch (e) {}\n    }\n}\n\nfunction openRenameDialog(engine) { engineToRename.value = engine; renameEngineName.value = engine.name; isRenameDialogOpen.value = true; }\nasync function confirmRenameEngine() {\n    if (engineToRename.value && renameEngineName.value.trim()) {\n        await apiUpdateEngine(engineToRename.value.id, { name: renameEngineName.value.trim() });\n        refreshData(); isRenameDialogOpen.value = false;\n    }\n}\n\nasync function openShareDialog(engine) {\n    engineToManageShares.value = engine; isShareDialogOpen.value = true; isShareLoading.value = true; sharesForEngine.value = [];\n    try {\n        const rawShares = await engineStore.fetchEngineShares(engine.id);\n        sharesForEngine.value = rawShares.filter(s => s.engine_id === engine.id);\n    } finally { isShareLoading.value = false; }\n}\n\nasync function handleGrantShare() {\n    if (engineToManageShares.value && newShareIdentifier.value.trim()) {\n        isShareLoading.value = true;\n        await engineStore.grantShare(engineToManageShares.value.id, newShareIdentifier.value.trim(), newShareRole.value);\n        isShareLoading.value = false; newShareIdentifier.value = '';\n        openShareDialog(engineToManageShares.value);\n    }\n}\nasync function handleRevokeShare(uid) {\n    isShareLoading.value = true;\n    await engineStore.revokeShare(engineToManageShares.value.id, uid);\n    isShareLoading.value = false;\n    openShareDialog(engineToManageShares.value);\n}\n\nonMounted(() => { refreshData(); });\n</script>\n\n<style scoped>\n@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Fira+Code:wght@400;500;700&display=swap');\n@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Orbitron:wght@400;500;700;900&display=swap');\n\n.my-engines-page {\n  position: fixed; Dynamic Component Discovery (DCD): Hub wajib melakukan scanning file secara otomatis.\n//#2. Lazy Loading: Modul hanya di-import ke RAM saat dipanggil (On-Demand).\n//#3. Atomic Isolation: 1 File = 1 Fungsi dengan nama file yang identik dengan nama fungsi aslinya.\n//#4. Zero Logic Mutation: Dilarang merubah alur logika, nama variabel, atau struktur if/try/loop.\n//#######################################################################\n\n<template>\n  <v-container fluid class=\"fill-height bg-deep pa-0\">\n    <div class=\"neural-ambient-fx\"></div>\n\n    <div class=\"d-flex flex-column w-100 h-100 z-5\">\n\n      <div class=\"d-flex align-center pa-6 border-gold-thin bg-glass-dark\">\n        <div class=\"d-flex align-center\">\n            <v-icon color=\"#FFD700\" size=\"44\" class=\"mr-4 glow-icon-gold animate-soft-pulse\">mdi-brain-sync</v-icon>\n            <div>\n              <div class=\"text-h4 font-weight-black text-white orbitron-font tracking-tighter uppercase\">Neural<span class=\"text-gold-subtle\">Ingestor</span></div>\n              <div class=\"text-caption text-grey font-mono letter-spacing-2\">FLOWORK DATA FACTORY \u2022 MULTI-THREAD DISTILLERY</div>\n            </div>\n        </div>\n        <v-spacer></v-spacer>\n        <v-btn icon=\"mdi-close\" color=\"white\" variant=\"text\" to=\"/ai-trainer\" size=\"large\"></v-btn>\n      </div>\n\n      <div class=\"d-flex flex-grow-1 overflow-hidden\">\n\n        <div class=\"sidebar-area pa-6 border-r-elegant custom-scrollbar\">\n          <div class=\"text-overline text-gold mb-4 opacity-40 letter-spacing-3 font-orbitron\">1. '#00E676' : '#FFD700'\" class=\"mb-3\">\n                {{ files.length > 0 ? 'mdi-folder-check' : 'mdi-folder-plus-outline' }}\n              </v-icon>\n              <div v-if=\"files.length === 0\" class=\"text-white font-mono text-body-2\">SCAN REPOSITORY</div>\n              <div v-else class=\"text-green-accent-3 font-mono text-h6\">{{ files.length }} FILES LOCKED</div>\n            </div>\n          </v-card>\n\n          <div class=\"text-overline text-gold mb-2 opacity-40 letter-spacing-3 font-orbitron\">2. text-grey-darken-2 font-mono mt-2\">Maximum speed: 1 teacher per chunk.</div>\n          </v-card>\n\n          <v-btn\n            block\n            color=\"#FFD700\"\n            height=\"70\"\n            class=\"text-black font-weight-black orbitron-font glow-gold-btn\"\n            :loading=\"ingestorStore.isDistilling\"\n            :disabled=\"selectedTeachers.length === 0 || files.length === 0\"\n            @click=\"startParallelProcessing\"\n          >\n            <v-icon start size=\"large\">mdi-flash</v-icon> IGNITE ENGINE\n          </v-btn>\n        </div>\n\n        <div class=\"flex-grow-1 d-flex flex-column pa-6 bg-terminal-dark\">\n\n          <v-expand-transition>\n            <div v-if=\"ingestorStore.isDistilling\" class=\"neo-glass-card pa-8 mb-6 slide-up-fx\">\n                <div class=\"d-flex align-center justify-space-between mb-4\">\n                  <div class=\"text-h5 text-white font-mono uppercase tracking-widest\">Neural Threads: <span class=\"text-gold\">{{ selectedTeachers.length }}</span></div>\n                  <div class=\"text-h4 text-gold font-mono\">{{ progressPercent }}%</div>\n                </div>\n                <v-progress-linear :model-value=\"progressPercent\" color=\"#FFD700\" height=\"10\" rounded striped indeterminate></v-progress-linear>\n                <div class=\"mt-4 d-flex align-center\">\n                    <v-icon color=\"#FFD700\" size=\"18\" class=\"mr-2 spin-fx\">mdi-loading</v-icon>\n                    <div class=\"text-caption text-grey font-mono uppercase tracking-wide\">{{ currentLog }}</div>\n                </div>\n            </div>\n          </v-expand-transition>\n\n          <v-card class=\"neo-glass-card flex-grow-1 d-flex flex-column overflow-hidden border-gold-muted\">\n             <div class=\"pa-4 border-b-elegant d-flex align-center bg-terminal-header\">\n                <v-icon color=\"#FFD700\" size=\"small\" class=\"mr-2\">mdi-code-json</v-icon>\n                <span class=\"text-caption text-gold font-mono tracking-widest uppercase\">knowledge_distillation_stream</span>\n                <v-spacer></v-spacer>\n                <div v-if=\"distilledData.length\" class=\"text-caption text-green font-mono font-weight-bold\">\n                    [ {{ distilledData.length }} NODES EXTRACTED ]\n                </div>\n             </div>\n\n             <div class=\"flex-grow-1 pa-4 bg-terminal-inner custom-scrollbar overflow-auto\">\n                <pre v-if=\"distilledData.length\" class=\"json-code font-mono\">{{ formattedJson }}</pre>\n                <div v-else-if=\"!ingestorStore.isDistilling\" class=\"d-flex flex-column align-center justify-center h-100 opacity-20\">\n                    <v-icon size=\"100\" color=\"#FFD700\" class=\"mb-4\">mdi-database-clock-outline</v-icon>\n                    <div class=\"text-h5 text-white font-mono tracking-widest\">AWAITING_SIGNAL</div>\n                </div>\n             </div>\n\n             <div v-if=\"distilledData.length && !ingestorStore.isDistilling\" class=\"pa-6 bg-glass-bottom d-flex align-center fade-in-fx\">\n                <v-btn variant=\"text\" color=\"grey-darken-1\" class=\"font-mono mr-6\" @click=\"resetEngine\">PURGE BUFFER</v-btn>\n                <v-spacer></v-spacer>\n                <v-select\n                    v-model=\"targetDataset\"\n                    :items=\"datasets.map(d => d.name)\"\n                    label=\"Inject to Dataset Library\"\n                    variant=\"outlined\"\n                    density=\"compact\"\n                    hide-details\n                    class=\"mr-4 gold-select-mini\"\n                ></v-select>\n                <v-btn color=\"green-accent-4\" variant=\"flat\" class=\"text-black font-weight-black px-12\" height=\"44\" @click=\"commitToEliteDB\">\n                    INJECT TO SQL ELITE\n                </v-btn>\n             </div>\n          </v-card>\n        </div>\n\n      </div>\n    </div>\n  </v-container>\n</template>\n\n<script setup>\nimport { ref, computed, onMounted } from 'vue';\nimport { useNeuralIngestorStore } from '@/store/neuralIngestor';\nimport { useAiCenterStore } from '@/store/aiCenter';\nimport { useDatasetStore } from '@/store/datasets';\nimport { useUiStore } from '@/store/ui';\nimport { storeToRefs } from 'pinia';\n\nconst ingestorStore = useNeuralIngestorStore();\nconst aiStore = useAiCenterStore();\nconst datasetStore = useDatasetStore();\nconst uiStore = useUiStore();\n\nconst { readyModels } = storeToRefs(aiStore);\nconst { datasets } = storeToRefs(datasetStore);\n\nconst folderInput = ref(null);\nconst files = ref([]);\nconst selectedTeachers = ref([]);\nconst targetDataset = ref(null);\nconst distilledData = ref([]);\n\nconst currentLog = ref('STANDBY');\nconst progressPercent = ref(0);\n\nconst formattedJson = computed(() => JSON.stringify(distilledData.value, null, 2));\n\nonMounted(async () => {\n  await aiStore.fetchAiStatus();\n  await datasetStore.fetchDatasets();\n});\n\nfunction triggerFolderScan() { folderInput.value.click(); }\n\nfunction handleFolderSelect(event) {\n  const selected = Array.from(event.target.files);\n  files.value = selected.filter(f => /\\.(txt|md|json|py|js|html|docx|pdf)$/i.test(f.name));\n}\n\nasync function startParallelProcessing() {\n  ingestorStore.isDistilling = true;\n  distilledData.value = [];\n  progressPercent.value = 0;\n\n  const allChunks = [];\n  currentLog.value = \"FRAGMENTING DATA REPOSITORY...\";\n\n  for (const file of files.value) {\n    const content = await readFileContent(file);\n    const lines = content.split('\\n');\n    const chunkSize = 1000;\n    for (let j = 0; j < lines.length; j += chunkSize) {\n      allChunks.push({\n        name: `${file.name} (Ch ${Math.floor(j/chunkSize) + 1})`,\n        text: lines.slice(j, j + chunkSize).join('\\n')\n      });\n    }\n  }\n\n  const total = allChunks.length;\n  let finished = 0;\n  const numTeachers = selectedTeachers.value.length;\n\n  const dispatchTasks = async () => {\n    const pool = [];\n    const maxConcurrent = 6;\n\n    for (let i = 0; i < allChunks.length; i++) {\n        const chunk = allChunks[i];\n        const teacherId = selectedTeachers.value[i % numTeachers];\n\n        const p = (async () => {\n            try {\n                currentLog.value = `Teacher [${teacherId}] distilling: ${chunk.name}`;\n                const result = await ingestorStore.distillChunk(chunk.text, teacherId);\n                if (Array.isArray(result)) {\n                    distilledData.value.push(...result);\n                }\n                finished++;\n                progressPercent.value = Math.round((finished / total) * 100);\n            } catch (err) {\n                console.error(`Thread error for teacher ${teacherId}:`, err);\n            }\n        })();\n\n        pool.push(p);\n\n        if (pool.length >= maxConcurrent) {\n            await Promise.race(pool);\n            pool.splice(pool.findIndex(task => task.status === 'fulfilled'), 1);\n        }\n    }\n    await Promise.all(pool);\n  };\n\n  try {\n    await dispatchTasks();\n    uiStore.showNotification({ text: \"Neural Ingestion Complete!\", color: \"success\" });\n  } catch (e) {\n    uiStore.showNotification({ text: \"Engine Interrupted.\", color: \"error\" });\n  } finally {\n    ingestorStore.isDistilling = false;\n    currentLog.value = \"IDLE\";\n  }\n}\n\nasync function readFileContent(file) {\n  return new Promise((resolve) => {\n    const reader = new FileReader();\n    reader.onload = (e) => resolve(e.target.result);\n    reader.readAsText(file);\n  });\n}\n\nasync function commitToEliteDB() {\n  if (!targetDataset.value) return;\n  const success = await datasetStore.addDataToSelectedDataset(distilledData.value, targetDataset.value);\n  if (success) {\n    uiStore.showNotification({ text: \"Knowledge injected to SQL Elite!\", color: \"success\" });\n    distilledData.value = [];\n  }\n}\n\nfunction resetEngine() {\n  files.value = [];\n  distilledData.value = [];\n  progressPercent.value = 0;\n}\n</script>\n\n<style scoped>\n.bg-deep { background-color: #000; position: relative; }\n.neural-ambient-fx {\n    position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; right: 0; bottom: 0;\n    background: radial-gradient(circle at 70% 30%, rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.05) 0%, transparent 50%),\n                radial-gradient(circle at 20% 80%, rgba(0, 245, 255, 0.02) 0%, transparent 40%);\n}\n\n.sidebar-area { width: 380px; background: rgba(5, 5, 8, 0.95); z-index: 10; }\n.bg-terminal-dark { background: #010101; }\n.border-gold-thin { border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.1) !important; }\n.border-r-elegant { border-right: 1px solid rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.1) !important; }\n.border-b-elegant { border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.1) !important; }\n.border-gold-muted { border: 1px solid rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.15) !important; }\n\n.neo-glass-card { background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.02); backdrop-filter: blur(25px); border-radius: 4px; }\n.bg-glass-dark { background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7); backdrop-filter: blur(15px); }\n.text-gold-subtle { color: rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.4); font-weight: 200; }\n.bg-terminal-inner { background: #000; }\n.json-code { color: #00FF9C; font-size: 0.85rem; line-height: 1.6; white-space: pre-wrap; }\n\n.scanner-zone { cursor: pointer; transition: 0.3s; border: 2px dashed rgba(255,215,0,0.15); }\n.scanner-zone:hover { background: rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.05); border-color: #FFD700; }\n\n.orbitron-font { font-family: 'Orbitron', sans-serif !important; }\n.glow-icon-gold { filter: drop-shadow(0 0 15px rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.3)); }\n.animate-soft-pulse { animation: softPulse 3s infinite ease-in-out; }\n@keyframes softPulse { 0%, 100% { transform: scale(1); opacity: 0.7; } 50% { transform: scale(1.05); opacity: 1; } }\n\n.glow-gold-btn { box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.1); }\n.custom-scrollbar::-webkit-scrollbar { width: 3px; }\n.custom-scrollbar::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb { background: rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.2); border-radius: 10px; }\n\n.gold-select :deep(.v-field) { background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.02) !important; }\n.gold-select-mini :deep(.v-field) { background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05) !important; color: white !important; font-family:   } catch (e) {\n        return dateString;\n    }\n}\n\nfunction truncateText(text, length) {\n    if (!text) return '';\n    return text.length > length ? text.substring(0, length) + '...' : Use of Your Information</h2>\n                <p>Having accurate information about you permits us to provide you with a smooth, efficient, and customized experience.
